brandInfo.name: Abercrombie & Fitch
brandInfo.description: Abercrombie & Fitch is an American lifestyle retailer that focuses on casual wear. Its fragrances, particularly the iconic 'Fierce', are known for their fresh, clean, and distinctly masculine appeal, capturing a youthful and energetic spirit.

perfumes.description: A fresh and uplifting aromatic fougère, Beacon is a scent that guides and inspires. It combines fresh aromatic notes with a clean, musky base, creating a sense of clarity and confidence.

The iconic signature scent of Abercrombie & Fitch, Fierce is a powerful and captivating aromatic fougère. It's a bold and masculine blend of fresh citrus, rich woods, and warm musk that has become a modern classic.

Fierce Icon is a modern and intensified interpretation of the original Fierce. It amplifies the signature freshness with a deeper, more complex blend of pepper, woods, and leather, creating a bold and unforgettable impression.

First Instinct is a modern and sensual aromatic fougère that captures the thrill of a first glance. It's a captivating blend of gin & tonic accord and melon, with a heart of pepper and a warm, ambery musk base.

brandInfo.name: Acqua Di Parma
brandInfo.description: Acqua di Parma is an Italian lifestyle and fashion company that produces fragrances, candles, bathrobes, and leather accessories. All of its products are made in Italy, and the brand is a symbol of Italian luxury and craftsmanship. Its fragrances often evoke the scents of the Italian Mediterranean.

perfumes.description: The original Colonia is the essence of Italian elegance and timelessness. A fresh, citrusy, and aromatic fragrance that has been a symbol of style since 1916.

A delicate and radiant floral fragrance that captures the beauty of cherry blossoms in bloom. Sakura is a fresh and luminous scent that combines the sweetness of cherry blossom with the brightness of bergamot and a soft, musky base.

A vibrant and sparkling citrus-aromatic fragrance that celebrates the rare yuzu fruit. Yuzu is a fresh and energetic scent that combines the bitterness of yuzu with the warmth of Sichuan pepper and a touch of violet.

A rich and opulent spicy-floral fragrance that celebrates the precious saffron spice. Zafferano is a warm and sensual scent that combines the spiciness of saffron with the sweetness of orange blossom and a touch of vanilla.

A sweet and gourmand fragrance that evokes the scents of Sicily. Mandorlo di Sicilia is a comforting and delicious scent that combines the sweetness of almond with the freshness of star anise and a creamy, vanilla base.

A fresh and dynamic aromatic-fougere fragrance that captures the spirit of an exclusive sports club. Colonia Club is a sophisticated and invigorating scent that combines the freshness of mint with the greenness of galbanum and a woody, musky base.

A rich and elegant woody-spicy fragrance that combines the freshness of Colonia with the warmth of ebony wood. Colonia Ebano is a sophisticated and masculine scent that blends citrus notes with spices and a precious wood base.

A charismatic and intense woody-citrus fragrance, Colonia Intensa is a tribute to the modern man. It is a sophisticated and confident scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of leather and a precious wood base.

A magnificent and charismatic amber-woody fragrance, Colonia Oud is a fusion of Italian freshness and oriental richness. It combines the iconic citrus notes of Colonia with the precious and intense aroma of oud wood.

A sophisticated and elegant leather fragrance that combines the freshness of Colonia with the warmth of Tuscan leather. Colonia Leather is a charismatic and masculine scent that is both modern and timeless.

A modern and luminous interpretation of the classic Colonia, Colonia Pura is a fresh and vibrant citrus-aromatic fragrance. It is a light and sophisticated scent that is perfect for the modern gentleman.

A noble and powerful woody-chypre fragrance that combines the freshness of Colonia with the richness of oakmoss absolute. Colonia Quercia is a sophisticated and elegant scent that is perfect for the modern gentleman.

A modern and sophisticated interpretation of the classic Colonia, Colonia Essenza is a woody-citrus fragrance that is both elegant and charismatic. It is a vibrant and intense scent that is perfect for the modern gentleman.

A relaxing and radiant citrus fragrance that captures the sunny atmosphere of the island of Capri. Arancia di Capri is a delightful and uplifting scent that combines the sweetness of orange with the freshness of mandarin and a touch of caramel.

A sparkling and vibrant woody-aromatic fragrance that celebrates the majestic bergamot of Calabria. Bergamotto di Calabria is a fresh and uplifting scent that combines the bitterness of bergamot with the warmth of ginger and a woody base.
A dynamic and aromatic fragrance that evokes the wild nature of Sardinia. Ginepro di Sardegna is a fresh and spicy scent that combines the energy of juniper with the warmth of sage and a woody base.

A regenerating and aromatic fragrance that evokes the island of Panarea. Mirto di Panarea is a fresh and uplifting scent that combines the aromatic notes of myrtle with the freshness of basil and a marine accord.
A vibrant and joyful fragrance that evokes the beauty of the Amalfi coast. Fico di Amalfi is a fresh and fruity scent that combines the sweetness of fig with the freshness of citrus and a woody base.

A sophisticated and elegant floral fragrance that celebrates the peony flower. Peonia Nobile is a vibrant and feminine scent that combines the freshness of raspberry with the richness of peony and a warm, ambery base.

A rich and enveloping amber-gourmand fragrance that celebrates the precious vanilla of Madagascar. Vaniglia is a warm and sensual scent that combines the sweetness of vanilla with the freshness of bergamot and a touch of jasmine.

brandInfo.name: Adolfo Dominguez
brandInfo.description: Adolfo Dominguez is a Spanish fashion designer. His fragrance line is known for its fresh, natural, and elegant scents that often evoke the green landscapes of Galicia, Spain.

perfumes.description: A classic and refreshing aromatic fougère for men. Agua Fresca is a tribute to the fresh, green landscapes of Galicia, Spain. It's a timeless scent that blends aromatic herbs with a clean, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Aerin Lauder
brandInfo.description: Aerin Lauder is a luxury lifestyle brand founded by the granddaughter of Estée Lauder. The brand's fragrances are elegant, modern, and effortlessly sophisticated, often inspired by memories, travel, and nature.

perfumes.description: A warm and inviting fragrance that feels like a cozy cashmere sweater. Amber Musk blends sensual florals, distinctive amber, and creamy musk.
A rich and realistic floral fragrance that captures the essence of a blooming lilac bush in spring. Lilac Path is a fresh and romantic scent.

brandInfo.name: Afnan Perfumes
brandInfo.description: Afnan Perfumes is a UAE-based brand that has been creating high-quality fragrances since 2007. The brand is known for its luxurious and exotic scents that blend traditional Arabian perfumery with modern Western influences.

perfumes.description: A clean and woody fragrance centered around white oud. Dehn Al Oudh Abiyad is a fresh and musky scent with a prominent woody character.

brandInfo.name: Agent Provocateur
brandInfo.description: Agent Provocateur is a British lingerie retailer founded in 1994. The brand's fragrance line is known for its bold, seductive, and often provocative scents that capture the essence of modern femininity and sensuality.

perfumes.description: A sweet and seductive floral fruity gourmand. Aphrodisiaque is a playful and alluring scent with notes of blackberry, jasmine, and a creamy vanilla orchid base.
A fresh and exotic floral fruity fragrance. Fatale Pink is a bright and vibrant scent with notes of tangerine, pear blossom, and a touch of bamboo.

brandInfo.name: Ahwaz
brandInfo.description: Ahwaz is a niche perfume brand that creates luxurious and opulent fragrances, often inspired by the rich traditions of Middle Eastern perfumery.

perfumes.description: An opulent and luxurious oriental fragrance. King's Harem is a rich and complex blend of spices, florals, and precious woods, creating a scent fit for royalty.

brandInfo.name: Ajmal
brandInfo.description: Ajmal is a family-owned fragrance house based in Dubai, with a rich heritage of over 70 years. The brand is renowned for its expertise in oriental perfumery, creating a wide range of scents from traditional ouds to contemporary fragrances.

perfumes.description: A beautiful and exotic floral woody musk. Mizyaan is a spicy and floral scent with a warm, ambery and woody base.
A rich and captivating amber woody fragrance. Amber Wood is a powerful and sophisticated blend of spices, amber, and precious woods.

brandInfo.name: Akro
brandInfo.description: Akro is a modern fragrance brand founded by Olivier Cresp and his daughter Anais. The brand is known for its addictive and unconventional scents, each inspired by a specific addiction, from coffee and chocolate to leather and smoke.

perfumes.description: A delicious and photorealistic gourmand fragrance that smells like a lemon tart. Bake is a sweet and zesty scent with a prominent lemon and vanilla accord.

brandInfo.name: Al Haramain
brandInfo.description: Al Haramain is a perfume house based in the United Arab Emirates. They are known for their traditional Arabian and oriental fragrances, often featuring notes of oud, amber, musk, and spices. Their perfumes range from concentrated perfume oils to Eau de Parfums, and they are known for their quality and longevity.

perfumes.description: A luxurious and opulent fragrance that combines the sweetness of fruits with the warmth of amber and woods. Amber Oud Gold Edition is a captivating and long-lasting scent that is perfect for special occasions.

Dhahab is a luxurious and radiant fragrance that means 'gold' in Arabic. It's a rich and opulent blend of sweet and fruity notes with a warm, ambery base, creating a scent that is both precious and captivating.

Sultan is a majestic and powerful fragrance that evokes the grandeur of royalty. It's a rich and complex blend of fruity and floral notes with a warm, woody, and musky base, creating a scent that is both commanding and sophisticated.
Hayati means 'life' in Arabic, and this fragrance is a celebration of life's joyful moments. It's a sweet and playful scent that combines fruity and floral notes with a warm, ambery, and musky base.

A luxurious and traditional Arabian fragrance, Mukhallat Al Emirates is a rich and opulent blend of oud, rose, and spices. It's a captivating and long-lasting scent that is perfect for special occasions.

A captivating and sensual fragrance, Amber Oud Rouge is a tribute to the color of passion. It is a warm and spicy scent that combines the richness of amber with the spiciness of saffron and a touch of sweetness.

Wardia means 'rose' in Arabic, and this fragrance is a beautiful tribute to the queen of flowers. It's a rich and romantic scent that combines the freshness of Taif rose with a warm, ambery, and musky base.

A luxurious and captivating musk fragrance, Musk Maliki is a rich and sensual scent that is both clean and animalic. It's a sophisticated and long-lasting perfume that is perfect for those who love musk.

brandInfo.name: Al Jazeera Perfumes
brandInfo.description: Al Jazeera Perfumes is a luxury fragrance house from Qatar, known for its opulent and exclusive scents that celebrate the rich heritage of Arabian perfumery.

perfumes.description: A magical and enchanting oriental fragrance. Magic is a rich and complex blend of fruits, florals, and a deep, woody and musky base.
An opulent and majestic oriental fragrance. Palace is a luxurious blend of rare spices, precious florals, and a rich, woody and ambery base, fit for royalty.

brandInfo.name: Alexandre J.
brandInfo.description: Alexandre.J is a French niche perfume brand that combines the luxury of oriental perfumery with contemporary French elegance. The brand is known for its opulent scents and beautifully decorated bottles.

perfumes.description: A sweet and nutty gourmand fragrance. Imperial Peacock is a delicious and comforting blend of almond, vanilla, and tonka bean, with a touch of heliotrope.
A rich and decadent gourmand fragrance. Zafeer Oud Vanille is a sweet and creamy blend of vanilla, toffee, and coconut, with a touch of oud and leather.

brandInfo.name: Amouage
brandInfo.description: Amouage is an international luxury fragrance house renowned for creating some of the most finely crafted perfumes in the world. Founded in the Sultanate of Oman in 1983, Amouage has redefined the Arabian art of perfumery and gained a global reputation for bringing innovative modernity and true artistry to all its creations.

perfumes.description: A spicy and woody fragrance that takes you on an olfactory journey. Journey Man is a captivating and masculine scent that combines the heat of Sichuan pepper with the smokiness of tobacco and the richness of leather.

A spicy and resinous fragrance that is both mysterious and compelling. Fate for Man is a complex and powerful scent that combines the intensity of cumin and ginger with the warmth of incense and the richness of woods.
A soft and creamy floral-fruity fragrance, Guidance is a comforting and elegant scent. It combines the sweetness of pear and hazelnut with the delicacy of osmanthus and a warm, woody base.

A tribute to truth and beauty, Honour Woman is a majestic and elegant white floral fragrance. It is a sophisticated and opulent scent that combines the richness of tuberose and gardenia with a warm, resinous base.

An even more potent and refined version of the iconic Interlude Man, Interlude 53 is a masterpiece of complexity and power. It is a smoky, resinous, and spicy fragrance with incredible depth and longevity.

A captivating and sophisticated interpretation of Interlude, Black Iris adds a smooth and powdery dimension to the original's smoky intensity. It is a refined and elegant fragrance that is both powerful and alluring.
A chaotic and intense fragrance that creates a sense of harmony through its complexity. Interlude Man is a smoky, spicy, and resinous scent that is both powerful and captivating.

A complex and captivating chypre-floral fragrance, Interlude Woman is a moment of peace in a chaotic world. It is a rich and multifaceted scent that combines the sweetness of kiwi with the warmth of incense and the earthiness of oakmoss.

A majestic and opulent fragrance that celebrates the 25th anniversary of Amouage. Jubilation XXV is a rich and complex scent that combines the sweetness of blackberry with the warmth of incense and the richness of oud.

A gourmand and creamy interpretation of the tuberose flower, Love Tuberose is a soft and romantic fragrance. It combines the sweetness of whipped cream and vanilla with the richness of tuberose and gardenia.
A surreal and dreamlike fragrance, Myths Man is a smoky and floral scent with a leathery undertone. It combines the brightness of chrysanthemum with the darkness of ash and the richness of leather.

A tribute to the bohemian spirit of the 1920s, Portrayal Man is a smoky and aromatic fragrance with a touch of sweetness. It combines the greenness of violet leaves with the richness of vetiver and a hint of cade oil.

A more intense and concentrated version of the iconic Reflection Man, Reflection 45 is a masterpiece of modern masculinity. It is a floral, woody, and musky fragrance with incredible depth and sophistication.

A modern and elegant floral-woody-musk fragrance, Reflection Man is a tribute to timeless masculinity. It is a fresh and sophisticated scent that combines the powderiness of orris with the warmth of woods and a touch of sweetness.

A lush and radiant floral-aquatic fragrance, Reflection Woman evokes a spring garden after the rain. It is a fresh and elegant scent that combines the greenness of violet leaves with the delicacy of magnolia and a woody base.
A simple yet profound fragrance that celebrates the beauty of vanilla. Vanilla Barka is a warm and comforting scent that is both sweet and smoky, creating a rich and inviting aura.

An aromatic and green fragrance that captures the scent of a garden by the sea. Beach Hut Man is a fresh and invigorating scent that combines the greenness of mint and galbanum with the earthiness of vetiver and a touch of ivy.

A sophisticated and elegant aldehydic-floral fragrance, Dia Woman is the epitome of daytime luxury. It is a bright and powdery scent that combines the freshness of aldehydes with the richness of flowers and a warm, woody base.
A more intense and opulent version of Epic Woman, Epic 56 is a masterpiece of complexity and power. It is a spicy, floral, and oriental fragrance with incredible depth and longevity.

Inspired by the legends of the Silk Road, Epic Woman is a spicy and floral oriental fragrance. It is a rich and complex scent that combines the warmth of cumin and cinnamon with the beauty of rose and a precious wood base.

A tribute to the beauty of raw materials, Material is a rich and captivating amber-vanilla fragrance. It is a warm and sensual scent that combines the sweetness of vanilla absolute with the richness of resins and woods.
A bold and majestic fragrance that celebrates the rich and complex aroma of tobacco. Opus XIV Royal Tobacco is a smoky, spicy, and resinous scent that is both powerful and sophisticated.
An exceptional attar that celebrates the precious and multifaceted orris root. Orris Wakan is a powdery, woody, and floral fragrance of incredible beauty and refinement.
A rich and luxurious attar that celebrates the king of spices, saffron. Saffron Hamra is a warm, spicy, and leathery fragrance of exceptional quality and depth.

brandInfo.name: Anfas
brandInfo.description: Anfas is a luxury perfume brand from the UAE, creating scents that are a modern interpretation of traditional Arabian perfumery, often with a focus on rich and opulent ingredients.

perfumes.description: A romantic and sensual floral fragrance. Ishq, meaning 'love', is a beautiful blend of saffron and jasmine with a warm, powdery, and ambery base.
A fresh and uplifting citrus and floral fragrance. Salam, meaning 'peace', is a bright and joyful blend of mandarin and bergamot with a heart of jasmine and a soft, ambery base.

brandInfo.name: Anfasic Dokhoon
brandInfo.description: Anfasic Dokhoon is a modern Emirati fragrance brand that offers a range of perfumes and incenses, blending traditional Arabian scents with contemporary twists.

perfumes.description: A sweet and delicious gourmand fragrance. Sukar, meaning 'sugar', is a playful and addictive blend of fruity notes, vanilla, and cotton candy.

brandInfo.name: Anna Sui
brandInfo.description: Anna Sui is an American fashion designer known for her whimsical, bohemian, and rock-and-roll inspired designs. Her fragrance line reflects this playful and romantic spirit, with imaginative bottles and youthful, fruity-floral scents.

perfumes.description: A whimsical and aquatic floral fruity fragrance. Fantasia Mermaid is a fresh and sweet scent with notes of blood orange, peony, and a honeyed vanilla base.
A fresh and joyful floral fruity fragrance. Lucky Wish is a bright and uplifting scent with notes of pomelo, bamboo, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Antonio Banderas
brandInfo.description: Antonio Banderas is a Spanish actor, director, and producer who launched a successful fragrance line in collaboration with Puig. The scents are known for being charismatic, seductive, and affordable, reflecting his passionate on-screen persona.

perfumes.description: A fresh and aromatic woody aquatic fragrance. King of Seduction is a charismatic and masculine scent with notes of pineapple, melon, and a marine accord.
A fresh and sensual floral aquatic fragrance for women. Blue Seduction is a bright and feminine scent with notes of melon, pear, and a sweet, sugary base.
A fresh and elegant floral aquatic fragrance. Queen of Seduction is a charismatic and feminine scent with notes of raspberry, jasmine, and a touch of suede.

brandInfo.name: Aquolina
brandInfo.description: Aquolina is an Italian cosmetics brand, famous for its playful and sweet gourmand fragrances. The brand's most iconic scent, Pink Sugar, launched in 2004 and became a global phenomenon, defining a generation of sweet perfumes.

perfumes.description: A warm and sunny gourmand fragrance. Gold Sugar is a delicious blend of coconut, crème brûlée, and sandalwood, creating a tropical and sweet scent.
The iconic and playful gourmand fragrance. Pink Sugar is a sweet and delicious blend of cotton candy, caramel, and vanilla, with a touch of licorice and red berries.

brandInfo.name: Arabian Oud
brandInfo.description: Arabian Oud is one of the largest and most respected perfume houses in the Middle East. They specialize in traditional Arabian and oriental fragrances, with a particular focus on high-quality oud. Their perfumes are known for their richness, complexity, and longevity.

perfumes.description: A fragrance that embodies the spirit of the noble Arabian warrior. Arabian Knight is a powerful and charismatic scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of spices and a rich, woody base.
A captivating and beloved fragrance, Kalemat is a rich and inviting scent that combines the sweetness of honey and blueberry with the warmth of amber and a touch of smoky incense.
A soft and elegant fragrance inspired by the beauty of Kashmir. This is a woody and musky scent with a touch of fruitiness, creating a serene and sophisticated aura.
A vibrant and joyful fragrance, Madawi is a fruity and floral scent with a warm, musky base. It is a captivating and uplifting perfume that is perfect for any occasion.

A classic and authentic oriental woody fragrance, Asalat Al Oud is a tribute to the rich heritage of Arabian perfumery. It is a powerful and long-lasting scent that is perfect for lovers of traditional oud.
A fresh and spicy fragrance with a touch of sweetness, Sultani is a modern and versatile scent. It combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of spices and a soft, musky base.
A fresh, citrusy, and woody fragrance, Titanium is a modern and energetic scent. It is a versatile and uplifting perfume that is perfect for everyday wear.

brandInfo.name: Aramis
brandInfo.description: Aramis is a brand of fragrances and men's grooming products owned by Estée Lauder. Launched in 1964, it was one of the first prestige men's fragrance lines to be sold in department stores. The brand is known for its classic, masculine, and sophisticated scents, with the original Aramis fragrance being a timeless icon.

perfumes.description: A fresh and adventurous aromatic fougère, Adventurer is a fragrance for the man who is bold and daring. It combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of spices and a rugged, woody base.
A rich and intoxicating fragrance that captures the spirit of Cuba. Havana is a warm and spicy scent that combines the sweetness of tobacco with the freshness of citrus and a complex, woody base.

A fresh and spicy fragrance for the modern explorer. Voyager is an invigorating and masculine scent that combines the warmth of ginger and nutmeg with the freshness of juniper and a smooth, woody base.

An elegant and romantic floral fragrance that captures the beauty of the Italian countryside. Tuscany Per Donna is a classic and sophisticated scent that combines the freshness of citrus with a rich bouquet of flowers and a warm, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Ard Al Zaafaran
brandInfo.description: Ard Al Zaafaran is a well-known perfume manufacturer based in the UAE. They are famous for creating affordable yet high-quality fragrances that are often inspired by popular designer and niche scents, with a distinct Middle Eastern touch.

perfumes.description: A sweet and spicy gourmand fragrance. Ameerat Al Ehsaas is a delicious blend of coconut, ginger, and vanilla, with a touch of cardamom and musk.

brandInfo.name: Ariana Grande
brandInfo.description: Ariana Grande is an American singer and actress who launched her own line of successful fragrances. Her perfumes are known for their sweet, playful, and gourmand notes, often reflecting her personality and music. They are very popular, especially among a younger audience.

perfumes.description: The debut fragrance from Ariana Grande, Ari is a sweet and luscious gourmand scent. It combines fruity notes with soft florals and a base of marshmallow and musk, creating a playful and feminine aura.
A dreamy and uplifting fragrance, Cloud is a cozy and addictive gourmand scent. It combines the freshness of lavender and pear with the creaminess of coconut and a sweet, musky base.
A more intense and richer version of the beloved Cloud, Cloud Intense amplifies the gourmand and musky notes, creating a longer-lasting and more powerful scent experience.
A fruity and floral interpretation of Cloud, Cloud Pink is a bright and joyful fragrance. It combines the sweetness of dragon fruit and berries with the creaminess of coconut and a soft, musky base.
A clean and conscious fragrance, God is a Woman is a fruity and musky scent with a touch of floralcy. It combines the freshness of pear with the softness of orris and a warm, musky base.
A bright and optimistic fragrance, Mod Blush is a fruity and floral scent with a touch of warmth. It combines the freshness of passionfruit with the softness of rose and a creamy, woody base.
A delectable and playful fragrance, Sweet Like Candy is a burst of sweetness. It combines the tartness of blackberry with the creaminess of marshmallow and a touch of vanilla.
A fragrance that is all about moving on and looking up. Thank U, Next is a unique and playful scent that combines the sweetness of coconut and raspberry with the softness of rose and a musky base.

brandInfo.name: Armand Basi
brandInfo.description: Armand Basi is a Spanish fashion and lifestyle brand. Its fragrances are known for their modern, urban, and Mediterranean-inspired character, often with a focus on fresh and natural notes.

perfumes.description: A vibrant and spicy floral fragrance. In Red is a modern and energetic scent with notes of ginger, cardamom, and a heart of jasmine and lily.

brandInfo.name: Armani
brandInfo.description: Giorgio Armani is an Italian luxury fashion house founded by Giorgio Armani which designs, manufactures, distributes and retails haute couture, ready-to-wear, leather goods, shoes, watches, jewelry, accessories, eyewear, cosmetics and home interiors. The brand's fragrance line is known for its sophisticated, elegant, and timeless scents, with iconic fragrances like Acqua di Giò and Armani Code.

perfumes.description: The iconic aquatic aromatic fragrance that captures the essence of the Mediterranean. Acqua di Giò is a fresh and invigorating scent with a blend of citrus, marine notes, and a woody base.

A warm and sensual interpretation of Acqua di Giò, Absolu combines the classic marine notes with the richness of patchouli and the warmth of tonka bean, creating a sophisticated and masculine fragrance.

A more intense and sophisticated version of the original, Acqua di Giò Essenza is a parfum concentration that emphasizes the woody and ambery facets of the fragrance, creating a deeper and longer-lasting scent experience.
A deep and intense marine interpretation of Acqua di Giò, Profondo plunges into the depths of the sea with its mineral-ambery accord and a touch of green mandarin.
An intense and sophisticated version of Acqua di Giò, Profumo adds a smoky and mineral dimension with the addition of incense and patchouli, creating a captivating and long-lasting fragrance.
A captivating and mysterious fragrance that evokes the meeting of the sea and the sky. Bleu Turquoise is a unique and salty-vanilla scent with a touch of spice and incense.
A fresh and elegant interpretation of the classic Code, Colonia combines the sensuality of tonka bean with the freshness of citrus and a touch of orange blossom.
A fresh and invigorating twist on the classic Code, Ice combines the warmth of tonka bean with the coolness of mint and the sharpness of ginger, creating a dynamic and modern fragrance.
A new and intense interpretation of the iconic Armani Code, the Parfum version amplifies the signature tonka bean and iris notes, creating a sophisticated and long-lasting scent experience.
A warm and sensual fragrance, Armani Code Profumo is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of tonka bean and amber with the spiciness of cardamom and a touch of leather.
A fresh and elegant woody-musk fragrance, Armani Mania is a sophisticated and versatile scent. It combines the freshness of mandarin with the warmth of cedar and a soft, musky base.

A bold and charismatic fragrance, Attitude is a unique and memorable scent. It combines the bitterness of coffee with the freshness of lemon and the warmth of amber, creating a captivating and masculine aura.
A happy and addictive fragrance, Because It's You is a fruity-floral scent that is both playful and elegant. It combines the sweetness of raspberry with the beauty of rose and a warm, vanilla base.
The original iconic fragrance, Armani Code is a sophisticated and seductive scent for the modern man. It is a smooth and captivating blend of tonka bean, leather, and citrus.

A surprising and addictive fragrance, Diamonds for Men is a gourmand-woody scent that is both fresh and sensual. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of cocoa and a spicy, woody base.

A passionate and audacious fragrance, In Love With You is a fruity-floral scent that captures the excitement of a new love. It combines the sweetness of black cherry with the beauty of jasmine and a warm, ambery base.

A modern and sensual woody-aromatic fragrance, Emporio Armani He is a second-skin scent that is both natural and refined. It combines the freshness of yuzu with the warmth of cedarwood and a soft, musky base.

A warm and charismatic fragrance, Stronger With You is a spicy-gourmand scent that is both confident and elegant. It combines the sweetness of vanilla and chestnut with the spiciness of cardamom and a touch of sage.

An intense and addictive fragrance, Stronger With You Absolutely is a boozy and ambery scent that is both powerful and sophisticated. It combines the sweetness of rum and vanilla with the warmth of chestnut and a touch of cedarwood.
A warm and sensual interpretation of Stronger With You, the Amber version amplifies the ambery and vanilla notes, creating a rich and captivating fragrance.

A more intense and vibrant version of Stronger With You, Intensely is a sweet and spicy fragrance with a gourmand twist. It combines the warmth of cinnamon and toffee with the freshness of juniper and a touch of suede.
A limited edition that adds a luxurious and masculine touch of leather to the Stronger With You DNA. It is a rich and sophisticated fragrance that is both powerful and elegant.
A powerful and majestic interpretation of Stronger With You, the Oud version introduces the rich and complex aroma of oud wood, creating a truly captivating and luxurious fragrance.
A rich and intense fragrance that combines the warmth of tobacco with the sweetness of vanilla and the spiciness of pepper. Stronger With You Tobacco is a captivating and masculine scent.
A clean and fresh fragrance, Emporio Armani White for Him is a minimalist and modern scent. It combines the brightness of citrus with the softness of musk and a touch of spice.

A joyful and refreshing fragrance that captures the essence of a lush garden by the sea. Acqua di Gioia is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of mint and lemon with the sweetness of brown sugar and a touch of jasmine.
A more intense and sophisticated version of Acqua di Gioia, Essenza amplifies the floral and aquatic notes, creating a deeper and more captivating fragrance experience.
A bright and cheerful interpretation of Acqua di Gioia, the Jasmine version highlights the beauty of the jasmine flower, creating a fresh and luminous floral fragrance.

A seductive and captivating fragrance, Armani Code for Women is a floral and citrusy scent with a warm, sensual base. It combines the brightness of orange blossom with the spiciness of ginger and the sweetness of honey.
An intense and opulent version of Armani Code for Women, Absolu Femme is a rich and captivating fragrance that combines the warmth of ginger and vanilla with the beauty of white flowers.

A warm and cozy interpretation of Armani Code for Women, Cashmere is a soft and sensual fragrance that feels like a luxurious cashmere sweater. It combines the sweetness of almond milk with the powderiness of iris and a touch of leather.

A sweet and gourmand interpretation of Armani Code for Women, Satin is a playful and addictive fragrance. It combines the sweetness of praline and vanilla with the freshness of ginger and a touch of cocoa.

A fresh and luminous interpretation of Armani Code for Women, Turquoise is a sparkling and joyful fragrance. It combines the brightness of neroli and orange blossom with the warmth of ginger and a woody, musky base.

A dazzling and multifaceted fragrance, Diamonds is a fruity-floral scent that is both glamorous and confident. It combines the sweetness of lychee and raspberry with the beauty of rose and a warm, ambery base.

A soft and intimate fragrance, Emporio Armani She is a powdery and musky scent that is both comforting and sensual. It combines the freshness of citrus with the softness of heliotrope and a warm, almondy base.

An energetic and vibrant fragrance, Armani Mania for Women is a floral and woody scent that is both modern and sophisticated. It combines the spiciness of pink pepper with the beauty of magnolia and a warm, musky base.

A bright and modern white floral fragrance that invites you to broaden your horizons. My Way is a luminous and elegant scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the richness of tuberose and a warm, vanilla base.
A majestic and captivating fragrance that celebrates the precious myrrh resin. Myrrhe Impériale is a warm and smoky scent that is both powerful and sophisticated, with a touch of saffron and vanilla.
A fresh and luminous interpretation of My Way, the Floral version is a sparkling and joyful fragrance. It combines the brightness of green mandarin with the beauty of tuberose and a soft, musky base.
A more intense and captivating version of My Way, the Intense version amplifies the white floral and vanilla notes, creating a deeper and more sensual fragrance experience.
A sophisticated and elegant interpretation of My Way, the Parfum version introduces a powdery and woody dimension with the addition of iris and ambrette, creating a truly luxurious fragrance.
A tribute to the city of Milan, Rose Milano is a modern and elegant chypre-floral fragrance. It combines the beauty of Damask rose with the earthiness of patchouli and a touch of fruitiness.
A soft and comforting fragrance, Sensi is a warm and almondy scent that feels like a second skin. It is a sensual and elegant perfume that is both modern and timeless.

A modern and elegant chypre-fruity fragrance, Sì is a tribute to modern femininity. It is a sophisticated and charismatic scent that combines the sweetness of cassis with the beauty of rose and a warm, woody base.

A delicate and luminous interpretation of Sì, Fiori is a floral and powdery fragrance that is both graceful and joyful. It combines the freshness of neroli with the sweetness of blackcurrant and a soft, musky base.

A more intense and opulent version of Sì, the 2021 Intense version is a rich and captivating chypre-amber fragrance. It combines the sweetness of blackcurrant syrup with the beauty of rose and a warm, resinous base.
A vibrant and passionate fragrance, Sì Passione is a fruity-floral scent that is both bold and elegant. It combines the spiciness of pink pepper with the sweetness of pear and a warm, woody base.

A more intense and captivating version of Sì Passione, the Intense version is a rich and sensual floral fragrance. It amplifies the jasmine note and adds a warm, woody depth, creating a truly addictive scent.

A beautiful and romantic interpretation of Sì, Rose Signature is a tribute to the queen of flowers. It is a delicate and elegant fragrance that combines two types of roses with a touch of iris and a soft, musky base.

A warm and radiant fragrance that captures the feeling of the sun on your skin. Sun di Gioia is a solar floral scent that combines the creaminess of frangipani with the warmth of amber and a touch of coconut.
A warm and sensual fragrance that evokes the scent of the Mediterranean coast. Terra di Gioia is a fruity-floral scent with a touch of almond and a warm, ambery base.

brandInfo.name: Armani Prive
brandInfo.description: Armani Privé is the exclusive, haute couture fragrance collection from Giorgio Armani. Each fragrance is a masterpiece of balance and simplicity, crafted from the most precious raw materials. The collection is a tribute to the art of perfumery, offering a range of sophisticated and elegant scents.

perfumes.description: A captivating and mysterious fragrance that evokes the meeting of the sea and the sky. Bleu Turquoise is a unique and salty-vanilla scent with a touch of spice and incense.
A warm and eccentric amber fragrance that is both playful and sophisticated. Ambre Eccentrico is a rich and resinous scent with a fruity twist of plum and a touch of cinnamon.

A fresh and aquatic jasmine fragrance inspired by Japanese floral art. Jasmin Kusamono is a delicate and transparent scent that combines the brightness of Nashi pear with the greenness of lily-of-the-valley and the softness of jasmine.

A warm and enveloping musk fragrance inspired by the winds of the desert. Musc Shamal is a powerful and sensual scent that combines the cleanliness of aldehydes with the warmth of musk and a touch of rose.
A majestic and opulent fragrance that celebrates the Damask rose. Rose d'Arabie is a rich and sensual scent that combines the beauty of rose with the darkness of patchouli and a touch of vanilla.

A warm and silky amber fragrance that feels like a luxurious cashmere shawl. Ambre Soie is a smooth and elegant scent that combines the warmth of amber with the spiciness of cinnamon and a touch of patchouli.
A captivating and spiritual fragrance inspired by the precious lapis lazuli stone. Bleu Lazuli is a smoky and tobacco-inflected scent with a touch of fruity sweetness and a warm, woody base.
A spiritual and meditative fragrance that captures the scent of incense in an Italian church. Bois d'Encens is a smoky and woody scent that is both profound and elegant.

A soft and powdery leather fragrance inspired by the noble amethyst stone. Cuir Améthyste is a sensual and elegant scent that combines the smoothness of leather with the floralcy of violet and a touch of birch.

A dark and mysterious leather fragrance that evokes the atmosphere of a smoky tannery. Cuir Noir is a powerful and captivating scent that combines the intensity of leather with the sweetness of vanilla and the richness of oud.

A warm and spicy fragrance that captures the vibrant energy of the tanzanite stone. Magenta Tanzanite is a captivating and addictive scent that combines the warmth of tobacco and coffee with the spiciness of cardamom and a touch of myrrh.

A delicate and fresh floral fragrance that celebrates the peony flower. Pivoine Suzhou is a luminous and elegant scent that combines the freshness of mandarin with the softness of peony and a touch of rose.

A fresh and dewy rose fragrance inspired by the gardens of Alexandria. Rose Alexandrie is a luminous and delicate scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the beauty of rose and a touch of neroli.

A rich and opulent white floral fragrance inspired by the vibrant malachite stone. Rouge Malachite is a captivating and sensual scent that combines the intensity of tuberose with the warmth of amber and a touch of spice.
A majestic and noble fragrance that celebrates the precious oud wood. Oud Royal is a smoky and leathery scent that is both powerful and sophisticated, with a touch of saffron and rose.

A fresh and aromatic fragrance that captures the scent of a Chinese tea ceremony. The Yulong is a citrusy and green scent that combines the smokiness of black tea with the freshness of green tea and a touch of mandarin.

A creamy and intoxicating white floral fragrance inspired by the lush green malachite stone. Vert Malachite is a vibrant and sensual scent that combines the richness of lily with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of spice.

brandInfo.name: Atkinsons
brandInfo.description: Atkinsons is a British perfume house founded in London in 1799. With a rich history of providing fragrances to royalty and aristocracy, the brand is known for its classic, elegant, and sophisticated scents. Their perfumes often have a traditional English character, with a modern twist.

perfumes.description: A tribute to the adventurous spirit of Gertrude Bell, Her Majesty The Oud is a captivating and feminine fragrance. It combines the sweetness of red berries with the beauty of Turkish rose and the richness of oud.
Inspired by the charisma of King Faisal I, His Majesty The Oud is a powerful and smoky fragrance. It combines the intensity of smoked tea with the richness of oud and a touch of vanilla.

A modern and sophisticated fragrance that celebrates the British love affair with oud. Oud Save The King is a unique and elegant scent that combines the freshness of Earl Grey tea with the richness of oud and a touch of suede.

A captivating and feminine fragrance that is a tribute to the forbidden love of an Eastern prince and a Western princess. Oud Save The Queen is a beautiful and gourmand scent that combines the freshness of Earl Grey tea with the beauty of white flowers and the richness of oud.

brandInfo.name: Attar Collection
brandInfo.description: Attar Collection is a luxury perfume brand from the UAE that creates opulent and modern oriental fragrances. The brand is known for its high-quality ingredients and beautifully designed bottles that evoke the glamour of Arabian royalty.

perfumes.description: A soft and clean floral woody musk. Musk Kashmir is a delicate and intimate scent that feels like a second skin, with notes of white musk, sandalwood, and a hint of spice.
A rich and seductive fruity chypre. The Queen of Sheba is a majestic blend of peach, tobacco, and incense with a deep, mossy and floral heart.

brandInfo.name: Azzaro
brandInfo.description: Azzaro is a French fashion and fragrance company founded by Loris Azzaro. The brand is known for its glamorous and seductive style, which is reflected in its perfumes. Azzaro fragrances are often bold, charismatic, and celebrate the Mediterranean lifestyle.

perfumes.description: The iconic aromatic fougère, Azzaro pour Homme is a timeless classic of seduction. It is a complex and charismatic scent that combines the freshness of lavender with the warmth of spices and a rich, woody base.

A more mysterious and sensual interpretation of the classic, Azzaro pour Homme Night Time is a woody and spicy fragrance that is both elegant and captivating. It combines the freshness of bitter orange with the warmth of nutmeg and a smoky, vetiver base.
A modern and urban fragrance, Visit for Men is a woody and spicy scent that is both elegant and charismatic. It combines the warmth of spices with the smokiness of incense and a rich, woody base.

A fresh and clean fragrance that evokes the feeling of a cool sea breeze. Chrome is a citrus-aromatic scent that is both invigorating and comforting, with a blend of metallic notes, fresh citrus, and a soft, musky base.

An adventurous and fruity interpretation of Chrome, Legend is a fresh and aquatic fragrance that is both energetic and masculine. It combines the sweetness of apple with the freshness of tea and a warm, ambery base.

A creamy and citrusy interpretation of Chrome, Pure is a fresh and luminous fragrance that is both modern and elegant. It combines the brightness of bergamot with the softness of tonka bean and a touch of woody notes.

A captivating and addictive fragrance for the man who dares to be himself. The Most Wanted is a sweet and spicy amber scent that combines the warmth of cardamom with the sweetness of toffee and a touch of amberwood.

A bold and charismatic fragrance for the modern man who lives life on his own terms. Wanted is a spicy and woody scent that combines the freshness of lemon with the warmth of ginger and a smoky, vetiver base.

brandInfo.name: Balenciaga
brandInfo.description: Balenciaga is a luxury fashion house founded in Spain by Cristóbal Balenciaga, a designer known for his uncompromising standards and avant-garde designs. The brand's fragrances often reflect this modern and artistic approach, with unique and sophisticated scents.

perfumes.description: A classic and elegant oriental spicy fragrance, Cristobal is a tribute to the founder of the house. It is a warm and sophisticated scent that combines the sweetness of fig with the richness of spices and a woody base.

A sophisticated and modern chypre-floral fragrance, Balenciaga Paris is a tribute to the city of light. It is a powdery and elegant scent that combines the beauty of violet with the earthiness of patchouli and a touch of greenness.

A modern and captivating floral fragrance, Florabotanica is a scent of imaginary flowers. It is a fresh and green scent that combines the coolness of mint with the beauty of rose and a touch of vetiver.

A spicy and vibrant interpretation of the rose, Rosabotanica is a modern and multifaceted fragrance. It combines the freshness of citrus with the spiciness of pink pepper and the greenness of fig leaf, all centered around a beautiful rose.

brandInfo.name: Bath & Body Works
brandInfo.description: Bath & Body Works is an American retailer specializing in personal care products, home fragrances, and candles. Their fragrances are known for being fun, accessible, and often feature gourmand or fruity-floral themes. They are famous for their wide variety of scents, including many seasonal and beloved limited editions.

perfumes.description: A classic and beloved fragrance, Black Raspberry Vanilla is a sweet and fruity blend of ripe berries and creamy vanilla. It's a comforting and delicious scent that is both playful and inviting.
A sophisticated and masculine fragrance, Whiskey Reserve is a smooth and boozy scent. It combines the richness of apple whiskey with the warmth of amber and a touch of oak.

A bright and optimistic fragrance, Dream Bright is a fruity and floral scent that inspires you to shine. It combines the sweetness of sapphire berries with the beauty of night-blooming orchid and a touch of vanilla.
A warm and exotic floral fragrance, Pink Amber & Morocco Orchid is a sensual and captivating scent. It combines the richness of amber with the beauty of orchid and a touch of jasmine.
A tropical and cheerful fragrance, Pink Coconut Calypso is a vacation in a bottle. It combines the creaminess of coconut with the sweetness of tropical fruits and a touch of vanilla.
A clean and fresh floral fragrance, Pure Wonder is a simple yet beautiful scent. It combines the delicacy of iced rosé with the softness of jasmine and a touch of warm amber.
A cozy and comforting fragrance, Warm Vanilla Sugar is a classic gourmand scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla and sugar with the warmth of sandalwood and a touch of coconut.

brandInfo.name: Bdk Parfums
brandInfo.description: BDK Parfums is a contemporary Parisian fragrance house founded by David Benedek. The brand creates modern, elegant, and narrative-driven scents inspired by characters, movements, and moments, with a focus on high-quality raw materials.

perfumes.description: A soft and sensual leather fragrance. Crème de Cuir is a smooth and creamy blend of white leather, pineapple, and vanilla, creating a modern and elegant scent.
A richer and more intense version of Gris Charnel. The Extrait amplifies the spicy and woody notes, with a prominent cardamom and a deeper, smokier vanilla and sandalwood base.
A seductive and playful amber fragrance. Rouge Smoking is a sweet and powdery blend of cherry, vanilla, and heliotrope, creating a modern and addictive scent.

brandInfo.name: Bella Freud
brandInfo.description: Bella Freud is a British fashion designer known for her distinctive knitwear and playful slogans. Her fragrance line captures the same intellectual, artistic, and slightly bohemian spirit.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual amber fragrance inspired by the 1970s. It's a rich and earthy blend of rose, patchouli, and incense, creating a nostalgic and bohemian scent.

brandInfo.name: Benetton
brandInfo.description: United Colors of Benetton is an Italian global fashion brand. Its fragrance line is known for its youthful, vibrant, and accessible scents that often celebrate diversity and togetherness.

perfumes.description: A fresh and modern woody aquatic fragrance. We Are Tribe is an energetic and youthful scent with notes of grapefruit, kumquat, and a marine accord.

brandInfo.name: Billie Eilish
brandInfo.description: Billie Eilish is an American singer and songwriter. Her debut fragrance, Eilish, is a reflection of her artistic vision, presented in a unique sculptural bottle and featuring a warm, cozy, and inviting gourmand scent.

perfumes.description: A captivating and cozy amber gourmand. Eilish is a warm and inviting blend of sugared petals, creamy vanilla, and soft spices, creating a sensual and comforting scent.

brandInfo.name: Boadicea The Victorious
brandInfo.description: Boadicea the Victorious is an independent British fragrance brand that creates artisanal, gender-neutral perfumes. Inspired by the warrior queen Boadicea, the brand is known for its powerful, opulent, and sophisticated scents, all housed in beautiful flacons with handcrafted Celtic-inspired shields.

perfumes.description: A passionate and romantic fragrance, Ardent is a warm and spicy floral scent. It combines the beauty of Turkish rose with the warmth of saffron and a rich, ambery base.

A luxurious and captivating fragrance, Blue Sapphire is a tribute to the 65th wedding anniversary of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip. It is a complex and opulent scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the richness of oud and a warm, ambery base.
A bright and confident fragrance, Heroine is a powdery and floral scent that is both modern and elegant. It combines the freshness of citrus with the beauty of violet and a soft, musky base.
A rich and opulent fragrance, Rose Sapphire is a spicy and ambery rose scent. It combines the beauty of Turkish rose with the warmth of saffron and a complex, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Bobbi Brown
brandInfo.description: Bobbi Brown is an American professional makeup artist and the founder of Bobbi Brown Cosmetics. Her fragrance line is known for its clean, fresh, and effortless scents that evoke simple pleasures, like a day at the beach.

perfumes.description: A clean and invigorating fragrance that captures the scent of a fresh bath. It's a simple, soapy, and refreshing scent.
The iconic scent of summer. Beach is a fresh and clean fragrance that captures the essence of a day at the beach, with notes of sand jasmine, sea spray, and mandarin.

brandInfo.name: Bond No. 9
brandInfo.description: Bond No. 9 is an American perfume house founded by Laurice Rahmé in 2003. The brand is a tribute to the city of New York, with each fragrance named after a specific neighborhood or landmark. Bond No. 9 is known for its artistic and often bold fragrances, as well as its iconic star-shaped bottles.

perfumes.description: A tribute to the iconic artist, Andy Warhol is a fruity and woody fragrance that is both playful and sophisticated. It combines the sweetness of plum with the freshness of citrus and a warm, woody base.

A vibrant and artistic fragrance, Bleecker Street is a green and gourmand scent that captures the creative energy of the neighborhood. It combines the greenness of violet leaf with the sweetness of cassis and a touch of caramel.

A celebration of individuality and creativity, Greenwich Village is a fresh and floral fragrance with a touch of sweetness. It combines the brightness of litchi with the beauty of peony and a soft, musky base.
A smooth and sophisticated fragrance, Lafayette Street is a fresh and spicy scent with a hint of vanilla. It is a versatile and elegant perfume that is perfect for any occasion.

A rich and gourmand fragrance that evokes the cozy atmosphere of a coffee shop in New Haarlem. It is a warm and inviting scent that combines the bitterness of coffee with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of lavender.
A vibrant and electrifying fragrance that captures the energy of New York City at night. New York Nights is a gourmand scent with notes of caramel and coffee, combined with beautiful white florals.
A classic and opulent fragrance that combines the richness of oud with the beauty of rose. New York Oud is a powerful and sophisticated scent that is both timeless and modern.

A chic and stylish fragrance, Tribeca is a gourmand scent that is both sophisticated and addictive. It combines the sweetness of cacao and hazelnut with the warmth of caramel and a touch of cedarwood.

A luxurious and regal fragrance created for Harrods, Royal Rose is a tribute to the queen of flowers. It is a rich and opulent scent that combines the beauty of rose with the warmth of amber and a touch of incense.
A sophisticated and aromatic fragrance created for Harrods. Harrods for Him is a fresh and green scent with a touch of spice and a smooth, woody base.

perfumes.inspiredBy: THE SCENT OF PEACE FOR HIM
perfumes.description: A fresh and uplifting fragrance that promotes peace and tranquility. The Scent of Peace for Him is a fruity and aromatic scent with a clean, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Bottega Veneta
brandInfo.description: Bottega Veneta is an Italian luxury fashion house known for its discreet and sophisticated style, with a focus on craftsmanship and quality materials. Their fragrances often reflect this understated elegance, with a particular emphasis on leather and natural ingredients, creating timeless and refined scents.

perfumes.description: The signature fragrance of the house, Bottega Veneta is a leathery floral chypre that is both elegant and timeless. It evokes the scent of the Venetian countryside with its blend of leather, oakmoss, and a touch of fruitiness.

A fresh and aromatic cologne-style fragrance, Essence Aromatique is a sophisticated and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the greenness of coriander and a smooth, woody base.

A woody and floral fragrance that captures the hazy light of a summer afternoon. Illusione for Her is a sensual and elegant scent that combines the sweetness of fig with the beauty of orange blossom and a touch of olive wood.

A bright and airy white floral fragrance, Knot is inspired by the fresh air of the Italian coast. It is a sophisticated and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of neroli with the creaminess of orange blossom and a touch of musk.
A more intense and charismatic version of the original Pour Homme, Extreme is a woody and aromatic fragrance with a touch of leather. It is a powerful and sophisticated scent for the modern man.

brandInfo.name: Boucheron
brandInfo.description: Boucheron is a French luxury jewelry and watch house. Its fragrance line is an extension of its high jewelry heritage, offering elegant, sophisticated, and timeless scents in beautifully crafted bottles.

perfumes.description: A warm and exotic amber vanilla fragrance. Vanille de Zanzibar is a rich and sensual blend of vanilla, sandalwood, and a touch of jasmine, inspired by the spice islands.
A modern and elegant floral fruity fragrance. Quatre is a bright and sparkling scent with notes of jasmine, rose, and a soft, musky base.
A luminous and elegant floral woody fragrance. Place Vendôme White Gold is a sophisticated blend of pear, jasmine, and a warm, woody vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Bourjois
brandInfo.description: Bourjois is a French cosmetics company founded in 1863. The brand is known for its playful, colorful, and affordable makeup and fragrances, with a classic Parisian charm.

perfumes.description: A classic and romantic floral aldehyde fragrance. Soir de Paris (Evening in Paris) is a timeless and elegant scent with a rich bouquet of flowers and a powdery, vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Britney Spears
brandInfo.description: Britney Spears is an American singer, dancer, and actress. Her highly successful fragrance line, launched in 2004, is known for its playful, sweet, and youthful gourmand scents, particularly the iconic Fantasy collection.

perfumes.description: The iconic and playful gourmand fragrance. Fantasy is a sweet and fruity blend of kiwi, white chocolate, and cupcake, creating a delicious and whimsical scent.
A sweet and edgy gourmand fragrance. Rocker Femme Fantasy is a creamy and fruity blend of blackberry, coconut cream, and vanilla, with a touch of floral.

brandInfo.name: Burberry
brandInfo.description: Burberry is a British luxury fashion house headquartered in London, England. It is known for its iconic trench coats, distinctive check pattern, and modern British sensibility. Burberry's fragrances often reflect the brand's classic, elegant, and understated style.

perfumes.description: A gentle and delicate fragrance designed for mothers and babies. Baby Touch is a soft and clean scent with a hint of citrus and a comforting, powdery base.
A more intense and sensual version of Brit Rhythm, Intense is a leathery and spicy fragrance for men. It is a bold and charismatic scent with a touch of sweetness.

A fresh and floral interpretation of Brit Rhythm for Her, the Floral version is a bright and joyful fragrance. It combines the freshness of citrus with a beautiful bouquet of flowers and a soft, musky base.
A sensual and feminine fragrance, Body is a woody-fruity scent that is both elegant and captivating. It combines the sweetness of peach with the warmth of cashmere wood and a touch of rose.
A lighter and fresher interpretation of Body, Tender is a delicate and youthful fragrance. It combines the crispness of apple with the softness of rose and a clean, musky base.

A classic and comfortable fragrance, Brit for Men is an amber woody scent that is both elegant and relaxed. It combines the freshness of mandarin with the spiciness of ginger and the warmth of tonka bean.
A sweet and gourmand fragrance, Brit for Women is a playful and charming scent. It combines the freshness of lime with the sweetness of almond and a creamy, vanilla base.

A classic and elegant fragrance, Burberry Woman is a fruity-floral scent that is both warm and sophisticated. It combines the sweetness of peach and apricot with the warmth of sandalwood and a soft, musky base.
A vibrant and adventurous fragrance, Her is a fruity-gourmand scent that captures the spirit of London. It is a beautiful blend of berries, white florals, and a warm, ambery base.
A more intense and sensual version of Her, the Elixir de Parfum is a rich and creamy fragrance that amplifies the gourmand and vanilla notes, creating a truly addictive scent.

A fresh and sparkling interpretation of Her, London Dream captures the hazy days of London. It is a bright and modern fragrance that combines the freshness of lemon and ginger with the beauty of rose and peony.

A festive and sophisticated fragrance, London for Men captures the spirit of Christmas in London. It is a warm and spicy scent that combines the sweetness of cinnamon with the richness of leather and a touch of port wine.

A classic and elegant white floral fragrance, London for Women is a tribute to the city of London. It is a sophisticated and timeless scent that combines the beauty of jasmine and honeysuckle with a soft, musky base.

Inspired by a London garden after the rain, My Burberry is a beautiful and contemporary floral fragrance. It combines the freshness of sweet pea and bergamot with the beauty of geranium and freesia, all wrapped in a soft, patchouli base.
A fresh and energetic fragrance, Sport for Men is an invigorating and modern scent. It combines the coolness of ginger and grapefruit with the freshness of sea notes and a clean, woody base.
A fresh and floral fragrance, Sport for Women is an energetic and uplifting scent. It combines the brightness of mandarin with the saltiness of sea salt and a soft, musky base.
A light and refreshing fragrance that captures the essence of a summer day. Summer Woman is a fruity-floral scent that is both joyful and carefree.

A fresh and energetic fragrance, The Beat is a floral woody musk scent that is both modern and sophisticated. It combines the freshness of tea with the spiciness of pink pepper and a clean, musky base.
A soft and clean fragrance, Touch for Women is a floral green scent that is both comforting and elegant. It combines the freshness of red pepper with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, vanilla base.

A relaxed and casual fragrance, Weekend for Women is a floral scent that evokes the feeling of a weekend getaway. It is a joyful and uplifting perfume with a blend of citrus, florals, and a soft, musky base.

A unique and captivating gourmand fragrance, Goddess is a tribute to the power of vanilla. It combines three different types of vanilla with a touch of lavender, creating a rich and sophisticated scent.
A more intense and opulent version of Goddess, the Intense version amplifies the vanilla and adds a touch of ambery woods, creating a deeper and more sensual fragrance experience.

A modern and powerful fragrance, Hero Eau de Parfum is a woody and spicy scent that is both sensual and charismatic. It combines the freshness of pine needles with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of incense.
A sensual and mysterious interpretation of My Burberry, Black is a captivating floral-amber fragrance. It combines the sweetness of candied rose with the warmth of amber and a touch of patchouli.
A more intense and sensual version of Mr. Burberry, the Eau de Parfum is a warm and spicy fragrance. It combines the freshness of grapefruit with the warmth of cinnamon and a rich, ambery base.

A fresh and invigorating fragrance, Mr. Burberry Indigo is an aromatic and herbal scent that captures the feeling of a coastal drive. It combines the freshness of lemon and rosemary with the coolness of mint and a touch of oakmoss.

A bright and joyful fragrance, My Burberry Blush is a fruity-floral scent that captures the energy of a London garden in the morning. It combines the tartness of pomegranate with the beauty of rose and a clean, jasmine base.

A vibrant and energetic fragrance, Brit Rhythm for Men is a leathery and aromatic scent inspired by live music. It combines the freshness of basil and cardamom with the richness of leather and a woody base.
A spicy and woody fragrance, The Beat for Men is a modern and charismatic scent. It combines the sharpness of black pepper with the freshness of citron and a smoky, vetiver base.

A clean and comfortable fragrance, Touch for Men is a musky and woody scent that is both fresh and warm. It combines the greenness of violet leaf with the spiciness of white pepper and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Bvlgari
brandInfo.description: Bvlgari is an Italian luxury brand known for its jewelry, watches, fragrances, and accessories. The brand's fragrances are often inspired by the world of high jewelry, with a focus on precious ingredients and sophisticated compositions. Bvlgari perfumes are known for their elegance, refinement, and modern Italian style.

perfumes.description: From the Le Gemme collection, Azaran is a tribute to the saffron spice. It is a warm and leathery fragrance with a touch of citrus, evoking the scent of the desert at sunset.
From the Le Gemme collection, Gyan is inspired by the blue sapphire. It is a sophisticated and aromatic fragrance that combines the beauty of jasmine with the earthiness of patchouli.
From the Le Gemme collection, Kobraa is inspired by the mysterious black onyx. It is a smoky and leathery fragrance with a touch of geranium, creating a powerful and charismatic aura.

From the Le Gemme collection, Onekh is inspired by the black onyx. It is a powerful and mysterious fragrance that combines the animalic intensity of oud with the warmth of spices and a touch of leather.
From the Allegra collection, Spettacolore is a vibrant and joyful fragrance. It is a powdery and ambery scent that combines the beauty of iris with the warmth of myrrh.
From the Le Gemme collection, Tygar is inspired by the tiger's eye stone. It is a fresh and powerful fragrance that combines the brightness of grapefruit with the warmth of ambroxan and a woody base.
From the Allegra collection, Magnifying Rose is a beautiful and elegant essence that can be layered with other fragrances. It is a pure and delicate scent of Bulgarian and Turkish roses.

A fresh and energetic fragrance, Aqva Pour Homme Atlantique is an aquatic and ambery scent that captures the power of the Atlantic Ocean. It combines the freshness of citrus with the saltiness of sea notes and a deep, ambery base.
The iconic aquatic fragrance, Aqva Pour Homme is a fresh and vibrant scent that evokes the power and beauty of the sea. It is a unique blend of marine notes, citrus, and a touch of seaweed.
A bold and unconventional fragrance, Black is a smoky and rubbery scent with a touch of vanilla. It is a modern and urban perfume that is both edgy and comforting.

A fragrance of unexpected contrasts, BLV Pour Homme is a spicy and woody scent that is both fresh and warm. It combines the coolness of ginger with the warmth of tobacco blossom and a touch of cardamom.

A clean and sophisticated fragrance, Bvlgari Man is a woody-oriental scent that is both modern and timeless. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of white honey and a soft, musky base.

A fresh and charismatic fragrance, Man Extreme is a woody-fresh scent that is both elegant and powerful. It combines the brightness of pink grapefruit with the warmth of cardamom and a touch of vetiver.
A bold and charismatic fragrance, Man in Black is a spicy-amber scent with a touch of leather. It is a powerful and seductive perfume inspired by the myth of the birth of Vulcan.

A dark and sensual fragrance, BLV Notte Pour Homme is a gourmand-woody scent that is both mysterious and comforting. It combines the richness of dark chocolate with the freshness of lavender and a touch of tobacco.
A classic and elegant fragrance, Bvlgari Pour Homme is a woody-floral-musk scent that is both understated and sophisticated. It is a timeless and versatile perfume with a prominent tea note.
A salty and aquatic fragrance inspired by Botticelli's Venus. Aqva Divina is a unique and radiant scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of beeswax and a touch of quince.
A fragrance of unexpected contrasts, BLV for women is a spicy and floral scent that is both cool and warm. It combines the freshness of ginger with the softness of wisteria and a touch of vanilla.
A classic and elegant floral fragrance, Bvlgari Pour Femme is a tribute to feminine grace. It is a beautiful and sophisticated bouquet of flowers with a soft, powdery base.
A vibrant and joyful fragrance, Omnia Coral is a fruity-floral scent inspired by the red coral. It combines the tartness of goji berries with the beauty of hibiscus and a touch of pomegranate.
A clean and calming fragrance, Eau Parfumée au Thé Blanc is a tribute to the precious white tea. It is a soft and musky scent that is both relaxing and sophisticated.
A tribute to gold and light, Goldea is a warm and sensual fragrance. It is a rich and opulent scent that combines the beauty of ylang-ylang with the warmth of musk and a touch of sweetness.

A contemporary and mysterious fragrance, Goldea The Roman Night is a chypre-floral scent that captures the energy of Rome at night. It combines the sweetness of mulberry with the beauty of night-blooming jasmine and a touch of black musk.

A dark and mysterious fragrance, Jasmin Noir is a tribute to the enigmatic jasmine flower. It is a rich and sensual scent that combines the beauty of jasmine with the sweetness of almond and a warm, woody base.

A lighter and more luminous interpretation of Jasmin Noir, Mon Jasmin Noir is a modern and sophisticated fragrance. It combines the freshness of citrus with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, musky base.

A dark and sensual fragrance, BLV Notte Pour Femme is a gourmand-woody scent that is both mysterious and comforting. It combines the richness of dark chocolate with the freshness of vodka and a touch of iris.

A unique and spicy fragrance, Omnia is inspired by the flavors of a chai tea. It is a warm and comforting scent that combines the spiciness of saffron and ginger with the sweetness of white chocolate.
A delicate and powdery fragrance, Omnia Amethyste is inspired by the amethyst gemstone. It is a beautiful and elegant scent that combines the beauty of iris and rose with a touch of greenness.

A clean and aquatic fragrance, Omnia Crystalline is inspired by the purity of crystal. It is a soft and gentle scent that combines the greenness of bamboo with the fruitiness of Nashi pear and a touch of lotus.

A vibrant and exotic fragrance, Omnia Indian Garnet is inspired by the mandarin garnet from India. It is a citrusy and floral scent that combines the brightness of mandarin with the beauty of osmanthus and a warm, ambery base.
A gentle and comforting fragrance designed for mothers and children. Petits et Mamans is a soft and powdery scent with a prominent chamomile note, creating a feeling of tenderness and love.

brandInfo.name: Byredo
brandInfo.description: Byredo is a Swedish luxury brand founded in Stockholm in 2006 by Ben Gorham. With a focus on craftsmanship and quality, Byredo creates fragrances that are often inspired by memories, emotions, and travels. The brand is known for its minimalist and artistic approach to perfumery.

perfumes.description: A fragrance that explores the primal and instinctual side of our nature. Animalique is a sensual and captivating scent that combines the warmth of amber with the softness of suede and a touch of floralcy.

A warm and romantic fragrance inspired by Paris in the late 1920s and its fascination with African culture. Bal d'Afrique is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the beauty of violet and a warm, woody base.

A fragrance that explores the idea of the end of time and the last scent on Earth. Eleventh Hour is a spicy and woody scent that combines the warmth of Sichuan pepper with the sweetness of fig and a touch of rum.

A fragrance that evokes the scent of old books and quiet libraries. Bibliothèque is a fruity and leathery scent that combines the sweetness of plum with the richness of leather and a touch of vanilla.
A tribute to the founder's Indian heritage, Black Saffron is a spicy and leathery fragrance. It combines the warmth of saffron with the freshness of juniper berries and a dark, leathery base.
A clean and pure fragrance that captures the scent of fresh laundry and clean skin. Blanche is a soft and aldehydic floral scent that is both innocent and sensual.

A warm and spicy fragrance that evokes a feeling of connection and intimacy. Eyes Closed is a comforting and sensual scent that combines the warmth of cinnamon and cardamom with the earthiness of patchouli.

A rich and opulent white floral fragrance, Casablanca Lily is a tribute to the majestic flower. It is a sensual and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of gardenia with the warmth of honey and a touch of carnation.

A tribute to the traditions of Día de los Muertos and All Saints' Day, De Los Santos is an aromatic and musky fragrance. It is a spiritual and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of sage with the earthiness of musk and a touch of sweetness.

A fresh and woody fragrance inspired by the Romani lifestyle. Gypsy Water is a free-spirited and adventurous scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the earthiness of pine needles and a warm, vanilla base.
A fresh and green fragrance that captures the scent of a freshly picked tulip. La Tulipe is a clean and elegant floral scent that is both simple and beautiful.
A controversial and aromatic fragrance that captures the scent of cannabis. It is a bold and unconventional scent that is both green and smoky.
A fragrance that reflects the tumultuous nature of our times. Mixed Emotions is a smoky and fruity scent that combines the sweetness of cassis with the bitterness of tea and a touch of birch wood.

A woody and floral fragrance inspired by the ghost flower of the Mojave Desert. Mojave Ghost is a beautiful and ethereal scent that combines the sweetness of ambrette with the beauty of magnolia and a soft, woody base.
A fragrance inspired by the vibrant and chaotic city of Mumbai. Mumbai Noise is a warm and spicy scent that combines the richness of coffee and tonka bean with a touch of davana.
A fragrance that captures the feeling of travel and anticipation. Open Sky is a fresh and citrusy scent with a touch of spice and a woody base, evoking the feeling of an endless horizon.
A classic and powerful fragrance that combines the richness of oud with the earthiness of patchouli. Oud Immortel is a smoky and woody scent that is both timeless and modern.
A tribute to the nurses of World War I, Rose of No Man's Land is a beautiful and compassionate fragrance. It is a fresh and spicy rose scent that is both delicate and strong.
A sweet and fruity fragrance that is a burst of ripeness. Pulp is a bold and unique scent that combines the sweetness of fig and red apple with the freshness of bergamot and a touch of praline.
A spicy and gourmand fragrance that is both chaotic and captivating. Rouge Chaotique is a rich and opulent scent that combines the sweetness of plum with the warmth of saffron and a touch of oud.
A rich and smoky leather fragrance that evokes the scent of a saddler's workshop. Sellier is a powerful and sophisticated scent that is both timeless and modern.

A warm and sweet fragrance that evokes the feeling of a slow dance. Slow Dance is a romantic and nostalgic scent that combines the sweetness of opoponax with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of cognac.
A modern and clean fragrance that celebrates the iconic cedarwood. Super Cedar is a simple yet sophisticated scent that is both warm and dry, with a touch of rose and a soft, musky base.

A bright and sunny fragrance that captures the feeling of a summer day. Sundazed is a citrusy and sweet scent that combines the freshness of mandarin with the sweetness of cotton candy and a soft, musky base.
A dark and smoky interpretation of vanilla, Vanille Antique is a rich and captivating fragrance. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the smokiness of cashmere wood and a touch of musk.
A spicy and citrusy fragrance that combines the richness of tobacco with the brightness of mandarin. Tobacco Mandarin is a bold and charismatic scent that is both complex and captivating.

A warm and musky fragrance that evokes the feeling of a psychedelic dream. Velvet Haze is a comforting and sensual scent that combines the sweetness of coconut with the earthiness of patchouli and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Byron
brandInfo.description: Byron Parfums is a French niche brand known for its bold, powerful, and extremely gourmand fragrances. Their scents are often intense, sweet, and designed to make a statement.

perfumes.description: An intensely sweet and rich gourmand fragrance. Mula Mula Double Caramel is a decadent blend of caramel, fruits, and a powerful oud and vanilla base.
A vibrant and juicy fruity gourmand. Mula Mula Rouge Extrême is a powerful and sweet blend of red fruits, saffron, and a deep, woody and musky base.

brandInfo.name: Byron Parfums
brandInfo.description: Byron Parfums is a French niche brand known for its bold, powerful, and extremely gourmand fragrances. Their scents are often intense, sweet, and designed to make a statement.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy gourmand fragrance. The Chronic is a rich and addictive blend of cinnamon, pepper, and a sweet, ambery and woody base.

brandInfo.name: Cacharel
brandInfo.description: Cacharel is a French brand of ready-to-wear clothing, perfume and accessories. The brand's fragrance line is known for its romantic, youthful, and often iconic scents like Anaïs Anaïs, Amor Amor, and LouLou, which have captured the spirit of femininity for different generations.

perfumes.description: A passionate and vibrant floral fruity fragrance. Amor Amor is a modern and youthful scent that captures the feeling of a first kiss, with notes of black currant, citrus, and a warm, vanilla base.
A darker and more mysterious version of Amor Amor. Forbidden Kiss is a sensual amber vanilla fragrance with notes of coffee, frangipani, and a creamy vanilla base.
An iconic and romantic floral fragrance. Anaïs Anaïs is a classic and tender bouquet of white flowers, with a prominent lily and hyacinth accord, creating a soft and ultra-feminine scent.
A modern and gourmand interpretation of Anaïs Anaïs. Premier Délice is a sweet and fruity floral with notes of pear, cacao, and a heart of peony.
A classic and spicy woody fragrance for men. Cacharel pour L'Homme is a unique and elegant scent with a prominent nutmeg accord, blended with fresh florals and a warm, woody base.
A unique and polarizing floral fragrance. Eden is a lush and aquatic scent that evokes a humid, tropical garden, with a complex blend of white flowers, fruits, and a deep, patchouli base.
A beloved and discontinued amber woody fragrance. Gloria is a warm and sensual blend of cherry, almond, and vanilla, with a touch of amaretto and spice.
An iconic and provocative amber floral fragrance. LouLou is a bold and powdery scent with a prominent tuberose and incense accord, creating a dark, sensual, and unforgettable aura.
A soft and clean floral woody musk. Noa is a delicate and comforting scent with a prominent coffee and white musk accord, creating a serene and gentle aura.
A bold and playful amber floral fragrance. Yes I Am is a modern and gourmand scent with a unique 'spicy cremoso' accord, blending milk and cardamom with sweet fruits and florals.
A rich and gourmand interpretation of Yes I Am. Delicious is a sweet and nutty fragrance with a prominent cacao and hazelnut accord, blended with a creamy milk note.

brandInfo.name: Calvin Klein
brandInfo.description: Calvin Klein is an American fashion house known for its minimalist and modern aesthetic. The brand's fragrance line is iconic, with groundbreaking scents like Obsession, Eternity, and the revolutionary unisex fragrance CK One, which have defined entire decades of perfumery.

perfumes.description: A clean and fresh floral woody musk. CK Be is a unisex fragrance that is both intimate and inviting, with notes of lavender, mint, and a soft, musky base.
An elegant and sophisticated floral fragrance. Beauty is a modern and minimalist scent with a prominent jasmine and ambrette accord, creating a clean and feminine aura.
A fresh and modern woody aromatic fragrance. Defy is a clean and masculine scent that contrasts the freshness of bergamot and lavender with a deep, earthy vetiver base.
