A modern and unconventional floral woody musk. Calvin Klein Women is a unique and artistic scent that blends the freshness of eucalyptus with the beauty of orange blossom and a warm, woody base.
A modern and metallic floral fragrance. Contradiction is a unique and clean scent with a prominent eucalyptus and floral accord, creating a fresh and distinctive aura.
An iconic and timeless aromatic fougère. Eternity for Men is a classic and clean scent that blends the freshness of lavender and citrus with a warm, woody and spicy base.
A modern and youthful floral woody musk. Downtown is a sweet and playful scent with notes of pear, plum, and a soft, musky and incense base.
A modern and tropical amber fougère. Eternity Now for Men is a sweet and spicy scent with notes of coconut, star anise, and a warm, vanilla and tonka bean base.
An iconic and aquatic floral fruity fragrance. Escape is a classic 90s scent that captures the feeling of a seaside escape, with notes of melon, chamomile, and a fresh, marine accord.
An iconic and romantic floral fragrance. Eternity for Women is a classic and elegant bouquet of flowers, with a prominent carnation and lily accord, creating a timeless and sophisticated scent.
A fresh and sensual woody aromatic fragrance. Euphoria Men is a modern and sophisticated scent that blends the freshness of ginger and pepper with a warm, suede and amber base.
A glamorous and sensual amber floral fragrance. Euphoria is a rich and exotic blend of pomegranate, black orchid, and a creamy, woody base.
A fresh and vibrant floral fruity fragrance. Euphoria Blush is a bright and modern scent with notes of raspberry, rose, and a creamy, chocolatey base.
A clean and modern citrus aromatic fragrance. CK Everyone is a fresh and gender-neutral scent with notes of orange oil, blue tea accord, and a clean, woody base.
A rich and opulent floral fruity fragrance. Euphoria Gold is a warm and luminous scent with notes of apricot, honey, and a heart of gardenia.
An iconic and powerful amber spicy fragrance for men. Obsession for Men is a classic and sensual blend of spices, amber, and a deep, woody and musky base.
A modern and aromatic fragrance. Obsessed for Women is a unique and clean scent with a prominent white lavender and musk accord, creating a fresh and sensual aura.
A modern and oriental amber woody fragrance. Obsessed for Men is a warm and sensual blend of black vanilla, amber, and a touch of leather.
The revolutionary and iconic citrus aromatic fragrance. CK One is a clean, fresh, and universally appealing unisex scent that blends green tea with citrus, florals, and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and spicy aromatic fragrance. CK One Red Edition for Him is a modern and energetic scent with notes of pear, ginger, and a suede and vetiver base.
A bold and rebellious amber spicy fragrance. CK One Shock for Him is a warm and energetic blend of tobacco, amber, and spices, with a fresh, citrusy opening.
A tropical and refreshing citrus aromatic fragrance. CK One Summer 2016 is a vibrant and youthful scent that evokes a jungle adventure, with notes of lime, guava, and coconut.
A tropical and refreshing citrus aromatic fragrance. CK One Summer 2016 is a vibrant and youthful scent that evokes a jungle adventure, with notes of lime, guava, and coconut.
A sensual and unique solar oriental fragrance. Reveal is a warm and salty scent that evokes the feeling of skin, with a prominent salt and ambergris accord, on a creamy sandalwood base.
A warm and spicy amber floral fragrance. Secret Obsession is a rich and sensual blend of plum, spices, and a deep, ambery and woody base.

brandInfo.name: Carner Barcelona
brandInfo.description: Carner Barcelona is a Spanish niche perfume house that creates fragrances inspired by the culture, art, and lifestyle of Barcelona. The scents are known for their quality, elegance, and Mediterranean character.

perfumes.description: A warm and milky woody fragrance. Palo Santo is a comforting and spiritual scent that blends the sacred wood with notes of rum, milk, and vanilla.

brandInfo.name: Carolina Herrera
brandInfo.description: Carolina Herrera is a Venezuelan-American fashion designer known for her elegant and sophisticated style. Her eponymous brand includes ready-to-wear, bridal, and fragrances. Carolina Herrera perfumes, like the iconic Good Girl, are often glamorous, feminine, and celebrate the modern woman.

perfumes.description: A fresh and aromatic fragrance that celebrates youth, freedom, and authenticity. 212 Heroes is a vegan fragrance with a unique cannabis accord, creating a modern and rebellious scent.
The iconic fragrance of New York City, 212 Men is a woody floral musk scent that is both fresh and sensual. It captures the energy and style of the city that never sleeps.
A sensual and mysterious fragrance, 212 Sexy Men is a spicy and ambery scent that is perfect for a night out. It is a captivating and seductive perfume that is both modern and sophisticated.
An energetic and addictive fragrance, 212 VIP Black is an aromatic fougère with a touch of sweetness. It is a bold and charismatic scent for the man who is the life of the party.
A boozy and spicy fragrance, 212 VIP Men is inspired by the vibrant nightlife of New York City. It is a charismatic and sophisticated scent for the man who is on the list.

A wild and energetic fragrance, 212 VIP Wild Party for Men is a woody and spicy scent that captures the spirit of a crazy party. It is a bold and charismatic perfume for the man who loves to have fun.

A joyful and uplifting fragrance, Alegria de Vivir is a celebration of life. It is a fresh and floral scent that combines the brightness of mandarin with the beauty of peony and a soft, rice steam accord.

A bold and sophisticated fragrance, Bad Boy is a spicy and gourmand scent that represents the duality of the modern man. It combines the brightness of bergamot with the darkness of cocoa and a touch of tonka bean.

A more intense and electrifying version of Bad Boy Cobalt, the Elixir is a powerful and charismatic fragrance. It amplifies the woody and aromatic notes, creating a deeper and more captivating scent experience.
An fiery and unconventional fragrance, Bad Boy Extreme pushes the boundaries. It combines the richness of cocoa with the earthiness of patchouli and a touch of incense.

A soft and intimate fragrance, Call Me Darling is a milky and floral scent that is both comforting and sensual. It combines the creaminess of milk with the beauty of orange blossom and a touch of tonka bean.

The iconic fragrance in the stiletto-shaped bottle, Good Girl is a sensual and sophisticated amber floral scent. It represents the duality of the modern woman with its blend of bright white florals and dark, gourmand notes.

perfumes.inspiredBy: CH UNDER THE SEA FOR MEN
perfumes.description: A fresh and aquatic fragrance that captures the mystery of the deep sea. CH Under the Sea for Men is an aromatic and marine scent with a touch of spice and a woody base.
A sensual and captivating fragrance, 212 Sexy is a sweet and spicy scent that is perfect for a night out. It is a modern and sophisticated perfume that is both alluring and confident.
A boozy and sweet fragrance, 212 VIP is inspired by the vibrant nightlife of New York City. It is a charismatic and glamorous scent for the woman who is on the list.
A fresh and fruity interpretation of 212 VIP, Rosé is a vibrant and cheerful fragrance. It combines the sparkle of pink champagne with the beauty of peach blossom and a soft, woody base.

A wild and energetic fragrance, 212 VIP Wild Party for Women is a fruity and floral scent that captures the spirit of a crazy party. It is a bold and charismatic perfume for the woman who loves to have fun.
The original 212 for women, this fragrance captures the modern and cosmopolitan spirit of New York City. It is a fresh and clean white floral scent that is both elegant and versatile.
A fresh and romantic interpretation of Good Girl, Blush is a powdery and floral fragrance. It combines the brightness of bergamot with the beauty of peony and a soft, vanilla base.

A more intense and sensual version of Good Girl Blush, the Elixir is a captivating and sophisticated fragrance. It amplifies the floral and vanilla notes, creating a deeper and more alluring scent experience.
A limited edition of the iconic Good Girl, Dazzling Garden is a tribute to the magic of a blooming garden at night. It is a sensual and captivating fragrance with a sparkling twist.
A glamorous and sparkling limited edition of Good Girl, Fantastic Pink is a celebration of femininity and confidence. It is a sensual and captivating fragrance with a touch of glitter.

A lighter and more luminous interpretation of Good Girl, Légère is a floral gourmand scent that is both fresh and sensual. It combines the sweetness of dulce de leche with the beauty of jasmine and a touch of ylang-ylang.

A rebellious and audacious fragrance, Good Girl Eau de Parfum Suprême is a fruity and ambery scent that breaks all the rules. It combines the sweetness of berries with the intensity of tonka bean and a touch of vetiver.
A playful and joyful fragrance, Lucky Charm is a fruity-floral scent that brings good luck. It combines the sweetness of plum with the beauty of iris and a touch of vanilla.

A rich and sophisticated fragrance, Mystery Tobacco is a tribute to the noble ingredient. It is a warm and spicy scent that combines the richness of tobacco with the sweetness of tonka bean and a touch of citrus.
A bold and confident fragrance, Fearless & Fabulous is a tribute to the power of women. It is a warm and floral scent that combines the beauty of gardenia with the warmth of cashmere wood.

A rich and opulent fragrance, Saffron Lazuli is inspired by the precious lapis lazuli stone. It is a warm and spicy scent that combines the richness of saffron with the sweetness of tonka bean and a touch of leather.
A powerful and charismatic fragrance, Stallion Leather is a tribute to the strength and beauty of the horse. It is a rich and smoky leather scent with a touch of spice and a floral heart.

perfumes.inspiredBy: CH UNDER THE SEA FOR WOMEN
perfumes.description: A fresh and aquatic fragrance that captures the magic of the deep sea. CH Under the Sea for Women is a floral and marine scent with a touch of fruitiness and a warm, sandy base.
A classic and authentic oud fragrance, True Oud is a tribute to the rich heritage of Arabian perfumery. It is a powerful and long-lasting scent that is perfect for lovers of traditional oud.

A fun and fabulous fragrance, Very Good Girl is a fruity and rosy interpretation of the iconic Good Girl. It is a bold and charismatic scent that combines the tartness of redcurrant with the beauty of rose and a warm, vanilla base.
A more glamorous and intense version of Very Good Girl, Glam is a sparkling and charismatic fragrance. It combines the sweetness of cherry with the beauty of rose and a touch of almond.

brandInfo.name: Caron
brandInfo.description: Caron is one of the oldest French perfume houses, founded in 1904. The brand is celebrated for its rich history, classic compositions, and iconic fragrances like Pour Un Homme de Caron, which have defined perfumery for generations.

perfumes.description: A timeless and iconic aromatic fragrance for men. Pour Un Homme de Caron is a classic and elegant blend of lavender and vanilla, creating a clean, comforting, and sophisticated scent.
A bold and powerful woody chypre. Yatagan is a rugged and animalic fragrance with notes of pine, leather, and castoreum, creating a unique and uncompromisingly masculine scent.

brandInfo.name: Cartier
brandInfo.description: Cartier is a French luxury goods conglomerate which designs, manufactures, distributes, and sells jewelry and watches. Founded in Paris in 1847, the brand is a symbol of elegance, sophistication, and timeless luxury. Cartier's fragrances are an extension of this heritage, with scents that are as precious and refined as their jewelry.

perfumes.description: A tribute to the majestic lily, Baiser Volé is a beautiful and realistic floral fragrance. It captures every aspect of the flower, from the fresh leaves to the powdery pistil, creating a scent that is both pure and sensual.

A sparkling and multi-faceted floral fragrance, Carat is designed to mimic the scent of a diamond. It is a beautiful and luminous bouquet of seven different flowers, creating a scent that is both vibrant and elegant.
A spicy and woody fragrance for men, Déclaration is a bold and charismatic scent. It is a unique and sophisticated blend of cardamom, citrus, and a warm, woody base.

A modern and feline chypre-floral fragrance, La Panthère is a tribute to the free and passionate woman. It is a captivating and sensual scent that combines the beauty of gardenia with the animalic touch of musk.

A honeyed and airy fragrance for men, L'Envol de Cartier is an innovative and sophisticated scent. It is a transparent and vibrant perfume that combines the sweetness of honey with the richness of guaiac wood and a touch of musk.

The iconic and classic oriental fragrance, Must de Cartier is a tribute to opulent femininity. It is a rich and complex scent that combines the greenness of galbanum with the beauty of jasmine and a warm, ambery base.

A more modern and floral interpretation of the classic, Must de Cartier Gold is a luminous and elegant fragrance. It combines the greenness of galbanum with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, vanilla base.

A classic and aromatic fougère, Pasha de Cartier is a tribute to the elegant and powerful man. It is a fresh and sophisticated scent that combines the coolness of mint with the warmth of spices and a rich, woody base.

A fresh and minty fragrance, Roadster is an invigorating and modern scent for men. It is a unique and elegant perfume that combines the coolness of mint with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of vetiver.

brandInfo.name: Carven
brandInfo.description: Carven is a French fashion house founded in 1945. The brand's fragrances are known for their chic, elegant, and effortlessly Parisian style, often featuring fresh and delicate floral compositions.

perfumes.description: A fresh and elegant floral fragrance. Le Parfum is a bright and feminine scent with notes of sweet pea, white hyacinth, and a soft, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Celine
brandInfo.description: Celine is a French luxury fashion house. Under the creative direction of Hedi Slimane, the brand launched a high-end fragrance collection, 'Haute Parfumerie', known for its sophisticated, elegant, and often powdery and musky scents that evoke a timeless Parisian chic.

perfumes.description: A bright and elegant citrus aromatic fragrance. Parade is a modern and sophisticated take on a classic cologne, with notes of neroli, bergamot, and a soft, mossy base.

brandInfo.name: Cerruti
brandInfo.description: Cerruti is an Italian fashion house. Its fragrance line is known for its classic, elegant, and sophisticated scents, with the iconic 1881 for Women being a standout floral fragrance.

perfumes.description: A fresh and aromatic woody fragrance for men. Cerruti pour Homme is a modern and elegant scent with notes of mandarin, guaiac wood, and a touch of anise.
A classic and elegant floral fragrance. 1881 for Women is a soft and powdery scent with a prominent mimosa and iris accord, creating a timeless and feminine aura.

brandInfo.name: Chanel
brandInfo.description: Chanel is a French luxury fashion house founded by Coco Chanel. The brand is a titan in the world of perfumery, with a legacy of creating timeless, elegant, and revolutionary fragrances. From the iconic Chanel No. 5 to the modern classic Coco Mademoiselle, Chanel scents are synonymous with sophistication and Parisian chic.

perfumes.description: A rich and opulent amber woody fragrance. Coromandel is a masterpiece that blends the earthiness of patchouli with the sweetness of white chocolate and the warmth of resins, creating a sophisticated and addictive scent.
A clean and elegant floral woody musk. 1957 is a sophisticated and luminous scent with a prominent white musk accord, blended with aldehydes, florals, and a touch of honey.
A bright and powdery floral fragrance. Comète is a luminous and elegant scent with a prominent cherry blossom and iris accord, creating a soft and ethereal aura.
A majestic and powerful amber fragrance. Le Lion de Chanel is a rich and opulent blend of labdanum, patchouli, and vanilla, creating a warm, smoky, and animalic scent.
A classic and sophisticated amber woody fragrance. Allure Homme is a fresh and warm scent that blends citrus and peach with a complex heart of spices and florals, on a rich, woody and vanilla base.
A fresh and energetic woody spicy fragrance. Allure Homme Sport is a vibrant and modern scent that combines the freshness of citrus and aldehydes with a warm, spicy and musky base.
An iconic and powerful chypre woody fragrance. Antaeus is a bold and animalic scent with a rich blend of myrrh, clary sage, and a deep, leathery and mossy base.
An iconic and modern woody aromatic fragrance. Bleu de Chanel is a fresh and sophisticated scent that blends the brightness of citrus with the warmth of ginger and incense, on a deep, woody base.
A bold and sophisticated amber woody fragrance. Égoïste is a warm and spicy blend of cinnamon, rose, and a rich, tobacco and sandalwood base.
A fresh and modern aromatic fougère. Platinum Égoïste is a clean and metallic scent that blends the freshness of lavender and rosemary with a sharp, woody base.
A classic and elegant amber floral fragrance. Allure is a complex and multi-faceted scent that blends fresh citrus and peach with a rich bouquet of flowers and a warm, vanilla and sandalwood base.
A warmer and more mysterious version of Allure. Allure Sensuelle is a rich and spicy amber floral with a prominent patchouli and pink pepper accord.
A modern and elegant aromatic fougère. Boy Chanel is a sophisticated and unisex scent that plays with the classic fougère structure, blending lavender and geranium with a soft, musky base.
A vibrant and unexpected chypre floral fragrance. Chance is a modern and sophisticated scent that blends the freshness of pink pepper with the beauty of jasmine and a deep, patchouli and musk base.
A sparkling and energetic chypre floral. Chance Eau Fraîche is a vibrant and zesty scent that blends the freshness of lemon and citron with a heart of water hyacinth and a clean, woody base.
A delicate and romantic floral fruity fragrance. Chance Eau Tendre is a soft and graceful scent that blends the freshness of quince and grapefruit with a beautiful heart of hyacinth and jasmine.
A classic and sophisticated floral green fragrance. Chanel No. 19 is a bold and elegant scent with a prominent galbanum and iris accord, creating a cool, earthy, and timeless aura.
A softer and more modern interpretation of No. 19. Poudré is a delicate and powdery floral woody musk with a prominent iris and musk accord, creating a clean and elegant scent.

The iconic and revolutionary floral-aldehyde fragrance. Chanel No. 5 is a timeless masterpiece, a complex and abstract scent that blends sparkling aldehydes with a rich bouquet of florals, creating an elegant and sophisticated aura.

A modern and more delicate interpretation of the timeless Chanel No. 5. Eau Première is a luminous and airy fragrance that softens the original's iconic aldehyde and floral heart with a touch of vanilla and ylang-ylang, creating a contemporary and elegant scent.
A modern, fresh, and vibrant interpretation of the iconic No. 5. L'Eau is a light and airy floral aldehyde with a prominent citrus and ylang-ylang accord, designed for a new generation.

A floral and fruity fragrance mist from Chanel's No. 1 beauty line. L'Eau Rouge is a revitalizing and delicate scent with notes of red berries, rose, and jasmine, designed to be worn alone or layered with other fragrances.
A luxurious and opulent amber spicy fragrance. Coco is a rich and complex scent that blends spicy and floral notes with a warm, resinous base, creating a bold and sophisticated aura.

A modern and sophisticated amber floral fragrance. Coco Mademoiselle is a vibrant and sensual scent that blends sparkling citrus with a heart of rose and jasmine, on a base of patchouli and vetiver, creating a bold and feminine aura.

A deeper and more sensual interpretation of Coco Mademoiselle. This intense version amplifies the patchouli and amber facets of the original, creating a rich, warm, and captivating fragrance with a powerful and long-lasting trail.
A soft and delicate interpretation of Coco Mademoiselle, designed for the night. L'Eau Privée is a light and intimate amber floral with a prominent musk and jasmine accord.

An intimate and seductive amber woody fragrance. Coco Noir is a mysterious and elegant scent that blends the brightness of grapefruit and bergamot with a rich heart of rose and jasmine, on a warm and sensual base of patchouli and tonka bean.

A luminous and airy floral fragrance. Gabrielle is a modern and radiant scent built around four white flowers: jasmine, ylang-ylang, orange blossom, and tuberose, creating a purely feminine and solar fragrance.

A vibrant and sparkling floral woody fragrance from the Les Eaux de Chanel collection. Paris-Paris is a fresh and elegant scent that captures the effortless style of Parisian women, with a prominent Damask rose note, refreshed by citrus and sharpened by pink pepper.

brandInfo.name: Chloé
brandInfo.description: Chloé is a French luxury fashion house known for its feminine, romantic, and bohemian style. Chloé's fragrances, particularly the iconic Chloé Eau de Parfum, are celebrated for their modern and elegant interpretation of the rose, capturing a chic and free-spirited femininity.

perfumes.description: The iconic fragrance of the house, Chloé Eau de Parfum is a modern and elegant interpretation of the rose. It is a fresh and feminine scent that is both classic and contemporary.

A more floral and powdery interpretation of the original, Fleur de Parfum is a delicate and sensual fragrance. It combines the beauty of rose with the freshness of verbena and a touch of cherry blossom.
A fresh and citrusy interpretation of the original, L'Eau de Chloé is a light and airy fragrance. It is a beautiful and elegant scent that is perfect for a spring day.

A powdery and floral fragrance, Love, Chloé is a tribute to vintage femininity. It is a soft and elegant scent that combines the beauty of iris with the freshness of orange blossom and a touch of pink pepper.

A romantic and fresh white floral fragrance, Love Story is inspired by Parisian romance. It is a beautiful and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of neroli with the beauty of orange blossom and jasmine.

A modern and adventurous chypre floral fragrance, Nomade is a tribute to the free-spirited woman. It is a beautiful and confident scent that combines the sweetness of mirabelle plum with the earthiness of oakmoss and a touch of freesia.
A more gourmand and jasmine-focused interpretation of Nomade, Naturelle is a warm and sensual fragrance. It combines the sweetness of dates with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, vanilla base.
A fresh and dewy rose fragrance, Roses de Chloé is a tribute to the queen of flowers. It is a delicate and graceful scent that captures the feeling of a Parisian rose garden.

A playful and energetic fragrance, See By Chloé is a fruity-floral scent that is both chic and addictive. It combines the freshness of apple blossom with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Chopard
brandInfo.description: Chopard is a Swiss manufacturer and retailer of luxury watches, jewelry, and accessories. The brand's fragrance line is known for its opulent and glamorous scents, often inspired by precious gems and red carpet events.

perfumes.description: A rich and exotic amber vanilla fragrance. Casmir is a warm and opulent blend of fruits, vanilla, and spices, creating a classic and comforting scent.
A romantic and sweet amber floral fragrance. Happy Spirit Amira d'Amour is a lovely blend of pink pepper, jasmine, and a warm, honeyed base.
A sweet and powdery gourmand fragrance. Wish is a delicious blend of caramel, honey, and vanilla, with a touch of fruit and florals.

brandInfo.name: Christian Dior
brandInfo.description: Christian Dior was a French fashion designer, best known as the founder of one of the world's top fashion houses. His fragrance line is legendary, with iconic scents like Miss Dior, J'adore, and Sauvage that have defined generations of perfumery.

perfumes.description: An iconic and seductive amber floral fragrance. Addict is a rich and opulent blend of silkwood blossom, orange blossom, and a deep, creamy bourbon vanilla base.
A fresher and more luminous version of Addict. The Eau de Toilette is a sparkling amber floral with a prominent Sicilian mandarin note and a soft, woody vanilla base.
A sensual and elegant amber floral fragrance. Ambre Nuit is a sophisticated blend of warm amber and velvety Turkish rose, creating a scent of refined seduction.
A classic and iconic floral fragrance. Diorissimo is a beautiful and realistic tribute to the lily-of-the-valley flower, creating a fresh and romantic scent.
A fresh and aromatic fragrance inspired by a walk along the sea. Balade Sauvage is a beautiful blend of fig, bergamot, and sea salt, creating a scent of natural elegance.
A sophisticated and elegant woody chypre. Bois d'Argent is a soft and powdery blend of iris, honey, and myrrh, creating a scent of understated luxury.
A joyful and sparkling amber woody fragrance. Dolce Vita is a happy and optimistic scent with notes of peach, cinnamon, and a creamy vanilla and sandalwood base.
A modern and sensual woody fragrance. The 2020 version of Dior Homme is a departure from the iris-heavy original, focusing on a clean and masculine blend of woods and spices.
The most intense and luxurious version of Dior Homme. The Parfum is a rich and powerful leather fragrance with a prominent iris note and a deep, woody and animalic base.
An oceanic and serene amber woody fragrance. Dune evokes the scent of a windswept beach, blending fresh florals with a warm, ambery and woody base.
A fresh and green woody aromatic fragrance for men. Dune Pour Homme is a unique and natural scent with a prominent fig leaf and wood accord.
A fresh and elegant citrus aromatic fragrance. Escale à Portofino is a bright and uplifting scent that captures the essence of the Italian Riviera, with notes of bergamot, citron, and almond.
The iconic and timeless citrus aromatic for men. Eau Sauvage is a masterpiece of perfumery, blending fresh lemon and bergamot with aromatic herbs and a deep, mossy base.
A more intense and modern interpretation of Eau Sauvage. The Extreme version is a fresh and aromatic fougère with a prominent lavender and basil accord.
An elegant and opulent floral fragrance. Grand Bal is a tribute to Dior's grand ball gowns, with a beautiful and radiant jasmine heart.
An iconic and revolutionary aromatic fougère. Fahrenheit is a unique and powerful blend of violet leaf, leather, and spices, creating a scent that is both warm and cool.
A cool and fresh interpretation of Fahrenheit. Fahrenheit 32 is an amber woody fragrance with a prominent orange blossom and vanilla accord, creating a unique and modern scent.
A darker and more intense version of Fahrenheit. Absolute is a rich and smoky amber woody fragrance with notes of myrrh, incense, and a prominent oud accord.
An iconic and seductive amber vanilla fragrance. Hypnotic Poison is a rich and creamy blend of almond, vanilla, and jasmine, creating a mesmerizing and addictive scent.
A lighter and more citrusy interpretation of Hypnotic Poison. Eau Secrete is a fresh and elegant amber floral with a prominent neroli and vanilla accord.
A more floral and sensual version of Hypnotic Poison. Eau Sensuelle is a rich and intoxicating amber floral with a prominent orchid and ylang-ylang accord.
A rich and decadent amber vanilla fragrance. Fève Délicieuse is a delicious and comforting blend of tonka bean, vanilla, and caramel, with a touch of cherry and cacao.
An elegant and mysterious chypre fragrance. Gris Dior is a sophisticated blend of rose, patchouli, and oakmoss, creating a scent of timeless Parisian chic.
A fresh and energetic woody aromatic fragrance. Higher is a modern and urban scent with notes of pear, basil, and a clean, woody base.
An iconic and luminous floral fruity fragrance. J'adore is a modern and glamorous bouquet of flowers, with a prominent jasmine, rose, and ylang-ylang accord.
A fresh and vibrant woody aromatic fragrance. Higher Energy is an energetic and uplifting scent with notes of pineapple, mint, and a spicy, woody base.
A fresh and salty floral fruity fragrance. J'adore In Joy is a unique and joyful scent with a prominent sea salt and peach accord, creating a sunny and uplifting feel.
The original and iconic woody floral musk. Dior Homme is a modern classic with a prominent iris note, creating a powdery, sophisticated, and elegant scent.
A fresh and elegant woody aromatic fragrance. Dior Homme Eau for Men is a bright and clean scent with a prominent iris and grapefruit accord.
A fresh and energetic woody aromatic fragrance. Dior Homme Sport is a vibrant and modern scent with notes of blood orange, pink pepper, and a clean, woody base.
An innovative and alcohol-free floral fragrance. J'adore Parfum d'Eau is a fresh and milky bouquet of white flowers, creating a soft and natural scent experience.
A more intense and sensual version of Dior Homme. Dior Homme Intense is a rich and powdery woody floral musk with a prominent iris and ambrette accord.
A rich and opulent amber floral fragrance. J'adore L'Or is a luxurious and concentrated blend of grandiflorum jasmine and centifolia rose absolutes, creating a truly precious scent.
A sensual and powerful amber floral fragrance. J'adore Infinissime is a rich and intoxicating blend of tuberose, jasmine, and ylang-ylang, with a creamy sandalwood base.
A vibrant and joyful floral woody musk. Joy by Dior is a bright and radiant scent with notes of citrus, rose, and a soft, powdery musk base.
A dark and mysterious amber woody fragrance. Midnight Poison is a captivating and seductive blend of rose, patchouli, and amber, creating a modern and gothic scent.
The original and iconic chypre floral fragrance. Miss Dior is a classic and elegant scent with a rich blend of florals, galbanum, and a deep, mossy base.
A bright and cheerful floral fruity fragrance. Absolutely Blooming is a sweet and playful scent with notes of raspberry, rose, and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and delicate floral fragrance. Blooming Bouquet is a tender and romantic scent with a prominent peony and rose accord, creating a soft and elegant aura.
A playful and gourmand chypre fruity fragrance. Miss Dior Chérie is a unique and memorable scent with a prominent popcorn and caramel accord, blended with strawberry and patchouli.
A modern and elegant amber floral. The 2017 version of Miss Dior EDP is a vibrant and sensual scent with a prominent rose and patchouli accord.
A velvety and fresh amber floral. The 2021 version of Miss Dior EDP is a beautiful bouquet of flowers with a prominent iris and peony accord, on a soft, musky and vanilla base.
A rich and intense amber floral. The 2024 Parfum version is a dense and fruity interpretation with a prominent jasmine and wild strawberry accord, on a deep, woody and ambery base.
A sparkling and fresh floral fragrance. Rose N'Roses is a vibrant and modern scent with a prominent Grasse rose and bergamot accord.
An iconic and provocative amber floral fragrance. Poison is a bold and dramatic blend of plum, tuberose, and incense, creating a dark and unforgettable scent.
A majestic and powerful amber floral fragrance. Oud Ispahan is a sophisticated and opulent blend of oud, rose, and saffron, creating a scent of pure luxury.
A rich and animalic amber woody fragrance. Oud Rosewood is a powerful and captivating blend of oud, rosewood, and a touch of fruity sweetness.
A modern and playful amber vanilla fragrance. Poison Girl is a sweet and addictive blend of bitter orange, rose, and a creamy almond and vanilla base.
A modern and seductive floral fragrance. Pure Poison is a clean and intoxicating blend of white flowers, with a prominent jasmine and gardenia accord.
A vibrant and juicy chypre fruity fragrance. Rouge Trafalgar is a delicious and playful blend of red berries, black currant, and a deep, patchouli base.
The iconic and fresh aromatic fougère. Sauvage is a powerful and noble blend of fresh bergamot, spicy pepper, and a prominent, ambery ambroxan base.
A warmer and more sensual version of Sauvage. The Eau de Parfum adds spicy notes of star anise and nutmeg to the fresh bergamot, with a smooth vanilla absolute base.
A soft and delicate floral fragrance. Souffle de Soie is a beautiful and airy blend of jasmine, tuberose, and rose, creating a scent of pure elegance.
An extraordinarily concentrated and powerful aromatic fragrance. Sauvage Elixir is a rich and spicy blend of grapefruit, spices, and a unique 'tailor-made' lavender essence, on a deep, woody base.
A fresh and delicate floral fragrance. Tendre Poison is a softer and more wearable interpretation of the original Poison, with a prominent freesia and honey accord.
The most concentrated and sensual version of Sauvage. The Parfum is a rich and smooth amber fougère with a prominent mandarin and tonka bean accord.
A rich and colorful amber fragrance. Tobacolor is a surprising and warm blend of tobacco, honey, and fruity notes, creating a modern and addictive scent.
A warm and spicy amber vanilla fragrance. Vanilla Diorama is a delicious and sophisticated gourmand with notes of vanilla, rum, and cacao.

brandInfo.name: Christina Aguilera
brandInfo.description: Christina Aguilera is an American singer, songwriter, actress, and television personality. Her fragrance line is known for its glamorous, feminine, and sensual scents that reflect her powerful and confident persona.

perfumes.description: A sensual and playful amber floral fragrance. By Night is a seductive scent with notes of red apple, pineapple, and a warm, ambery vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Cire Trudon
brandInfo.description: Cire Trudon is the oldest candlemaker in the world, founded in 1643. The French brand has expanded into perfumery, creating sophisticated and artistic fragrances that often evoke historical themes and rich, natural landscapes.

perfumes.description: A warm and smoky leather fragrance inspired by a hotel in Havana. Ernesto is a rich blend of rum, tobacco, and leather, with a touch of citrus and spice.

brandInfo.name: Clean
brandInfo.description: Clean is a fragrance brand that pioneered the concept of 'clean' scents, creating fresh, simple, and linear fragrances inspired by everyday experiences like a warm cotton towel or a fresh shower. The brand is known for its minimalist aesthetic and commitment to eco-conscious and cruelty-free practices.

perfumes.description: A soft and intimate floral woody musk. Clean Skin evokes the scent of warm skin with notes of musk, honeydew, and a touch of vanilla.
The ultimate fresh laundry scent. Warm Cotton is a clean and comforting fragrance with notes of citrus, verbena, and a soft, musky base.
A bright and refreshing floral woody musk. Cool Cotton is a crisp and clean scent with notes of bergamot, green apple, and a soft, cottony base.

brandInfo.description: Clinique is an American skincare, cosmetics, toiletries and fragrances brand, usually sold in high-end department stores. It is a subsidiary of the Estée Lauder Companies. Its fragrance line is known for clean, fresh, and often hypoallergenic scents, with 'Happy' and 'Aromatics Elixir' being its most iconic creations.
brandInfo.name: Clinique

perfumes.description: A classic and iconic chypre-floral fragrance. Aromatics Elixir is a complex and powerful blend of herbs, florals, and woods, creating a unique, medicinal, and deeply aromatic scent that is both polarizing and beloved.
A mysterious and sensual amber floral. Aromatics in Black is a deep and alluring fragrance that blends juicy plum and pink pepper with a heart of jasmine and a warm, myrrh and tonka bean base.
A clean and elegant amber floral. Aromatics in White is a serene and sophisticated fragrance that blends violet leaf and pepper with a heart of rose and orange blossom, on a soft, musky amber base.
A rich and opulent amber floral centered around rose. Beyond Rose is a luxurious and intense fragrance that blends a deep, jammy rose with warm amber and spices.
A bright, cheerful, and iconic floral fruity fragrance. Happy is a fresh and uplifting blend of citrus and florals that evokes a feeling of pure joy and sunshine.
A bright, cheerful, and iconic citrus aromatic fragrance for men. Happy for Men is a fresh and uplifting blend of citrus fruits and green notes that evokes a feeling of pure joy and energy.
A soft and comforting floral woody musk. Simply was a unique fragrance that blended clean, soapy notes with a heart of white florals and a smooth, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Clive Christian
brandInfo.description: Clive Christian is a British luxury perfume house that creates some of the most expensive and opulent fragrances in the world. The brand is known for its use of rare and precious ingredients, as well as its beautiful and artistic presentations. Clive Christian perfumes are a symbol of ultimate luxury and refinement.

perfumes.description: A sophisticated and complex woody spicy fragrance, No. 1 for Men is a symbol of ultimate luxury. It is a powerful and charismatic scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of spices and a rich, woody base.
A rich and gourmand fragrance, XXI Art Deco Vanilla Orchid is a beautiful and elegant scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the beauty of orchid and a touch of greenness.

A rich and opulent floral fruity fragrance, No. 1 for Women is a symbol of ultimate luxury. It is a beautiful and sophisticated scent that combines the sweetness of fruits with a rich bouquet of flowers and a warm, woody base.
A spicy and woody fragrance, X for Men is a captivating and charismatic scent. It is a unique and sophisticated blend of spices, woods, and a touch of sweetness.
A fresh and citrusy fragrance, X Neroli is a limited edition that celebrates the beautiful neroli flower. It is a bright and uplifting scent that is perfect for a summer day.

brandInfo.name: CoSTUME NATIONAL
brandInfo.description: CoSTUME NATIONAL is an Italian fashion house known for its urban, minimalist, and edgy style. The brand's fragrances reflect this modern and sophisticated aesthetic.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy amber fragrance for men. CoSTUME NATIONAL Homme is a modern and sophisticated scent with notes of grapefruit, cardamom, and a rich, woody base.
A dark and sensual amber fragrance. Scent Intense is a minimalist and modern scent with a prominent amber accord, blended with hibiscus and a touch of tea.

brandInfo.name: Coach
brandInfo.description: Coach is an American luxury design house specializing in handbags, luggage, accessories, and ready-to-wear. Its fragrance line captures the brand's modern, free-spirited, and all-American attitude.

perfumes.description: A vibrant and sparkling floral fragrance inspired by the energy of New York City. Coach The Fragrance is a modern and joyful scent with notes of raspberry, Turkish rose, and a soft, suede musk base.

brandInfo.name: Comme des Garçons
brandInfo.description: Comme des Garçons is a Japanese fashion label founded by Rei Kawakubo. The brand's fragrance line is known for its avant-garde, artistic, and often unconventional scents that challenge the norms of perfumery, with a focus on themes like incense, synthetics, and anti-perfumes.

perfumes.description: An unconventional and modern woody fragrance. Concrete is an artistic scent that deconstructs sandalwood, blending it with spices and metallic notes to create a unique, urban, and industrial feel.

brandInfo.name: Comme des Garçons
brandInfo.description: Comme des Garçons is a Japanese fashion label founded by Rei Kawakubo. The brand's fragrance line is known for its avant-garde, artistic, and often unconventional scents that challenge the norms of perfumery, with a focus on themes like incense, synthetics, and anti-perfumes.

perfumes.description: A unique and artistic fragrance. Comme des Garçons 2 is a complex blend of natural and synthetic notes, with a prominent ink accord, creating a modern and unconventional scent.
An abstract and avant-garde 'anti-perfume'. Odeur 53 is a blend of 53 synthetic and inorganic notes, evoking scents like fresh laundry, hot lightbulbs, and metal.
A celebration of wood. Wonderwood is a rich and complex blend of various woods, both natural and synthetic, creating a deep, smoky, and meditative scent.

brandInfo.name: Coty
brandInfo.description: Coty, Inc. is a multinational beauty company founded in 1904 by François Coty. It is one of the largest fragrance companies in the world, known for producing and distributing a vast array of popular and classic perfumes.

perfumes.description: A classic and comforting amber vanilla fragrance. Vanilla Fields is a warm and sweet blend of vanilla, jasmine, and a touch of coconut, creating a nostalgic and affordable scent.

brandInfo.name: Courreges
brandInfo.description: Courrèges is a French fashion house known for its futuristic, space-age designs. Its fragrances, like its fashion, are often modern, bold, and unconventional.

perfumes.description: A bold and spicy amber fragrance. Hyperbole is a warm and modern scent with notes of tobacco, tonka bean, and a touch of pepper.
A fresh and modern aromatic fragrance. Slogan is a clean and minimalist scent with notes of juniper berries and a soft, white musk base.

brandInfo.name: Creed
brandInfo.description: Creed is a niche perfume house with a history of creating fragrances for royalty and discerning clientele. Founded in 1760, the brand is known for its use of high-quality natural ingredients and traditional infusion techniques, resulting in luxurious and sophisticated scents.

perfumes.description: A tribute to the Renaissance city of Florence, Acqua Fiorentina is a luminous and fresh fruity-floral fragrance. It opens with a sweet and tangy blend of plum and apple, leading to a heart of rose, carnation, and bergamot, and settles into a warm base of sandalwood and cedarwood.

A modern classic, Aventus is a powerful and sophisticated chypre-fruity fragrance. It is a celebration of strength, success, and vision, with a bold opening of pineapple, blackcurrant, and apple, a smoky heart of birch and patchouli, and a rich base of oakmoss and ambergris.

Aventus Absolu is a more intense and opulent interpretation of the iconic Aventus. It amplifies the fruity and woody notes, creating a richer and more complex scent experience with a captivating and long-lasting trail.

The feminine counterpart to the legendary Aventus, Aventus for Her is a confident and alluring fruity-chypre fragrance. It features a crisp opening of green apple and pink pepper, a floral heart of rose and lilac, and a sensual base of sandalwood, amber, and ylang-ylang.

Carmina is a bold and sensual amber-floral fragrance. It combines the richness of black cherry and saffron with a delicate heart of May rose and peony, all resting on a warm and inviting base of myrrh, frankincense, and ambroxan.

A classic and sophisticated woody-amber fragrance, Bois du Portugal is a tribute to the forests of Portugal. It opens with fresh bergamot, leading to a heart of lavender, and dries down to a rich and warm base of cedarwood, sandalwood, and vetiver.

Erolfa is a fresh and invigorating marine fragrance that captures the essence of the Mediterranean sea. It blends citrus notes with spices and a salty, ambery base, creating a scent that is both uplifting and sophisticated.

A rich and opulent floral fragrance, Fantasia de Fleurs is a tribute to the elegance of Empress Elisabeth of Austria-Hungary. It is a classic blend of Bulgarian rose and Florentine iris, creating a timeless and romantic scent.

A fresh and romantic floral fragrance, Fleurs de Gardenia is a celebration of the gardenia flower. It is a delicate and elegant scent that combines the creaminess of gardenia with spicy and green notes, creating a modern and sophisticated floral perfume.

A timeless classic, Green Irish Tweed is a fresh and invigorating woody-floral fragrance. It evokes a walk through the Irish countryside with its blend of lemon verbena, iris, and violet leaves, grounded by a base of sandalwood and ambergris.

Inspired by the majestic Himalayan mountains, Himalaya is a fresh and adventurous woody-amber fragrance. It combines crisp citrus notes with warm spices and a base of sandalwood, cedarwood, and ambergris, creating a scent that is both invigorating and comforting.

A daring and mysterious floral fragrance, Love in Black is inspired by the enigmatic Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis. It is a powdery and woody scent with a heart of violet and iris, complemented by blackcurrant and a warm, musky base.

A pure and elegant floral fragrance, Love in White is a celebration of unity and peace. It is a sophisticated blend of orange peel, magnolia, and rice, with a floral heart and a creamy, powdery base of sandalwood and vanilla.

A luxurious and versatile marine fragrance, Millesime Imperial is a sophisticated blend of salty and fruity notes. It opens with a burst of bergamot and blackcurrant, leading to a heart of iris and a marine accord, and dries down to a warm, musky base.

A vibrant and uplifting citrus-aromatic fragrance, Neroli Sauvage is a celebration of the neroli blossom. It is a fresh and elegant scent that combines the bitterness of neroli with the sweetness of bergamot and a warm, ambery base.

A luxurious and exotic amber-floral fragrance, Queen of Silk is a tribute to the precious material. It is a rich and opulent scent that combines the sweetness of passionfruit with the warmth of tuberose and a sensual, ambery base.

A fresh and aromatic fragrance, Royal Mayfair is a tribute to the Duke of Windsor. It is a unique and sophisticated scent that combines the freshness of gin and lime with the warmth of pine and a touch of rose.

A luxurious and majestic woody-spicy fragrance, Royal Oud is a tribute to the precious resin. It is a sophisticated and opulent scent that balances the richness of oud with the freshness of citrus and the warmth of spices.

A fresh and clean aromatic-citrus fragrance, Royal Water is a tribute to the new generation of royals. It is an invigorating and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of basil and a musky base.

A rich and spicy amber-woody fragrance, Original Santal is inspired by the royal splendor of India. It is a warm and inviting scent that combines the creaminess of sandalwood with the spiciness of cinnamon and a touch of vanilla.

A fresh and adventurous aromatic fragrance, Silver Mountain Water evokes the sparkling streams of the Swiss Alps. It is a crisp and clean scent that combines the freshness of bergamot and mandarin with the greenness of tea and a musky base.

A playful and feminine fruity-floral fragrance, Spring Flower is a tribute to the vibrant energy of spring. It is a fresh and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of fruits with the delicacy of flowers and a warm, musky base.

A rich and sensual amber-vanilla fragrance, Sublime Vanille is a tribute to the precious spice. It is a warm and comforting scent that combines the sweetness of vanilla with the freshness of lemon and a touch of musk.

A classic and sophisticated aromatic-fougere fragrance, Tabarome is a tribute to the British tradition of fine tobacco. It is a warm and spicy scent that combines the richness of tobacco with the freshness of ginger and a leathery base.

A fresh and green woody-aromatic fragrance, Original Vetiver is a modern interpretation of the classic vetiver scent. It is a clean and invigorating perfume that combines the earthiness of vetiver with the freshness of citrus and a touch of soapiness.

A fiery and adventurous aromatic-fougere fragrance, Viking is a tribute to the fearless spirit of the Norse explorers. It is a bold and masculine scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the spiciness of pink pepper and a warm, woody base.

A tropical and refreshing citrus-gourmand fragrance, Virgin Island Water is a tribute to the Caribbean. It is a blissful and exotic scent that combines the freshness of lime and coconut with the sweetness of sugar cane and a warm, musky base.

A luxurious and radiant amber-floral fragrance, White Amber is a tribute to the precious resin. It is a warm and sensual scent that combines the richness of amber with the delicacy of jasmine and a fruity touch.

A captivating and sophisticated amber-floral fragrance, Royal Princess Oud is a tribute to the modern woman. It is a chic and sensual scent that combines the richness of oud with the delicacy of rose and a touch of vanilla.

A graceful and ethereal floral fragrance, Wind Flowers is a tribute to the power and delicacy of the wind. It is a fresh and airy scent that combines the sweetness of jasmine with the greenness of orange blossom and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: DKNY
brandInfo.description: DKNY (Donna Karan New York) is a fashion house founded by Donna Karan. The brand is known for its modern, urban, and energetic style, reflecting the pulse of New York City. DKNY fragrances often capture this vibrant spirit, with fresh, clean, and sometimes playful compositions, notably the iconic Be Delicious line.

perfumes.description: A fresh and clean floral woody musk fragrance designed for everyday wear. It's a versatile and uplifting scent that embodies the dynamic energy of New York City.

The iconic fresh and fruity apple fragrance, Be Delicious is a tribute to the Big Apple. It is a crisp and juicy scent that combines the sweetness of apple with the freshness of cucumber and a touch of magnolia.
A tropical and fruity interpretation of Be Delicious, Mai Tai is a vibrant and joyful fragrance. It combines the sweetness of pineapple and orange with a touch of rum and a soft, musky base.
A sweet and fruity gourmand fragrance, Be Tempted is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of red berries and apple with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of patchouli.
A warm and spicy oriental fragrance, Black Cashmere is a sensual and mysterious scent. It combines the richness of spices with the warmth of amber and a touch of woody notes.
A soft and powdery musk fragrance, Cashmere Mist is a comforting and intimate scent. It is a beautiful blend of musk, jasmine, and sandalwood, creating a feeling of pure luxury.

The original fresh and clean floral fragrance, DKNY (1999) is a tribute to the energy of New York City. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the beauty of white flowers and a clean, musky base.
A playful and vibrant fruity-floral fragrance. Fruity Rooty is a cheerful and uplifting scent that combines the sweetness of berries with the freshness of green notes and a soft, musky base.

A more opulent and golden interpretation of Be Delicious, Golden Delicious is a radiant and sophisticated fragrance. It combines the sweetness of apple with the beauty of white flowers and a warm, woody base.

A modern and urban chypre floral fragrance, My NY is a tribute to the vibrant energy of New York City. It is a captivating and sensual scent that combines the sweetness of raspberry with the earthiness of patchouli and a touch of jasmine.

A sweet and floral honey fragrance, Nectar Love is a tribute to the irresistible power of love. It is a beautiful and addictive scent that combines the sweetness of honey and neroli with the beauty of jasmine and a touch of vanilla.

A clean and minimalist floral fragrance, Pure DKNY is a tribute to simplicity and purity. It is a soft and gentle scent that combines the freshness of vanilla with the beauty of lotus and a touch of sandalwood.

brandInfo.name: Davidoff
brandInfo.description: Davidoff is a Swiss luxury goods brand, known for its high-end watches, leather goods, writing instruments, and fragrances. The brand's most iconic fragrance, Cool Water, revolutionized the world of perfumery with its fresh and aquatic scent, and it remains a bestseller to this day.

perfumes.description: The iconic and revolutionary aromatic aquatic fragrance, Cool Water is a tribute to the power of the ocean. It is a fresh and invigorating scent that combines the coolness of mint with the freshness of seawater and a touch of lavender.

A sweet and boozy fragrance for the charismatic and playful man. The Brilliant Game is a warm and inviting scent that combines the sweetness of a cocktail with the warmth of tonka bean and a touch of cedarwood.

A classic and powerful amber woody fragrance, Zino Davidoff is a tribute to the founder of the brand. It is a rich and sophisticated scent that combines the freshness of lavender with the warmth of patchouli and a touch of rosewood.

The fresh and aquatic floral fragrance for women, Cool Water Woman is a tribute to the beauty of the ocean. It is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of melon with the freshness of pineapple and a touch of lily-of-the-valley.

brandInfo.name: Davidoff
brandInfo.description: Davidoff is a Swiss premium brand of cigars, cigarettes and smoker's accessories. Its fragrance line, most famously with the iconic Cool Water, is known for its fresh, aquatic, and masculine scents that evoke a sense of adventure and the power of the ocean.

perfumes.description: A woody aromatic fragrance inspired by the forces of nature. Horizon is a scent of freedom and adventure, blending fresh citrus with spicy and earthy notes.

brandInfo.name: Diesel
brandInfo.description: Diesel is an Italian retail clothing company known for its rebellious, provocative, and street-wise style. This edgy and modern spirit is reflected in its fragrances, which are often bold, energetic, and designed for a youthful and daring audience.

perfumes.description: A woody and aromatic fragrance for the rebellious man. Bad is a daring and sophisticated scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the salty tang of caviar and a warm, tobacco base.

A fresh and aromatic fragrance for all genders, D by Diesel is a tribute to the youth of today. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the spiciness of ginger with the freshness of lavender and a warm, vanilla base.
A sweet and spicy gourmand fragrance, Loverdose is a captivating and addictive scent. It is a beautiful and playful blend of star anise and licorice with a warm, vanilla base.
A more intense and gourmand interpretation of Loverdose, Red Kiss is a passionate and addictive fragrance. It combines the sweetness of sugar and cacao with a touch of orange blossom.

The iconic fragrance in the fist-shaped bottle, Only The Brave is a fresh and leathery oriental woody scent. It is a powerful and charismatic perfume that combines the freshness of lemon with the warmth of amber and a touch of leather.

A more green and aromatic interpretation of Only The Brave, Wild is a fragrance for the man who follows his instincts. It is a fresh and adventurous scent that combines the greenness of citronella with the spiciness of nutmeg and a touch of coconut.

brandInfo.name: Diptyque
brandInfo.description: Diptyque is a Parisian fragrance and scented candle brand. Founded in 1961, the brand is known for its artistic and evocative scents, often inspired by travel, nature, and memories. Diptyque's fragrances are celebrated for their unique compositions and high-quality ingredients.

perfumes.description: A complex and multifaceted fragrance that captures the scent of the original Diptyque boutique. It is a warm and inviting scent with a blend of woods, spices, and fresh green notes.
A warm and resinous amber fragrance that is both elegant and comforting. It is a beautiful and timeless scent that is perfect for a cozy evening.
The iconic scent of blackcurrant leaves and Bulgarian roses. Baies is a fresh and fruity fragrance that is both elegant and joyful.
A gourmand and spicy fragrance that evokes the scent of freshly baked biscuits. It is a warm and comforting scent that is perfect for a cozy winter day.
A beautiful and realistic tuberose fragrance inspired by the childhood memories of Yves Coueslant, one of Diptyque's founders. It is a fresh and captivating scent that is perfect for a summer day.
A fresh and citrusy fragrance that celebrates the orange blossom in all its facets. Eau des Sens is a vibrant and uplifting scent that is perfect for a sunny day.

A warm and spicy oriental fragrance, Eau Lente is a tribute to the ancient traditions of perfumery. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of cinnamon and clove with the sweetness of opoponax.
The scent of a crackling wood fire, Feu de Bois is a smoky and woody fragrance that is both comforting and sophisticated. It is the perfect scent for a cozy winter evening.
A fresh and aromatic lavender fragrance, Feuille de Lavande captures the scent of a field of lavender in Provence. It is a beautiful and relaxing scent that is perfect for any occasion.

The iconic and realistic fig tree fragrance, Philosykos is a tribute to the beauty of the Greek islands. It is a fresh and green scent that captures every aspect of the fig tree, from the leaves to the fruit and the wood.
A rich and complex vanilla fragrance, Eau Duelle Eau de Parfum is a tribute to the duality of vanilla. It is a warm and spicy scent that is both sweet and smoky, with a touch of incense.

A leathery and spicy fragrance inspired by the travels of Ibn Battuta. Eau Rihla is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of leather with the spiciness of pink pepper and a touch of iris.

A soft and musky fragrance, Fleur de Peau is a tribute to the mythical love between Psyche and Eros. It is a beautiful and intimate scent that combines the powderiness of iris with the warmth of ambrette and a touch of pink pepper.

A fresh and fruity fragrance inspired by the Mediterranean summer. Ilio is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of prickly pear with the freshness of bergamot and a touch of jasmine.
A woody and aromatic fragrance inspired by the city of Kyoto. It is a beautiful and serene scent that combines the earthiness of vetiver with the freshness of incense and a touch of rose.

A fresh and citrusy fragrance, L'Eau des Hespérides is a tribute to the mythical garden of the Hesperides. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the bitterness of bitter orange with the freshness of mint and a touch of immortelle.
A soft and musky fragrance that evokes the scent of paper. L'Eau Papier is a beautiful and minimalist scent that combines the powderiness of rice steam with the warmth of musk and a touch of mimosa.
A warm and resinous fragrance, Opopanax is a tribute to the precious resin. It is a rich and captivating scent that is both sweet and smoky, with a touch of vanilla.

A rich and opulent oud fragrance, Oud Palao is a tribute to the precious wood. It is a powerful and captivating scent that combines the intensity of oud with the beauty of rose and a touch of vanilla.

A powdery and woody fragrance that evokes the scent of a Parisian bar. Orphéon is a beautiful and nostalgic scent that combines the freshness of juniper berries with the warmth of tonka bean and a touch of jasmine.

A bright and zesty citrus fragrance, Oyédo is a tribute to the city of Edo, the former name of Tokyo. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of yuzu with the sweetness of raspberry and a touch of thyme.
A creamy and meditative sandalwood fragrance, Tam Dao is a tribute to the sacred forests of Indochina. It is a beautiful and serene scent that is perfect for moments of contemplation.

A modern and sophisticated patchouli fragrance, Tempo is a tribute to the 1960s. It is a beautiful and nuanced scent that combines three different types of patchouli with a touch of violet leaf and mate.

brandInfo.name: Dolce & Gabbana
brandInfo.description: Dolce & Gabbana is an Italian luxury fashion house known for its glamorous and sensual style, often inspired by the culture and traditions of Sicily. Their fragrances, like the iconic Light Blue and The One, are as bold and captivating as their fashion, celebrating Mediterranean passion and joy.

perfumes.description: An opulent and enigmatic fragrance, The One Mysterious Night is a tribute to the vibrant spirit of the Middle East. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the spiciness of saffron with the beauty of rose and the warmth of amber.

A vibrant and charismatic fragrance from the D&G Anthology collection, L'Impératrice is a juicy and aquatic fruity-floral. It is a beautiful and uplifting scent that combines the sweetness of watermelon with the freshness of kiwi and a touch of cyclamen.
A classic and discontinued fragrance, By Man is a spicy and woody scent that is both elegant and masculine. It is a complex and sophisticated perfume with a prominent tobacco and sandalwood accord.

A luxurious and sensual fragrance from the Velvet Collection, Oriental Musk is a tribute to the ancient traditions of Arabian perfumery. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of musk with the spiciness of cardamom and a touch of rose.

A modern and aromatic fragrance, Intenso is a tribute to the new generation of Dolce & Gabbana man. It is a clean and elegant scent with a unique milkwood accord, which gives it a creamy and woody character.
A classic and discontinued fragrance, By for women is a floral and spicy scent that is both elegant and sensual. It is a complex and sophisticated perfume with a prominent coffee and lily accord.

A sweet and gourmand fragrance, Devotion is a tribute to the sacred heart. It is a delicious and comforting scent that combines the freshness of candied citrus with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of orange blossom.

A fresh and aromatic fragrance for men, K by Dolce & Gabbana is a tribute to the modern king of everyday life. It is a charismatic and vibrant scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the spiciness of pimento and a woody base.
A more intense and opulent version of Devotion, the Intense version amplifies the vanilla and citrus notes, creating a richer and more captivating fragrance experience.

A fresh and clean white floral fragrance, Dolce is a tribute to the beauty of Sicily. It is a soft and feminine scent that combines the freshness of neroli with the beauty of white flowers and a soft, musky base.

The iconic and fresh citrus aromatic fragrance for men, Light Blue pour Homme is a tribute to the Mediterranean lifestyle. It is a vibrant and sensual scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the spiciness of pepper and a woody base.

A fresh and aquatic fragrance inspired by the volcanic island of Stromboli. Living Stromboli is a vibrant and energetic scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the coolness of aquatic notes and a touch of geranium.

perfumes.inspiredBy: LIGHT BLUE EAU INTENSE POUR HOMME
perfumes.description: A more intense and aquatic interpretation of Light Blue pour Homme, the Eau Intense version is a powerful and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the citrus and marine notes, creating a deeper and more lasting scent experience.

perfumes.inspiredBy: LIGHT BLUE ITALIAN LOVE POUR HOMME
perfumes.description: A more grapefruit-focused interpretation of Light Blue, Italian Love is a vibrant and joyful fragrance. It is a beautiful and uplifting scent that captures the spirit of an Italian summer.

A sunny and joyful fragrance, Dolce Shine is a fruity-floral scent that is a tribute to the Italian summer. It is a beautiful and radiant perfume that combines the sweetness of mango with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, woody base.
The iconic and classic aldehydic floral fragrance, Dolce & Gabbana (Red Cap) is a tribute to the passionate and sensual woman. It is a powerful and sophisticated scent that is both bold and elegant.

A sweet and tropical white floral fragrance, Dolce Garden is a tribute to the pleasures of a blooming garden. It is a beautiful and delicious scent that combines the creaminess of coconut with the beauty of frangipani and a touch of vanilla.

The classic and aromatic fougère for men, Dolce & Gabbana Pour Homme is a tribute to Italian elegance and style. It is a fresh and masculine scent that combines the brightness of citrus with the warmth of spices and a clean, tobacco base.

perfumes.inspiredBy: THE ONE FOR MEN EAU DE PARFUM
perfumes.description: The iconic and warm amber spicy fragrance for men, The One is a tribute to the charismatic and sophisticated man. It is a beautiful and elegant scent that combines the freshness of grapefruit with the warmth of ginger and a rich, tobacco base.
A fresh and aromatic interpretation of The One for Men, Grey is a modern and elegant fragrance. It combines the freshness of grapefruit with the earthiness of vetiver and a touch of cardamom.
A fresh and citrusy fragrance from the Velvet Collection, Velvet Bergamot is a tribute to the precious Italian citrus. It is a beautiful and uplifting scent that is perfect for a summer day.
A lighter and more fruity interpretation of The One for women, L'Eau The One is a fresh and luminous fragrance. It is a beautiful and elegant scent that is perfect for daytime wear.

The iconic and fresh fruity-floral fragrance, Light Blue is a tribute to the Mediterranean lifestyle. It is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the fruitiness of apple and a soft, woody base.

A more intense and citrusy interpretation of Light Blue, the Eau Intense version is a powerful and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the lemon and apple notes, creating a deeper and more lasting scent experience.

A fruity and sweet interpretation of Light Blue, Escape to Panarea is a tribute to the beautiful Aeolian island. It is a beautiful and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of pear with the beauty of jasmine and a warm, ambery base.
A more woody and musky interpretation of Light Blue, Italian Love is a sensual and captivating fragrance. It combines the freshness of citrus with the softness of ambrette and a warm, woody base.

A fruity and gourmand interpretation of Light Blue, Love is Love is a celebration of love in all its forms. It is a beautiful and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of apple and red berries with a touch of gelato.

A fresh and floral interpretation of Light Blue, Sunset in Salina is a tribute to the beautiful Aeolian island. It is a beautiful and romantic scent that combines the freshness of vine leaves with the beauty of freesia and a touch of violet.

A sweet and gourmand fragrance, Dolce & Gabbana Pour Femme is a tribute to the sensual and passionate woman. It is a beautiful and comforting scent that combines the sweetness of marshmallow with the freshness of neroli and a touch of vanilla.

A more intense and sensual interpretation of Pour Femme, Intense is a captivating and addictive fragrance. It amplifies the marshmallow and white floral notes, creating a deeper and more mysterious scent experience.

A fruity and citrusy fragrance, Q by Dolce & Gabbana is a tribute to the modern queen. It is a vibrant and charismatic scent that combines the freshness of lemon with the sweetness of cherry and a woody base.

A rosy and floral interpretation of The One, Rose The One is a beautiful and romantic fragrance. It is a delicate and elegant scent that combines the beauty of rose with the fruitiness of litchi and a soft, musky base.
A gourmand and delicious fragrance, Sexy Chocolate is a tribute to the pleasures of chocolate. It is a rich and comforting scent that is perfect for a cozy evening.

The iconic and warm amber floral fragrance for women, The One is a tribute to the unique and special woman. It is a beautiful and elegant scent that combines the sweetness of peach with the beauty of lily and a warm, vanilla base.
A sweet and caramel-focused interpretation of The One, Desire is a sensual and captivating fragrance. It is a beautiful and addictive scent that is perfect for a night out.

A more intense and concentrated interpretation of The One, Essence is a rich and opulent fragrance. It amplifies the white floral and vanilla notes, creating a deeper and more luxurious scent experience.

brandInfo.name: Dries Van Noten
brandInfo.description: Dries Van Noten is a Belgian fashion designer. His fragrance line is an extension of his artistic and eclectic fashion aesthetic, creating unique and sophisticated scents that often play with contrasts and rich textures.

perfumes.description: A fresh and beautiful white floral fragrance. Jardin de L'Orangerie is a tribute to the orange blossom, creating a bright, clean, and elegant scent.

brandInfo.description: Dsquared² is a Canadian fashion brand founded by twin brothers Dean and Dan Caten. Known for its playful and edgy designs, its fragrance line often revolves around woody and natural themes, most famously with the 'He Wood' and 'She Wood' collections.
brandInfo.name: Dsquared²

perfumes.description: A dark and mysterious woody spicy fragrance. Potion Black is a bold and intense scent that blends spices, incense, and a deep, leathery and woody base.
The original woody aromatic fragrance from the collection. He Wood is a fresh and natural scent that blends violet and watery notes with a clean, woody base of cedar and vetiver.
A rugged and mineralic woody fragrance inspired by the Canadian mountains. It's a powerful blend of incense, violet, and woods, evoking a sense of nature and strength.
A warm and sensual amber woody fragrance. Potion is a modern and alluring scent that blends red thyme and mint with a heart of spices and a deep, ambery base.
A sensual and mysterious chypre floral. Potion for Women is a rich and alluring blend of fruits and florals with a deep, ambery and patchouli base.
A feminine and elegant floral woody musk. She Wood is a bright and natural scent that blends violet and lemon with a heart of florals and a clean, woody base.
A warm and spicy amber floral. Want is a vibrant and feminine fragrance that blends ginger and pink pepper with a heart of heliotrope and a creamy vanilla base.
A sparkling and spicy amber floral. Want Pink Ginger is a fresher and more vibrant version of Want, with a prominent ginger note and a bright, citrusy opening.
An earthy and aromatic fragrance for men. Wild is a unique scent that blends santolina and St. John's wort with a resinous, ambery base, evoking a sense of untamed nature.

brandInfo.name: Dunhill
brandInfo.description: Dunhill is a British luxury goods brand, specializing in ready-to-wear, custom and bespoke menswear, leather goods, and accessories. The brand's fragrance line reflects its classic, masculine, and sophisticated British heritage.

perfumes.description: A sophisticated and modern woody spicy fragrance. Icon Elite is a bold and masculine scent with notes of cardamom, ebony, and a touch of suede.

brandInfo.name: Electimuss
brandInfo.description: Electimuss is a luxury British perfume house inspired by the legends of ancient Rome. The brand creates opulent and powerful scents that celebrate courage, power, and glamour, using high-quality and rare ingredients.

perfumes.description: A dark and mysterious leather fragrance. Patchouli of the Underworld is a rich and complex blend of patchouli, leather, and spices, creating a powerful and seductive scent.

brandInfo.name: Elie Saab
brandInfo.description: Elie Saab is a Lebanese fashion designer known for his breathtaking evening gowns and bridal wear. His fragrance line, particularly Le Parfum, is celebrated for its radiant and elegant white floral compositions that embody modern femininity and luxury.

perfumes.description: An iconic and radiant white floral fragrance. Le Parfum is a luminous and elegant blend of orange blossom, jasmine, and a sweet, honeyed base.
A sweet and addictive gourmand fragrance. Girl of Now is a delicious blend of almond, pistachio, and tonka bean, with a touch of orange blossom.

brandInfo.name: Elizabeth Taylor
brandInfo.description: Elizabeth Taylor was a legendary British-American actress. Her fragrance line, launched in 1987, is known for its glamorous, opulent, and classic scents, with the iconic White Diamonds being one of the best-selling celebrity fragrances of all time.

perfumes.description: A classic and glamorous floral aldehyde fragrance. White Diamonds is a rich and powerful bouquet of white flowers, with a prominent lily and tuberose accord, on a warm, ambery base.

brandInfo.name: Emilio Pucci
brandInfo.description: Emilio Pucci was an Italian fashion designer and politician. The brand is known for its geometric prints and kaleidoscope of colors. The fragrance line captures this vibrant and joyful spirit, often with fresh and fruity-floral compositions.

perfumes.description: A fresh and elegant floral green fragrance. Emilio Pucci is a bright and sophisticated scent with notes of galbanum, jasmine, and a touch of vetiver.

brandInfo.name: Eon Productions
brandInfo.description: Eon Productions is a British film production company that primarily produces the James Bond film series. The 007 fragrance line captures the sophisticated, masculine, and adventurous spirit of the iconic secret agent.

perfumes.description: A classic and masculine aromatic fougère. James Bond 007 is a fresh and sophisticated scent with notes of apple, lavender, and a woody, mossy base.

brandInfo.name: Ermenegildo Zegna
brandInfo.description: Ermenegildo Zegna is an Italian luxury fashion house specializing in men's clothing and accessories. The brand's fragrance line, particularly the Essenze collection, is known for its high-quality ingredients and sophisticated, masculine compositions.

perfumes.description: A rich and sophisticated amber woody fragrance. Indonesian Oud is a luxurious and elegant blend of oud, rose, and amber, creating a classic and powerful scent.
A warm and spicy amber vanilla fragrance. Bourbon Vanilla is a rich and sophisticated blend of vanilla, vetiver, and a touch of ginger.
A fresh and modern woody spicy fragrance for men. Uomo is a bright and elegant scent with notes of violet, bergamot, and a clean, vetiver base.

brandInfo.name: Escada
brandInfo.description: Escada is a German luxury fashion group known for its vibrant, colorful, and glamorous designs. Escada fragrances, particularly their annual summer limited editions, are celebrated for their playful, fruity, and tropical compositions, evoking a sense of joy and escapism.

perfumes.description: A fresh and tropical fragrance inspired by the vibrant spirit of Cuba. Brisa Cubana is a lively and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of mint with the sweetness of pineapple and a touch of sea salt.
A fruity and floral fragrance inspired by a summer day. Agua del Sol is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of pear and raspberry with the beauty of rose and a warm, creamy base.

A tropical and fruity fragrance inspired by a Polynesian paradise. Born in Paradise is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of green apple and watermelon with the creaminess of coconut and a touch of guava.

A warm and spicy floral fragrance, Celebrate N.O.W. is a tribute to the joy of living in the present moment. It is a captivating and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of ginger with the beauty of magnolia and a warm, cinnamon base.

A sweet and fruity cherry fragrance, Cherry in Japan is a tribute to the beauty of cherry blossoms in Tokyo. It is a playful and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of cherry with the freshness of jasmine and a soft, musky base.

A sweet and fruity cherry fragrance, Cherry in the Air is a playful and joyful scent that captures the feeling of summer. It combines the sweetness of cherry with the freshness of raspberry and a touch of marshmallow.

A fruity and floral fragrance inspired by a Brazilian carnival. Fiesta Carioca is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of passionfruit and raspberry with the beauty of passionflower and a soft, musky base.

A fruity and floral fragrance inspired by a Mexican fiesta. Flor del Sol is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of tequila sunrise accord with the beauty of dahlia and a warm, sandalwood base.
A sweet and gourmand fragrance, Incredible Me is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of tiramisu with the freshness of clementine and a touch of orchid.

A fresh and floral fragrance, Joyful is a tribute to the joy of living. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of blackcurrant with the beauty of peony and a warm, honeyed base.
A sweet and gourmand oriental fragrance, Magnetism is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of caramel and vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of musk.

The classic and elegant floral fragrance, Margaretha Ley is a tribute to the founder of the brand. It is a sophisticated and timeless scent that combines the beauty of jasmine and rose with a warm, woody base.

A fresh and aquatic fruity fragrance, Marine Groove is a vibrant and joyful scent that captures the feeling of a summer party on a yacht. It combines the sweetness of passionfruit and redcurrant with the freshness of cyclamen and a touch of musk.

A fruity and floral fragrance inspired by the vibrant city of Miami. Miami Blossom is a joyful and uplifting scent that combines the sweetness of pineapple and watermelon with the beauty of tiare flower and a soft, musky base.
A fruity and floral fragrance, Moon Sparkle is a playful and enchanting scent. It combines the sweetness of strawberry and blackcurrant with the beauty of freesia and a soft, musky base.

A fresh and fruity fragrance inspired by the lush nature of Costa Rica. Nectar de Costa Rica is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the sweetness of pineapple and mango with the freshness of green notes and a touch of musk.

A fresh and fruity fragrance inspired by the beautiful island of Santorini. Santorini Sunrise is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the sweetness of mandarin and bergamot with the freshness of jasmine and a touch of pink pepper.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Sentiment is a romantic and delicate scent. It combines the sweetness of redcurrant and blackcurrant with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.

A fruity and floral fragrance, Sexy Graffiti is a playful and vibrant scent inspired by the street art of New York City. It combines the sweetness of wild strawberry and raspberry with the beauty of lily-of-the-valley and a soft, musky base.

A fresh and fruity fragrance, Sorbetto Rosso is a tribute to the delicious Italian sorbet. It is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of watermelon with the freshness of citrus and a touch of sea salt.

A fruity and floral fragrance inspired by a music festival. Summer Festival is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of cherry blossom with the freshness of jasmine and a touch of sandalwood.
