A fruity and floral fragrance inspired by an Indian sunset. Taj Sunset is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of mango and nectarine with the beauty of raspberry and a soft, musky base.

A fresh and aquatic floral fragrance, Turquoise is a vibrant and uplifting scent inspired by the clear waters of the Mediterranean. It combines the freshness of sea notes with the beauty of white flowers and a soft, musky base.

A fruity and floral fragrance inspired by a summer in the Mediterranean. Turquoise Summer is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of pineapple and strawberry with the beauty of tiare flower and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Escentric Molecules
brandInfo.description: Escentric Molecules is a niche fragrance brand founded by perfumer Geza Schoen. The brand is known for its minimalist approach to perfumery, focusing on single aroma molecules or a small number of ingredients. Their fragrances are often subtle, unique, and designed to interact with the wearer's natural scent.

perfumes.description: A woody and musky fragrance built around Iso E Super, a synthetic aroma molecule. Escentric 01 is a subtle yet captivating scent that is designed to enhance the wearer's natural pheromones.
A fresh and musky fragrance built around Ambroxan, a synthetic aroma molecule that mimics the scent of ambergris. Escentric 02 is a clean and airy scent that is both subtle and captivating.
A woody and aromatic fragrance built around Cashmeran, a synthetic aroma molecule that evokes the scent of warm, dry wood and musk. Escentric 05 is a comforting and sensual scent with a touch of fig.
A fresh and citrusy fragrance built around Javanol, a synthetic aroma molecule that mimics the scent of sandalwood. Escentric 04 is a vibrant and uplifting scent with a prominent grapefruit note.

A minimalist fragrance composed solely of Iso E Super, a synthetic aroma molecule that is woody and musky. Molecule 01 is designed to enhance the wearer's natural scent and create a subtle, alluring aura.

Molecule 01 with a prominent black tea note. This fragrance combines the subtle woody-musky character of Iso E Super with the aromatic and slightly smoky aroma of black tea, creating a comforting and sophisticated scent.

Molecule 01 with a beautiful iris note. This fragrance combines the subtle woody-musky character of Iso E Super with the powdery and elegant aroma of iris, creating a sophisticated and intimate scent.
Molecule 01 with a vibrant mandarin note. This fragrance combines the subtle woody-musky character of Iso E Super with the juicy and uplifting aroma of mandarin, creating a fresh and energetic scent.

A minimalist fragrance composed solely of Cashmeran, a synthetic aroma molecule that evokes the scent of warm, dry wood and musk. Molecule 05 is a comforting and sensual scent that interacts uniquely with each wearer's skin chemistry.

Molecule 01 with a prominent patchouli note. This fragrance combines the subtle woody-musky character of Iso E Super with the earthy and slightly smoky aroma of patchouli, creating a sophisticated and grounding scent.

brandInfo.name: Essential Parfums
brandInfo.description: Essential Parfums is a modern French fragrance house with a focus on sustainability, affordability, and creative freedom for its perfumers. The brand creates high-quality, elegant, and minimalist scents that highlight a specific raw material.

perfumes.description: A fresh and spicy woody aromatic fragrance. Bois Impérial is a modern and elegant scent with a prominent Akigalawood note, blended with fresh basil and earthy vetiver.

brandInfo.name: Estee Lauder
brandInfo.description: Estée Lauder Companies Inc. is an American multinational manufacturer and marketer of prestige skincare, makeup, fragrance and hair care products. The company was founded in 1946 by Estée Lauder and Joseph Lauder. Estée Lauder fragrances are known for their classic, elegant, and sophisticated compositions, often embodying timeless femininity.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy amber fragrance for men, Intuition for Men is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of cucumber with the warmth of amber and a touch of patchouli.
A classic and romantic floral fragrance, Beautiful is a tribute to the joy of love. It is a beautiful and opulent bouquet of flowers with a soft, woody base.

A modern and romantic floral fragrance, Beautiful Belle is a tribute to the modern bride. It is a beautiful and luminous scent that combines the sweetness of lychee with the beauty of gardenia and a warm, musky base.

A tropical and exotic floral fragrance, Beyond Paradise is a vibrant and joyful scent that transports you to a lush, faraway island. It is a beautiful blend of white flowers, fruits, and a touch of amber.

A fresh and solar floral fragrance, Bronze Goddess Eau Fraîche Skinscent is a tribute to the warmth of summer. It is a beautiful and luminous scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the creaminess of coconut and a touch of tiare flower.

perfumes.inspiredBy: BRONZE GODDESS EAU DE PARFUM (SUMMER LIMITED EDITION)
perfumes.description: A tropical and solar floral fragrance, Bronze Goddess Eau de Parfum (Summer Limited Edition) is a tribute to the endless summer. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of coconut with the warmth of amber and a touch of tiare flower.
A tropical and fruity floral fragrance, Brasil Dream is a vibrant and joyful scent inspired by the energy of Brazil. It is a beautiful blend of fruits, flowers, and a warm, musky base.

A fresh and aquatic solar floral fragrance, Bronze Goddess Azur is a tribute to the clear blue waters of the Mediterranean. It is a beautiful and luminous scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the saltiness of sea notes and a touch of coconut.

A tropical and fruity floral fragrance, Bronze Goddess Capri is a tribute to the beautiful island of Capri. It is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of mandarin with the beauty of jasmine and a warm, amber base.

A warm and solar floral fragrance, Bronze Goddess Soleil is a tribute to the golden hour of summer. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of coconut with the warmth of amber and a touch of tiare flower.

A classic and opulent amber spicy fragrance, Cinnabar is a tribute to the exotic East. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of spices with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of incense.

A classic and elegant aldehydic floral fragrance, Estée is a tribute to the timeless beauty of a woman. It is a sophisticated and luminous scent that combines the freshness of aldehydes with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, woody base.
A warm and sensual amber floral fragrance, Intuition for Women is a captivating and alluring scent. It combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of amber and a touch of gardenia.

A classic and sophisticated chypre floral fragrance, Knowing is a tribute to the confident and elegant woman. It is a rich and complex scent that combines the beauty of rose and mimosa with the earthiness of patchouli and a touch of civet.

A modern and elegant floral woody musk fragrance, Modern Muse is a tribute to the confident and independent woman. It is a beautiful and sophisticated scent that combines the freshness of jasmine with the warmth of woods and a soft, musky base.

A bold and glamorous floral fruity fragrance, Modern Muse Le Rouge is a tribute to the confident and daring woman. It is a vibrant and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of redcurrant with the beauty of rose and a touch of vanilla.

A dark and mysterious floral woody musk fragrance, Modern Muse Nuit is a tribute to the allure of the night. It is a sensual and captivating scent that combines the richness of blackcurrant with the beauty of jasmine and a warm, woody base.

A fresh and aquatic floral fragrance, Oasis Dawn is a tribute to the tranquility of a desert oasis at dawn. It is a beautiful and serene scent that combines the freshness of water lily with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and clean floral fragrance, Pleasures is a tribute to the simple pleasures of life. It is a beautiful and uplifting scent that captures the feeling of a spring garden after the rain.
A sweet and gourmand floral fruity fragrance, Pleasures Delight is a playful and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of pomegranate and strawberry with the beauty of peony and a touch of caramel.
A fresh and green jasmine fragrance, Private Collection Jasmine White Moss is a sophisticated and elegant scent. It is a beautiful blend of jasmine, white moss, and a touch of galbanum.

A rich and opulent white floral fragrance, Private Collection Tuberose Gardenia is a tribute to the beauty of these two iconic flowers. It is a sensual and captivating scent that is both powerful and elegant.

A classic and elegant green floral fragrance, Private Collection is a tribute to the personal style of Estée Lauder. It is a sophisticated and timeless scent that combines the freshness of green notes with the beauty of jasmine and a warm, woody base.

A warm and woody amber fragrance, Sensuous is a tribute to the natural sensuality of a woman. It is a soft and inviting scent that combines the warmth of amber with the sweetness of honey and a touch of lily.

A dark and mysterious amber woody fragrance, Sensuous Noir is a tribute to the allure of the night. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of amber with the spiciness of pepper and a touch of rose.

A soft and musky floral fragrance, Sensuous Nude is a tribute to the natural beauty of a woman. It is a clean and intimate scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the softness of musk and a touch of coconut.
A rich and opulent amber floral fragrance, SpellBound is a captivating and mysterious scent. It is a beautiful and complex blend of spices, flowers, and a warm, ambery base.
A classic and clean aldehydic floral fragrance, White Linen is a tribute to the freshness of clean linen. It is a crisp and elegant scent that is both timeless and sophisticated.

brandInfo.name: Etat Libre D'Orange
brandInfo.description: Etat Libre d'Orange is a French niche perfume house known for its provocative, unconventional, and often humorous approach to perfumery. Their fragrances are designed to challenge norms and evoke strong emotions, with unique and daring compositions that stand out from the mainstream.

perfumes.description: A spicy and resinous fragrance with a prominent camphor note, Archives 69 is a bold and unconventional scent. It is a captivating and mysterious perfume that is both warm and cool, with a blend of spices, incense, and a touch of plum.

perfumes.inspiredBy: I AM TRASH - LES FLEURS DU DECHET
perfumes.description: A fruity and woody fragrance that celebrates discarded ingredients, I Am Trash is a unique and thought-provoking scent. It is a playful and optimistic perfume that transforms waste into beauty.

A powdery and floral fragrance with a prominent leather note, Putain des Palaces is a tribute to the glamorous and scandalous women of the past. It is a sensual and captivating scent that is both bold and elegant.

A green and aromatic fragrance inspired by the ballet of the same name. The Afternoon of a Faun is a unique and ethereal scent that combines the freshness of green notes with the warmth of immortelle and a touch of leather.

A clean and futuristic aquatic fragrance, The Ghost in the Shell is a unique and thought-provoking scent. It is a transparent and ethereal perfume that combines the freshness of aquatic notes with the warmth of musk and a touch of vinyl.

A fresh and green minty rose fragrance, You Or Someone Like You is a tribute to the city of Los Angeles. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the coolness of mint with the beauty of rose and a touch of grapefruit.

brandInfo.name: Ex Nihilo
brandInfo.description: Ex Nihilo is a Parisian haute perfumery house founded in 2013. The brand is known for its avant-garde approach to fragrance creation, offering a unique and personalized experience. Ex Nihilo perfumes are crafted with the finest raw materials and are designed to be both innovative and luxurious.

perfumes.description: A fresh and fruity fragrance with a touch of amber, Blue Talisman is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of pear and bergamot with the warmth of ambroxan and a touch of musk.
A very popular fruity floral fragrance, Fleur Narcotique is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of litchi and peach with the beauty of peony and a soft, musky base.
A green and aromatic fragrance with a touch of leather, French Affair is a sophisticated and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the earthiness of vetiver and a hint of rose.

A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Lust in Paradise is a vibrant and joyful scent inspired by the French Riviera. It combines the sweetness of lychee with the beauty of peony and a soft, musky base.
A warm and spicy amber fragrance, Midnight Special is a captivating and mysterious scent. It combines the richness of amber with the spiciness of black pepper and a touch of rose.
A creamy and woody sandalwood fragrance, Santal Calling is a comforting and sensual scent. It combines the warmth of sandalwood with the sweetness of milk and a touch of iris.
A sweet and floral gourmand fragrance, Sweet Morphine is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of lilac and mimosa with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of iris.
A fresh and creamy vetiver fragrance, Vetiver Moloko is a unique and comforting scent. It combines the earthiness of vetiver with the sweetness of milk and a touch of bergamot.
A more intense and opulent version of Fleur Narcotique, the Extrait de Parfum amplifies the fruity and floral notes, creating a richer and more captivating scent experience.

brandInfo.name: Faberge
brandInfo.description: Fabergé is a jewelry firm founded in 1842 in Russia. While famous for its elaborate jeweled eggs, the brand also produced fragrances, with the iconic men's scent Brut being its most famous and enduring creation.

perfumes.description: A timeless and iconic aromatic fougère for men. Brut is a classic and masculine scent with a fresh, spicy, and powdery character, defined by its blend of anise, lavender, and tonka bean.

brandInfo.name: Fendi
brandInfo.description: Fendi is an Italian luxury fashion house. While many of its fragrances are now discontinued, the brand was known for creating bold, elegant, and sophisticated scents that reflected its high-fashion aesthetic.

perfumes.description: A fresh and aromatic aquatic fragrance for men. Acqua Fan di Fendi is a bright and invigorating scent with notes of citrus, lavender, and a touch of leather.
A classic and opulent chypre floral fragrance. Fendi is a bold and sophisticated scent with a rich blend of spices, florals, and a deep, leathery and mossy base.
A bright and elegant amber floral fragrance. L'Acquarossa is a modern and feminine scent with notes of citrus, lantana, and a beautiful rose heart.

brandInfo.name: Ferrari
brandInfo.description: Ferrari is an Italian luxury sports car manufacturer. The brand's fragrance line, particularly the Essence Collection, aims to capture the spirit of luxury, performance, and Italian craftsmanship, often with a focus on high-quality woody and spicy notes.

perfumes.description: A fresh and aromatic woody aquatic fragrance. Cedar Essence is an elegant and masculine scent that blends the freshness of mint and sea notes with the warmth of cedarwood.

brandInfo.name: Floraiku
brandInfo.description: Floraiku is a French niche perfume house that draws inspiration from Japanese culture, poetry, and ceremonies. The brand is known for its elegant, refined, and artistic fragrances, presented in beautiful bottles with a focus on natural ingredients.

perfumes.description: A sweet and fruity gourmand fragrance. One Umbrella for Two is a delicious and comforting blend of blackcurrant, genmaicha (green tea with roasted rice), and cedarwood.

brandInfo.name: Francesca Bianchi
brandInfo.description: Francesca Bianchi is an independent perfumer based in Amsterdam. Her fragrances are known for their bold, sensual, and often animalic character, with a focus on rich, complex, and highly personal compositions.

perfumes.description: A soft and powdery floral musk. Angel's Dust is a delicate and intimate scent that blends iris, rose, and mimosa with a warm, musky and slightly sweet base.

brandInfo.name: Franck Boclet
brandInfo.description: Franck Boclet is a French fashion designer. His fragrance line is known for its bold, rock-and-roll inspired scents, often with a focus on rich, powerful, and addictive notes like tobacco, vanilla, and leather.

perfumes.description: A bold and addictive white floral fragrance. Cocaine is a powerful and intoxicating blend of tuberose, monoi oil, and tobacco, creating a unique and provocative scent.
A sweet and playful gourmand fragrance. Sugar is a delicious blend of marshmallow, honey, and vanilla, with a touch of fruit and florals.

brandInfo.description: Éditions de Parfums Frédéric Malle is a French perfume house founded in 2000. It operates like a publishing house for perfumers, giving them total creative freedom and featuring their names on the bottles. The result is a collection of unique, high-quality, and artistic fragrances.
brandInfo.name: Frederic Malle

perfumes.description: An opulent and spiritual oud fragrance from the Desert Gems collection. Dawn captures the moment of morning prayer with a powerful and pure blend of Turkish rose, pink pepper, and a high concentration of natural oud.
A sensual and powerful amber fragrance. Musc Ravageur is a bold and dramatic blend of spices, vanilla, and musk, creating a warm, animalic, and unforgettable scent.
A powerful and unbreakable promise captured in a scent. Promise is a potent blend of two types of rose, apple, and a deep, sensual base of patchouli and cypriol, creating a modern and intense chypre.
A majestic and romantic fragrance inspired by the moon in the Middle East. The Moon is a rich and sweet blend of raspberry, lychee, and rose, with a powerful base of oud and leather.

An uncompromising and animalic oud fragrance. The Night is a powerful and pure composition built around an unprecedented amount of natural Indian oud, blended with Turkish rose and amber. It is one of the most authentic oud scents in modern perfumery.

brandInfo.name: Furla
brandInfo.description: Furla is an Italian luxury goods company, known for its high-quality leather goods and accessories. The brand's fragrance line reflects its modern, elegant, and colorful Italian style.

perfumes.description: A modern and elegant chypre fruity fragrance. Autentica is a bright and feminine scent with notes of pear, cherry blossom, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Gianfranco Ferre
brandInfo.description: Gianfranco Ferré was an Italian fashion designer also known as 'the architect of fashion'. His fragrance line is characterized by its sophisticated, elegant, and often classic compositions.

perfumes.description: A fresh and elegant woody floral musk for men. Ferré for Men is a sophisticated and clean scent with a prominent iris note, blended with woods and a touch of fruit.
A spicy and woody fragrance for men. In The Mood For Love Man is a warm and aromatic scent with notes of pepper, lavender, and a rich, ambery base.

brandInfo.name: Giardini Di Toscana
brandInfo.description: Giardini Di Toscana is an Italian niche perfume house that creates evocative fragrances inspired by the gardens and landscapes of Tuscany. The brand is known for its high-quality, artistic, and often gourmand compositions.

perfumes.description: A delicious and comforting gourmand fragrance. Bianco Latte is a sweet and creamy blend of caramel, honey, and vanilla, creating a warm and addictive scent.

brandInfo.name: Gisada
brandInfo.description: Gisada is a Swiss fragrance brand that creates modern, elegant, and high-quality scents. The brand is known for its sophisticated compositions and luxurious presentation.

perfumes.description: A fresh and fruity amber fragrance for men. Ambassador is a vibrant and charismatic scent with notes of mango, cardamom, and a warm, ambery base.

brandInfo.name: Givenchy
brandInfo.description: Givenchy is a French luxury fashion and perfume house. It hosts the brand of haute couture clothing, accessories and Parfums Givenchy, perfumes and cosmetics. The brand's fragrance line is known for its elegance, sophistication, and timeless appeal, with iconic scents like L'Interdit and Gentleman.

perfumes.description: A deeper and more mysterious version of L'Interdit. The Intense version is a rich and captivating amber floral with a prominent vanilla and sesame accord.
A modern and vibrant floral fragrance. Very Irrésistible is a beautiful and feminine scent with a prominent rose and star anise accord.
A modern and unisex woody aromatic fragrance created in collaboration with Matthew M. Williams. It's a minimalist and elegant scent with notes of palo santo, cedar, and cardamom.
A modern reinterpretation of the classic. The 2017 Gentleman is a woody aromatic with a prominent pear and iris accord, creating a sophisticated and elegant scent.

perfumes.inspiredBy: GENTLEMAN RESERVE EAU DE PARFUM PRIVE
perfumes.description: A rich and sophisticated amber vanilla fragrance inspired by whiskey. Réserve Privée is a warm and boozy blend of iris, chestnut, and a prominent whiskey accord.
A modern and bold woody aromatic fragrance. Gentleman Society is a unique blend of narcissus, vetiver, and a warm, vanilla and palo santo base.
A modern and elegant woody fragrance for men. Gentlemen Only is a sophisticated and clean scent with notes of birch leaf, incense, and a touch of spice.
A fresh and vibrant aromatic fruity fragrance. Insensé Ultramarine is a classic and energetic scent with notes of black currant, watermelon, and a clean, floral heart.
A modern and magnetic woody aromatic fragrance. Pi is a warm and sensual blend of vanilla, almond, and tonka bean, creating a unique and memorable scent.
A modern and playful citrus aromatic fragrance. Play is a fresh and energetic scent with notes of bitter orange, coffee, and a touch of amyris wood.
An iconic and radiant white floral fragrance. Amarige is a bold and joyful bouquet of flowers, with a prominent tuberose and mimosa accord.
A warm and spicy interpretation of Amarige. Mariage is a rich and sensual amber floral with a prominent cinnamon and jasmine accord.
A captivating and dualistic amber floral fragrance. Ange ou Démon is a mysterious and sensual blend of saffron, lily, and a creamy tonka bean and vanilla base.
A fresh and delicate floral fruity fragrance. Bloom is a bright and joyful scent with notes of raspberry, violet, and a soft, musky base.
A radiant and elegant chypre floral fragrance. Dahlia Divin is a sophisticated and feminine scent with notes of mirabelle plum, jasmine, and a warm, woody base.
A mysterious and powdery chypre floral fragrance. Dahlia Noir is an elegant and sophisticated scent with a prominent iris and rose accord, on a deep, woody base.
A fresh and modern floral green fragrance. Eau de Givenchy is a bright and uplifting scent with notes of bergamot, neroli, and a clean, musky base.
A glamorous and sophisticated floral fruity fragrance. Hot Couture is a unique and elegant scent with a prominent raspberry and pepper accord.
A modern and daring amber floral fragrance. L'Interdit is a bold and addictive blend of white flowers, particularly tuberose, and a dark, earthy patchouli and vetiver base.
A fiery and sensual version of L'Interdit. Rouge is a warm and spicy amber floral with a prominent blood orange, ginger, and pimento leaf accord.
An even more carnal and captivating version of L'Interdit Rouge. Rouge Ultime is a rich and leathery floral with a prominent cacao and tobacco accord.
A classic and opulent amber floral fragrance. Organza is a rich and warm blend of white flowers, spices, and a deep, woody and vanilla base.
A modern and playful amber floral fragrance. Play for Her is a sweet and spicy blend of pink pepper, orchid, and a warm, ambery base.
A classic and opulent chypre floral fragrance. Ysatis is a rich and powerful blend of yellow flowers, aldehydes, and a deep, animalic and mossy base.

brandInfo.description: Goldfield & Banks is an Australian luxury perfume house founded by Dimitri Weber. The brand celebrates the unique and rare botanical ingredients native to Australia, creating modern and sophisticated fragrances that capture the essence of the Australian landscape.
brandInfo.name: Goldfield & Banks Australia

perfumes.description: A refreshing and carefree citrus aromatic fragrance that evokes a tropical paradise. It features the zesty Australian finger lime, blended with coriander and a grounding base of vetiver and sandalwood.
A vibrant and sparkling fragrance centered around Australian ginger. It combines the zesty ginger with mandarin, florals, and a warm, ambery base, creating a scent that is both uplifting and sensual.

An aquatic aromatic fragrance that captures the essence of a coastal walk. It blends fresh Italian lemon with a heart of sage and a base of cedarwood and moss, evoking the scent of sea spray on a sunny day.
A rich and luxurious amber woody fragrance. Silky Woods is a modern and sophisticated blend of precious woods, suede, and vanilla, creating a smooth, warm, and enveloping scent.

brandInfo.name: Gres
brandInfo.description: Grès is a French fashion house founded by Germaine Émilie Krebs, known as Madame Grès. The brand's most iconic fragrance, Cabochard, is a classic and bold leather chypre that has been a benchmark in perfumery since its launch in 1959.

perfumes.description: A fresh and vibrant floral green fragrance. Cabotine is a bright and cheerful scent with a prominent ginger lily and hyacinth accord, creating a classic and affordable green floral.

brandInfo.name: Gucci
brandInfo.description: Gucci is an Italian luxury fashion house based in Florence, Italy. Its fragrance line is known for its bold, modern, and often eclectic scents that reflect the creative vision of the brand, with iconic collections like Gucci Bloom, Gucci Guilty, and The Alchemist's Garden.

perfumes.description: A bright and airy floral fragrance from The Alchemist's Garden collection. Tears from the Moon is a delicate and elegant blend of white peony, lily-of-the-valley, and stephanotis.
A powerful and mysterious woody spicy fragrance from The Alchemist's Garden collection. The Voice of the Snake is a captivating blend of oud, patchouli, and saffron.
A classic and discontinued amber woody fragrance. Envy for Men is a sophisticated and spicy blend of ginger, incense, and sandalwood, creating a warm and elegant scent.
A modern and sophisticated chypre fragrance for men. Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme is an elegant and masculine blend of cypress, tobacco, and leather.
A more intense and provocative version of Gucci Guilty Pour Homme. The Intense version is a woody aromatic with a prominent lavender and lemon accord, on a deep, ambery base.
A classic and discontinued woody spicy fragrance. Gucci Pour Homme is a rich and smoky blend of incense, leather, and spices, creating a powerful and sophisticated scent.

perfumes.inspiredBy: GUILTY ELIXIR DE PARFUM POUR HOMME
perfumes.description: A rich and intense amber leather fragrance. The Elixir version is a powerful and captivating blend of vanilla, orris, and a deep, smoky patchouli base.
A modern and charismatic woody aromatic fragrance. Gucci Guilty Pour Homme is a fresh and seductive blend of lemon, lavender, and a deep, woody patchouli base.
A rich and opulent amber woody fragrance. Gucci Oud is a luxurious and unisex blend of oud, rose, and amber, creating a powerful and sophisticated scent.
A modern and minimalist woody aromatic fragrance. Rush for Men is a clean and smooth blend of sandalwood, cedar, and a touch of lavender.
A soft and elegant white floral fragrance. Bamboo is a modern and feminine scent with notes of bergamot, lily, and a warm, ambery sandalwood base.
A rich and beautiful white floral fragrance. Gucci Bloom is a modern and authentic scent that captures the essence of a flourishing garden, with a prominent tuberose and jasmine accord.
A delicate and youthful floral fragrance. Flora by Gucci is a bright and optimistic scent with a prominent osmanthus and peony accord.
A joyful and sweet floral fruity fragrance. Gorgeous Gardenia is a beautiful and radiant scent with a prominent gardenia and brown sugar accord.
A radiant and cheerful floral fragrance. Gorgeous Jasmine is a bright and modern scent with a prominent jasmine and magnolia accord.
A sweet and fruity floral fragrance. Gorgeous Magnolia is a beautiful and radiant scent with a prominent magnolia and dewberry accord.
A warm and sensual amber floral fragrance. Gorgeous Orchid is a rich and captivating blend of orchid, vanilla, and a touch of citrus.
A more intense and nocturnal version of Gucci Bloom. The Intense version is a rich and captivating white floral with a prominent night-blooming jasmine and tuberose accord.

perfumes.inspiredBy: GUCCI BY GUCCI EAU DE PARFUM
perfumes.description: A modern and sophisticated chypre fruity fragrance. Gucci by Gucci is an elegant and sensual blend of guava, pear, and a deep, patchouli and honey base.
A bold and glamorous amber floral fragrance. Gucci Guilty is a modern and seductive blend of pink pepper, lilac, and a deep, ambery patchouli base.
A more intense and darker version of Gucci Guilty. Guilty Black is a sensual and provocative amber floral with a prominent red berries and raspberry accord.
A richer and more powerful version of Gucci Guilty. The Intense version is a deep and captivating amber floral with a prominent lilac and violet accord.
A glamorous and sophisticated floral woody musk. Gucci Première is inspired by old Hollywood glamour, with a sparkling bergamot and champagne opening and a sensual, leathery base.
An iconic and impulsive chypre fruity fragrance. Gucci Rush is a bold and intoxicating blend of peach, gardenia, and a deep, earthy patchouli base.
A lighter and more transparent version of Gucci Rush. Rush 2 is a fresh and vibrant floral woody musk with notes of freesia, rose, and a clean, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Guerlain
brandInfo.description: Guerlain is a French perfume, cosmetics, and skincare house, among the oldest in the world. Founded in Paris in 1828, the brand has a rich heritage of creating iconic and innovative fragrances, often characterized by their complex compositions, high-quality natural ingredients, and a distinctive 'Guerlinade' signature.

perfumes.description: A rich and opulent vanilla fragrance from the L'Art & La Matière collection. Spiritueuse Double Vanille is a warm and sensual scent that combines two types of vanilla with a touch of rum and spices.

A warm and sweet tobacco and honey fragrance from the L'Art & La Matière collection. Tobacco Honey is a rich and comforting scent that combines the sweetness of honey with the smokiness of tobacco and a touch of vanilla.

A rich and gourmand tonka bean fragrance from the L'Art & La Matière collection. Tonka Impériale is a warm and sensual scent that combines the sweetness of tonka bean with the bitterness of almond and a touch of tobacco.

A beautiful and elegant vanilla and angelica fragrance from the L'Art & La Matière collection. Angélique Noire is a luminous and sophisticated scent that combines the freshness of angelica with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of pear.

A fresh and fruity rose fragrance from the Aqua Allegoria Harvest collection. Rosa Rossa Harvest is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of lychee with the beauty of rose and a touch of blackcurrant.
A pure and intense vanilla extract from the L'Art & La Matière collection. Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 is a rich and opulent vanilla fragrance that is both sweet and smoky, with a touch of leather.

A modern and sophisticated woody aromatic fragrance for men, L'Homme Idéal is a tribute to the ideal man. It is a charismatic and elegant scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of almond and a touch of leather.

A fresh and tropical coconut fragrance from the Aqua Allegoria collection. Coconut Fizz is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of coconut water with the freshness of bergamot and a touch of freesia.

A fresh and rosy floral fragrance from the Aqua Allegoria collection. Flora Rosa is a delicate and elegant scent that combines the freshness of rose with the sweetness of red berries and a touch of iris.
A fresh and floral fragrance from the Aqua Allegoria collection. Florabloom is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of mango with the beauty of tuberose and a touch of musk.

A fresh and citrusy aromatic fragrance from the Aqua Allegoria collection. Mandarine Basilic is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the sweetness of mandarin with the freshness of basil and a touch of green tea.

A fresh and fruity passionfruit fragrance from the Aqua Allegoria collection. Passiflora is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of passionfruit with the freshness of bergamot and a touch of ylang-ylang.

A fresh and fruity pear fragrance from the Aqua Allegoria collection. Pera Granita is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the sweetness of pear with the freshness of grapefruit and a touch of osmanthus.

A warm and spicy amber fragrance, Baiser de Russie is a tribute to the opulence of Imperial Russia. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of plum with the warmth of amber and a touch of leather.

A classic and elegant floral fruity fragrance, Champs-Élysées is a tribute to the most beautiful avenue in the world. It is a vibrant and joyful scent that combines the sweetness of blackcurrant with the beauty of mimosa and a touch of almond.

A bold and powdery violet fragrance, Insolence is a tribute to the audacious woman. It is a vibrant and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of berries with the beauty of violet and a touch of iris.

A warm and sensual amber floral fragrance, L'Instant de Guerlain is a tribute to a moment of pure emotion. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of honey with the beauty of magnolia and a touch of amber.

A soft and powdery floral woody musk fragrance, L'Instant Magic is a tribute to the magic of a moment. It is a delicate and elegant scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the softness of iris and a warm, musky base.

A sweet and fruity gourmand fragrance, La Petite Robe Noire is a tribute to the little black dress. It is a playful and chic scent that combines the sweetness of black cherry with the beauty of rose and a touch of licorice.

A classic and iconic chypre fruity fragrance, Mitsouko is a masterpiece of modern perfumery. It is a complex and mysterious scent that combines the sweetness of peach with the earthiness of oakmoss and a touch of spices.

A modern and sensual amber floral fragrance, Mon Guerlain is a tribute to contemporary femininity. It is a beautiful and captivating scent that combines the freshness of lavender with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of sandalwood.
A fresh and delicate lily-of-the-valley fragrance, Muguet is a tribute to the arrival of spring. It is a beautiful and ephemeral scent that captures the essence of this precious flower.

A classic and spiritual woody oriental fragrance, Samsara is a tribute to the sacred and the serene. It is a rich and complex blend of sandalwood, jasmine, and ylang-ylang, creating a harmonious and meditative scent.

The iconic and legendary amber oriental fragrance, Shalimar is a masterpiece of modern perfumery. It is a rich and sensual scent that combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of vanilla and a smoky, leathery base.

A softer and more powdery interpretation of Shalimar, Philtre de Parfum is a delicate and elegant fragrance. It is a beautiful and luminous scent that combines the freshness of lemon with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of iris.

A warm and solar floral fragrance, Terracotta Le Parfum is a tribute to the golden glow of summer. It is a beautiful and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of tiare flower with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of coconut.

brandInfo.name: Guess
brandInfo.description: Guess is an American clothing brand and retailer. Its fragrance line is known for its youthful, sexy, and affordable scents that capture a modern and playful spirit.

perfumes.description: A fresh and vibrant floral woody musk. Dare is a bright and modern scent with notes of kumquat, cactus flower, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Guy Laroche
brandInfo.description: Guy Laroche was a French fashion designer. His fragrance line is famous for its classic and powerful scents, including the iconic Drakkar Noir, a benchmark aromatic fougère for men.

perfumes.description: An iconic and powerful aromatic fougère. Drakkar Noir is a classic and masculine scent with a fresh, spicy, and mossy character, defined by its blend of lavender, citrus, and oakmoss.
A classic and elegant floral fragrance. Fidji is a fresh and green scent with a prominent hyacinth and galbanum accord, creating a timeless and sophisticated aura.

brandInfo.name: Halston
brandInfo.description: Halston was an American fashion designer who rose to international fame in the 1970s. His fragrance line, particularly the classic Z-14, is known for its bold, masculine, and distinctly 70s character.

perfumes.description: A classic and powerful leather chypre for men. Halston Z-14 is a bold and aromatic scent with a complex blend of citrus, spices, and a deep, mossy and leathery base.

brandInfo.name: Hamidi Oud
brandInfo.description: Hamidi Oud & Perfumes is a brand based in the UAE, specializing in oriental fragrances. They are known for creating scents that blend traditional Arabian notes like oud and musk with modern compositions.

perfumes.description: A fresh and clean floral woody musk. Rehan is a delicate and uplifting scent with notes of violet, rose, and a soft, powdery musk base.

brandInfo.name: Hermes
brandInfo.description: Hermès is a French luxury design house established in 1837. Its fragrance line, created by renowned perfumers like Jean-Claude Ellena and Christine Nagel, is celebrated for its elegance, artistry, and high-quality ingredients, with iconic collections such as the Jardins series, Hermessence, and the classic Terre d'Hermès.

perfumes.description: A surprising and aromatic fragrance that evokes a garden in Greece. Un Jardin à Cythère is a unique blend of grasses, olive wood, and fresh pistachio.
An airy and transparent amber vanilla fragrance. Vanille Galante is a delicate and elegant blend of vanilla, lily, and spices, creating a light and sophisticated scent.
A classic and sophisticated leather fragrance for men. Bel Ami is a rich and elegant blend of spices, leather, and a deep, mossy base.
A bright and joyful citrus aromatic fragrance. Eau de Mandarine Ambrée is a simple and elegant blend of mandarin and passionfruit, with a warm, ambery base.
A modern and futuristic aromatic green fragrance. H24 is a unique and metallic scent with notes of clary sage, narcissus, and a prominent, steamy sclarene molecule.
A warm and elegant woody spicy fragrance from the Hermessence collection. Poivre Samarcande is a sophisticated and minimalist blend of pepper, woods, and a touch of oakmoss.
An iconic and earthy woody spicy fragrance. Terre d'Hermès is a modern classic that blends the freshness of orange and grapefruit with the mineralic note of flint and a deep, vetiver base.
A fresh and icy interpretation of Terre d'Hermès. Eau Givrée is a vibrant and invigorating citrus aromatic with a prominent citron and juniper berry accord.
A more intense and vetiver-focused version of Terre d'Hermès. This version is a rich and earthy woody aromatic with a prominent vetiver and Sichuan pepper accord.
A lighter and more aquatic version of Terre d'Hermès. Eau Très Fraîche is a bright and refreshing woody aromatic with a prominent orange and watery notes accord.
A beautiful and evocative aromatic aquatic fragrance. Un Jardin en Méditerranée captures the scent of a Mediterranean garden, with notes of fig leaf, cypress, and citrus.
A classic and opulent chypre floral fragrance. 24 Faubourg is a rich and sophisticated blend of white flowers, amber, and a deep, woody base.
A warm and delicious amber spicy fragrance. Ambre Narguilé is a rich and comforting blend of honey, cinnamon, and tobacco, creating a scent that evokes a warm apple pie.
A soft and elegant leather fragrance. Barenia is a modern and sophisticated scent with a prominent leather and rose accord, creating a beautiful and wearable leather perfume.

A classic and timeless citrus aromatic fragrance. Eau d'Orange Verte is a fresh and invigorating scent that captures the essence of a morning dew on orange trees, with notes of orange, mint, and oakmoss.
A fresh and aromatic green fragrance. Eau de Basilic Pourpre is a vibrant and modern scent with a prominent purple basil accord, blended with bergamot and geranium.
A unique and smoky citrus aromatic fragrance. Eau de Citron Noir is a surprising and elegant scent that combines the freshness of lemon with the smoky depth of black lime and a touch of tea.
A magical and enchanting woody fragrance. Eau des Merveilles is a surprising and warm scent that evokes the feeling of a walk on the beach, with notes of orange, ambergris, and a touch of spice.

A fresh and mineralic aquatic fragrance. Eau des Merveilles Bleue is a surprising and beautiful scent that captures the essence of the sea, with notes of sea water, patchouli, and a touch of woodiness.
A warmer and more gourmand interpretation of Eau des Merveilles. Elixir des Merveilles is a rich and comforting scent with notes of orange peel, caramel, and a deep, resinous base.
A modern and elegant leather fragrance. Galop d'Hermès is a sophisticated and feminine scent that combines the softness of rose with the richness of leather and a touch of quince.
A luminous and radiant floral fragrance. Jour d'Hermès is a celebration of femininity, with a beautiful and complex bouquet of white flowers, citrus, and a soft, musky base.

A unique and elegant floral woody musk. Kelly Calèche is a sophisticated and modern scent that combines the softness of florals with the richness of leather, creating a beautiful and distinctive fragrance.
A warm and sensual amber vanilla fragrance. L'Ambre des Merveilles is a rich and comforting scent that combines the warmth of amber with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of patchouli.
A dark and mysterious amber woody fragrance. L'Ombre des Merveilles is a smoky and resinous scent that combines the warmth of tonka bean with the darkness of incense and black tea.
A serene and meditative citrus aromatic fragrance. Le Jardin de Monsieur Li is a beautiful and minimalist scent that evokes a Chinese garden, with notes of kumquat, jasmine, and mint.

A delicate and ethereal floral fruity fragrance. Osmanthe Yunnan is a beautiful and transparent scent that combines the apricot-like aroma of osmanthus with the freshness of tea and a touch of leather.
A playful and spicy floral fragrance. Twilly d'Hermès is a youthful and modern scent that combines the freshness of ginger with the sensuality of tuberose and a warm, woody base.
A sparkling and joyful floral fragrance. Twilly Eau Ginger is a bright and energetic scent with a prominent ginger and peony accord, creating a fresh and modern feel.
A unique and spicy aquatic fragrance. Un Jardin après la Mousson captures the scent of an Indian garden after the monsoon, with notes of ginger, cardamom, and watery accords.
A dreamy and floral aquatic fragrance. Un Jardin sur la Lagune evokes a secret garden in Venice, with notes of magnolia, pittosporum, and a salty, marine accord.

A fresh and green floral fruity fragrance. Un Jardin sur le Nil is a beautiful and evocative scent that captures the essence of a garden on the Nile river, with notes of green mango, lotus, and incense.
A fresh and spicy woody fragrance. Voyage d'Hermès is a modern and elegant scent that combines the freshness of citrus and cardamom with the warmth of woods and a clean, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Hind Al Oud
brandInfo.description: Hind Al Oud is a luxury Emirati perfume house that creates opulent and artistic fragrances, blending traditional Arabian perfumery with a modern, sophisticated vision.

perfumes.description: A clean and elegant floral woody musk. Emarati Musk is a soft and powdery scent with a prominent musk accord, blended with delicate florals.

brandInfo.name: Histoires de Parfums
brandInfo.description: Histoires de Parfums is a French niche perfume house that creates fragrances inspired by historical figures, years, and poems. The brand is known for its rich, complex, and narrative-driven scents.

perfumes.description: A classic and elegant aromatic fougère inspired by Casanova. 1725 is a clean and powdery blend of lavender, licorice, and a warm, ambery vanilla base.
A theatrical and powdery floral fragrance inspired by the famous Parisian cabaret. 1889 Moulin Rouge is a unique blend of lipstick, iris, and spices, creating a nostalgic and glamorous scent.

brandInfo.name: Hollister
brandInfo.description: Hollister Co. is an American lifestyle brand by Abercrombie & Fitch Co. Inspired by Southern California, its fragrances are known for their casual, youthful, and beachy vibe.

perfumes.description: The iconic scent of Hollister stores. SoCal is a fresh and woody aromatic fragrance that captures the essence of the Southern California beach lifestyle.

brandInfo.name: Hugo Boss
brandInfo.description: Hugo Boss is a German luxury fashion house known for its high-quality menswear, womenswear, accessories, and fragrances. Hugo Boss fragrances often embody a sense of confidence, success, and modern masculinity or femininity, with a focus on sophisticated and contemporary scents.

perfumes.description: A fresh and spicy woody fragrance for men, Baldessarini is a tribute to the sophisticated and confident man. It is a charismatic and elegant scent that combines the freshness of mandarin with the warmth of patchouli and a touch of cumin.

The iconic and classic woody spicy fragrance for men, Boss Bottled is a tribute to the modern man. It is a fresh and sophisticated scent that combines the sweetness of apple with the warmth of cinnamon and a touch of vanilla.
A more intense and sophisticated version of Boss Bottled, the Eau de Parfum amplifies the woody and spicy notes, creating a deeper and more captivating scent experience.
A rich and intense amber spicy fragrance, Boss Bottled Elixir is a powerful and captivating scent. It combines the warmth of frankincense with the spiciness of cardamom and a touch of patchouli.
A warm and smoky oud fragrance, Boss Bottled Oud is a luxurious and captivating scent. It combines the richness of oud with the sweetness of apple and a touch of saffron.
A fresh and aquatic interpretation of Boss Bottled, Pacific is a vibrant and energetic fragrance. It combines the freshness of lemon with the coolness of sea notes and a touch of coconut.
A spicy and woody oud fragrance, Boss Bottled Saffron Oud is a luxurious and captivating scent. It combines the richness of saffron with the warmth of oud and a touch of rose.

A fresh and citrusy interpretation of Boss Bottled, Tonic is a vibrant and energetic fragrance. It combines the freshness of grapefruit and bitter orange with the spiciness of ginger and a clean, woody base.
A fresh and spicy woody fragrance for men, Boss Orange is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of apple with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of incense.
A fresh and aromatic fougère for men, Elements is a clean and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of citrus with the coolness of mint and a touch of cedarwood.
A fresh and spicy aromatic fragrance for men, Energise is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of pineapple and mint with the spiciness of pink pepper and a touch of nutmeg.

The iconic and fresh aromatic green fragrance for men, Hugo Man is a tribute to individuality and self-expression. It is a crisp and invigorating scent that combines the freshness of green apple with the coolness of mint and a touch of pine.

A classic and elegant woody aromatic fragrance for men, Hugo Boss Classic is a timeless and sophisticated scent. It combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of sandalwood and a touch of vetiver.
A warm and spicy oriental fragrance for men, Hugo Dark Blue is a mysterious and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of ginger and grapefruit with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of suede.
A fresh and minty aromatic fragrance for men, Hugo Iced is a cool and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of iced mint with the bitterness of wild tea and a touch of vetiver.
A warm and spicy leather fragrance for men, The Scent is a seductive and captivating scent. It combines the sweetness of maninka fruit with the warmth of leather and a touch of ginger.

A more intense and magnetic interpretation of The Scent, Magnetic is a captivating and addictive fragrance. It amplifies the maninka fruit and leather notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.

A fresh and energetic aromatic green fragrance for men, Unlimited is a tribute to the power of endurance. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of mint and pineapple with the warmth of sandalwood and a touch of cistus.

A warm and woody vanilla fragrance for women, Alive is a tribute to the joy of living. It is a comforting and sensual scent that combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of sandalwood and a touch of apple.

A fresh and floral fragrance for women, Boss Jour is a tribute to the first light of day. It is a beautiful and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of freesia with the beauty of honeysuckle and a touch of white birch.
A sweet and fruity floral fragrance for women, Boss Orange is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of apple with the beauty of white flowers and a warm, vanilla base.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance for women, Hugo Boss Woman is a modern and elegant scent. It combines the sweetness of apple with the beauty of white flowers and a soft, musky base.

A fresh and floral fragrance for women, Ma Vie Pour Femme is a tribute to the independent and confident woman. It is a beautiful and elegant scent that combines the freshness of cactus flower with the beauty of freesia and a soft, woody base.

A sweet and fruity gourmand fragrance for women, The Scent for Her is a seductive and captivating scent. It combines the sweetness of peach and freesia with the richness of osmanthus and a warm, cacao base.
A more intense and vibrant interpretation of Boss Woman, Extreme is a fresh and fruity floral fragrance. It amplifies the white floral notes, creating a deeper and more captivating scent experience.

brandInfo.name: Indigo Wild
brandInfo.description: Indigo Wild is an American company known for its natural body care products, particularly under the 'Zum' brand. Their fragrances are typically simple, earthy, and based on essential oils.

perfumes.description: A warm and spiritual amber spicy fragrance. Zum Frankincense & Myrrh is a simple and earthy blend of the two classic resins, creating a meditative and comforting scent.

brandInfo.name: Initio
brandInfo.description: Initio Parfums Privés is a French niche perfume house that explores the power of scent through a blend of science and magic. The brand is known for its powerful, seductive, and often animalic fragrances built around high-quality raw materials and 'pheromonal' molecules.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual amber spicy fragrance. Mystic Experience is a rich and captivating blend of coffee, amber, and sandalwood, creating a mysterious and alluring scent.
A spiritual and meditative woody aromatic fragrance. Paragon is a soothing blend of palo santo, white sage, and lavender, creating a calming and centering scent.

brandInfo.name: Initio Parfums Privés
brandInfo.description: Initio Parfums Privés is a French niche perfume house founded in 2015. The brand explores the power of scent and its connection to emotions, instincts, and desires. Initio fragrances are known for their bold, sensual, and often animalic compositions, designed to evoke a primal response.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual amber musk fragrance, Absolute Aphrodisiac is designed to evoke desire. It is a captivating and addictive scent that combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of castoreum.
A sweet and fruity floral fragrance, Addictive Vibration is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of apple blossom with the beauty of orange blossom and a touch of honey.
A powerful and vibrant rose fragrance, Atomic Rose is a modern and explosive scent. It combines the beauty of Turkish rose with the freshness of hedione and a touch of pink pepper.

A warm and spiritual amber musk fragrance, Blessed Baraka is designed to bring good fortune. It is a captivating and comforting scent that combines the richness of amber with the warmth of musk and a touch of sandalwood.

A leathery and animalic fragrance, Divine Attraction is a bold and sensual scent. It is a captivating and provocative perfume that combines the raw power of leather with the warmth of amber and a touch of vetiver.
A fresh and clean floral fragrance, High Frequency is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of magnolia with the freshness of hedione and a touch of almond.

A clean and comforting musk fragrance, Musk Therapy is designed to bring a sense of well-being. It is a soft and ethereal scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the sweetness of white musk and a touch of magnolia.
A sweet and boozy cherry fragrance, Narcotic Delight is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of cherry with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of cognac.

A powerful and majestic oud fragrance, Oud for Greatness is a tribute to the strength and wisdom of the oud wood. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the intensity of oud with the freshness of lavender and a touch of saffron.
A fresh and citrusy oud fragrance, Oud for Happiness is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of oud and a touch of ginger.
A powdery and floral fragrance with a prominent iris note, Psychedelic Love is a captivating and sensual scent. It is a beautiful and mysterious blend of iris, heliotrope, and a touch of myrrh.
A fresh and aromatic fougère, Rehab is a clean and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of lavender and bergamot with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of vetiver.

A warm and spicy rum and vanilla fragrance, Side Effect is a captivating and addictive scent. It is a bold and sensual perfume that combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of rum and a touch of tobacco.

brandInfo.description: Issey Miyake is a Japanese fashion designer known for his technology-driven clothing designs. His fragrance line, most famously 'L'Eau d'Issey', reflects this minimalist and innovative philosophy, often focusing on clean, aquatic, and floral notes to create scents that are both modern and timeless.
brandInfo.name: Issey Miyake

perfumes.description: A minimalist and fresh green floral fragrance. A Scent is a clean and vibrant blend of lemon verbena, jasmine, and hyacinth, creating a scent that is modern, simple, and natural.

The iconic aquatic floral fragrance from 1992. L'Eau d'Issey is a pure and fresh scent that combines lotus, freesia, and cyclamen with a heart of peonies and lilies, on a soft, woody musk base. It was revolutionary for its time and remains a timeless classic.
An iconic and timeless woody aquatic fragrance for men. L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme is a fresh and powerful scent that blends zesty yuzu with spices and woods, evoking a sense of cascading water.

The iconic aquatic floral fragrance from 1992. L'Eau d'Issey is a pure and fresh scent that combines lotus, freesia, and cyclamen with a heart of peonies and lilies, on a soft, woody musk base. It was revolutionary for its time and remains a timeless classic.
A magnetic and mysterious woody spicy fragrance. Nuit d'Issey Bleu Astral is an elegant scent that contrasts fresh lime with a heart of leather and a deep, ambery wood base.
A joyful and optimistic floral fruity fragrance. Pleats Please is a vibrant and playful blend of pear, peony, and sweet pea, with a clean, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Issey Miyake
brandInfo.description: Issey Miyake is a Japanese fashion designer. His fragrance line, particularly the iconic L'Eau d'Issey, is famous for its minimalist aesthetic and innovative use of aquatic and fresh notes, creating scents that are clean, modern, and timeless.

perfumes.inspiredBy: L EAU D ISSEY PURE NECTAR
perfumes.description: A sweet and aquatic floral fragrance. L'Eau d'Issey Pure Nectar de Parfum is a rich and honeyed scent that blends pear and rose with a warm, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Jacomo
brandInfo.description: Jacomo is a French-American fashion and fragrance brand. It is particularly known for its classic masculine fragrances from the 70s and 80s, such as the iconic Jacomo de Jacomo.

perfumes.description: A classic and powerful leather fragrance for men. Jacomo de Jacomo is a dark and smoky scent with notes of clove, leather, and oakmoss.
A fresh and fruity aromatic fragrance. Paradox for Men is a vibrant and modern scent with notes of mango, basil, and a warm, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Jacques Bogart
brandInfo.description: Jacques Bogart is a French fragrance brand founded in 1975. The brand is known for its powerful, masculine, and often classic aromatic fougère fragrances, such as the iconic One Man Show.

perfumes.description: A classic and powerful chypre fragrance for men. One Man Show is a bold and aromatic scent with a complex blend of herbs, spices, and a deep, mossy and woody base.

brandInfo.name: Jacques Fath
brandInfo.description: Jacques Fath was a French fashion designer considered one of the three dominant influences on postwar haute couture. His fragrance line is known for its classic, elegant, and often green and floral compositions, such as the iconic Iris Gris.

perfumes.description: A fresh and tropical marine fragrance. Curacao Bay is a vibrant and exotic scent that evokes a Caribbean vacation, with notes of citrus, frangipani, and a salty, musky base.

brandInfo.name: James Heeley
brandInfo.description: James Heeley is a British perfume designer based in Paris. His eponymous brand, Heeley Parfums, is known for its contemporary, elegant, and high-quality fragrances that are crafted with a focus on natural ingredients and minimalist aesthetics.

perfumes.description: A realistic and tropical coconut fragrance. Coccobello is a green and creamy scent that captures the essence of a coconut palm, with notes of palm leaf, gardenia, and a salty, vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Jean Paul Gaultier
brandInfo.description: Jean Paul Gaultier is a French haute couture and ready-to-wear fashion designer known for his unconventional and provocative designs. His fragrances, particularly the iconic Le Male and Classique, are celebrated for their bold, sensual, and often playful compositions, reflecting his unique vision.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual amber vanilla fragrance, Gaultier 2 is a captivating and addictive scent. It is a minimalist yet powerful blend of amber, musk, and vanilla, designed to be worn by anyone.

A woody aromatic fragrance with a prominent fig leaf note, Kokorico is a bold and energetic scent. It is a unique and captivating blend of fig leaf, cacao, and patchouli, creating a dark and sensual aura.

A fresh and woody coconut fragrance, Le Beau is a tribute to masculine sensuality. It is a vibrant and alluring scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the sweetness of coconut and a warm, tonka bean base.

A more intense and tropical version of Le Beau, Paradise Garden is a vibrant and exotic fragrance. It combines the sweetness of fig and coconut with the freshness of green notes and a warm, woody base.

The iconic and classic aromatic fougère for men, Le Male is a tribute to the sailor. It is a fresh and sensual scent that combines the coolness of mint with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of lavender.

A more intense and amber vanilla version of Le Male, Elixir is a powerful and seductive fragrance. It amplifies the vanilla and tonka bean notes, creating a deeper and more captivating scent experience.
A more elegant and spicy version of Le Male, Le Parfum is a sophisticated and sensual fragrance. It combines the warmth of cardamom with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of lavender.
A sweet and gourmand amber vanilla fragrance, Le Male Lover is a playful and seductive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of mint.
A fresh and minty aromatic fougère, Le Male Terrible is a bold and energetic scent. It is a unique and captivating blend of mint, grapefruit, and vetiver, creating a vibrant and rebellious aura.

A sweet and caramel-focused fragrance for men, Scandal Pour Homme is a bold and charismatic scent. It is a captivating and addictive blend of caramel, tonka bean, and vetiver, creating a powerful and seductive aura.

A more intense and woody version of Scandal Pour Homme, Absolu is a powerful and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the caramel and tonka bean notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A sweet and fruity amber fragrance, Ultra Male is a bold and seductive scent. It is a captivating and addictive blend of pear, vanilla, and cinnamon, creating a powerful and charismatic aura.

The iconic and classic amber floral fragrance for women, Classique is a tribute to feminine sensuality. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of orange blossom with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of ginger.

A limited edition of Classique, Cabaret is a glamorous and playful fragrance. It is a vibrant and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of orange blossom with the warmth of amber and a touch of ginger.

A more intense and gourmand version of Classique, Essence de Parfum is a rich and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the vanilla and whipped cream notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A fresh and aquatic floral fragrance, Divine is a luminous and uplifting scent. It is a beautiful and elegant blend of lily, calone, and a touch of white flowers, creating a serene and ethereal aura.
A sweet and gourmand vanilla and pear fragrance, La Belle is a captivating and addictive scent. It is a beautiful and sensual blend of green pear, bergamot, and a warm, vanilla base.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Ma Dame is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the sweetness of orange with the beauty of rose and a touch of grenadine.
A sweet and honeyed chypre floral fragrance, Scandal is a bold and captivating scent. It is a rich and sensual blend of honey, gardenia, and patchouli, creating a powerful and addictive aura.
A more intense and honeyed version of Scandal, By Night is a rich and opulent fragrance. It amplifies the honey and tuberose notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A more intense and woody version of Scandal, Le Parfum is a powerful and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the jasmine and vanilla notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.

A fruity and floral fragrance with a prominent tuberose note, So Scandal! is a bold and glamorous scent. It is a vibrant and playful blend of orange blossom, tuberose, and milk, creating a truly scandalous aura.

A modern and sensual interpretation of Classique, Classique X is a floral woody musk fragrance. It is a captivating and addictive scent that combines the freshness of neroli with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of orange blossom.

brandInfo.name: Jennifer Lopez
brandInfo.description: Jennifer Lopez is an American singer, actress, and businesswoman. Her highly successful fragrance line is known for its glamorous, feminine, and often fresh and fruity scents, with the iconic Glow being a standout.

perfumes.description: A glamorous and sensual floral fruity fragrance. JLove is a bright and modern scent with notes of raspberry, pineapple, and a soft, musky base.
A tropical and sunny floral fruity fragrance. Miami Glow is a vibrant and sexy scent with notes of passionfruit, coconut milk, and a warm, ambery base.

brandInfo.name: Jeroboam
brandInfo.description: Jeroboam is a French niche perfume house, an offshoot of the Jovoy brand, created by François Hénin. The brand specializes in powerful, musky extraits de parfum presented in small, travel-friendly bottles.

perfumes.description: A spicy and floral fragrance with a powerful tuberose note. Gozo is a rich and captivating scent that blends saffron and tuberose with a deep, woody and musky base.

brandInfo.name: Jesus Del Pozo
brandInfo.description: Jesús del Pozo was a Spanish fashion designer. His fragrance line, now often under the 'Halloween' brand, is known for its whimsical, romantic, and often magical floral and fruity scents.

perfumes.description: A dark and sensual amber floral fragrance. In Black is a mysterious and captivating scent with notes of cherry, licorice, and a deep, woody and vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Jil Sander
brandInfo.description: Jil Sander is a German minimalist fashion designer. The brand's fragrance line reflects this clean and minimalist aesthetic, with the iconic Sun being a benchmark for solar and summer fragrances.

perfumes.description: The iconic scent of summer. Sun is a warm and radiant amber floral fragrance that evokes the feeling of sun on skin, with notes of orange blossom, ylang-ylang, and a creamy, vanilla base.

brandInfo.description: Jimmy Choo is a British luxury fashion house specializing in shoes, handbags, accessories and fragrances. The brand's perfumes are known for being glamorous, confident, and modern, often featuring sweet, fruity, and patchouli-heavy compositions.
brandInfo.name: Jimmy Choo

perfumes.description: A bright and youthful floral fruity fragrance. Blossom is a playful and sweet blend of red berries and citrus with a heart of rose and sweet pea, on a soft, musky base.
A limited edition tropical and fruity floral fragrance. Exotic is a vibrant and juicy blend of black currant and passionfruit with a heart of florals and a deep patchouli base.
A warm and addictive amber vanilla fragrance. Fever is a sensual and glamorous scent that blends sweet plum and lychee with a heart of heliotrope and a creamy, roasted tonka bean base.
A luminous and sparkling floral fragrance. Flash is a modern and exciting scent that blends spicy pink pepper and strawberry with a heart of white florals like tuberose and jasmine.
A glamorous and vibrant amber floral. I Want Choo is a sparkling and joyful fragrance that blends juicy peach and mandarin with a heart of jasmine and red lily, on a warm vanilla base.
A modern and daring floral fragrance. Illicit is a warm and spicy scent that blends ginger and bitter orange with a heart of jasmine and a sweet, honey-amber base.

The first fragrance from the house, a modern and feminine chypre fruity. Jimmy Choo is a confident and sensual scent that blends pear and green notes with a heart of orchid and a deep, toffee-patchouli base.
A modern and fresh aromatic fruity fragrance for men. Jimmy Choo Man is a crisp and confident scent that blends honeydew melon and lavender with a heart of pineapple leaf and a soft, suede base.
A limited edition chypre fruity fragrance with a festive feel. Stars is a warmer and sweeter take on the original Jimmy Choo, with a prominent orange and toffee accord.

brandInfo.name: Jo Malone London
brandInfo.description: Jo Malone London is a British fragrance and lifestyle brand known for its elegant, simple, and often linear scents. The brand encourages 'fragrance combining,' allowing customers to layer different scents to create a personalized aroma. Jo Malone fragrances are celebrated for their fresh, clean, and natural compositions.

perfumes.description: A fresh and fruity woody fragrance, English Oak & Redcurrant is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the tartness of redcurrant with the warmth of oak and a touch of rose.
A soft and powdery iris and musk fragrance, Iris & White Musk is a delicate and elegant scent. It combines the beauty of iris with the softness of white musk and a touch of amber.
A warm and sensual musk and amber fragrance, Midnight Musk & Amber is a captivating and mysterious scent. It combines the richness of amber with the softness of musk and a touch of juniper.
A fresh and fruity tropical fragrance, Tropical Cherimoya is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of cherimoya with the freshness of passionflower and a touch of copahu balm.
A rich and smoky oud fragrance, Oud & Bergamot is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of oud and a touch of cedarwood.
A fresh and citrusy mango fragrance, Thai Lime & Mango is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of mango with the freshness of lime and a touch of mint.
A warm and aromatic amber and lavender fragrance, Amber & Lavender is a comforting and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of lavender with the warmth of amber and a touch of musk.
A warm and earthy amber and patchouli fragrance, Amber & Patchouli is a rich and sensual scent. It combines the warmth of amber with the earthiness of patchouli and a touch of spices.
A fresh and aromatic citrus fragrance, Basil & Neroli is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of neroli with the greenness of basil and a touch of white musk.
A fresh and woody aromatic fragrance, Black Cedarwood & Juniper is a modern and urban scent. It combines the freshness of juniper with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of cumin.
A warm and gourmand coffee and vetiver fragrance, Black Vetyver Cafe is a rich and captivating scent. It combines the bitterness of coffee with the earthiness of vetiver and a touch of vanilla.

A fresh and fruity blackberry fragrance, Blackberry & Bay is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the scent of a childhood memory of blackberry picking, with a blend of tart berries and green bay leaves.
A warm and gourmand cacao fragrance, Blue Agava & Cacao is a rich and sensual scent. It combines the bitterness of cacao with the sweetness of agave and a touch of vanilla.
A warm and smoky leather fragrance, Bronze Wood & Leather is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the richness of leather with the warmth of woods and a touch of juniper.
A fresh and aromatic vegetable fragrance, Carrot Blossom & Fennel is a unique and uplifting scent. It combines the greenness of carrot blossom with the sweetness of fennel and a touch of musk.

A fresh and woody aromatic fragrance, Cypress & Grapevine Cologne Intense is a sophisticated and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of cypress with the earthiness of grapevine and a touch of amber.
A warm and spicy amber and lily fragrance, Dark Amber & Ginger Lily is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the richness of amber with the spiciness of ginger and a touch of black cardamom.
A fresh and aromatic tea fragrance, Earl Grey & Cucumber is a clean and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot and cucumber with the coolness of mint and a touch of beeswax.

A fresh and woody aromatic fragrance, English Oak & Hazelnut is a tribute to the English countryside. It is a warm and comforting scent that combines the freshness of green hazelnut with the warmth of roasted oak and a touch of cedarwood.

A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, English Pear & Freesia is a tribute to the beauty of autumn. It is a beautiful and elegant scent that combines the sweetness of pear with the freshness of freesia and a soft, woody base.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, English Pear and Sweet Pea is a delicate and charming scent. It combines the sweetness of pear with the beauty of sweet pea and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and floral frangipani fragrance, Frangipani Flower Cologne is a vibrant and exotic scent. It captures the essence of the frangipani flower, with its creamy and solar notes.

A fresh and floral lime blossom fragrance, French Lime Blossom is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of a Parisian park in spring, with a blend of lime blossom, bergamot, and a touch of honey.
A fresh and floral gardenia fragrance, Gardenia is a beautiful and elegant scent. It captures the essence of the gardenia flower, with its creamy and intoxicating notes.
A warm and spicy gourmand fragrance, Ginger Biscuit is a comforting and delicious scent. It evokes the scent of freshly baked gingerbread, with a blend of ginger, cinnamon, and nutmeg.

A fresh and aromatic tea fragrance, Golden Needle Tea is a tribute to the precious tea leaves. It is a clean and elegant scent that combines the freshness of tea with the warmth of amber and a touch of spices.
A fresh and citrusy grapefruit fragrance, Grapefruit is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It is a simple yet elegant perfume that captures the essence of juicy grapefruit.
A fresh and citrusy aromatic fragrance, Green Orange & Coriander is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of green orange with the spiciness of coriander and a touch of musk.
A fresh and green tomato leaf fragrance, Green Tomato Leaf is a unique and invigorating scent. It captures the authentic aroma of a tomato garden, with its green and earthy notes.
A fresh and floral honeysuckle fragrance, Honeysuckle & Davana is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of honeysuckle with the fruitiness of davana and a soft, mossy base.

A fresh and floral honeysuckle and jasmine fragrance, Honeysuckle & Jasmine is a beautiful and elegant scent. It combines the sweetness of honeysuckle with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, musky base.
A warm and smoky incense and citrus fragrance, Incense & Cedrat is a captivating and spiritual scent. It combines the richness of frankincense with the freshness of lemon and a touch of amber.
A warm and smoky incense fragrance, Incense & Embers is a comforting and mysterious scent. It evokes the scent of a crackling fire, with a blend of incense, amber, and a touch of vetiver.
A powdery and floral iris fragrance, Iris & Lady Moore is a delicate and elegant scent. It combines the beauty of iris with the freshness of violet and a soft, musky base.

A dark and fruity spicy fragrance, Pomegranate Noir is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the tartness of pomegranate with the warmth of spices and a smoky, woody base.
A fresh and citrusy pomelo fragrance, Pomelo is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of juicy pomelo, with its fresh and slightly bitter notes.
A fresh and aromatic floral fragrance, Poppy & Barley is a unique and comforting scent. It evokes the scent of the English countryside, with a blend of poppy, barley, and a touch of fig.
A fresh and rosy floral fragrance, Red Roses is a tribute to the queen of flowers. It is a beautiful and elegant scent that captures the essence of a bouquet of red roses.
A warm and spicy saffron fragrance, Saffron is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the richness of saffron with the warmth of amber and a touch of sandalwood.
A rich and opulent floral fragrance, Scarlet Poppy Intense is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of ambrette with the beauty of poppy and a warm, tonka bean base.
A fresh and woody aromatic fragrance, Shards of Cedar & Red Thyme is a unique and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of red thyme with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of vetiver.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Silk Blossom is a vibrant and joyful scent. It captures the essence of silk tree blossoms, with its delicate and luminous notes.
A fresh and aromatic herbal fragrance, Sorrel & Lemon Thyme is a unique and invigorating scent. It combines the tartness of sorrel with the freshness of lemon thyme and a touch of geranium.

A warm and woody vanilla and vetiver fragrance, Vetiver & Golden Vanilla is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the earthiness of vetiver with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of cardamom.
A fresh and woody vetiver fragrance, Vetyver is a classic and elegant scent. It captures the essence of vetiver, with its earthy and smoky notes.
A classic and elegant gardenia fragrance, Vintage Gardenia is a tribute to the timeless beauty of the gardenia flower. It is a rich and opulent scent that captures the essence of a blooming gardenia.
A fresh and floral jasmine and mint fragrance, White Jasmine & Mint is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of mint with the beauty of jasmine and a touch of coriander.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, White Lilac & Rhubarb is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the tartness of rhubarb with the beauty of white lilac and a touch of rose.

A fresh and fruity fig fragrance, Wild Fig & Cassis is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of a Mediterranean fig tree, with its green and earthy notes.
