brandInfo.name: John Varvatos
brandInfo.description: John Varvatos is an American contemporary menswear designer. His fragrance line is known for its rugged, masculine, and rock-and-roll inspired scents, often housed in distinctive, textured bottles.

perfumes.description: A dark and rebellious leather fragrance. Dark Rebel is a smoky and boozy blend of rum, tobacco, and leather, creating a bold and charismatic scent.
A modern and sophisticated amber woody fragrance. John Varvatos is a warm and fruity scent with notes of medjool date, tamarind, and a smooth, leathery base.

brandInfo.description: Joop! is a German fashion and cosmetics house founded by Wolfgang Joop. The brand is famous for its bold and often provocative fragrances, particularly the iconic pink 'Joop! Homme', a powerful and sweet amber fougère that became a massive success in the 1990s.
brandInfo.name: Joop

perfumes.description: A fresh and fruity floral fragrance. All About Eve is a crisp and youthful scent that blends green apple with florals and a warm, cinnamon-vanilla base.
The iconic and polarizing amber fougère. Joop! Homme is a powerful and sweet fragrance with a distinctive blend of cinnamon, vanilla, and florals, known for its immense sillage and longevity.
A fresh and aromatic fougère. Nightflight is a clean and vibrant blend of pineapple, lavender, and citrus with a smooth, woody, and musky base.
A modern and sophisticated woody spicy fragrance. Wow! is a warm and elegant blend of cardamom and bergamot with a heart of fir and a sweet, tonka bean and vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Jovan
brandInfo.description: Jovan is an American fragrance brand, founded in 1972. The brand is famous for its affordable and popular musk-based fragrances, such as the iconic Jovan Musk, which became a cultural phenomenon in the 1970s.

perfumes.description: A clean and fresh floral woody musk. White Musk for Men is a crisp and classic scent that blends citrus and mint with a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Jovoy
brandInfo.description: Jovoy Paris is a French niche perfume house and retailer, founded by François Hénin. The brand is known for its powerful, high-quality, and often bold fragrances that celebrate the art of perfumery.

perfumes.description: A bold and sophisticated woody spicy fragrance. Incident Diplomatique is a powerful and elegant scent with a prominent vetiver and patchouli accord, creating a modern and assertive aura.
A comforting and creamy gourmand fragrance. Remember Me is a unique and delicious blend of milky notes, tea, and spices, creating a warm and nostalgic scent.

brandInfo.description: Juicy Couture is an American casualwear and dress clothing brand. Its fragrance line, launched in 2006, reflects the brand's fun, glamorous, and slightly irreverent personality, with a focus on sweet, fruity, and floral gourmand scents, most famously the 'Viva La Juicy' collection.
brandInfo.name: Juicy Couture

perfumes.description: A rich and playful white floral fragrance. Couture Couture is a sweet and fruity blend of plum and orange blossom with a warm, ambery sandalwood base.
A fun and sunny floral fruity fragrance inspired by Malibu. It's a tropical and sweet blend of passionfruit and watermelon with a heart of florals and a soft, musky base.

The iconic floral fruity gourmand. Viva La Juicy is a playful and sweet fragrance that blends wild berries and mandarin with a creamy heart of gardenia and jasmine, on a delicious caramel and vanilla base.
A more decadent and luxurious version of the original. Gold Couture amplifies the gourmand notes, with a richer caramel and vanilla base, creating a more opulent and seductive scent.
The most concentrated and luxurious version of Viva La Juicy. The Luxe Parfum is a richer and deeper interpretation, emphasizing the fruity and gourmand notes for a more intense experience.
A sparkling and effervescent floral fruity fragrance. This version highlights a fresh rose note, blended with pear and peony, creating a brighter and more floral take on the original.
A sweet and delectable gourmand fragrance. Sucre is a playful and creamy blend of red currant and gardenia with a heart of almond cream and a base of whipped cream and vanilla.

brandInfo.description: Juliette Has a Gun is a French niche perfume brand founded by Romano Ricci, great-grandson of Nina Ricci. The brand is known for its modern, romantic, and often rebellious take on perfumery, with a focus on rose and musk, and the iconic minimalist scent 'Not a Perfume'.
brandInfo.name: Juliette Has A Gun

perfumes.description: A simple and carefree floral woody musk. Anyway is a clean and bright blend of neroli and lime with a soft, musky base, designed to be easy to wear for anyone, anywhere.
A modern and bold chypre floral. Lady Vengeance is a dramatic and sophisticated fragrance that blends Bulgarian rose and patchouli with a soft, musky vanilla base.
A hypnotic and sensual amber floral. Liquid Illusion is a unique and captivating fragrance that blends powdery heliotrope and iris with a warm, ambery and tonka bean base.
A bold and unconventional chypre fragrance. Mad Madame is a modern and assertive scent that blends metallic rose and black currant with a deep, animalic and mossy base.
A delicious and playful amber vanilla fragrance. Mmmm... is a sweet and gourmand scent that blends raspberry and neroli with a heart of florals and a creamy, caramel and sandalwood base.
A sparkling and refreshing citrus aromatic. Moscow Mule is a zesty and vibrant fragrance that captures the essence of the cocktail, with notes of ginger, lime, and a clean, musky base.
A soft and clean floral woody musk. Musc Invisible is a comfortable and intimate fragrance that feels like a second skin, with a simple and elegant blend of jasmine, cotton flower, and white musk.

A minimalist and modern fragrance composed of a single note, Cetalox (Ambroxan). Not a Perfume is a clean, musky, and ambery scent that is hypoallergenic and designed to enhance the wearer's natural scent.
A unique and salty amber vanilla. Vanilla Vibes captures the feeling of a desert beach, blending natural vanilla with sea salt and a warm, sandy, and musky base.

brandInfo.name: Jusbox
brandInfo.description: Jusbox is an Italian niche perfume house that creates fragrances inspired by music and iconic musicians. Each scent is a tribute to a specific genre or artist, capturing their spirit and energy in a bottle.

perfumes.description: A warm and boozy amber spicy fragrance inspired by the Beat Generation. Beat Cafe is a rich and comforting blend of cognac, tobacco, and leather.
A fresh and ozonic floral aquatic fragrance. Siren & Sailors is a bright and uplifting scent with notes of sea salt, rose, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Justin Bieber
brandInfo.description: Justin Bieber is a Canadian singer. His fragrance line is known for its youthful, sweet, and fruity-floral scents that appeal to his young fanbase.

perfumes.description: A playful and sweet floral fruity fragrance. Girlfriend is a bright and youthful scent with notes of pear, strawberry, and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and energetic floral fruity fragrance. The Key is a bright and modern scent with notes of pear, jasmine, and a creamy, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Karl Lagerfeld
brandInfo.description: Karl Lagerfeld was a German creative director, fashion designer, artist, and photographer. His fragrance line reflects his signature style of modern elegance, with classic yet contemporary scents for men and women.

perfumes.description: A fresh and earthy woody aromatic fragrance. Bois de Vétiver is a modern and elegant scent with notes of blood orange, mint, and a prominent vetiver base.
A fresh and elegant floral fruity fragrance. Karl Lagerfeld for Her is a modern and feminine scent with notes of peach, magnolia, and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and fruity floral aquatic fragrance. Ocean View for Women is a bright and tropical scent with notes of lychee, pineapple, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Kayali
brandInfo.description: Kayali is a fragrance brand founded by Huda and Mona Kattan, known for their beauty empire Huda Beauty. Kayali fragrances are designed to be layered and combined, encouraging personal expression through scent. The brand focuses on high-quality ingredients and unique scent profiles, often with a Middle Eastern influence.

A sweet and smoky cherry fragrance, Lovefest Burning Cherry | 48 is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of black cherry with the smokiness of palo santo and a touch of praline.

perfumes.description: A sweet and tropical banana fragrance, Maui in a Bottle Sweet Banana is a playful and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of banana with the freshness of coconut and a touch of vanilla.

A rich and warm vanilla fragrance, Vanilla | 28 is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of brown sugar.

A sweet and gourmand vanilla and candy fragrance, Vanilla Candy Rock Sugar | 44 is a playful and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the crunch of rock sugar and a touch of pear.

A sweet and earthy vanilla and patchouli fragrance, Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli | 64 is a rich and opulent scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the earthiness of patchouli and a touch of rum.

A sweet and gourmand pistachio fragrance, Yum Pistachio Gelato | 33 is a delicious and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of pistachio and rum with the creaminess of whipped cream and a touch of hazelnut.
A sweet and gourmand marshmallow fragrance, Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81 is a playful and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of marshmallow with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of amber.

brandInfo.name: Keiko Mecheri
brandInfo.description: Keiko Mecheri is an American niche perfume house founded by Keiko and Kamel Mecheri. The brand is known for its artistic, elegant, and often travel-inspired fragrances, with a focus on high-quality ingredients and unique compositions.

perfumes.description: A sweet and powdery gourmand fragrance inspired by the Turkish delight confection. Loukhoum is a delicious and comforting blend of almond, honey, and rose.

brandInfo.name: Kenzo
brandInfo.description: Kenzo is a French luxury fashion house founded by Japanese designer Kenzo Takada. The brand is known for its vibrant, eclectic, and nature-inspired designs. Kenzo fragrances often reflect this playful and artistic spirit, with scents that are fresh, bold, and unique, often incorporating floral and aquatic notes.

perfumes.description: A fresh and aquatic aromatic fragrance for men, Homme Sport Extrême is an invigorating and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of mint and grapefruit with the coolness of sea notes and a touch of vetiver.

A classic and fresh woody aquatic fragrance for men, Kenzo pour Homme is a tribute to the power of the ocean. It is a unique and invigorating scent that combines the freshness of marine notes with the warmth of sandalwood and a touch of pine.

perfumes.inspiredBy: L'EAU PAR KENZO ELECTRIC WAVE POUR HOMME
perfumes.description: A fresh and aquatic aromatic fragrance for men, L'Eau par Kenzo Electric Wave pour Homme is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of grapefruit with the coolness of mint and a touch of vetiver.

A spicy and woody fragrance for men, Tokyo by Kenzo is a tribute to the vibrant energy of Tokyo. It is a modern and urban scent that combines the freshness of ginger with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of incense.
A fresh and citrusy aromatic fragrance for men, Totem Orange is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of orange with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of pineapple.
A warm and sensual amber vanilla fragrance, Amour Le Parfum is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of rice.
A powdery and floral violet fragrance, Couleur Kenzo Violet is a delicate and elegant scent. It combines the sweetness of violet with the freshness of blackcurrant and a touch of musk.

The iconic and powdery floral fragrance, Flower by Kenzo is a tribute to the beauty of a poppy in the city. It is a soft and elegant scent that combines the beauty of rose and violet with a warm, musky base.
A more intense and gourmand version of Flower by Kenzo, L'Elixir is a rich and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the vanilla and praline notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Jeu d'Amour is a playful and romantic scent. It combines the sweetness of pear and pomegranate with the beauty of tuberose and a soft, musky base.
A bold and spicy oriental fragrance, Jungle L'Éléphant is a captivating and unforgettable scent. It is a rich and complex blend of spices, fruits, and a warm, ambery base.
A warm and sensual amber vanilla fragrance, Kenzo Amour is a comforting and inviting scent. It is a beautiful blend of rice, vanilla, and frangipani, creating a soft and intimate aura.
A fresh and aquatic floral fragrance, L'Eau par Kenzo is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It is a beautiful and clean blend of lotus, mint, and a touch of pink pepper.

A fresh and green floral fragrance, Parfum d'Été is a tribute to the beauty of summer. It is a luminous and elegant scent that combines the freshness of green notes with the beauty of hyacinth and a soft, musky base.

A warm and solar floral fragrance, Summer by Kenzo is a tribute to the golden glow of summer. It is a beautiful and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of mimosa with the warmth of musk and a touch of lemon.

A bold and playful floral fruity fragrance, World is a tribute to the modern woman. It is a vibrant and energetic scent that combines the sweetness of red berries with the beauty of peony and a touch of ambroxan.

brandInfo.name: Khaltat
brandInfo.description: Khaltat is a luxury fragrance brand from the UAE that blends the art of Arabian perfumery with modern European sensibilities. The brand is known for its rich, opulent, and long-lasting scents.

perfumes.description: A tropical and creamy gourmand fragrance. Aloha is a delicious and exotic blend of coconut, caramel, and vanilla, creating a scent that evokes a luxurious beach vacation.
A sweet and fruity gourmand fragrance. Gharam is a rich and addictive blend of red berries, vanilla, and a touch of oud, creating a sensual and captivating scent.

brandInfo.name: Kiehls
brandInfo.description: Kiehl's is an American cosmetics brand retailer that specializes in skin, hair, and body care products. Its most iconic fragrance, Original Musk, is a classic and sensual scent with a long and storied history.

perfumes.description: An iconic and timeless floral woody musk. Original Musk is a clean yet sensual fragrance with a prominent musk accord, blended with soft florals and a touch of sweetness.

brandInfo.name: Kilian
brandInfo.description: Kilian Paris is a luxury fragrance house founded by Kilian Hennessy, heir to the Hennessy cognac family. The brand is known for its opulent, sophisticated, and often provocative fragrances, inspired by themes of love, desire, and addiction. Kilian perfumes are crafted with the finest ingredients and presented in exquisite, refillable bottles.

perfumes.description: A rich and opulent oud fragrance, Pearl Oud is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the intensity of oud with the sweetness of saffron and a touch of rose.
A sweet and honeyed orange blossom fragrance, Can't Stop Loving You is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of orange blossom with the warmth of honey and a touch of oakmoss.
A warm and smoky incense and oud fragrance, Incense Oud is a captivating and spiritual scent. It combines the richness of frankincense with the intensity of oud and a touch of rose.

A fresh and aromatic absinthe fragrance, L'Heure Verte is a tribute to the bohemian spirit of Paris. It is a unique and captivating scent that combines the bitterness of absinthe with the sweetness of patchouli and a touch of licorice.
A warm and spicy tobacco fragrance, Light My Fire is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of tobacco with the sweetness of honey and a touch of patchouli.
A warm and sensual musk and oud fragrance, Musk Oud is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of oud with the softness of musk and a touch of rose.

A boozy and woody whiskey fragrance, Single Malt is a tribute to the finest Scotch whisky. It is a rich and sophisticated scent that combines the warmth of whiskey with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of plum.
A smoky and gourmand tobacco and apple fragrance, Smoking Hot is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of apple with the smokiness of tobacco and a touch of bourbon vanilla.
A powerful and charismatic amber fragrance, Stronger With You Absolutely is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of rum.
A fresh and boozy aquatic fragrance, Vodka on the Rocks is a crisp and invigorating scent. It combines the coolness of aldehydes with the freshness of coriander and a touch of rose.
A fresh and rosy floral fragrance, A Kiss from a Rose is a delicate and romantic scent. It combines the beauty of rose with the freshness of green notes and a soft, musky base.

A boozy and fruity apple fragrance, Apple Brandy on the Rocks is a tribute to the iconic New York cocktail. It is a fresh and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of apple with the warmth of rum and a touch of cedarwood.
A fresh and spicy ginger fragrance, Blue Moon Ginger Dash is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of lemon with the spiciness of ginger and a touch of vodka.

perfumes.inspiredBy: GOOD GIRL GONE BAD EAU FRAICHE
perfumes.description: A lighter and fresher interpretation of Good Girl Gone Bad, Eau Fraîche is a sparkling and joyful fragrance. It combines the freshness of orange blossom with the beauty of tuberose and a touch of jasmine.
A more intense and opulent version of Good Girl Gone Bad, Extreme is a captivating and sensual fragrance. It amplifies the white floral notes, creating a deeper and more addictive scent experience.
A sweet and fruity floral fragrance, Killing Me Slowly is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of lychee and blackcurrant with the beauty of rose and a touch of iris.
A sweet and gourmand marshmallow fragrance, Kisses Don't Lie is a playful and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of marshmallow with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of orange blossom.

A more intense and gourmand version of Love Don't Be Shy, Extreme is a rich and opulent fragrance. It amplifies the marshmallow and orange blossom notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A sweet and fruity floral fragrance, Madly in Love is a playful and romantic scent. It combines the sweetness of raspberry with the beauty of rose and a touch of vanilla.
A creamy and woody sandalwood fragrance, Sacred Wood is a tribute to the precious wood. It is a serene and meditative scent that is both warm and comforting.

A warm and solar floral fragrance, Sunkissed Goddess is a tribute to the golden glow of summer. It is a beautiful and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of coconut with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of tiare flower.

A warm and spicy amber fragrance, Gold Knight is a tribute to the elegance of a knight in shining armor. It is a captivating and sophisticated scent that combines the sweetness of honey with the warmth of patchouli and a touch of anise.
A fresh and clean white floral fragrance, Bamboo Harmony is a serene and elegant scent. It is a beautiful blend of neroli, white tea, and bamboo, creating a calming and harmonious aura.
A fresh and citrusy aromatic fragrance, Good Girl Gone Bad is a playful and provocative scent. It combines the sweetness of osmanthus with the beauty of tuberose and a touch of jasmine.
A warm and spicy amber fragrance, In the City of Sin is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of plum with the warmth of amber and a touch of incense.
A sweet and gourmand marshmallow fragrance, Love Don't Be Shy is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of marshmallow with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of orange blossom.
A spicy and woody fragrance, Playing With The Devil is a bold and provocative scent. It combines the sweetness of peach and blackcurrant with the warmth of pimento and a touch of sandalwood.
A sweet and gourmand marshmallow and green tea fragrance, Princess is a playful and charming scent. It combines the sweetness of marshmallow with the freshness of green tea and a touch of ginger.

A fresh and aquatic floral fragrance, Water Calligraphy is a serene and elegant scent. It is a beautiful blend of water lily, magnolia, and a touch of grapefruit, creating a calming and harmonious aura.

A warm and spicy amber floral fragrance, Woman in Gold is a tribute to the iconic painting by Gustav Klimt. It is a rich and opulent scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the beauty of rose and a warm, vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Kilian Paris
brandInfo.description: Kilian Paris is a luxury fragrance house founded by Kilian Hennessy, heir to the Hennessy cognac family. The brand is known for its opulent, sophisticated, and often provocative fragrances, inspired by themes of love, desire, and addiction. Kilian perfumes are crafted with the finest ingredients and presented in exquisite, refillable bottles.

perfumes.description: A boozy and fruity apple fragrance, Apple Brandy on the Rocks is a tribute to the iconic New York cocktail. It is a fresh and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of apple with the warmth of rum and a touch of cedarwood.
A creamy and musky floral fragrance, Rolling in Love is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of almond milk with the beauty of iris and a soft, musky base.
A warm and sensual amber vanilla fragrance, Adults is a playful and provocative scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of fig milk.
A rich and smoky oud fragrance, Amber Oud is a captivating and opulent scent. It combines the intensity of oud with the warmth of amber and a touch of vanilla.

A sweet and boozy gourmand fragrance, Angels' Share is a tribute to Kilian Hennessy's cognac heritage. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of cognac with the sweetness of cinnamon and a touch of tonka bean.
A warm and honeyed tobacco fragrance, Back to Black is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the sweetness of honey with the richness of tobacco and a touch of cherry.
A fresh and citrusy aromatic fragrance, Good Girl Gone Bad is a playful and provocative scent. It combines the sweetness of osmanthus with the beauty of tuberose and a touch of jasmine.
A dark and gourmand coffee and rum fragrance, Black Phantom is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the bitterness of coffee with the sweetness of caramel and a touch of rum.
A sweet and fruity floral fragrance, Forbidden Games is a playful and seductive scent. It combines the sweetness of apple and peach with the beauty of tuberose and a touch of honey.
A warm and spicy coffee fragrance, Intoxicated is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the bitterness of coffee with the warmth of cardamom and a touch of vanilla.

perfumes.inspiredBy: KISSING BURNS 6.4 CALORIES AN HOUR. WANNA GO ON A DIET?
perfumes.description: A sweet and gourmand marshmallow fragrance, Kissing Burns 6.4 Calories an Hour. Wanna Go on a Diet? is a playful and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of marshmallow with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of lily-of-the-valley.
A fruity and woody plum fragrance, Liaisons Dangereuses, Typical Me is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the sweetness of plum with the warmth of rose and a touch of cinnamon.
A fresh and fruity tropical fragrance, Moonlight in Heaven is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of mango and rice with the freshness of grapefruit and a touch of vetiver.

A sensual and opulent white floral fragrance, Voulez-Vous Coucher Avec Moi is a captivating and seductive scent. It combines the beauty of gardenia and tuberose with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of cedarwood.

brandInfo.name: Kkw
brandInfo.description: KKW Fragrance is a fragrance line by American media personality, businesswoman, and model Kim Kardashian. The brand is known for its modern, often gourmand and floral scents, with a focus on sensual and glamorous compositions.

perfumes.description: A bold and seductive floral gourmand. Red Lips is a rich and sweet fragrance with notes of blood orange, red lotus, and a warm, ambery vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Kylie Jenner
brandInfo.description: Kylie Jenner is an American media personality, socialite, and businesswoman. Her debut fragrance, Cosmic, is a sweet and modern amber floral designed to be magnetic and otherworldly.

perfumes.description: A sweet and magnetic amber floral fragrance. Cosmic is a modern and feminine scent with notes of star jasmine, blood orange, and a warm, vanilla musk base.

brandInfo.name: L'Artisan Parfumeur
brandInfo.description: L'Artisan Parfumeur is one of the first niche perfume houses, founded in Paris in 1976. The brand is known for its artistic, innovative, and nature-inspired fragrances, celebrating the beauty of raw materials and creative perfumery.

perfumes.description: A cool and leathery floral fragrance. Mont de Narcisse is a sophisticated and modern scent that blends the greenness of narcissus with a smoky, leathery base.

brandInfo.name: L'Artisan Parfumeur
brandInfo.description: L'Artisan Parfumeur is one of the first niche perfume houses, founded in Paris in 1976. The brand is known for its artistic, innovative, and nature-inspired fragrances, celebrating the beauty of raw materials and creative perfumery.

perfumes.description: An iconic and realistic fig fragrance. Premier Figuier captures the entire fig tree: the greenness of the leaves, the milkiness of the sap, and the sweetness of the fruit.
An iconic and realistic fig fragrance. Premier Figuier captures the entire fig tree: the greenness of the leaves, the milkiness of the sap, and the sweetness of the fruit.

brandInfo.description: L'Occitane en Provence is a French luxury retailer of beauty and home products. Inspired by the landscapes and traditions of Provence, their fragrances often feature natural, high-quality ingredients like lavender, verbena, and immortelle, creating scents that are both authentic and evocative of the South of France.
brandInfo.name: L'Occitane

perfumes.description: A bright and zesty citrus aromatic fragrance. Citrus Verbena is a refreshing and energizing blend of lemon, grapefruit, and verbena, perfect for a hot summer day.
A sophisticated and fruity floral fragrance. Magnolia & Mûre is an elegant blend of bright magnolia and juicy blackberry, with a soft, woody base.
A delicate and fresh floral fragrance. Pivoine Flora (Peony) is a romantic and green scent that captures the aroma of a blooming peony garden.
A warm and aromatic gourmand fragrance inspired by the golden hour in Provence. Terre de Lumière is a unique blend of honey, lavender, and almond, creating a comforting and luminous scent.

brandInfo.name: La Prairie
brandInfo.description: La Prairie is a Swiss luxury skincare company. While many of its fragrances are discontinued, they were known for their opulent, complex, and sophisticated compositions, often housed in artistic and luxurious bottles.

perfumes.description: A fresh and uplifting citrus aromatic fragrance. Cellular Energizing Body Spray is a bright and clean scent with notes of grapefruit, cardamom, and a soft, musky base.
A rich and sensual floral fruity fragrance. Midnight Rain is a dark and mysterious blend of tropical fruits, white flowers, and a deep, woody patchouli base.
An exotic and complex amber floral fragrance. Silver Rain is a rich and unique blend of fruits, spices, and florals with a deep, woody and vanilla base.

brandInfo.description: Lacoste is a French company, founded in 1933 by tennis player René Lacoste. Famous for its crocodile logo and polo shirts, the brand's fragrance line reflects its sporty, elegant, and relaxed aesthetic. The scents are often fresh, clean, and modern, embodying a sense of effortless chic.
brandInfo.name: Lacoste

perfumes.description: A modern and magnetic aromatic fougère. L.12.12. Magnetic is a fresh and sweet fragrance that blends green mountain juniper with a heart of violet and a warm, ambery base.
A sophisticated and modern woody spicy fragrance. L'Homme Lacoste is an elegant blend of citrus and spices with a warm, woody, and ambery base.
A soft and elegant floral woody musk. Lacoste Pour Femme is a comfortable and sophisticated fragrance that blends florals with a distinctive suede note, creating a clean and powdery aura.
A bright and sunny floral fruity fragrance. Touch of Sun is a cheerful and uplifting scent that blends citrus and watery notes with a heart of florals and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Lady Gaga
brandInfo.description: Lady Gaga is an American singer, songwriter, and actress. Her debut fragrance, Fame, was notable for its innovative black fluid that becomes invisible when sprayed, and its bold, sweet, and floral scent.

perfumes.description: A unique and dramatic floral fragrance. Fame is a dark and sweet blend of belladonna, orchid, and incense, with a touch of honey and apricot.

brandInfo.description: Lalique is a French glasswear design house founded by artist and jeweler René Lalique. Originally famous for its glass art, the brand expanded into perfumery, creating fragrances that are often housed in beautifully crafted bottles. The scents themselves are known for their elegance, quality, and artistic composition.
brandInfo.name: Lalique

perfumes.description: A vibrant and juicy floral fruity fragrance. Amethyst is a beautiful blend of dark berries like black currant and blackberry with a heart of florals and a soft, musky base.

A dark, moody, and iconic woody aromatic fragrance. Encre Noire is a masterpiece centered around vetiver, presented in its most earthy, smoky, and inky facets, creating a sophisticated and mysterious scent.
An elegant and modern floral woody musk. Living Lalique is a sophisticated and powdery fragrance that blends iris and spices with a smooth, creamy, and woody base.
A modern and elegant chypre floral. Perles de Lalique is a cool and earthy fragrance that features a prominent rose and patchouli combination, with a powdery, almost medicinal quality.
A soft and sensual amber woody fragrance. Satine is a warm and powdery blend of florals, vanilla, and tonka bean, creating a delicate and comforting aura.
A warm and aromatic woody spicy fragrance. Sculpteur d'Épices is a sophisticated blend of spices, coffee, and a rich, ambery base.

brandInfo.name: Lancôme
brandInfo.description: Lancôme is a French luxury cosmetics house founded in 1935 by Armand Petitjean. The brand is known for its high-quality skincare, makeup, and fragrances. Lancôme perfumes often embody elegance, femininity, and a touch of French romance, with iconic scents like Trésor and La Vie Est Belle.

perfumes.description: A fresh and aromatic fougère for men, Hypnôse Homme is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of mint and cardamom with the warmth of amber and a touch of patchouli.
A classic and elegant aldehydic floral fragrance, Climat is a timeless and sophisticated scent. It is a beautiful and luminous bouquet of flowers with a soft, powdery base.
A warm and sensual oriental vanilla fragrance, Hypnôse is a captivating and addictive scent. It is a beautiful blend of passionflower, vanilla, and vetiver, creating a truly hypnotic aura.

A modern and elegant chypre floral fragrance, Idôle is a tribute to the strong and independent woman. It is a luminous and sophisticated scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the beauty of rose and a clean, musky base.
A more solar and salty interpretation of Idôle, Aura is a radiant and uplifting fragrance. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of salty rose.
A more intense and sensual version of Idôle, L'Intense is a captivating and addictive fragrance. It amplifies the rose and jasmine notes, creating a deeper and more opulent scent experience.
A sweet and gourmand interpretation of Idôle, Nectar is a delicious and addictive fragrance. It combines the sweetness of popcorn with the beauty of rose and a warm, vanilla base.

A modern and warm floral fragrance, Idôle Now is a tribute to the power of nature. It is a beautiful and luminous scent that combines the freshness of rose with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of orchid.
A sweet and gourmand jasmine fragrance, Jasmins Marzipane is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of marzipan with the beauty of jasmine and a touch of almond.
A sweet and gourmand amber vanilla fragrance, La Nuit Trésor is a captivating and addictive scent. It is a beautiful blend of black rose, vanilla orchid, and a touch of praline.

perfumes.inspiredBy: LA NUIT TRESOR A LA FOLIE
perfumes.description: A more intense and gourmand version of La Nuit Trésor, À La Folie is a rich and opulent fragrance. It amplifies the vanilla and bourbon notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.

perfumes.inspiredBy: LA NUIT TRESOR DENTELLE DE ROSES
perfumes.description: A rosy and floral interpretation of La Nuit Trésor, Dentelle de Roses is a delicate and elegant fragrance. It combines the beauty of rose with the sweetness of raspberry and a soft, musky base.
A musky and powdery interpretation of La Nuit Trésor, Musc Diamant is a soft and sensual fragrance. It combines the sweetness of white musk with the beauty of freesia and a touch of vanilla.
A lighter and more coconutty interpretation of La Nuit Trésor, Nude is a fresh and sensual fragrance. It combines the sweetness of coconut with the beauty of rose and a soft, vanilla base.

The iconic and sweet gourmand floral fragrance, La Vie Est Belle is a tribute to the beauty of life. It is a captivating and addictive scent that combines the sweetness of iris and praline with a touch of blackcurrant.

perfumes.inspiredBy: LA VIE EST BELLE EN ROSE
perfumes.description: A fresh and rosy interpretation of La Vie Est Belle, En Rose is a vibrant and joyful fragrance. It combines the sweetness of red berries with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.

A more intense and fruity interpretation of La Vie Est Belle, Intensément is a rich and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the red iris and vanilla notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.

perfumes.inspiredBy: LA VIE EST BELLE IRIS ABSOLU
perfumes.description: A more intense and iris-focused interpretation of La Vie Est Belle, Iris Absolu is a rich and opulent fragrance. It amplifies the iris and gourmand notes, creating a deeper and more sophisticated scent experience.

perfumes.inspiredBy: LA VIE EST BELLE L'EAU DE TOILETTE FLORALE
perfumes.description: A lighter and more floral interpretation of La Vie Est Belle, L'Eau de Toilette Florale is a fresh and joyful fragrance. It combines the sweetness of osmanthus with the beauty of mimosa and a soft, musky base.

A more luminous and orange blossom-focused interpretation of La Vie Est Belle, L'Éclat is a radiant and joyful fragrance. It combines the sweetness of orange blossom with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of iris.
A more intense and gourmand version of La Vie Est Belle, L'Elixir is a rich and opulent fragrance. It amplifies the iris and praline notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.

perfumes.inspiredBy: LA VIE EST BELLE SOLEIL CRISTAL
perfumes.description: A solar and coconutty interpretation of La Vie Est Belle, Soleil Cristal is a radiant and joyful fragrance. It combines the sweetness of coconut with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of iris.
A classic and mysterious chypre floral fragrance, Magie Noire is a captivating and unforgettable scent. It is a rich and complex blend of spices, flowers, and a warm, woody base.
A warm and spicy floral woody fragrance, Magnifique is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of saffron with the beauty of rose and a warm, woody base.
A fresh and rosy floral fragrance, Magnolia Rosae is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the beauty of magnolia and rose with a touch of musk and amber.
A fresh and spicy floral fragrance, Miracle is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It is a beautiful blend of lychee, freesia, and magnolia, creating a feeling of pure joy and wonder.

A fresh and citrusy floral fragrance, Ô de l'Orangerie is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of an orange grove in bloom, with a blend of orange blossom, neroli, and a touch of cedarwood.
A fresh and aquatic fruity floral fragrance, Ô Oui! is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of apple and pear with the freshness of water lily and a touch of musk.
A warm and woody oud fragrance, Oud Ambroisie is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the richness of oud with the sweetness of rose and a touch of saffron.
A rich and opulent oud and rose fragrance, Oud Bouquet is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the beauty of rose with the intensity of oud and a touch of praline.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Oui La Vie Est Belle is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of raspberry with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.
A classic and opulent white floral fragrance, Poême is a tribute to the power of poetry. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the beauty of mimosa and datura with a warm, vanilla base.

A classic and elegant amber floral fragrance, Trésor is a tribute to precious moments. It is a warm and romantic scent that combines the beauty of rose and lilac with the sweetness of apricot and a soft, musky base.
A sweet and rosy fruity floral fragrance, Trésor Midnight Rose is a captivating and playful scent. It combines the sweetness of raspberry with the beauty of rose and a touch of vanilla.

brandInfo.name: Lanvin
brandInfo.description: Lanvin is a French luxury fashion house. Its fragrance line is known for its elegant, romantic, and often classic floral scents, such as the iconic Arpège and the modern classic Éclat d'Arpège.

perfumes.description: A delicate and radiant floral green fragrance. Éclat d'Arpège is a modern and feminine scent with notes of lilac, green tea, and a soft, musky base.
A sweet and fruity floral fragrance. Lanvin Me is a playful and modern scent with notes of blueberry, licorice, and a rich tuberose heart.
A joyful and romantic floral fruity fragrance. Marry Me is a bright and optimistic scent with a prominent bitter orange and jasmine accord.

brandInfo.name: Lattafa Perfumes
brandInfo.description: Lattafa Perfumes is a leading fragrance house based in the United Arab Emirates, known for creating high-quality, long-lasting oriental and Arabian perfumes. They offer a wide range of scents, often inspired by traditional Middle Eastern perfumery, with a focus on rich and opulent compositions.

perfumes.description: A fruity and woody oud fragrance, Bade'e Al Oud Sublime is a captivating and opulent scent. It combines the sweetness of apple and lychee with the richness of oud and a touch of rose.
A sweet and spicy gourmand fragrance, Khamrah is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of dates and cinnamon with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of praline.
A clean and soft musk fragrance, Khalis Musk is a comforting and intimate scent. It is a beautiful blend of white musk with a touch of floral notes and a soft, powdery base.
A fresh and spicy aromatic fragrance, Ra'ed Silver is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of citrus with the spiciness of pink pepper and a touch of amber.
A warm and sweet amber vanilla fragrance, Raghba is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of oud and a touch of incense.
A sweet and gourmand caramel and vanilla fragrance, Yara Moi is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of caramel with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of amber.
A sweet and fruity tropical fragrance, Yara is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of pineapple and mango with the freshness of passionfruit and a touch of vanilla.

brandInfo.description: Laura Biagiotti was an Italian fashion designer known as the 'Queen of Cashmere'. Her fragrance line, particularly the iconic 'Roma', is celebrated for its classic, elegant, and distinctly Italian character, often blending rich oriental notes with bright Mediterranean citrus.
brandInfo.name: Laura Biagiotti

perfumes.description: An iconic and classic amber spicy fragrance. Roma is a warm and evocative scent that blends bright citrus and mint with a rich, balsamic, and mossy base, capturing the timeless spirit of Rome.
A classic and masculine amber woody fragrance. Roma Uomo is a timeless scent that blends fresh citrus and green notes with a warm, woody, and resinous base.
A soft and romantic floral woody musk. Sotto Voce is a warm and powdery blend of fruits, florals, and a creamy, woody vanilla base.
A rich and romantic amber spicy fragrance. Venezia is a warm and intoxicating blend of fruits, florals, and a deep, resinous, and animalic base, evoking the mystery of Venice.
A classic and refined woody spicy fragrance for men. Venezia Uomo is an elegant blend of citrus, florals, and spices on a rich, leathery, and mossy base.

brandInfo.name: Laura Mercier
brandInfo.description: Laura Mercier is a French and American makeup artist and the founder of Laura Mercier Cosmetics. Her fragrance line, particularly the gourmand scents, is beloved for its sophisticated, comforting, and delicious aromas.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual amber vanilla fragrance. Ambre Vanille is a comforting and intimate scent that blends the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of tangerine.

brandInfo.name: Le Labo
brandInfo.description: Le Labo is a New York-based fragrance and lifestyle brand founded in 2006. The brand is known for its artisanal approach to perfumery, with a focus on handcrafted scents, high-quality raw ingredients, and a unique in-store blending experience. Le Labo fragrances are often minimalist, sophisticated, and designed to evolve on the skin.

perfumes.description: A soft and musky ambrette fragrance, Ambrette 9 is a delicate and intimate scent. It is a minimalist yet captivating blend of ambrette seeds, citrus, and a touch of apple.
A clean and musky ambroxan fragrance, Another 13 is a captivating and addictive scent. It is a minimalist yet powerful blend of ambroxan, jasmine, and moss, creating a unique and alluring aura.

A fresh and green aquatic fragrance, Baie 19 is a tribute to the scent of rain after a long drought. It is a clean and invigorating scent that combines the freshness of juniper berries with the earthiness of patchouli and a touch of green leaves.
A fresh and citrusy bergamot fragrance, Bergamote 22 is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It is a beautiful and energetic blend of bergamot, grapefruit, and vetiver, creating a feeling of pure joy.
A fresh and citrusy cedar fragrance, Cèdre 37 Berlin is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of cedar with the brightness of citron and a touch of ginger.

A fresh and floral orange blossom fragrance, Fleur d'Oranger 27 is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of orange groves in bloom, with a blend of orange blossom, lemon, and a touch of musk.
A fresh and citrusy lime fragrance, Limette 37 is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of juicy lime, with its fresh and zesty notes.
A rich and opulent white floral fragrance, Lys 41 is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the beauty of lily and tuberose with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of musk.
A green and earthy oakmoss fragrance, Mousse de Chêne 30 is a sophisticated and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of oakmoss with the warmth of patchouli and a touch of pink pepper.
A dark and smoky oud fragrance, Oud 27 is a powerful and captivating scent. It combines the intensity of oud with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of incense.
A smoky and leathery patchouli fragrance, Patchouli 24 is a bold and unconventional scent. It combines the earthiness of patchouli with the smokiness of birch tar and a touch of vanilla.
A fresh and spicy rose fragrance, Rose 31 is a modern and unconventional scent. It combines the beauty of rose with the warmth of cumin and a touch of vetiver.
A warm and woody sandalwood fragrance, Santal 26 is a comforting and sensual scent. It combines the richness of sandalwood with the warmth of amber and a touch of vanilla.

The iconic woody aromatic fragrance, Santal 33 is a tribute to the American West. It is a smoky and leathery scent that combines the warmth of sandalwood with the coolness of cardamom and a touch of iris.

A warm and spicy tobacco fragrance, Tabac 28 Miami is a tribute to the vibrant city of Miami. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of tobacco with the warmth of rum and a touch of cedarwood.
A fresh and aromatic black tea fragrance, The Noir 29 is a captivating and sophisticated scent. It combines the bitterness of black tea with the sweetness of fig and a touch of cedarwood.
A warm and sensual tonka bean fragrance, Tonka 25 is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of tonka bean with the warmth of musk and a touch of cedarwood.
A smoky and woody vetiver fragrance, Vetiver 46 is a powerful and sophisticated scent. It combines the earthiness of vetiver with the warmth of frankincense and a touch of pepper.
A fresh and creamy matcha tea fragrance, The Matcha 26 is a unique and comforting scent. It combines the bitterness of matcha with the sweetness of fig and a touch of cedarwood.

A warm and sensual vanilla fragrance, Vanille 44 Paris is a tribute to the city of love. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of guaiac wood.

A clean and woody guaiac wood fragrance, Gaiac 10 Tokyo is a minimalist and elegant scent. It is a serene and meditative perfume that combines the warmth of guaiac wood with the softness of musk and a touch of olibanum.
A warm and resinous myrrh fragrance, Myrrhe 55 is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the richness of myrrh with the warmth of amber and a touch of jasmine.

brandInfo.description: Loewe is a Spanish luxury fashion house founded in 1846. Known for its high-quality leather goods, the brand's fragrance line reflects its dedication to craftsmanship and artistry. Loewe's perfumes often draw inspiration from nature and art, creating sophisticated and often unconventional scents.
brandInfo.name: Loewe

perfumes.description: A fresh and airy floral fragrance. A Mi Aire is a light and carefree blend of citrus, florals, and a soft, musky base, evoking a gentle breeze.
A vibrant and tropical citrus aromatic. Agua Miami is a refreshing and sunny blend of citrus fruits, florals, and a soft, musky base, inspired by the energy of Miami.
A classic and powerful aromatic fougère. Esencia pour Homme is a complex and masculine blend of green notes, spices, and a deep, woody, and mossy base.
A unique and harmonious amber fragrance. Solo is a scent of contrasts, balancing fresh citrus and lavender with warm spices and a rich, ambery base.
A woody and spicy interpretation of the Solo fragrance. Solo Loewe Cedro is a masculine and elegant scent that highlights the note of cedarwood, blended with spices and lavender.

brandInfo.description: Lolita Lempicka is a French fashion designer and perfume creator. Her fragrance line, launched in 1997, is famous for its whimsical, fairy-tale aesthetic. The iconic first perfume, 'Lolita Lempicka', in its apple-shaped bottle, is a celebrated gourmand fragrance with a distinctive licorice and violet accord.
brandInfo.name: Lolita Lempicka

perfumes.description: A unique and enchanting amber vanilla fragrance for men. Au Masculin is a distinctive blend of licorice, violet, and anise with a warm, boozy, and woody base.
A warm and spicy amber vanilla fragrance inspired by mermaids. L de Lolita Lempicka is a beautiful gourmand blend of cinnamon, vanilla, and bitter orange.
A light and delicate floral fruity fragrance. L'Eau Jolie is a fresh and pretty scent that blends black currant and pear with a soft floral heart and a musky base.
The iconic first perfume, a magical and enchanting floral fruity gourmand. Lolita Lempicka is a fairy-tale scent with a unique blend of licorice, violet, and cherry, on a sweet, powdery vanilla base.
A playful and delicious floral fruity gourmand. Sweet is a tempting fragrance that highlights a juicy cherry note, blended with cacao, sugar, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Lorenzo Villoresi
brandInfo.description: Lorenzo Villoresi is an Italian niche perfume house. The brand is known for its classic, high-quality, and often powerful fragrances that are inspired by travel, mythology, and the rich traditions of Italian perfumery.

perfumes.description: The ultimate powdery fragrance. Teint de Neige, meaning 'color of snow', is a soft and comforting blend of powdery notes, rose, and heliotrope, creating a nostalgic and intensely clean scent.

brandInfo.name: Louboutin
brandInfo.description: Christian Louboutin is a French fashion designer whose high-end stiletto footwear incorporates shiny, red-lacquered soles. His fragrance line is known for its luxurious, opulent, and often dramatic scents, housed in beautifully artistic bottles.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual white floral fragrance. Bikini Questa Sera is a rich and intoxicating blend of jasmine and tuberose, creating a scent that evokes a hot summer night.
A powerful and majestic leather fragrance. Loubiraj is a bold and charismatic scent with notes of suede, pink pepper, and cedarwood.
A sensual and spicy amber fragrance. Loubirouge is a dramatic and captivating scent with notes of cardamom, iris, and vanilla.

brandInfo.name: Louis Vuitton
brandInfo.description: Louis Vuitton Malletier, commonly known as Louis Vuitton, is a French luxury fashion house and company founded in 1854 by Louis Vuitton. The brand is known for its high-quality leather goods, ready-to-wear, and accessories. Louis Vuitton fragrances are an extension of this luxury, offering sophisticated and often travel-inspired scents crafted with precious ingredients.

perfumes.description: A leathery and fruity raspberry fragrance, Mille Feux is a vibrant and captivating scent. It combines the sweetness of raspberry with the richness of leather and a touch of saffron.
A warm and spicy oud and leather fragrance, Nouveau Monde is a captivating and adventurous scent. It combines the richness of oud with the warmth of saffron and a touch of cocoa.
A dark and mysterious woody floral musk fragrance, Matière Noire is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the richness of oud and patchouli with the beauty of rose and a touch of blackcurrant.

A fresh and rosy floral fragrance, Rose des Vents is a tribute to the beauty of the rose. It is a luminous and elegant scent that combines the freshness of rose with the sweetness of blackcurrant and a touch of cedarwood.

A fresh and citrusy aquatic fragrance, Afternoon Swim is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It captures the feeling of a refreshing dip in the ocean, with a blend of orange, bergamot, and a touch of marine notes.
A sweet and fruity floral fragrance, Attrape-Rêves is a captivating and enchanting scent. It combines the sweetness of lychee and ginger with the beauty of peony and a touch of cacao.
A fresh and green aromatic fragrance, Cactus Garden is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It captures the essence of a desert garden, with a blend of cactus sap, bergamot, and a touch of lemongrass.
A fresh and citrusy solar fragrance, California Dream is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the feeling of a Californian sunset, with a blend of mandarin, pear, and a touch of musk.
A fresh and citrusy floral fragrance, City of Stars is a vibrant and glamorous scent. It captures the energy of Los Angeles at night, with a blend of blood orange, tiare flower, and a touch of musk.
A warm and sensual vanilla fragrance, Contre Moi is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the freshness of orange blossom and a touch of cacao.
A leathery and musky fragrance, Dans la Peau is a captivating and intimate scent. It combines the richness of leather with the softness of musk and a touch of jasmine.
A fruity and floral osmanthus fragrance, Étoile Filante is a luminous and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of osmanthus with the freshness of jasmine and a touch of musk.

A warm and spicy amber floral fragrance, Fleur du Désert is a tribute to the beauty of the desert. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the sweetness of honey with the warmth of oud and a touch of rose.

A fresh and floral mimosa fragrance, Heures d'Absence is a tribute to the fleeting moments of life. It is a delicate and elegant scent that combines the sweetness of mimosa with the freshness of rose and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and citrusy amber fragrance, Imagination is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of citrus with the warmth of ambroxan and a touch of black tea.
A fresh and spicy ginger fragrance, L'Immensité is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of ginger with the bitterness of grapefruit and a touch of amber.

A rich and opulent rose and oud fragrance, Les Sables Roses is a tribute to the desert at dawn. It is a powerful and captivating scent that combines the beauty of rose with the intensity of oud and a touch of saffron.
A smoky and leathery incense fragrance, Nuit de Feu is a captivating and mysterious scent. It combines the richness of incense with the warmth of leather and a touch of oud.
A dark and mysterious oud and rose fragrance, Ombre Nomade is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the intensity of oud with the beauty of rose and a touch of frankincense.
A fresh and citrusy yuzu fragrance, On the Beach is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the feeling of a sunny day at the beach, with a blend of yuzu, neroli, and a touch of sand.
A fresh and woody patchouli fragrance, Orage is a powerful and captivating scent. It combines the earthiness of patchouli with the freshness of bergamot and a touch of iris.
A warm and spicy amber fragrance, Stellar Times is a captivating and luxurious scent. It combines the richness of amber with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of orange blossom.
A fresh and citrusy orange blossom fragrance, Sun Song is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the feeling of a sunny summer day, with a blend of orange blossom, neroli, and a touch of musk.
A rich and opulent tuberose fragrance, Turbulences is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the beauty of tuberose with the warmth of leather and a touch of saffron.
A fresh and citrusy aquatic fragrance, Pacific Chill is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It captures the feeling of a refreshing dip in the ocean, with a blend of orange, lemon, and a touch of mint.
A fresh and rosy floral fragrance, Spell on You is a captivating and romantic scent. It combines the beauty of iris and rose with the sweetness of acacia flower and a touch of musk.

A fresh and clean lily-of-the-valley fragrance, Apogée is a luminous and uplifting scent. It is a beautiful and elegant blend of lily-of-the-valley, jasmine, and guaiac wood, creating a feeling of pure serenity.

brandInfo.name: M. Micallef
brandInfo.description: M. Micallef is a French niche perfume house founded by Martine Micallef and Geoffrey Nejman. The brand is known for its luxurious and artistic fragrances, often presented in beautifully hand-decorated bottles, with a focus on high-quality natural ingredients.

perfumes.description: A fresh and invigorating citrus aromatic fragrance. GNTONIC is a bright and modern scent with notes of lime, ginger, and a touch of gin, creating a refreshing and sophisticated cocktail-inspired experience.
A sweet and delicate amber vanilla fragrance. Vanille Fleur is a beautiful and feminine blend of vanilla, rose, and peach, creating a soft and romantic aura.
A luxurious and radiant floral fruity fragrance. Ylang in Gold is a tropical and creamy blend of ylang-ylang, coconut, and vanilla, creating a scent that evokes a sun-drenched paradise.

brandInfo.name: Mac
brandInfo.description: MAC Cosmetics is a Canadian cosmetics manufacturer. While primarily known for its makeup, the brand has released several popular fragrances, often with a focus on bold, gourmand, and unique scents like the iconic Velvet Teddy.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy amber fragrance inspired by the iconic lipstick shade. Velvet Teddy is a rich and comforting blend of honey, tobacco, and spices, creating a sensual and sophisticated scent.

brandInfo.name: Maison Crivelli
brandInfo.description: Maison Crivelli is a French niche perfume house that creates surprising and sensorial fragrances inspired by unexpected discoveries of raw materials. The brand is known for its modern, artistic, and high-quality compositions.

perfumes.description: A powerful and exotic leather fragrance. Oud Maracujá is a bold and unique blend of passionfruit, oud, and leather, creating a fruity, smoky, and animalic scent.
A unique and captivating floral leather fragrance. Tubéreuse Astrale is a modern and sensual blend of tuberose, osmanthus, and a soft, leathery base.

brandInfo.name: Maison Francis Kurkdjian
brandInfo.description: Maison Francis Kurkdjian is a French luxury fragrance house founded in 2009 by master perfumer Francis Kurkdjian and Marc Chaya. The brand is known for its exquisite, sophisticated, and often innovative fragrances that blend traditional French perfumery with a modern sensibility. Each scent is crafted with the finest raw materials and a meticulous attention to detail.

perfumes.description: A woody floral fragrance with a prominent amyris note, Amyris Femme is a luminous and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of lemon with the beauty of iris and a soft, woody base.
A classic and elegant oud fragrance, Oud is a rich and captivating scent. It combines the intensity of oud with the warmth of saffron and a touch of cedarwood.

A fresh and clean urban fragrance, 724 is a tribute to the energy of big cities. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of aldehydes with the beauty of white flowers and a soft, musky base.
A woody aromatic fragrance with a prominent amyris note, Amyris Homme is a luminous and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of mandarin with the warmth of amyris and a touch of iris.

A fresh and floral orange blossom fragrance, APOM (A Part Of Me) is a tribute to the connection between two souls. It is a beautiful and elegant scent that combines the freshness of orange blossom with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of ylang-ylang.

A fresh and aquatic mint fragrance, Aqua Celestia is a serene and uplifting scent. It evokes the feeling of a clear blue sky meeting the horizon, with a blend of mint, lime, and a touch of blackcurrant.

A fresh and green citrus aromatic fragrance, Aqua Media Cologne Forte is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot and verbena with the sweetness of fennel and a touch of musk.

A clean and fresh citrus aromatic fragrance, Aqua Universalis is a versatile and uplifting scent. It is a beautiful and minimalist blend of bergamot, lemon, and white musk, creating a feeling of pure freshness.

A more intense and vibrant version of Aqua Universalis, Forte is a powerful and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the citrus and white floral notes, creating a deeper and more lasting scent experience.

A more intense and opulent version of Baccarat Rouge 540, the Extrait de Parfum is a rich and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the amber and woody notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A warm and spicy amber vanilla fragrance, Gentle Fluidity Gold is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of coriander.
A fresh and aromatic woody fragrance, Gentle Fluidity Silver is a clean and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of juniper berries with the warmth of nutmeg and a touch of coriander.

A warm and sensual amber fragrance, Grand Soir is a tribute to the magic of a Parisian evening. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of amber with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of benzoin.
A fresh and rosy fragrance for men, L'Homme À la Rose is a modern and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of grapefruit with the beauty of Damask rose and a touch of amberwood.

A classic and elegant fougère, Masculin Pluriel is a tribute to timeless masculinity. It is a fresh and sophisticated scent that combines the freshness of lavender with the warmth of leather and a touch of vetiver.
A soft and musky oud fragrance, Oud Cashmere Mood is a comforting and sensual scent. It combines the richness of oud with the warmth of amber and a touch of vanilla.
A rich and opulent rose and oud fragrance, Oud Satin Mood is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the beauty of Turkish rose with the intensity of oud and a touch of vanilla.
A fresh and rosy oud fragrance, Oud Silk Mood is a delicate and elegant scent. It combines the beauty of rose with the freshness of chamomile and a touch of oud.

brandInfo.name: Maison Francis Kurkdjian
brandInfo.description: Maison Francis Kurkdjian is a luxury French perfume house founded by master perfumer Francis Kurkdjian. The brand is celebrated for its sophisticated, elegant, and masterfully crafted fragrances, including the global phenomenon Baccarat Rouge 540.

perfumes.description: An iconic and luminous amber floral fragrance. Baccarat Rouge 540 is a sophisticated and addictive scent that blends airy jasmine and radiant saffron with a mineralic ambergris and woody cedar base.

brandInfo.name: Maison Margiela Replica
brandInfo.description: Maison Margiela Replica is a fragrance collection from the French fashion house Maison Margiela. The Replica line aims to evoke specific moments, locations, and memories through scent. Each fragrance is designed to be a "replica" of a familiar scent, offering a unique and nostalgic olfactory experience.

perfumes.description: A fresh and clean aromatic fougère, At the Barber's evokes the classic scent of a barbershop. It is a crisp and invigorating blend of basil, lavender, and tonka bean, with a touch of white musk.

A warm and smoky woody gourmand fragrance, By the Fireplace evokes the comforting scent of a crackling fire on a winter evening. It is a rich and inviting blend of smoky woods, vanilla, and a touch of chestnut.

A warm and gourmand coffee and lavender fragrance, Coffee Break evokes the comforting scent of a cozy coffee shop. It is a rich and inviting blend of coffee, lavender, and milk, with a touch of spearmint.

A warm and boozy tobacco and leather fragrance, Jazz Club evokes the smoky atmosphere of a Brooklyn jazz club. It is a rich and sensual blend of rum, tobacco, and vanilla, with a touch of pink pepper.

A clean and fresh floral woody musk fragrance, Lazy Sunday Morning evokes the comforting scent of freshly laundered sheets on a lazy Sunday. It is a soft and intimate blend of lily-of-the-valley, iris, and white musk.

A fruity and rosy chypre fragrance, On a Date evokes the excitement of a first date in Provence. It is a vibrant and romantic scent that combines the sweetness of blackcurrant with the beauty of rose and a touch of patchouli.
A warm and woody vanilla fragrance, Whispers in the Library evokes the comforting scent of an old library. It is a rich and inviting blend of vanilla, cedarwood, and a touch of pepper.

A fresh and woody aromatic fragrance, Autumn Vibes evokes the crisp scent of a walk in the woods during autumn. It is a vibrant and invigorating blend of cedarwood, pink pepper, and a touch of maple syrup.

A fresh and aquatic solar floral fragrance, Beach Walk evokes the carefree feeling of a summer day at the beach. It is a luminous and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of coconut milk and a touch of ylang-ylang.
A clean and soapy floral woody musk fragrance, Bubble Bath evokes the comforting scent of a warm bath. It is a soft and intimate blend of soap bubbles, coconut, and white musk.
A fresh and aquatic marine fragrance, Sailing Day evokes the invigorating scent of the open sea. It is a crisp and uplifting blend of marine notes, red seaweed, and a touch of ambergris.
A fresh and citrusy aromatic fragrance, Under the Lemon Tree evokes the refreshing scent of a lemon grove in Sicily. It is a vibrant and uplifting blend of lemon, petitgrain, and green tea.
A green and woody aromatic fragrance, Untitled is a minimalist and modern scent. It is a clean and fresh blend of galbanum, boxwood, and incense, creating a unique and intriguing aura.

A fresh and aquatic floral fragrance, When the Rain Stops evokes the comforting scent of rain after a storm. It is a beautiful and serene blend of aquatic notes, rose, and patchouli, creating a feeling of calm and renewal.

brandInfo.name: Maison Mataha
brandInfo.description: Maison Mataha is a French niche perfume house known for its extremely potent and long-lasting gourmand fragrances. Their most famous scent, Escapade Gourmande, has become a viral sensation for its hyper-realistic vanilla and burnt sugar aroma.

perfumes.description: An intensely sweet and realistic gourmand fragrance. Escapade Gourmande is a delicious and addictive blend of black sugar, vanilla, and tonka bean, creating a scent that smells like a freshly baked crème brûlée.

brandInfo.name: Mancera
brandInfo.description: Mancera is a French niche perfume house founded in 2008 by Pierre Montale. The brand is known for its bold, intense, and long-lasting fragrances, often featuring a blend of Western and Eastern influences. Mancera perfumes are crafted with high-quality ingredients and are designed to make a statement.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual oud and vanilla fragrance, Aoud Vanilla is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of oud with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of saffron.
A warm and gourmand vanilla fragrance, Black Vanilla is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of coconut.

A fresh and woody citrus aromatic fragrance, Cedrat Boise is a versatile and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of blackcurrant and bergamot with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of leather.
A warm and spicy tobacco fragrance, Red Tobacco is a powerful and captivating scent. It combines the richness of tobacco with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of oud.
A sweet and gourmand rose and vanilla fragrance, Roses Vanille is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the beauty of Turkish rose with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of sugar.
A rich and opulent vanilla fragrance, Vanille Exclusif is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of musk.
A warm and gourmand coffee fragrance, Amore Caffè is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the bitterness of coffee with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of caramel.
A fresh and citrusy oud fragrance, Aoud Lemon Mint is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of lemon and mint with the warmth of oud and a touch of amber.
A sweet and tropical coconut and vanilla fragrance, Coco Vanille is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of coconut with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of tiare flower.
A fresh and aquatic citrus fragrance, French Riviera is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of the French Riviera, with a blend of lemon, orange, and a touch of marine notes.
A smoky and woody cannabis fragrance, Hindu Kush is a powerful and captivating scent. It combines the earthiness of cannabis with the warmth of incense and a touch of spices.
A warm and spicy amber floral fragrance, Instant Crush is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of saffron and ginger with the beauty of rose and a warm, woody base.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Melody of the Sun is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of blackcurrant and lemon with the beauty of jasmine and a touch of cedarwood.
A sweet and gourmand rose and chocolate fragrance, Roses and Chocolate is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the beauty of rose with the richness of dark chocolate and a touch of vanilla.

A fresh and woody aromatic fragrance, Saharian Wind is a tribute to the vastness of the desert. It is a clean and invigorating scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of spices.
A sweet and fizzy cola fragrance, Tonka Cola is a playful and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of cola with the warmth of tonka bean and a touch of vanilla.

brandInfo.name: Marc Antoine Barrois
brandInfo.description: Marc-Antoine Barrois is a French couturier. His fragrance line, created in collaboration with perfumer Quentin Bisch, is known for its unique, modern, and highly sophisticated scents, with Ganymede being a standout creation.

perfumes.description: A unique and futuristic mineralic leather fragrance. Ganymede is a bright and airy scent with notes of mandarin, violet, and immortelle, creating a modern and unforgettable olfactory experience.

brandInfo.description: Marc Jacobs is an American fashion designer whose brand is known for its playful, quirky, and often vintage-inspired aesthetic. The fragrance line, particularly the 'Daisy' and 'Decadence' collections, reflects this spirit with whimsical bottle designs and bright, youthful, and accessible scents.
brandInfo.name: Marc Jacobs

perfumes.description: A bold and peppery woody spicy fragrance. Bang is an energetic and masculine scent that features a prominent black pepper note, blended with woods and resins.
A charming and optimistic floral woody musk. Daisy is a fresh and feminine scent that blends wild strawberry and violet leaves with a heart of gardenia and jasmine, on a soft, musky base.
An ethereal and fruity floral fragrance. Daisy Dream is a light and airy blend of blackberry and pear with a heart of wisteria and jasmine, on a creamy coconut and musk base.
A sunny and bright fruity floral. Daisy Dream Sunshine is a cheerful blend of solar notes, strawberry, and a soft, musky base, evoking a happy summer day.
A glamorous and luxurious amber floral. Decadence is a rich and sensual fragrance that blends juicy plum and saffron with a heart of rose and a deep, ambery base.
A sunny and happy floral fruity fragrance. Honey is a sweet and vibrant blend of pear and punch with a heart of honeysuckle and a warm, honeyed base.

brandInfo.description: Marc-Antoine Barrois is a French couturier who launched his eponymous fragrance house. The scents, created in collaboration with perfumer Quentin Bisch, are known for their modern, elegant, and highly distinctive character, often blending mineralic, spicy, and leathery notes to create unique and memorable olfactory signatures.
brandInfo.name: Marc-Antoine Barrois

perfumes.description: A sophisticated and modern woody spicy fragrance. B683 is an elegant blend of spices, leather, and woods, creating a refined and timeless scent with a futuristic edge.
A powerful and unique fragrance that contrasts green, earthy vetiver and rhubarb with a smooth, woody base. Encelade is a bold and artistic scent that evokes a lush, primal landscape.
An intensified and richer version of the original. Ganymede Extrait amplifies the spicy, leathery, and mineralic facets, creating a more powerful and opulent fragrance experience.
A bright and sunny floral fragrance centered around the linden blossom (tilleul). Tilia is a joyful and optimistic scent that blends honeyed florals with a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Masque Milano
brandInfo.description: Masque Milano is an Italian niche perfume house that creates artistic and narrative-driven fragrances, presented as 'scenes' in an 'opera'. The brand is known for its high-quality, complex, and evocative scents.

perfumes.description: A warm and passionate amber spicy fragrance. Tango is a rich and intoxicating blend of spices, florals, and a deep, boozy and ambery base, evoking the sensuality of the dance.

brandInfo.name: Matiere Premiere
brandInfo.description: Matière Première is a French niche perfume house founded by perfumer Aurélien Guichard. The brand focuses on highlighting a single, exceptional raw material in each fragrance, creating modern, minimalist, and high-quality scents.

perfumes.description: A clean and sensual floral woody musk. Radical Rose is a modern and powerful interpretation of the rose, with a bright and spicy character.
A modern and airy amber vanilla fragrance. Vanilla Powder is a unique blend of vanilla, coconut, and palo santo, creating a light, powdery, and slightly smoky scent.
A bright and modern amber spicy fragrance. Crystal Saffron is a luminous and clean interpretation of saffron, blended with musk and ambroxan for a contemporary feel.

brandInfo.name: Max Mara
brandInfo.description: Max Mara is an Italian fashion house known for its luxurious, modern, and sophisticated womenswear. Its fragrances, though many are discontinued, often reflected this elegant and clean aesthetic.

perfumes.description: A unique and sophisticated floral fragrance. Max Mara is a distinctive blend of ginger and citrus with a heart of lily and orchid, on a musky, sugary base.

brandInfo.name: Mdci
brandInfo.description: MDCI Parfums (Marchal Design & Créations Indépendantes) is a French niche perfume house known for its luxurious, high-quality fragrances and artistic presentation, often featuring sculpted bust stoppers.

perfumes.description: A modern and sophisticated aromatic fougère. Invasion Barbare is a classic and elegant blend of lavender, cardamom, and vanilla, creating a clean, spicy, and refined scent.

brandInfo.name: Melanie Martinez
brandInfo.description: Melanie Martinez is an American singer, songwriter, and filmmaker. Her debut fragrance, Cry Baby Perfume Milk, is known for its unique baby bottle design and its sweet, lactonic, and fruity scent.

perfumes.description: A sweet and playful gourmand fragrance. Cry Baby Perfume Milk is a unique and comforting blend of milky notes, strawberry, and caramel, creating a nostalgic and whimsical scent.

brandInfo.name: Memo Paris
brandInfo.description: Memo Paris is a French fragrance house founded in 2007 by Clara and John Molloy. The brand is inspired by travel and exotic destinations, with each fragrance telling a story of a unique journey. Memo Paris perfumes are known for their luxurious compositions, often featuring leather and precious raw materials.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy leather fragrance, African Leather is a tribute to the African continent. It is a powerful and captivating scent that combines the warmth of leather with the spiciness of cardamom and a touch of geranium.

A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Cappadocia is a tribute to the magical landscape of Cappadocia. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of amber with the spiciness of saffron and a touch of sandalwood.

A fresh and aromatic citrus fragrance, Corfu is a tribute to the beautiful Greek island. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the coolness of mint and a touch of jasmine.
A fresh and spicy citrus aromatic fragrance, Kedu Sesame is a unique and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of grapefruit with the earthiness of sesame and a touch of freesia.
A warm and sensual tuberose fragrance, Marfa is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the beauty of tuberose with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of orange blossom.

A warm and spicy leather fragrance, Moroccan Leather is a tribute to the vibrant culture of Morocco. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of leather with the spiciness of ginger and a touch of cypress.
A fresh and aquatic leather fragrance, Ocean Leather is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It captures the feeling of the open sea, with a blend of marine notes, basil, and a touch of vetiver.

A smoky and leathery aromatic fragrance, Russian Leather is a tribute to the vastness of the Russian landscape. It is a powerful and captivating scent that combines the freshness of basil and mint with the warmth of leather and a touch of pine.

brandInfo.name: Michael Kors
brandInfo.description: Michael Kors is an American fashion designer known for his luxury accessories and ready-to-wear. The Michael Kors brand embodies a jet-set, glamorous, and sophisticated lifestyle. Michael Kors fragrances often reflect this aesthetic, with scents that are modern, chic, and designed for the confident individual.

perfumes.description: A warm and woody amber fragrance, Midnight Shimmer is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of musk.
A fresh and spicy woody fragrance for men, Michael Kors for Men is a modern and sophisticated scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of patchouli and a touch of coriander.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, 24K Brilliant Gold is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of mandarin with the beauty of white flowers and a warm, woody base.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Coral is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of a tropical paradise, with a blend of grapefruit, orange blossom, and a touch of tuberose.
A warm and sensual amber fragrance, Sexy Amber is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of amber with the warmth of sandalwood and a touch of white flowers.
A fresh and fruity tropical fragrance, Sexy Rio de Janeiro is a vibrant and joyful scent. It captures the energy of Rio, with a blend of mango, passionfruit, and a touch of jasmine.
A fruity and floral chypre fragrance, Sexy Ruby is a bold and glamorous scent. It combines the sweetness of raspberry with the beauty of rose and a warm, woody base.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Sexy Sunset is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the feeling of a beautiful sunset, with a blend of pear, lotus, and a touch of amber.
A fresh and citrusy aromatic fragrance, Sporty Citrus is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of orange and mandarin with a touch of musk and woody notes.
A rich and opulent white floral fragrance, Super Gorgeous is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the beauty of tuberose and jasmine with the warmth of amber and a touch of tobacco.
