A warm and woody amber fragrance, Twilight Shimmer is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the sweetness of plum with the warmth of amber and a touch of musk.
A fresh and citrusy floral fragrance, White Luminous Gold is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of pear with the beauty of white flowers and a soft, musky base.
A warm and spicy floral fragrance, Wonderlust is a captivating and adventurous scent. It combines the sweetness of almond milk with the beauty of dianthus and a warm, benzoin base.

brandInfo.name: Miller Harris
brandInfo.description: Miller Harris is a British niche perfume house that creates complex and artistic fragrances using natural ingredients. The brand is known for its modern, elegant, and often nature-inspired scents.

perfumes.description: A rich and aromatic amber spicy fragrance. Feuilles de Tabac is a warm and sophisticated blend of tobacco leaf, spices, and a touch of pine, creating a classic and comforting scent.

brandInfo.name: Missguided
brandInfo.description: Missguided is a UK-based multi-channel retailer selling clothes aimed at 16-35 year old women. Its fragrance line is known for its bold, playful, and affordable scents that match its fast-fashion aesthetic.

perfumes.description: A vibrant and confident floral fruity fragrance. Babe Power is a sweet and playful scent with notes of sour cherry, orange blossom, and a touch of cotton candy.

brandInfo.name: Missoni
brandInfo.description: Missoni is an Italian luxury fashion house based in Varese, and known for its colorful knitwear designs. The brand's fragrance line reflects this vibrant and joyful spirit, with modern and elegant scents.

perfumes.description: A bright and elegant floral fruity fragrance. Missoni is a modern and feminine scent with notes of pear, jasmine, and a soft, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Miu Miu
brandInfo.description: Miu Miu is an Italian high fashion women's clothing and accessory brand and a fully owned subsidiary of Prada. Its fragrance line is known for its quirky, youthful, and modern scents, often with a prominent lily-of-the-valley note.

perfumes.description: A sweet and creamy gourmand fragrance. Fleur de Lait is a delicious and comforting blend of mango and coconut milk, creating a tropical and lactonic scent.
A fresh and dewy floral green fragrance. L'Eau Bleue is a bright and realistic interpretation of lily-of-the-valley after a spring rain.

brandInfo.description: Molton Brown is a British fragrance and personal care brand founded in London. Known for its luxury bath, body, and home products, the brand's fragrances are often inspired by travel and exotic ingredients, creating sophisticated and well-balanced scents for both men and women.
brandInfo.name: Molton Brown

perfumes.description: A warm and comforting woody fragrance. Amber Cocoon is a cozy blend of amber, spices, and woods, creating a scent that feels like a warm embrace.
An iconic and invigorating woody spicy fragrance. Black Pepper is a dynamic and adventurous scent that blends spicy black pepper with fresh citrus and an earthy, woody base.
A fresh and uplifting citrus aromatic fragrance. Thai Vert is a zesty and green blend of lime, verbena, and green tea, creating a clean and energizing scent.
A discontinued spicy and aromatic fragrance. Ziao Jao was known for its unique blend of Sichuan pepper, citrus, and warm spices, creating a vibrant and exotic scent.

brandInfo.name: Moncler
brandInfo.description: Moncler is an Italian luxury fashion brand mostly known for its skiwear. The brand's fragrance line is modern and innovative, often featuring unique woody and aromatic compositions housed in futuristic, interactive bottles.

perfumes.description: A fresh and modern woody aromatic fragrance. Pour Homme is a crisp and clean scent with notes of alpine green accord, clary sage, and a prominent mountain woods accord.
A unique and powdery floral woody musk. Pour Femme is a clean and comforting scent with a prominent 'powdery snow' accord, blended with jasmine and a warm, vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Montale
brandInfo.description: Montale is a French niche perfume house founded in 2003 by Pierre Montale. The brand is known for its rich, intense, and long-lasting fragrances, often featuring a high concentration of natural ingredients, particularly oud. Montale perfumes are inspired by the perfumer's experiences in the Middle East and are presented in distinctive aluminum bottles.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy amber fragrance, Golden Sand is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of spices.
A soft and powdery floral fragrance, Orchid Powder is a delicate and elegant scent. It combines the beauty of orchid with the softness of musk and a touch of vanilla.
A rich and opulent oud fragrance, Oud Pashmina is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the intensity of oud with the warmth of amber and a touch of rose.
A smoky and woody fragrance, Wood on Fire is a captivating and mysterious scent. It evokes the scent of a crackling fire, with a blend of smoky woods, amber, and a touch of vetiver.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Bubble Forever is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of pear and blackcurrant with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.
A sweet and gourmand rose and violet fragrance, Crazy in Love is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the beauty of rose with the sweetness of brown sugar and a touch of violet.
A fresh and aquatic aromatic fragrance, Herbal Aquatica is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of marine notes with the greenness of herbs and a touch of citrus.
A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Infinity is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of oud with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of spices.
A sweet and gourmand floral fruity fragrance, Rendez-vous à Paris is a playful and romantic scent. It combines the sweetness of pear and lychee with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and citrusy floral fragrance, Soleil de Capri is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of a sunny day in Capri, with a blend of citrus, white flowers, and a soft, musky base.
A warm and spicy amber floral fragrance, Starry Nights is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of apple and bergamot with the beauty of rose and a warm, patchouli base.

brandInfo.name: Montale
brandInfo.description: Montale is a French niche perfume house founded in 2003 by Pierre Montale. The brand is known for its rich, intense, and long-lasting fragrances, often featuring a high concentration of natural ingredients, particularly oud. Montale perfumes are inspired by the perfumer's experiences in the Middle East and are presented in distinctive aluminum bottles.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy tonka bean fragrance, Arabians Tonka is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of tonka bean with the warmth of saffron and a touch of oud.
A warm and gourmand vanilla fragrance, Dark Vanilla is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of spices.
A warm and gourmand coffee and rose fragrance, Intense Café is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the bitterness of coffee with the sweetness of rose and a touch of vanilla.
A clean and musky fragrance, Musk to Musk is a soft and comforting scent. It is a beautiful blend of musk with a touch of oud and amber, creating a serene and intimate aura.
A fresh and rosy musk fragrance, Roses Musk is a beautiful and elegant scent. It combines the beauty of rose with the softness of musk and a touch of jasmine.
A sweet and gourmand vanilla cake fragrance, Vanilla Cake is a delicious and addictive scent. It evokes the scent of freshly baked vanilla cake, with a blend of vanilla, milk, and a touch of caramel.
A warm and sensual vanilla fragrance, Vanilla Extasy is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of apricot.
A fresh and citrusy oud fragrance, Aoud Orange is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of orange with the warmth of oud and a touch of saffron.
A warm and sensual oud fragrance, Aoud Velvet is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of oud with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of tiare flower.
A dark and smoky oud and rose fragrance, Black Aoud is a powerful and majestic scent. It combines the intensity of oud with the beauty of rose and a touch of patchouli.
A sweet and gourmand chocolate fragrance, Chocolate Greedy is a delicious and addictive scent. It combines the richness of cacao with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of dried fruits.
A rich and opulent oud fragrance, Fantastic Oud is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the intensity of oud with the warmth of leather and a touch of rose.
A warm and sweet honey and oud fragrance, Honey Aoud is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of honey with the richness of oud and a touch of cinnamon.
A tropical and creamy tiare flower fragrance, Intense Tiaré is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of tiare flower with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of coconut.
A warm and spicy oriental fragrance, Mukhalat is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of strawberry with the warmth of amber and a touch of vanilla.
A fresh and rosy floral fragrance, The New Rose is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the beauty of rose with the freshness of blackcurrant and a touch of musk.

brandInfo.name: Montana
brandInfo.description: Claude Montana is a French fashion designer. His fragrance line, particularly the iconic Parfum de Peau, is known for its bold, powerful, and often animalic scents that defined the 1980s.

perfumes.description: A classic and powerful leather fragrance for men. Montana Homme is a bold and aromatic scent with a complex blend of aldehydes, spices, and a deep, leathery and mossy base.

brandInfo.name: Montblanc
brandInfo.description: Montblanc is a German manufacturer of luxury writing instruments, watches, jewelry, leather goods, and fragrances. Founded in 1906, the brand is synonymous with craftsmanship, quality, and timeless elegance. Montblanc fragrances often embody a sense of sophistication, adventure, and classic masculinity or femininity.

perfumes.description: A fresh and spicy aromatic fougère, Emblem is a tribute to the modern man. It is a charismatic and elegant scent that combines the freshness of clary sage with the warmth of tonka bean and a touch of grapefruit.

A fresh and woody aromatic fragrance, Explorer is a tribute to the spirit of adventure. It is a captivating and invigorating scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the earthiness of vetiver and a touch of patchouli.
A fresh and aromatic woody fragrance, Individuel is a unique and sophisticated scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of sandalwood and a touch of raspberry.
A fresh and aromatic woody fragrance, Legend Blue is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of spearmint with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of ambroxan.

A fresh and aromatic fougère, Legend for Men is a tribute to the legendary man. It is a charismatic and elegant scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of coumarin and a touch of pineapple.
A more intense and spicy version of Legend, Intense is a powerful and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the woody and fruity notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A warm and woody aromatic fragrance, Legend Night is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of vanilla.
A fresh and woody aromatic fragrance, Legend Red is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of blood orange with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of clary sage.

A fresh and aquatic aromatic fragrance, Legend Spirit is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of grapefruit and pink pepper with the coolness of marine notes and a touch of white musk.
A warm and spicy oriental fragrance, Presence is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of ginger and cardamom with the warmth of amber and a touch of sandalwood.
A fresh and spicy woody fragrance, Starwalker is a modern and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of bamboo and bergamot with the warmth of sandalwood and a touch of ginger.
A classic and elegant floral fruity fragrance, Femme Individuelle is a sophisticated and versatile scent. It combines the sweetness of redcurrant with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Lady Emblem is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of redcurrant with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and floral woody musk fragrance, Legend Pour Femme is a modern and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of neroli with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, musky base.
A sweet and gourmand floral fragrance, Signature is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of clementine with the beauty of magnolia and a warm, vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Moresque
brandInfo.description: Moresque is an Italian niche perfume house that blends Italian artistry with the rich traditions of Arabian perfumery. The brand is known for its opulent, high-quality, and beautifully presented fragrances.

perfumes.description: A bold and sensual floral spicy fragrance. Contessa is a rich and intoxicating blend of spices, rose, and a warm, sweet tonka bean base.

brandInfo.name: Morph
brandInfo.description: Morph is an Italian niche perfume house that creates innovative and transformative fragrances. The brand is known for its high-quality, long-lasting, and often unconventional scents.

perfumes.description: A fresh and aromatic marine fragrance. Antigua Bay is a bright and invigorating scent with notes of sea salt, bergamot, and a deep, woody base.
A sweet and addictive amber vanilla fragrance. Tonkatonic is a rich and comforting blend of tonka bean, almond, and vanilla, creating a warm and gourmand scent.

brandInfo.name: Moschino
brandInfo.description: Moschino is an Italian luxury fashion house founded in 1983 by Franco Moschino. The brand is known for its innovative, colorful, and often eccentric designs, characterized by a playful and ironic approach to fashion. Moschino's fragrances follow this theme, often with whimsical packaging and unique scent concepts that challenge the conventions of perfumery.

perfumes.description: An aromatic fougère fragrance for men, Moschino Forever is a timeless and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of kumquat and star anise with the warmth of tonka bean and a touch of musk.
A classic, discontinued men's leather fragrance from 1990. It's a bold, masculine, and aromatic scent, representative of the powerful fragrances of its era. A true leathery chypre.

Toy Boy is a woody and spicy fragrance that reinterprets elegance with a touch of irony. It's a bold, unique, and playful scent, with a prominent rose note. Designed for a dynamic and passionate man who is not afraid to show his more tender and playful side.
A fresh and aromatic fougère for men, Uomo? is a modern and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of kumquat and coriander with the warmth of amber and a touch of cedarwood.
A fresh and clean floral fragrance for women, Cheap & Chic is a playful and charming scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot and petitgrain with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.

A fresh and citrusy floral fruity fragrance, Cheap & Chic I Love Love is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the freshness of grapefruit and orange with the sweetness of redcurrant and a touch of lily-of-the-valley.
A fresh and aquatic floral fruity fragrance, Cheap & Chic Light Clouds is a light and airy scent. It evokes the feeling of a clear blue sky, with a blend of cyclamen, lotus, and a touch of musk.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Cheap & Chic So Real is a vibrant and playful scent. It combines the sweetness of bitter orange and tangerine with the beauty of jasmine and a touch of magnolia.
A fresh and clean floral fruity fragrance, Fresh Couture is a playful and ironic scent. It is a vibrant and uplifting blend of mandarin, bergamot, and ylang-ylang, with a touch of raspberry.
A fresh and citrusy floral fruity fragrance, Funny! is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the freshness of bitter orange and pink pepper with the sweetness of green tea and a touch of jasmine.
A fresh and clean floral fragrance, L'Eau Cheap & Chic is a light and airy scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot and rose with a touch of freesia and a soft, musky base.

A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Pink Bouquet is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of pineapple and raspberry with the beauty of pink lily-of-the-valley and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and floral woody musk fragrance, Stars is a luminous and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of rose and peony with the warmth of amber and a touch of vetiver.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Toy 2 is a playful and charming scent. It combines the sweetness of apple and mandarin with the beauty of peony and a soft, musky base.
A sweet and fruity bubblegum fragrance, Toy 2 Bubble Gum is a playful and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of bubblegum with the freshness of candied citrus and a touch of rose.
A fresh and aquatic floral fragrance, Toy 2 Pearl is a luminous and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of lemon with the beauty of jasmine and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Mugler
brandInfo.description: Mugler (formerly Thierry Mugler) is a French fashion house founded by Thierry Mugler. The brand is known for its avant-garde, theatrical, and often futuristic designs. Mugler fragrances are equally iconic and distinctive, with groundbreaking scents like Angel and Alien, known for their bold and unconventional compositions.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy oriental woody fragrance for men, A*Men is a groundbreaking and iconic scent. It combines the freshness of mint and bergamot with the warmth of patchouli and a touch of coffee.
A warm and spicy tonka bean fragrance, A*Men Pure Tonka is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of tonka bean with the warmth of coffee and a touch of lavender.
A fresh and citrusy spicy fragrance, A*Men Ultra Zest is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of blood orange and mandarin with the warmth of coffee and a touch of ginger.
A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Alien Man is a bold and captivating scent. It combines the freshness of dill and mint with the warmth of leather and a touch of cashmeran.
A sweet and gourmand oriental woody fragrance, Angel Men is a groundbreaking and iconic scent. It combines the sweetness of caramel and chocolate with the warmth of patchouli and a touch of coffee.
A warm and spicy oriental woody fragrance, B*Men is a bold and captivating scent. It combines the freshness of rhubarb and spices with the warmth of vetiver and a touch of amber.
A warm and spicy woody gourmand fragrance, A*Men Pure Malt is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of whiskey with the warmth of patchouli and a touch of coffee.

A warm and sensual amber woody floral fragrance, Alien is a groundbreaking and iconic scent. It is a powerful and mysterious blend of jasmine sambac, cashmeran wood, and white amber, creating a truly otherworldly aura.
A more intense and vanilla-focused version of Alien, Essence Absolue is a rich and opulent fragrance. It amplifies the vanilla and amber notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A warm and solar floral fragrance, Alien Goddess is a luminous and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of jasmine.
A more intense and vanilla-focused version of Alien Goddess, Intense is a rich and opulent fragrance. It amplifies the vanilla and amber notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.

The iconic sweet and gourmand oriental vanilla fragrance, Angel is a groundbreaking and unforgettable scent. It is a captivating and addictive blend of patchouli, praline, and red berries, creating a truly unique and otherworldly aura.
A more intense and floral version of Angel, Elixir is a rich and opulent fragrance. It amplifies the vanilla and floral notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A sweet and gourmand woody gourmand fragrance, Angel Muse is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of hazelnut cream with the warmth of vetiver and a touch of patchouli.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Angel Nova is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of raspberry and lychee with the beauty of Damask rose and a soft, woody base.
A green and woody amber fragrance, Aura is a captivating and mysterious scent. It combines the freshness of rhubarb leaf with the warmth of tiger liana and a touch of vanilla.

A fresh and fruity gourmand fragrance, Innocent is a lighter and more playful interpretation of Angel. It combines the sweetness of red berries and mandarin with the freshness of praline and a touch of musk.
A unique and controversial fruity savory fragrance, Womanity is a bold and unconventional scent. It combines the sweetness of fig with the saltiness of caviar and a touch of woody notes.

brandInfo.name: Naomi Campbell
brandInfo.description: Naomi Campbell is a British model, actress, and businesswoman. Her fragrance line is known for its glamorous, feminine, and often sweet and fruity scents that reflect her iconic supermodel status.

perfumes.description: A sweet and sophisticated floral fruity gourmand. Naomi is a modern and feminine scent with notes of guava, coffee, and a creamy vanilla base.

brandInfo.description: Narciso Rodriguez is an American fashion designer of Cuban ancestry. His fragrance line, launched in 2003, is renowned for its modern and sensual interpretation of musk. The collection, particularly the 'For Her' and 'NARCISO' lines, is celebrated for its minimalist elegance and addictive, musky character.
brandInfo.name: Narciso Rodriguez

perfumes.description: A prismatic floral fragrance that celebrates individuality. All of Me is a modern and multifaceted scent that blends fresh magnolia with a heart of rose and geranium, on a soft, musky sandalwood base.

A luminous and solar amber floral fragrance. Ambrée captures the warmth of sun-kissed skin with exotic notes of frangipani and ylang-ylang, wrapped in the signature Narciso musk and a soft, ambery base.

A modern and elegant woody spicy fragrance for men. Bleu Noir is a mysterious and seductive scent that contrasts spicy cardamom and nutmeg with a heart of musk, on a dark, woody base of cedar and ebony.
A luminous and addictive floral woody fragrance. Cristal is a radiant scent that opens with bright florals and bergamot, leading to a heart of rose and musk, on a warm, ambery base.
A vibrant and spirited floral woody musk. Fleur Musc is a bold reinterpretation of a floral bouquet, blending spicy pink pepper with lush rose and peony, all wrapped in the signature heart of musk.
The iconic and elegant floral woody musk that started it all. For Her Eau de Toilette is a modern classic, featuring a heart of Egyptian musk surrounded by soft florals and a warm, woody base.

A celebration of the 20th anniversary of the original For Her. Forever is a luminous and timeless floral musk that enhances the original with notes of frangipani and gardenia for a brighter, more solar feel.

A soft and sensual floral musk that feels like a second skin. Musc Nude is a delicate and intimate fragrance, blending white florals and pink pepper with a warm heart of musk and a creamy tonka bean base.

A softer, more romantic interpretation of the original. For Her Eau de Parfum is a beautiful floral woody musk that emphasizes the rose and peach notes, creating a warmer and more powdery version of the iconic musk.

A deep, intense, and sensual version of For Her. L'Absolu enhances the signature musk with a powerful heart of tuberose and a rich, ambery patchouli base, creating a more carnal and mysterious fragrance.
A mysterious and sensual fragrance that explores the darker side of musk. Musc Noir combines a juicy plum note with a heart of heliotrope and musk, on a soft, leathery suede base.
A more floral and luminous take on Musc Noir. This version highlights a beautiful rose note, blended with the signature musk and a warm vanilla base, creating a sensual and intimate amber floral.

A supremely elegant and seductive floral woody musk. Narciso Eau de Parfum is a modern classic that combines a creamy gardenia and rose with a heart of musk, on a clean, woody base of cedar and vetiver.
A distinctive and modern aromatic fougère. Narciso Rodriguez for Him is a unique fragrance that combines a prominent violet leaf note with a heart of musk and a warm, ambery patchouli base.

brandInfo.name: Narcotica
brandInfo.description: Narcotica is a niche perfume house that creates bold, addictive, and often gourmand fragrances. The brand is known for its high-quality, long-lasting, and unapologetically decadent scents.

perfumes.description: A rich and decadent gourmand fragrance. Dulce Diablo is a boozy and sweet blend of chocolate, apricot, and rum, with a deep, woody and patchouli base.

brandInfo.name: Nasomatto
brandInfo.description: Nasomatto is an Italian niche perfume house founded by Alessandro Gualtieri. The brand is known for its bold, unconventional, and highly concentrated fragrances, often exploring themes of addiction, intensity, and provocation. Nasomatto perfumes are designed to make a strong statement and leave a lasting impression.

perfumes.description: A green and aromatic absinthe fragrance, Absinth is a captivating and mysterious scent. It combines the bitterness of absinthe with the freshness of green notes and a touch of vetiver.
A dark and woody leather fragrance, Duro is a powerful and uncompromising scent. It combines the richness of leather with the warmth of oud and a touch of spices.
A fruity and metallic gourmand fragrance, Fantomas is a unique and provocative scent. It combines the sweetness of fruits with a strange metallic accord and a touch of rubber.
A rich and opulent white floral fragrance, Narcotic Venus is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the beauty of tuberose and jasmine with the warmth of spices and a touch of lily.
A fresh and clean floral woody musk fragrance, Nudiflorum is a delicate and intimate scent. It combines the freshness of white flowers with the softness of musk and a touch of leather.
A warm and spicy oud and chocolate fragrance, Pardon is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of oud with the sweetness of chocolate and a touch of magnolia.
A leathery and animalic fragrance, Sadonaso is a bold and provocative scent. It explores the darker side of human desires, with a blend of animalic notes, leather, and a touch of musk.
A boozy and woody amber fragrance, Baraonda is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of whiskey with the warmth of amber and a touch of rose.

A dark and smoky oud and cannabis fragrance, Black Afgano is a powerful and uncompromising scent. It is a captivating and addictive blend of cannabis, oud, and incense, creating a truly unique and provocative aura.
A woody and musky amber fragrance, Blamage is a unique and unconventional scent. It is a complex and intriguing blend of woods, musk, and a touch of leather, creating a mysterious and alluring aura.

brandInfo.name: Nikos
brandInfo.description: Nikos is a German jewelry and fashion designer. The brand's most famous fragrance, Sculpture, is known for its unique, artistic bottle and its fresh, aromatic, and slightly sweet scent.

perfumes.description: A fresh and aromatic amber fougère. Sculpture is a classic and clean scent with notes of orange blossom, bergamot, and a warm, sweet tonka bean base.

brandInfo.description: Nina Ricci is a French fashion house founded by Maria "Nina" Ricci and her son Robert in 1932. The brand's fragrance line is known for its romantic, feminine, and often whimsical scents. The iconic L'Air du Temps (1948) and the modern Nina apple-shaped bottles are hallmarks of their perfume legacy.
brandInfo.name: Nina Ricci

perfumes.description: A timeless and iconic floral fragrance that symbolizes peace and love. L'Air du Temps is a classic spicy floral, with a prominent carnation note blended with other florals and a warm, powdery base.
A sensual and musky amber floral. L'Extase is a seductive fragrance that blends a bouquet of white roses with pink pepper and a warm, ambery caramel base.
A sweet and mysterious amber vanilla fragrance. Luna is a gourmand scent that contrasts wild berries and orange blossom with a rich heart of caramel and a creamy vanilla base.
A modern fairy tale in a bottle. Nina is a bright and sparkling floral-fruity fragrance with a gourmand twist, featuring notes of candied apple, lemon, and a soft, woody base.
A more daring and gourmand version of Nina. Nina Rouge is an audacious floral fruity gourmand that blends juicy raspberry and citron with a heart of gardenia and a sweet caramel-vanilla base.
A luminous and sensual floral fragrance. Premier Jour is a delicate and intimate scent that blends fresh mandarin and sweet pea with a heart of gardenia and a soft, musky base.
A glamorous and audacious chypre floral. Ricci Ricci is a bold and modern fragrance that features a prominent rhubarb note, blended with tuberose and a deep patchouli base.

brandInfo.name: Nishane
brandInfo.description: Nishane is the first and only Istanbul-based niche perfume brand that is globally recognized. Founded by Murat Katran and Mert Güzel, the brand is known for its unique and sophisticated fragrances, often inspired by the rich cultural heritage of Istanbul. Nishane perfumes are celebrated for their high concentration, longevity, and distinctive scent profiles.

perfumes.description: A fresh and citrusy amber fragrance, Ambra Calabria is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of amber and a touch of vanilla.
A warm and spicy vanilla and ginger fragrance, Ani is a captivating and addictive scent. It is a beautiful blend of vanilla, ginger, and bergamot, creating a truly unique and comforting aura.
A fresh and aromatic aquatic fragrance, Ege is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of the Aegean Sea, with a blend of yuzu, violet leaves, and a touch of basil.
A warm and smoky tobacco and rum fragrance, Fan Your Flames is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of tobacco with the sweetness of coconut and a touch of rum.

A fresh and woody chypre fragrance, Hacivat is a tribute to elegance and artistry. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the freshness of pineapple and bergamot with the earthiness of oakmoss and a touch of woody notes.
A sweet and gourmand floral fragrance, Hundred Silent Ways is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla and tuberose with the warmth of amber and a touch of peach.
A fresh and aromatic herbal fragrance, Karagoz is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of pineapple and grape with the earthiness of patchouli and a touch of oud.
A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Kredo is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of oud with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of saffron.
A fresh and green fig fragrance, Papilefiko is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of a fig tree in the Mediterranean, with a blend of fig leaf, fig, and a touch of lavender.
A smoky and earthy vetiver fragrance, Sultan Vetiver is a powerful and sophisticated scent. It combines the richness of vetiver with the warmth of amber and a touch of spices.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Tempfluo is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of mandarin and orange blossom with the beauty of jasmine and a touch of cedarwood.
A fresh and aromatic tea fragrance, Wulong Cha is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of oolong tea, with its fresh and slightly bitter notes.

brandInfo.name: One Direction
brandInfo.description: One Direction was an English-Irish pop boy band. Their fragrance line is known for its youthful, sweet, and fruity-floral scents that appeal to their young fanbase.

perfumes.description: A sweet and playful floral fruity fragrance. Our Moment is a bright and youthful scent with notes of red currant, jasmine, and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and bright floral fruity fragrance. You & I is a modern and feminine scent with notes of mango, osmanthus, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Ormonde Jayne
brandInfo.description: Ormonde Jayne is a British niche perfume house founded by Linda Pilkington. The brand is known for its elegant, sophisticated, and often travel-inspired fragrances, with a focus on high-quality and rare ingredients.

perfumes.description: A rich and aromatic amber fougère. Montabaco is a sophisticated and powerful blend of tobacco leaf, leather, and spices, with a fresh, citrusy opening.

brandInfo.name: Orto Parisi
brandInfo.description: Orto Parisi is an artistic niche perfume project by Alessandro Gualtieri (the creator of Nasomatto). The brand explores raw, natural, and often challenging bodily scents, creating powerful, animalic, and highly conceptual fragrances.

perfumes.description: A powerful and animalic leather fragrance. Cuoium is a dark and smoky scent with notes of leather, incense, and a touch of animalic accords, creating a raw and primal experience.
An incredibly powerful and long-lasting aquatic fragrance. Megamare is a deep and salty scent that evokes the power of the ocean, with notes of seaweed, ambergris, and a touch of citrus.
A dark and earthy fragrance inspired by volcanic soil. Terroni is a smoky and woody scent with a prominent oud accord, blended with spices and a touch of sweetness.

brandInfo.name: P&G
brandInfo.description: Procter & Gamble (P&G) is a multinational consumer goods corporation. While they own and produce many famous fragrance brands, their own branded scents are typically functional fragrances for products like air fresheners and fabric softeners.

perfumes.description: A fresh and clean aquatic floral fragrance, reminiscent of a popular fabric softener. It evokes the scent of fresh laundry with notes of water lily and clean musk.
A sweet and fruity floral fragrance, often found in home and laundry products. It's a pleasant and familiar blend of berries, florals, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Paco Rabanne
brandInfo.description: Paco Rabanne is a Spanish fashion designer known for his avant-garde and futuristic designs. His fragrance line is equally bold and innovative, with iconic and highly successful scents like 1 Million, Invictus, and Lady Million that define modern perfumery.

perfumes.description: An amber woody fragrance with a gourmand twist. Black XS is a rebellious and sweet scent with notes of lemon, praline, and a deep, ambery patchouli base.
A more intense and sensual version of Black XS. L'Aphrodisiaque is a rich and leathery fragrance with notes of saffron, honey, and a deep, praline base.
The iconic scent of victory. Invictus is a fresh and sporty aquatic woody fragrance that blends the freshness of grapefruit with a marine accord and a woody, ambery base.
A fresher and more aquatic version of Invictus. Aqua is an invigorating and energetic scent that amplifies the marine and citrus notes for a truly refreshing experience.
A more intense and warmer version of Invictus. Legend is a powerful and heroic scent that blends the freshness of sea salt with the warmth of spices and a rich, ambery base.
A fresh and minty interpretation of Invictus. Platinum is an invigorating and powerful scent that combines the freshness of grapefruit and mint with a strong, aromatic lavender heart.
A warm and sensual amber fragrance. Invictus Victory is a powerful and addictive scent that contrasts the freshness of lemon with the warmth of vanilla and a smoky incense note.
The most intense version of Invictus. The Elixir is a rich and powerful amber woody fragrance with a prominent vanilla and tonka bean accord, blended with spices and incense.
A bold and luxurious leather fragrance. 1 Million Parfum is a solar and salty interpretation of the original, with notes of tuberose, monoi oil, and a prominent leather accord.
The iconic and flamboyant woody spicy fragrance. 1 Million is a bold and seductive blend of blood mandarin, cinnamon, and a rich, leathery amber base.
A richer and more intense version of 1 Million. The Elixir is a powerful and addictive amber woody fragrance with a prominent vanilla and davana accord.
A sweet and gourmand interpretation of 1 Million. Lucky is a playful and addictive scent with a prominent hazelnut and honey accord, blended with plum and woods.
A warmer and more intimate version of 1 Million. Privé is a rich and sensual amber woody fragrance with a prominent cinnamon and tobacco accord.
A fresh and spicy amber woody fragrance. 1 Million Royal is a modern and charismatic scent that blends the freshness of lavender with the warmth of cedarwood and a rich, ambery base.
A classic and timeless aromatic fougère. Paco Rabanne Pour Homme is a fresh and soapy scent with a prominent lavender and oakmoss accord, creating a clean and masculine aura.
A futuristic and modern aromatic fragrance. Phantom is a unique and addictive blend of creamy lavender, zesty lemon, and a sweet, earthy vanilla base.
A vibrant and magnetic amber spicy fragrance. Pure XS is a bold and seductive scent that contrasts the freshness of ginger and thyme with the warmth of vanilla and a boozy liqueur note.
A more intense and sensual version of Pure XS. Night is a rich and captivating amber spicy fragrance with a prominent ginseng and caramel accord.
A sweet and boozy amber vanilla fragrance. Strong Me is a bold and addictive scent with a prominent rum and vanilla accord, blended with fruity notes.
A futuristic and modern amber woody fragrance. Ultraviolet Man is a unique and fresh scent with a prominent mint and amber accord, creating a cool and vibrant aura.
A rebellious and gourmand floral fruity fragrance. Black XS for Her is a dark and sweet blend of cranberry, cacao, and vanilla, with a touch of patchouli.
A more intense and sensual version of Black XS for Her. L'Aphrodisiaque is a rich and captivating amber floral with a prominent datura and vanilla accord.
A fresh and green floral fragrance. Blossom Me is a bright and uplifting scent with notes of mint, green mandarin, and a heart of orange blossom.
A playful and tropical floral fruity fragrance. Fame is a modern and glamorous scent with a prominent mango and jasmine accord, on a creamy vanilla and sandalwood base.
The iconic and glamorous floral fruity fragrance. Lady Million is a bold and seductive blend of raspberry, neroli, and a deep, honeyed patchouli base.
A modern and powerful chypre floral. Lady Million Empire is a bold and sophisticated scent that blends the sweetness of mirabelle plum with a heart of magnolia and a boozy cognac base.
A warmer and more intimate version of Lady Million. Privé is a rich and sensual amber floral with a prominent cacao and honey accord.
A bold and luxurious floral fragrance. Lady Million Royal is a glamorous and confident scent with a prominent pomegranate and white floral accord.
A modern and divine amber floral fragrance. Olympéa is a unique and addictive scent that blends the freshness of water jasmine with a salty vanilla accord and a warm, ambery base.
A more intense and sensual version of Olympéa. The Intense version is a rich and captivating amber fragrance with a prominent salty vanilla and ambergris accord.
A green and aromatic floral fragrance. Olympéa Flora is a fresh and modern interpretation with a prominent rose and peony accord, blended with fruity black currant.
A radiant and sunny citrus aromatic fragrance. Olympéa Solar is a bright and sparkling scent that combines the freshness of orange blossom with a warm, solar tiare flower heart.
A sweet and provocative amber floral fragrance. Pure XS for Her is a unique and addictive scent with a prominent popcorn and vanilla accord, blended with ylang-ylang.
A futuristic and modern amber floral fragrance. Ultraviolet is a unique and spicy scent with a prominent violet and pepper accord, on a warm, ambery vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Paloma Picasso
brandInfo.description: Paloma Picasso is a French and Spanish fashion designer and businesswoman, best known for her jewelry designs for Tiffany & Co. and her signature perfumes. Her fragrances are known for their bold, artistic, and classic character.

perfumes.description: A classic and powerful amber fragrance for men. Minotaure is a rich and complex blend of fruits, florals, and a deep, leathery and musky base.
An iconic and bold chypre floral fragrance. Paloma Picasso is a powerful and sophisticated scent with a rich blend of florals, spices, and a deep, animalic and mossy base.

brandInfo.name: Pantheon Roma
brandInfo.description: Pantheon Roma is an Italian niche perfume house that creates artistic and narrative-driven fragrances inspired by the love story of Raphael and Margherita. The brand is known for its high-quality, potent, and often gourmand compositions.

perfumes.description: A rich and decadent gourmand fragrance. Dolce Passione is a delicious and intoxicating blend of dark chocolate, hazelnut, and truffle, with a touch of sweetness from strawberry and honey.

brandInfo.name: Parfums D'Elmar
brandInfo.description: Parfums d'Elmar is a luxury niche perfume house that creates opulent, high-concentration fragrances. The brand is known for its bold, complex, and long-lasting scents, presented in extravagant bottles.

perfumes.description: A romantic and seductive floral fruity fragrance. Elixir d'Amour is a sweet and captivating blend of raspberry, rose, and a warm, ambery vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Parfums Delrae
brandInfo.description: Parfums DelRae is an American niche perfume house founded by DelRae Roth. The brand creates artistic and high-quality fragrances inspired by French perfumery traditions and the natural beauty of Northern California.

perfumes.description: A rich and sensual woody spicy fragrance. Bois de Paradis is a warm and comforting blend of woods, spices, and a touch of fruity sweetness.

brandInfo.name: Parfums de Marly
brandInfo.description: Parfums de Marly is a French niche perfume house founded in 2009 by Julien Sprecher. The brand is inspired by the splendor of the 18th century, particularly the court of Louis XV and his love for horses and perfumery. Parfums de Marly fragrances are known for their opulent, sophisticated, and often powerful compositions, crafted with high-quality ingredients.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy vanilla and amber fragrance, Althaïr is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of cardamom.
A warm and sensual amber floral fragrance, Athalia is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the beauty of iris with the warmth of amber and a touch of orange blossom.
A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Carlisle is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of green apple with the warmth of tonka bean and a touch of saffron.
A sweet and fruity floral fragrance, Cassili is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of plum and redcurrant with the beauty of frangipani and a soft, vanilla base.
A fresh and citrusy floral fragrance, Darcy is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot and lemon with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and rosy floral fragrance, Delina is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of lychee and rhubarb with the beauty of Turkish rose and a soft, musky base.
A more intense and gourmand version of Delina, Exclusif is a rich and opulent fragrance. It amplifies the rose and vanilla notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.

A fresh and rosy floral fragrance, Delina La Rosée is a lighter and more ethereal interpretation of Delina. It combines the freshness of lychee and pear with the beauty of Turkish rose and a soft, musky base.

A leathery and woody fragrance, Godolphin is a tribute to the majestic Arabian horse. It is a powerful and sophisticated scent that combines the richness of leather with the warmth of saffron and a touch of iris.
A fresh and fruity woody fragrance, Greenley is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the crispness of green apple with the freshness of Sicilian bergamot and a touch of cedarwood.
A warm and spicy oud and saffron fragrance, Haltane is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of oud with the warmth of saffron and a touch of praline.
A warm and spicy tobacco and vanilla fragrance, Herod is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of tobacco with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of cinnamon.
A warm and spicy amber fragrance, Kalan is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of blood orange with the warmth of spices and a touch of woody notes.
A warm and spicy amber fougère, Layton is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the freshness of apple and lavender with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of cardamom.
A more intense and woody version of Layton, Exclusif is a powerful and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the woody and spicy notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Meliora is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of red berries and blackcurrant with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.

A warm and spicy leather fragrance, Nisean is a tribute to the ancient Nisean horses. It is a powerful and captivating scent that combines the richness of leather with the warmth of saffron and a touch of incense.
A warm and spicy honey and cinnamon fragrance, Oajan is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of honey with the warmth of cinnamon and a touch of vanilla.

A sweet and gourmand marshmallow and orange blossom fragrance, Oriana is a playful and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of marshmallow with the freshness of orange blossom and a touch of blackcurrant.
A fresh and almondy fougère, Pegasus is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the sweetness of almond and a warm, vanilla base.
A more intense and woody version of Pegasus, Exclusive is a powerful and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the almond and vanilla notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A fresh and aromatic citrus fragrance, Percival is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot and mandarin with the warmth of amberwood and a touch of fir balsam.
A fresh and citrusy woody fragrance, Perseus is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of grapefruit with the earthiness of vetiver and a touch of ambergris.
A warm and sensual amber floral fragrance, Safanad is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of orange blossom with the warmth of amber and a touch of iris.
A fresh and aromatic citrus fragrance, Sedley is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of mint and bergamot with the coolness of aquatic notes and a touch of ambroxan.
A fresh and clean floral woody musk fragrance, Valaya is a luminous and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of citrus with the beauty of white flowers and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Paris Corner
brandInfo.description: Paris Corner is a UAE-based perfume house known for creating affordable and high-quality fragrances that are often inspired by popular designer and niche scents.

perfumes.description: A sweet and tropical fruity gourmand. Khair Fusion is a delicious blend of lychee, black currant, and a creamy, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Paris Hilton
brandInfo.description: Paris Hilton is an American media personality, socialite, and businesswoman. Her fragrance line is known for its playful, sweet, and fruity-floral scents that reflect her glamorous and fun-loving persona.

perfumes.description: A sweet and bubbly floral fruity fragrance. Heiress is a playful and youthful scent with notes of passionfruit, champagne, and a touch of mimosa.

brandInfo.name: Pecksniff'S
brandInfo.description: Pecksniff's is a British fragrance and cosmetics brand that creates classic, high-quality, and often affordable scents for both personal and home use.

perfumes.description: A warm and sophisticated woody fragrance. Black Oak & Cedar is a classic and masculine blend of woods, spices, and a touch of citrus.
A soft and relaxing aromatic fragrance. Calm is a soothing blend of lavender, chamomile, and other gentle florals, designed to create a peaceful atmosphere.
A fresh and invigorating aromatic aquatic fragrance. Mistraal is a bright and clean scent with notes of citrus, marine accords, and a touch of spice.

brandInfo.name: Penhaligon's
brandInfo.description: Penhaligon's is a British perfumery established in 1870 by William Penhaligon. The brand is known for its rich heritage, traditional English craftsmanship, and unique, often eccentric fragrances. Penhaligon's perfumes are celebrated for their storytelling, quality ingredients, and distinctive bottle designs.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy amber floral fragrance, AlUla is a tribute to the ancient city. It is a captivating and sensual scent that combines the sweetness of plum with the warmth of saffron and a touch of vanilla.

A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Babylon is a tribute to the ancient city. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of vanilla with the spiciness of saffron and a touch of cedarwood.
A warm and spicy amber floral fragrance, Bewitching Yasmine is a captivating and seductive scent. It combines the beauty of jasmine with the warmth of oud and a touch of cardamom.

A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Cairo is a tribute to the ancient city. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of saffron and rose with the richness of oud and a touch of patchouli.
A warm and spicy gourmand fragrance, Changing Constance is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of caramel with the warmth of pimento and a touch of tobacco.
A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Clandestine Clara is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the sweetness of rum with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of cinnamon.

A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Constantinople is a tribute to the ancient city. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of vanilla with the spiciness of pink pepper and a touch of patchouli.

A warm and spicy aromatic fougère, Endymion Concentré is a more intense version of the classic Endymion. It is a captivating and sensual scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of nutmeg and a touch of leather.
A warm and spicy woody oud fragrance, Halfeti is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of oud with the warmth of saffron and a touch of rose.
A warm and spicy leather fragrance, Halfeti Leather is a more intense and sensual version of Halfeti. It amplifies the leather and oud notes, creating a deeper and more captivating scent experience.

A warm and spicy woody fragrance, Halfeti Cedar is a tribute to the precious cedarwood. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of cedarwood with the spiciness of saffron and a touch of rum.

A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Legacy of Petra is a tribute to the ancient city of Petra. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of myrrh with the spiciness of fennel and a touch of green tea.

A fresh and floral chypre fragrance, Luna is a tribute to the goddess of the moon. It is a luminous and ethereal scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the beauty of rose and a soft, musky base.

A fresh and aromatic fougère, Sartorial is a tribute to the classic British tailor. It is a clean and sophisticated scent that combines the freshness of lavender with the warmth of beeswax and a touch of leather.

A fresh and aromatic fougère, Savoy Steam is a tribute to the Turkish baths of London. It is a clean and invigorating scent that combines the freshness of rosemary and eucalyptus with the warmth of incense and a touch of rose.
A warm and spicy leather fragrance, Terrible Teddy is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of leather with the warmth of incense and a touch of ambroxan.
A warm and spicy woody fragrance, The Blazing Mr Sam is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of cardamom and cumin with the warmth of patchouli and a touch of cedarwood.

A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, The Tragedy of Lord George is a captivating and sophisticated scent. It combines the richness of brandy with the warmth of shaving soap and a touch of tonka bean.
A warm and spicy amber floral fragrance, Tralala is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of saffron with the warmth of leather and a touch of whiskey.

A fresh and floral fruity fragrance, Vaara is a tribute to the royal family of Marwar. It is a vibrant and uplifting scent that combines the sweetness of quince and rose with the freshness of coriander and a touch of honey.

A fresh and fruity chypre fragrance, Empressa is a tribute to the powerful and elegant women of the past. It is a luminous and sophisticated scent that combines the sweetness of peach and blood orange with the beauty of rose and a warm, woody base.

A powdery and floral iris fragrance, Iris Prima is a tribute to the world of ballet. It is a delicate and elegant scent that combines the beauty of iris with the warmth of leather and a touch of amber.

A fresh and spicy aromatic fragrance, Juniper Sling is a tribute to the iconic London Dry Gin. It is a crisp and invigorating scent that combines the freshness of juniper with the spiciness of black pepper and a touch of leather.

A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, The World According to Arthur is a tribute to the legendary King Arthur. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of incense with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of grapefruit.

brandInfo.name: Perfumer'S Story By Azi
brandInfo.description: The Perfumer's Story by Azzi Glasser is a British niche perfume house founded by perfumer Azzi Glasser. The brand creates artistic and character-driven fragrances, often in collaboration with artists, actors, and designers.

perfumes.description: A majestic and powerful woody fragrance. Sequoia is a rich and earthy scent that captures the essence of the giant trees, with notes of red wood, patchouli, and a touch of incense.

brandInfo.name: Phlur
brandInfo.description: Phlur is a modern American fragrance brand known for its clean, sustainable, and transparent approach to perfumery. Their scents are often minimalist, elegant, and designed to be wearable and personal.

perfumes.description: A lush and creamy green fragrance. Father Figure is a modern and sophisticated blend of fig, water lily, and sandalwood, creating a scent that is both fresh and comforting.
A soft and intimate floral woody musk. Missing Person is a delicate and comforting scent that evokes the feeling of a loved one's skin, with notes of musk, bergamot, and sandalwood.

brandInfo.name: Pierre Balmain
brandInfo.description: Pierre Balmain was a French fashion designer and founder of the Balmain fashion house. His fragrance line is known for its classic, elegant, and often bold scents that reflect the brand's post-war Parisian chic.

perfumes.description: A dark and smoky woody spicy fragrance. Carbone de Balmain is a sophisticated and masculine scent with notes of pepper, incense, and a prominent elemi and fig accord.
A modern and glamorous amber floral fragrance. Extatic is a sweet and fruity scent with notes of pear, osmanthus, and a warm, leathery base.
A richer and more opulent version of Extatic. Intense Gold is a warm and sensual amber floral with a prominent heliotrope and vanilla accord.
A modern and elegant chypre floral fragrance. Ivoire is a clean and sophisticated scent with notes of galbanum, iris, and a soft, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Pino Silvestre
brandInfo.description: Pino Silvestre is an Italian fragrance brand, famous for its iconic pine-cone-shaped bottle and its classic aromatic fougère scent. Launched in 1955, it has become a timeless and affordable staple in men's perfumery.

perfumes.description: The iconic and classic aromatic fougère. Pino Silvestre is a fresh and invigorating scent that captures the essence of a pine forest, with notes of pine, juniper, and a touch of citrus.

brandInfo.name: Prada
brandInfo.description: Prada is an Italian luxury fashion house founded in 1913 by Mario Prada. The brand is known for its sophisticated, minimalist, and often intellectual approach to fashion. Prada fragrances often reflect this aesthetic, with scents that are elegant, refined, and modern, often featuring prominent iris and amber notes.

perfumes.description: A warm and woody musk fragrance, Cargo de Nuit is a tribute to the mystery of the night. It is a captivating and sensual scent that combines the warmth of amber with the softness of musk and a touch of cedarwood.
A clean and fresh iris fragrance for men, Infusion d'Homme is a sophisticated and elegant scent. It is a beautiful blend of iris, neroli, and cedarwood, creating a feeling of pure freshness.
A spicy and floral carnation fragrance, Infusion d'Oeillet is a unique and captivating scent. It is a beautiful blend of carnation, sandalwood, and a touch of styrax.
A fresh and powdery iris and amber fragrance for men, L'Homme is a sophisticated and elegant scent. It is a beautiful blend of iris, amber, and neroli, creating a feeling of modern masculinity.
A fresh and aromatic mint fragrance for men, Luna Rossa is a vibrant and energetic scent. It is a tribute to the world of sailing, with a blend of mint, lavender, and a touch of ambroxan.
A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Luna Rossa Black is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the sweetness of coumarin with the warmth of amber and a touch of musk.
A fresh and aromatic fougère, Luna Rossa Carbon is a modern and sophisticated scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the earthiness of patchouli and a touch of ambroxan.

A warm and spicy amber fragrance, Luna Rossa Extreme is a more intense and sensual version of Luna Rossa. It amplifies the amber and vanilla notes, creating a deeper and more captivating scent experience.
A fresh and aquatic aromatic fragrance, Luna Rossa Ocean is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the coolness of marine notes and a touch of vetiver.
A fresh and spicy ginger fragrance, Luna Rossa Sport is a vibrant and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of ginger with the warmth of juniper berries and a touch of tonka bean.
A classic and elegant amber floral fragrance, Prada Amber Pour Homme is a sophisticated and timeless scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of amber and a touch of patchouli.
A sweet and gourmand caramel and musk fragrance, Candy is a captivating and addictive scent. It is a playful and sensual blend of caramel, musk, and vanilla, creating a truly irresistible aura.
A sweet and floral caramel fragrance, Candy Florale is a vibrant and joyful scent. It combines the sweetness of caramel with the beauty of peony and a touch of limoncello.
A sweet and fruity gourmand fragrance, Candy Gloss is a playful and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of cherry and blackcurrant with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of orange blossom.
A sweet and musky vanilla fragrance, Candy Kiss is a soft and comforting scent. It is a beautiful blend of vanilla, musk, and orange blossom, creating a feeling of pure tenderness.
A soft and powdery almond fragrance, Infusion d'Amande is a delicate and elegant scent. It combines the sweetness of almond with the warmth of tonka bean and a touch of musk.
A clean and powdery iris fragrance, Infusion d'Iris is a sophisticated and elegant scent. It is a beautiful blend of iris, cedarwood, and frankincense, creating a feeling of pure refinement.
A spicy and floral carnation fragrance, Infusion d'Oeillet is a unique and captivating scent. It is a beautiful blend of carnation, sandalwood, and a touch of styrax.

A fresh and floral orange blossom fragrance, Infusion de Fleur d'Oranger is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the essence of orange groves in bloom, with a blend of orange blossom, neroli, and a touch of jasmine.
A fresh and floral mimosa fragrance, Infusion de Mimosa is a delicate and elegant scent. It captures the essence of mimosa in bloom, with its soft and powdery notes.
A warm and sensual vanilla fragrance, Infusion de Vanille is a comforting and inviting scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of bergamot.
A warm and sensual amber fragrance, L'Eau Ambrée is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the warmth of amber with the freshness of citrus and a touch of patchouli.
A fresh and floral amber fragrance, Paradoxe is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of neroli with the warmth of amber and a touch of vanilla.
A more intense and amber floral fragrance, Paradoxe Intense is a captivating and addictive scent. It amplifies the vanilla and amber notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A fresh and floral amber fragrance, Paradoxe Virtual Flower is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of neroli with the warmth of amber and a touch of jasmine.
A classic and elegant amber floral fragrance, Prada Amber is a sophisticated and timeless scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of amber and a touch of patchouli.
A warm and sensual floral fragrance, Prada La Femme is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of frangipani with the warmth of beeswax and a touch of tuberose.

brandInfo.description: Profumum Roma is an Italian niche perfume house founded in Rome by the Durante family. Known for its high-concentration extraits de parfum, the brand creates evocative and powerful scents inspired by personal memories and experiences, using exceptionally high-quality raw materials to achieve remarkable longevity and sillage.
brandInfo.name: Profumum Roma

perfumes.description: A hyper-realistic aromatic aquatic fragrance that perfectly captures the scent of the sea. Acqua di Sale is a powerful blend of salt, myrtle, and cedarwood, evoking a walk along a windswept Italian coastline.
A sweet and fruity fragrance that balances sugary notes with fresh berries and orange blossom. Acqua e Zucchero is a delightful and uplifting scent that is both playful and elegant.
A powerful and evocative woody fragrance that smells like a burning fireplace. Arso is a smoky and resinous blend of pine, incense, and leather, creating a rugged and comforting atmosphere.
A delicate and angelic gourmand floral. Battito d'Ali (meaning 'flutter of wings') is a beautiful, powdery blend of myrrh, vanilla, and orange blossom, creating a soft and ethereal aura.

brandInfo.name: Ralph Lauren
brandInfo.description: Ralph Lauren is an American fashion company founded by designer Ralph Lauren. The brand is synonymous with classic American style, embodying a sophisticated, preppy, and often sporty aesthetic. Ralph Lauren fragrances reflect this heritage, offering a range of scents that are timeless, elegant, and often inspired by the outdoors and traditional American pursuits.

perfumes.description: A sweet and fruity floral fragrance, Big Pony 2 is a playful and charming scent. It combines the sweetness of cranberry with the freshness of tonka bean and a touch of floral notes.
A fresh and aquatic aromatic fougère, Polo Blue is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It captures the feeling of freedom and the open sea, with a blend of melon, cucumber, and a touch of basil.
A warm and spicy woody fragrance, Polo Red is a bold and energetic scent. It combines the freshness of red grapefruit with the warmth of red saffron and a touch of red wood.
A more intense and spicy version of Polo Red, Intense is a powerful and captivating fragrance. It amplifies the red grapefruit and coffee notes, creating a deeper and more sensual scent experience.
A fresh and aquatic aromatic fougère, Polo Sport is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It captures the feeling of an active lifestyle, with a blend of mint, lemon, and a touch of marine notes.
A fresh and rosy floral woody musk fragrance, Romance is a timeless and elegant scent. It is a beautiful blend of rose, violet, and musk, creating a feeling of pure romance.

A fresh and woody aromatic fougère, Safari is a tribute to the spirit of adventure. It is a captivating and invigorating scent that combines the freshness of bergamot and lemon with the warmth of sandalwood and a touch of vetiver.

A fresh and green floral fragrance, Safari Woman is a tribute to the spirit of adventure. It is a captivating and invigorating scent that combines the freshness of galbanum and hyacinth with the beauty of rose and a touch of sandalwood.

brandInfo.name: Ramon Monegal
brandInfo.description: Ramón Monegal is a Spanish master perfumer and the founder of his eponymous niche perfume house. The brand is known for its artistic, high-quality, and often bold fragrances that celebrate the art of perfumery.

perfumes.description: A sophisticated and elegant woody fragrance. Dry Wood is a complex and refined blend of woods, spices, and a touch of leather, creating a timeless and masculine scent.
A passionate and dramatic floral fruity fragrance. Flamenco is a rich and intoxicating blend of raspberry, rose, and a deep, woody and musky base, evoking the spirit of the dance.

brandInfo.description: Rasasi Perfumes is a family-owned business in Dubai, founded in 1979. It is one of the leading fragrance companies in the Middle East, known for creating high-quality, luxurious, and popular scents that blend traditional Arabian perfumery with modern Western influences.
brandInfo.name: Rasasi

perfumes.description: A classic and elegant floral woody musk. Arba Wardat is a harmonious blend of bright bergamot, romantic florals, and a smooth, woody musk base.
A popular and seductive amber spicy fragrance for men. Daarej is a warm and inviting blend of spices, florals, and a sweet, powdery vanilla and tonka bean base.
A sweet and charming fruity-floral gourmand for women. Daarej for Women is a delightful blend of fruits, florals, and a creamy, powdery base of vanilla and caramel.
A rich and opulent amber spicy fragrance. La Yuqawam Tobacco Blaze is a bold and sophisticated blend of sweet apricot, spices, and a deep, leathery oud base.

brandInfo.name: Repetto
brandInfo.description: Repetto is a French ballet shoe company. Its fragrance line is known for its delicate, graceful, and feminine scents that evoke the world of ballet, often with a focus on soft, powdery, and floral notes.

perfumes.description: A fresh and delicate floral fragrance. L'Eau Florale is a bright and graceful scent with notes of rose, grapefruit, and a soft, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Rihanna
brandInfo.description: Rihanna is a Barbadian singer, actress, and businesswoman. Her fragrance line is known for its bold, modern, and often sweet and fruity scents that reflect her confident and trendsetting persona.

perfumes.description: A sweet and playful floral fruity fragrance. RiRi is a bright and youthful scent with notes of passionfruit, rum, and a creamy vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Rituals
brandInfo.description: Rituals is a Dutch cosmetics brand that creates products for home and body, inspired by ancient Eastern traditions. Their fragrances are known for their calming, aromatic, and spa-like qualities.

perfumes.description: A fresh and invigorating aromatic fragrance inspired by the traditional Turkish bath. Hammam is a revitalizing blend of eucalyptus and rosemary.

brandInfo.name: Roberto Cavalli
brandInfo.description: Roberto Cavalli is an Italian fashion designer known for his flamboyant, exotic, and often animal-print inspired designs. The Roberto Cavalli fragrance line reflects this bold and glamorous aesthetic, offering scents that are sensual, opulent, and often feature rich floral and oriental notes.

perfumes.description: A fresh and spicy aromatic fougère, Black is a modern and sophisticated scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of vetiver and a touch of coriander.
A warm and spicy woody fragrance, Just Cavalli Gold for Him is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of coffee with the warmth of vetiver and a touch of cardamom.
A fresh and aromatic fougère, Just Him is a modern and sophisticated scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of vetiver and a touch of leather.
A warm and spicy oud fragrance, Tiger Oud is a powerful and captivating scent. It combines the richness of oud with the warmth of amber and a touch of rose.

A fresh and aquatic floral fragrance, Acqua is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the feeling of a refreshing sea breeze, with a blend of jasmine, lily-of-the-valley, and a touch of marine notes.
A warm and spicy oud fragrance, Divine Oud is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the richness of oud with the warmth of amber and a touch of rose.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Exotica is a vibrant and joyful scent. It captures the essence of a tropical paradise, with a blend of mango, frangipani, and a touch of sandalwood.
A fresh and floral woody musk fragrance, Just is a modern and sophisticated scent. It combines the freshness of neroli with the beauty of tiare flower and a soft, woody base.
A warm and sensual amber floral fragrance, Just Gold for Her is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of hazelnut with the warmth of amber and a touch of marshmallow.
A fresh and floral woody musk fragrance, Just Her is a modern and sophisticated scent. It combines the freshness of neroli with the beauty of tiare flower and a soft, woody base.
A warm and sensual oriental floral fragrance, Nero Assoluto is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of orchid with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of ebony wood.

A fresh and citrusy floral woody musk fragrance, Paradiso is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the feeling of a Mediterranean paradise, with a blend of citrus, jasmine, and a touch of cypress.
A fresh and floral green fragrance, Serpentine is a captivating and exotic scent. It combines the freshness of mango and tiare flower with the warmth of amber and a touch of sandalwood.
A warm and gourmand vanilla fragrance, Splendid Vanilla is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of oud.

brandInfo.name: Roccobarocco
brandInfo.description: Roccobarocco is an Italian fashion designer. His fragrance line is known for its classic, elegant, and often bold scents that reflect a glamorous Italian style.

perfumes.description: A classic and opulent floral aldehyde fragrance. Roccobarocco is a rich and sophisticated blend of florals, spices, and a deep, mossy base.

brandInfo.name: Rochas
brandInfo.description: Rochas is a French fashion house founded by Marcel Rochas. The brand's fragrance line is known for its classic, elegant, and often romantic scents, such as the iconic Femme and the modern gourmand Rochas Man.

perfumes.description: A unique and pioneering gourmand fragrance for men. Rochas Man is a comforting and sensual blend of coffee, lavender, and vanilla.
A fresh and sensual floral aquatic fragrance. Aquawoman is a bright and tropical scent with notes of sea water, rose, and a touch of mango.
A playful and elegant floral fruity fragrance. Mademoiselle Rochas is a sweet and romantic scent with notes of candied apple, rose, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Roger & Gallet
brandInfo.description: Roger & Gallet is a French perfume house founded in 1862. The brand is known for its classic, high-quality, and often nature-inspired fragrances, soaps, and body products, with a focus on fresh and elegant compositions.

perfumes.description: A fresh and fruity aromatic fragrance. Fleur de Figuier is a bright and joyful scent that captures the essence of a fig tree, with notes of fig, grapefruit, and a touch of musk.
A fresh and delicate floral fragrance. Rose is a romantic and elegant scent with a prominent rose accord, blended with peony and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Roja Parfums
brandInfo.description: Roja Parfums is a British luxury perfume house founded by master perfumer Roja Dove. The brand is renowned for its exquisite, opulent, and highly concentrated fragrances, crafted with the finest and rarest ingredients. Roja Parfums are celebrated for their complexity, longevity, and exceptional quality, embodying the pinnacle of haute perfumery.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy amber and oud fragrance, Amber Aoud is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of oud with the warmth of amber and a touch of rose.
A fresh and woody chypre fragrance, Apex is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot and lemon with the earthiness of oakmoss and a touch of leather.

A warm and spicy amber floral fragrance, Britannia is a tribute to the British Empire. It is a rich and opulent scent that combines the sweetness of peach and bergamot with the beauty of rose and a warm, amber base.

A fresh and woody aromatic fragrance, Burlington is a tribute to the elegance of Burlington Arcade. It is a clean and sophisticated scent that combines the freshness of lemon and mint with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of leather.
A warm and spicy amber fougère, Danger Pour Homme is a captivating and seductive scent. It combines the freshness of lemon and lavender with the warmth of amber and a touch of cumin.

A rich and opulent chypre oriental fragrance, Diaghilev is a tribute to the legendary impresario. It is a complex and captivating scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the warmth of amber and a touch of civet.

A fresh and citrusy aromatic fougère, Elysium Pour Homme Eau Intense is a more intense and vibrant version of Elysium. It amplifies the citrus and vetiver notes, creating a deeper and more invigorating scent experience.
A warm and spicy amber oriental fragrance, Enigma is a captivating and mysterious scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the warmth of amber and a touch of cognac.

A warm and spicy leather fragrance, Great Britain is a tribute to the rich heritage of Great Britain. It is a powerful and sophisticated scent that combines the richness of leather with the warmth of amber and a touch of rose.

A fresh and citrusy aromatic fragrance, Isola Blu is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It captures the feeling of a sunny day on a Mediterranean island, with a blend of lemon, bergamot, and a touch of jasmine.

A warm and spicy amber woody fragrance, Manhattan is a tribute to the vibrant city of New York. It is a rich and captivating scent that combines the warmth of tobacco with the sweetness of vanilla and a touch of ginger.
A warm and sensual musk and oud fragrance, Musk Aoud is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the richness of oud with the softness of musk and a touch of rose.
A fresh and citrusy aromatic fougère, Oligarch is a vibrant and invigorating scent. It combines the freshness of lemon and bergamot with the warmth of juniper berries and a touch of pink pepper.
A rich and opulent chypre floral fragrance, Risqué Pour Femme is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot with the beauty of rose and a warm, civet base.
A sweet and gourmand floral fragrance, Ti Amo is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of vanilla with the beauty of rose and a touch of ginger.

A fresh and citrusy aromatic fougère, Elysium Pour Homme Parfum is a powerful and captivating scent. It combines the freshness of grapefruit and lemon with the earthiness of vetiver and a touch of juniper berries.
A soft and powdery floral fragrance, A Goodnight Kiss is a delicate and intimate scent. It combines the sweetness of rose with the softness of musk and a touch of iris.
A sweet and gourmand oud fragrance, Sweetie Aoud is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of honey with the richness of oud and a touch of rose.

brandInfo.name: Romane
brandInfo.description: Romane is a fragrance brand known for creating accessible and popular scents, often with a focus on fresh, aromatic, and masculine compositions.

perfumes.description: A fresh and invigorating aromatic aquatic fragrance. Royal Blue is a clean and masculine scent with notes of citrus, sea salt, and a woody base.

brandInfo.description: Rémy Latour is a French perfume brand, most famous for its iconic 1996 release, 'Cigar'. The brand focuses on creating affordable yet distinctive fragrances, often with a masculine and aromatic profile.
brandInfo.name: Rémy Latour

perfumes.description: An iconic aromatic fruity fragrance for men. Cigar is a sweet and spicy blend of fruits, tobacco, and woods, known for its strong and distinctive character.

brandInfo.name: S.T.Dupont
brandInfo.description: S.T. Dupont is a French luxury goods company. Its fragrance line is known for its elegant, sophisticated, and often classic scents that reflect the brand's heritage of fine craftsmanship.

perfumes.description: A rich and opulent amber woody fragrance. Oud Oriental is a powerful and sophisticated blend of oud, leather, and spices, creating a classic and luxurious scent.

brandInfo.description: The fragrance line inspired by the surrealist artist Salvador Dalí. Launched in 1983, the perfumes are known for their artistic and often unconventional bottle designs, many of which are based on Dalí's paintings. The scents themselves range from classic chypres to modern fruity-florals.
brandInfo.name: Salvador Dali

perfumes.description: A rich and warm amber vanilla fragrance. Dalimania is a sweet and fruity blend of peach and coconut with a deep, creamy vanilla and sandalwood base.
A soft and romantic fruity-floral fragrance. Dalissime is a delicate and powdery blend of peach, apricot, and florals on a warm, musky base.
A tropical and refreshing floral fruity fragrance. Laguna evokes a sunny beach with notes of pineapple, coconut, and lemon, blended with florals and a creamy sandalwood base.
The first fragrance from the house, a classic and opulent floral chypre. Salvador Dali is a bold and artistic blend of aldehydes, rich florals, and a deep, mossy, and resinous base.
