brandInfo.description: Salvatore Ferragamo is an Italian luxury goods company, with headquarters in Florence, Italy. Initially known for footwear, the brand's fragrance line reflects its commitment to Italian elegance and craftsmanship, offering a range of sophisticated and timeless scents.
brandInfo.name: Salvatore Ferragamo

perfumes.description: A modern and vibrant amber floral. Amo Ferragamo is a unique gourmand fragrance that blends black currant and Campari with a heart of jasmine and a creamy vanilla base.
A sophisticated and powdery floral chypre. Emozione is an elegant and feminine fragrance that blends bergamot and peach with a heart of rose and iris, on a soft, leathery suede base.
A classic and fresh woody floral musk for men. F by Ferragamo Pour Homme is a crisp and elegant blend of lavender and apple with a spicy black pepper heart and a warm, ambery base.
A chic and playful floral fruity gourmand. Signorina is a fresh and spicy fragrance that blends pink pepper and red currant with a heart of jasmine and a creamy panna cotta base.
A daring and mysterious amber floral. Signorina Misteriosa is a sweet and gourmand fragrance that blends wild blackberry with a heart of orange blossom and a creamy black vanilla mousse base.
A bright and powdery floral fragrance from the Tuscan Scent collection. White Mimosa is a delicate and elegant blend of mimosa and ambrette with a soft, musky iris base.
A bright and powdery floral fragrance from the Tuscan Scent collection. White Mimosa is a delicate and elegant blend of mimosa and ambrette with a soft, musky iris base.

brandInfo.name: Sarah Jessica Parker
brandInfo.description: Sarah Jessica Parker is an American actress and producer. Her fragrance line, particularly the iconic Lovely, is known for its modern, elegant, and sophisticated scents that blend classic femininity with a contemporary twist.

perfumes.description: A modern and elegant floral woody musk. Lovely is a soft and sophisticated scent with notes of lavender, martini, and a prominent, clean musk accord.

brandInfo.name: Scent Salim
brandInfo.description: Scent Salim is a UK-based niche perfume house that creates high-quality fragrances inspired by traditional Arabian perfumery, with a focus on rich, opulent, and long-lasting scents.

perfumes.description: A clean and sensual floral woody musk. Moroccan Musk is a soft and intimate scent with a prominent white musk accord, blended with delicate florals and a touch of sweetness.

brandInfo.name: Sephora
brandInfo.description: Sephora is a French multinational retailer of personal care and beauty products. Their own brand of fragrances often includes simple, accessible, and popular scents like fresh cotton.

perfumes.description: A clean and comforting floral woody musk. Fleur de Coton is a soft and powdery scent that evokes the feeling of fresh laundry, with notes of cotton flower, violet, and musk.

brandInfo.description: Serge Lutens is a French artist, photographer, filmmaker, and perfume designer. His eponymous fragrance line is known for its artistic, poetic, and often unconventional compositions. The scents are rich, complex, and narrative-driven, frequently exploring oriental and spicy themes.
brandInfo.name: Serge Lutens

perfumes.description: An iconic and powerful amber fragrance. Ambre Sultan is a rich, resinous, and spicy scent that evokes a traditional Arabian souk, with a dry, herbal, and almost savory character.
A legendary fragrance named after a dry, hot wind in Morocco. Chergui is a warm and enveloping blend of honeyed tobacco, hay, and amber, creating a sweet, spicy, and unforgettable scent.
A sophisticated and comforting fragrance inspired by English afternoon tea. It's a warm and spicy blend of candied ginger, tea, and cinnamon with a woody, honeyed base.
A contemplative and pure fragrance exploring the duality of good and evil. La Religieuse ('The Nun') is a clean, almost stark blend of jasmine and incense with a soft, animalic musk.
A bright and cheerful white floral fragrance. Nuit de Cellophane is a luminous and fruity blend of osmanthus, jasmine, and mandarin, creating a joyful and elegant scent.
A dark and woody take on vanilla. Un Bois Vanille is a sophisticated gourmand that blends smoky vanilla with coconut milk, licorice, and precious woods.

brandInfo.name: Serge Lutens
brandInfo.description: Serge Lutens is a French artist, photographer, filmmaker, and perfume designer. His eponymous fragrance line is known for its artistic, poetic, and often unconventional compositions. The scents are rich, complex, and narrative-driven, frequently exploring oriental and spicy themes.

perfumes.description: A unique and comforting gourmand fragrance. Jeux de Peau is a nostalgic and artistic scent that evokes the smell of a warm bakery, with notes of wheat, milk, and a touch of licorice.

brandInfo.name: Shaik
brandInfo.description: Shaik is a luxury fragrance brand from Bahrain that creates opulent and majestic scents inspired by the romance and mystery of the Arabian desert. The brand is known for its high-quality ingredients and beautifully designed bottles.

perfumes.description: A rich and opulent amber floral fragrance. Opulent Shaik Classic No 33 is a majestic and complex blend of florals, spices, and a deep, powdery and musky base.

brandInfo.name: Shirley May
brandInfo.description: Shirley May is a brand known for producing affordable fragrances that are often inspired by popular designer scents, offering a wide range of options for everyday use.

perfumes.description: A classic and clean floral woody musk. Shirley May is a soft and feminine scent with a prominent white floral accord and a gentle, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Shiseido
brandInfo.description: Shiseido is a Japanese multinational personal care company. Its fragrance line is known for its elegant, sophisticated, and often minimalist scents that reflect a modern Japanese aesthetic.

perfumes.description: A delicate and radiant white floral fragrance. Ever Bloom is a soft and feminine scent with notes of lotus, gardenia, and a clean, musky base.
A modern and vibrant floral fragrance. Ginza is a sophisticated and feminine scent with notes of pomegranate, orchid, and a deep, woody base.
A bright and elegant chypre floral fragrance. Zen is a fresh and uplifting scent with notes of pineapple, grapefruit, and a deep, patchouli and incense base.

brandInfo.name: Shulton Company
brandInfo.description: Shulton Company was the original creator of the iconic Old Spice fragrance. Though the brand is now owned by Procter & Gamble, its legacy is defined by this timeless and classic men's scent.

perfumes.description: The iconic and timeless amber spicy fragrance for men. Old Spice is a classic and comforting blend of spices, carnation, and a warm, powdery base.

brandInfo.name: Siordia
brandInfo.description: Siordia is a niche perfume house that creates artistic and evocative fragrances, often with a focus on unique and high-quality ingredients.

perfumes.description: A dark and mysterious amber woody fragrance. Night Horse is a powerful and seductive blend of coffee, tobacco, and a deep, woody and animalic base.

brandInfo.name: Sisley
brandInfo.description: Sisley is a French luxury cosmetics, skin care, and perfume company. Its fragrance line is known for its high-quality, elegant, and often classic chypre compositions, such as the iconic Eau du Soir.

perfumes.description: An iconic and elegant chypre floral fragrance. Eau du Soir is a rich and sophisticated blend of florals, spices, and a deep, mossy base, creating a timeless and luxurious scent.
A fresh and exotic chypre floral fragrance. Eau Tropicale is a bright and vibrant scent with notes of passionfruit, hibiscus, and a deep, patchouli base.
A modern and radiant floral aldehyde fragrance. Izia is a bright and elegant scent with a prominent rose accord, blended with aldehydes and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Snif
brandInfo.description: Snif is a modern fragrance brand that offers a direct-to-consumer, try-before-you-buy model. The brand is known for its genderless, high-quality, and often unconventional scents.

perfumes.description: An avant-garde and industrial fragrance. Dead Dinosaur is a bold and smoky scent with notes of gasoline, leather, and burnt rubber, creating a unique and provocative experience.

brandInfo.name: SoOud
brandInfo.description: SoOud is a niche perfume house that creates fragrances inspired by the sensuality and mystery of the Middle East, presented with a contemporary French touch. The brand is known for its rich, opulent, and often poetic scents.

perfumes.description: A luminous and elegant amber floral fragrance. Nur, meaning 'light', is a sophisticated and radiant blend of chamomile, fruits, and a deep, ambery and resinous base.

brandInfo.name: Sofia Vergara
brandInfo.description: Sofía Vergara is a Colombian and American actress and model. Her fragrance line is known for its glamorous, feminine, and often fruity-floral scents that reflect her vibrant and sensual personality.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual amber gourmand. Love is a rich and comforting blend of coffee, vanilla, and florals, creating a sophisticated and addictive scent.

brandInfo.description: Sol de Janeiro is a Brazilian-inspired beauty brand famous for its body care products and fragrances. Their scents, particularly the 'Cheirosa' line, are designed to capture the joyful and vibrant spirit of Brazil, featuring warm, sunny, and often gourmand notes like pistachio, salted caramel, and vanilla.
brandInfo.name: Sol De Janeiro

perfumes.description: The iconic scent of Brazil. A warm and sunny gourmand fragrance that blends delicious notes of pistachio and almond with salted caramel and vanilla, evoking a perfect day on a Brazilian beach.
A vibrant and juicy fruity gourmand. Carioca Crush is a tropical explosion of pear, pink pepper, and lychee, creating a fun and energetic scent.
A warm and uplifting amber floral. Cheirosa '59 is a comforting blend of vanilla orchid and sugared violet, wrapped in sheer sandalwood for a cozy and enveloping feel.
A fruity and floral fragrance that is bright and unexpected. Cheirosa '68 blends Brazilian jasmine and pink dragonfruit with sheer vanilla for a fresh and vibrant scent.
A warm and decadent gourmand fragrance. Cheirosa '71 is a delicious blend of caramelized vanilla, toasted macadamia nut, and a hint of sea salt, creating a cozy and comforting scent.
A warm and sunny floral fragrance. Summer é Amor is a romantic blend of creamy almond, orange flower, and a base of brown sugar and woods, evoking a summer romance.

brandInfo.name: Sommens
brandInfo.description: Somens is a niche perfume house that creates fragrances inspired by different cultures and stories from around the world, with a focus on high-quality ingredients and artistic expression.

perfumes.description: A rich and boozy amber woody fragrance. Capriccio is a warm and intoxicating blend of coffee, rum, and oud, with a touch of sweetness.

brandInfo.name: Sonia Rykiel
brandInfo.description: Sonia Rykiel was a French fashion designer and writer. Her fragrance line is known for its bold, unconventional, and often sensual scents that reflect her free-spirited and artistic persona.

perfumes.description: A classic and opulent amber fragrance. Le Parfum is a rich and complex blend of florals, spices, and a deep, resinous and woody base.

brandInfo.name: Sospiro
brandInfo.description: Sospiro Perfumes is a luxury fragrance house, originally launched by Sergio Momo (founder of Xerjoff), that creates scents inspired by classical music and opera. The brand is known for its opulent, high-quality, and often dramatic compositions.

perfumes.description: A sweet and playful gourmand fragrance. Maraschino is a delicious and juicy blend of cherry, almond, and vanilla, creating a scent that is both fun and sophisticated.
A delicious and creamy gourmand fragrance. Pasticcio is a sweet and comforting blend of vanilla, caramel, and milky notes, creating a scent that smells like a fine Italian pastry.
A sophisticated and elegant chypre floral fragrance. Accento is a bright and modern scent with notes of pineapple, hyacinth, and a deep, musky base.
A powerful and long-lasting floral fruity fragrance. Erba Pura is a vibrant and sweet blend of citrus, tropical fruits, and a strong, musky amber base.

brandInfo.name: Stéphane Humbert Lucas 777
brandInfo.description: Stéphane Humbert Lucas 777 is a French niche perfume house that creates luxurious and artistic fragrances inspired by travel, spirituality, and the Middle East. The brand is known for its high-quality ingredients and opulent, complex scents.

perfumes.description: A vibrant and tropical fruity aromatic fragrance. God of Fire is a powerful and exotic blend of mango, ginger, and woods, creating a scent that is both fresh and sensual.

brandInfo.name: Swarovski
brandInfo.description: Swarovski is an Austrian producer of glass headquartered in Wattens, Austria. While primarily known for its crystal products, the brand has also released fragrances, often in beautifully designed bottles, that reflect a sense of glamour and sparkle.

perfumes.description: A richer and more intense version of Aura. Aura Intense is a warm and sensual amber floral with a prominent litchi and rose accord, on a deep, resinous base.

brandInfo.description: Swiss Arabian is a prominent UAE-based perfume manufacturer, one of the first in the region. The brand is known for its wide range of fragrances that blend traditional Arabian perfumery with modern sensibilities, offering everything from rich ouds and attars to contemporary Western-style scents.
brandInfo.name: Swiss Arabian

perfumes.description: A vibrant and fruity floral fragrance. Al Amaken is a sweet and tropical blend of passionfruit and black currant with a heart of rose and a warm, musky base.
A warm and inviting woody spicy fragrance. Habeitak is a rich blend of spices, florals, and a deep, ambery wood base, creating a sensual and comforting scent.
An opulent and spicy oriental fragrance. Kashkha is a complex blend of fruity and spicy top notes with a rich heart of oud and a warm, ambery base.
A sweet and radiant fruity-floral fragrance. Noora, meaning 'divine light', is a bright blend of orange and honey with a heart of florals and a warm, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Swiss Army
brandInfo.description: Victorinox Swiss Army is a knife manufacturer and luxury watchmaker based in Switzerland. Its fragrance line is known for its fresh, clean, and often aromatic scents that evoke the crispness of the Swiss Alps.

perfumes.description: A classic and fresh woody aromatic fragrance for men. Swiss Army is a clean and invigorating scent with notes of mint, lavender, and a crisp, woody base.

brandInfo.name: Tauer Perfumes
brandInfo.description: Tauer Perfumes is a Swiss independent perfume house founded by perfumer Andy Tauer. The brand is known for its artistic, high-quality, and often bold and powerful fragrances, with a signature 'Tauerade' base.

perfumes.description: A richer and deeper interpretation of L'Air du Désert Marocain. Au Coeur du Désert is a warm and spicy amber fragrance that captures the heart of the desert, with a powerful blend of spices, woods, and amber.

brandInfo.name: Ted Lapidus
brandInfo.description: Ted Lapidus was a French fashion designer. His fragrance line is known for its classic, powerful, and often affordable masculine scents, such as the iconic Lapidus Pour Homme.

perfumes.description: A classic and powerful amber fragrance for men. Ted Lapidus Pour Homme is a bold and sweet scent with notes of pineapple, honey, and a deep, mossy and tobacco base.

brandInfo.name: Thameen
brandInfo.description: Thameen is a British luxury niche perfume house inspired by the world's most precious jewels. The brand creates opulent, high-quality, and long-lasting fragrances that celebrate the art of perfumery.

perfumes.description: A sophisticated and modern amber woody fragrance. Carved Oud is a smooth and elegant blend of oud, cedarwood, and a touch of patchouli, creating a refined and versatile scent.
A luscious and sensual amber floral fragrance. Peregrina is a rich and intoxicating blend of white flowers, vanilla, and a deep, ambery base.

brandInfo.name: The Body Shop
brandInfo.description: The Body Shop is a British cosmetics, skin care and perfume company founded by Anita Roddick. The company is known for its focus on natural ingredients, ethical sourcing, and cruelty-free products. Their fragrances are often simple, clean, and inspired by nature, with their White Musk being an iconic scent.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy fragrance that combines the sensuality of musk with the richness of oud. Red Musk Oud is a captivating and mysterious scent with a touch of tobacco and spices.
A dark and sensual fragrance, Black Musk is a captivating and addictive scent. It combines the sweetness of pear and licorice with the warmth of musk and a touch of vanilla.

A more floral and intense interpretation of Black Musk, Night Bloom is a captivating and mysterious fragrance. It combines the sweetness of pineapple with the beauty of night-blooming flowers and a warm, musky base.

The iconic fragrance from The Body Shop, White Musk is a soft and clean scent that is both comforting and sensual. It is a beautiful blend of musk, lily, and iris, creating a timeless and elegant aura.
A lighter and fresher interpretation of the classic White Musk, L'Eau is a delicate and uplifting fragrance. It combines the softness of musk with the sweetness of pear and a touch of greenness.

brandInfo.name: The Merchant Of Venice
brandInfo.description: The Merchant of Venice is an Italian niche perfume house that creates fragrances inspired by the ancient art of perfumery in Venice and its trade routes. The brand is known for its high-quality, artistic, and often opulent scents.

perfumes.description: A warm and spicy amber fragrance. Arabesque is a rich and comforting blend of tobacco, plum, and spices, with a sweet, tonka bean base.

brandInfo.name: The Spirit Of Dubai
brandInfo.description: The Spirit of Dubai is a luxury fragrance house from the UAE that creates opulent and complex scents inspired by the city of Dubai. The brand is known for its high-quality ingredients and extravagant presentations.

perfumes.description: A rich and complex amber spicy fragrance. Turath, meaning 'heritage', is an opulent blend of fruits, spices, and a deep, smoky and woody base.

brandInfo.name: The White Company
brandInfo.description: The White Company is a British retailer of linens, home decor, and clothing, primarily in white. Their fragrance line is known for its clean, elegant, and comforting scents that create a serene and luxurious atmosphere.

perfumes.description: A soft and cozy floral woody musk. Cashmere Blanc is a comforting and elegant scent with notes of cashmere wood, vanilla, and a touch of citrus.
A dark and sensual floral fragrance. Noir is a mysterious and elegant blend of amber, mandarin, and sandalwood.

brandInfo.name: Thomas Kosmala
brandInfo.description: Thomas Kosmala is a niche perfume house founded by the eponymous perfumer. The brand is known for its modern, minimalist, and often powerful fragrances that play with synthetic molecules, particularly ambroxan.

perfumes.description: A modern and sensual woody aromatic fragrance. Après l'Amour is a bright and airy scent with notes of bitter orange, lemon zest, and a prominent, clean musk and ambroxan base.

brandInfo.name: Tiffany & Co
brandInfo.description: Tiffany & Co. is an American luxury jewelry and specialty retailer. Its fragrance line is known for its elegant, sophisticated, and often sparkling scents that reflect the brand's timeless and iconic status, with a focus on the noble iris note.

perfumes.description: A brighter and more luminous interpretation of the signature fragrance. Sheer is a fresh and elegant floral with notes of black currant, ylang-ylang, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.description: Tiziana Terenzi is an Italian niche perfume house founded by siblings Tiziana and Paolo Terenzi. The brand is known for its highly concentrated extraits de parfum, often inspired by fire, travel, and intense emotions. Their fragrances are characterized by their power, complexity, and use of high-quality raw materials.
brandInfo.name: Tiziana Terenzi

perfumes.description: A bright and fruity floral fragrance. Andromeda is a powerful and long-lasting scent that blends fresh bergamot and passionfruit with a heart of florals and a warm, woody base.
A clean and powdery citrus musk. Bianco Puro is a bright and ethereal fragrance that blends fresh citrus with a heart of spices and lavender, on a soft, musky vanilla base.
A spicy and animalic fougère. Burdel is a bold and provocative fragrance that blends spices and citrus with a heart of lily-of-the-valley and a deep, musky and animalic base.
A seductive and elegant amber woody fragrance. Casanova is a powdery and leathery scent that blends fig leaf and florals with a deep, ambery and musky base.
A sweet and tropical chypre fruity fragrance. Cassiopea is a vibrant and joyful blend of passionfruit and lemon with a floral heart and a creamy, musky base.
A soft and powdery amber fragrance. Draco is a creamy and musky blend of fruits and florals with a warm, vanilla and tonka bean base.
An immensely popular and powerful chypre fruity fragrance. Kirke is an explosion of sweet fruits, particularly passionfruit, on a strong and long-lasting musky base.
A fresh and woody fragrance with a fruity twist. Orion is often compared to Creed Aventus for its blend of pineapple and bergamot with a smoky, woody base of birch and oud.

brandInfo.description: Tom Ford is an American luxury fashion house founded by designer Tom Ford in 2005. Initially known for menswear, accessories, and eyewear, the brand expanded into beauty with the launch of Tom Ford Beauty. Its fragrance line, particularly the 'Private Blend' collection, is celebrated for its opulent, bold, and often unisex compositions that use high-quality ingredients to create distinctive and memorable scents.
brandInfo.name: Tom Ford

perfumes.description: A rich, resinous, and deeply sensual amber fragrance. Amber Absolute is a powerful and straightforward composition built around a high concentration of pure amber, enhanced with incense and vanilla for a warm, smoky, and almost spiritual experience.
A rare and discontinued fragrance known for its unique blend of leather, rum, and warm spices. Amber Intrigue is a sophisticated and mysterious scent that creates a captivating and alluring aura.

A rich and exotic woody fragrance that evokes the mystique of the Middle East. Arabian Wood combines precious woods, florals, and spices to create a scent that is both traditional and modern, with a powerful and elegant character.

A classic and impeccably tailored aromatic fougère. Beau de Jour embodies the perfectly groomed gentleman, with a commanding presence of lavender, supported by a green, earthy, and ambery base. It's clean, sharp, and timelessly masculine.

An explicitly sweet and dangerously voluptuous fragrance. Bitter Peach captures the scent of ripe, juicy peach dripping with nectar, warmed by cardamom and a boozy cognac and rum accord. It's a rich, seductive, and sweet amber scent.

A luxurious and sensual fragrance of rich, dark accords and an alluring potion of black orchids and spice. Black Orchid is modern and timeless. It is a long-lasting and with a widespread aura, making it a memorable and iconic scent.

An intensified, more luxurious version of the original. Black Orchid Parfum amplifies the hypnotic black orchid and ylang-ylang with the addition of rich rum absolute. The result is a more potent, seductive, and opulent fragrance experience.

A sophisticated and somewhat melancholic floral chypre. Black Violet is a dark, earthy, and powdery fragrance that combines the deep aroma of black violet with citrus and woody notes, creating a scent that is both elegant and mysterious.

A sensual and captivating floral chypre. Café Rose captures the untamed sensuality of a refined rose infused with the unexpected twist of dark coffee. Saffron and black pepper add a spicy warmth, while the base of incense and amber provides depth.

A seductive and fiery take on cherry. Cherry Smoke opens with the scent of dark cherry, ignited by osmanthus and smoldering smoked woods. It's a hedonistic fragrance that is both sweet and smoky, capturing a more mysterious side of the fruit.

A fresher, more aquatic interpretation of Costa Azzurra. This version captures the exhilarating sea air and sparkling water of the Mediterranean, blending crisp citrus and pine with a salty, mineralic driftwood accord. It's bright, invigorating, and clean.

An evocative and aromatic woody fragrance that captures the easy sensuality of a Mediterranean escape. Costa Azzurra blends the salty air of the coast with the aromatic scent of the macchia—a mix of cypress, oak, and aromatic herbs.

A meditative and spiritual amber woody fragrance. Ébène Fumé combines the ancient essence of Palo Santo wood with smoky African ebony wood, creating a scent that is grounding, calming, and transcendent. Notes of incense, black pepper, and leather add to its mystical aura.

A playful and flirtatious fragrance that combines the tartness of Morello cherry with the warmth of musk and jasmine. Electric Cherry is effervescent and tantalizing, capturing a moment of playful seduction with a vibrant, fruity-floral character.

A bold and masculine re-invention of the classic fougère. Fougère d'Argent is a sophisticated blend of lavender and mandarin with a warm, spicy heart of ginger and akigalawood, creating a scent that is both classic and audaciously modern.

An explicit, exclusive, and fabulous fragrance with a decadent leather grip. Fucking Fabulous is a bold and iconic scent that blends clary sage and lavender with bitter almond, vanilla, and rich leather. It's a statement-making fragrance for those who dare.

A sophisticated and elegant woody fragrance centered around vetiver. Grey Vetiver is a masterful blend of sun-drenched citrus, refined spices, and prized woods, creating a scent of impeccable tailoring and charismatic masculinity.

A classic and aromatic woody chypre fragrance. Italian Cypress evokes the timeless landscape of the Italian countryside with its crisp citrus, fresh basil, and a deep, resinous cypress and wood accord. It is elegant, refined, and distinctly Italian.

A dark, smoky, and mysterious fragrance from the original Private Blend collection. Japon Noir is a complex and challenging scent, blending notes of leather, patchouli, amber, and a prominent, almost incense-like jasmine. It's a bold and artistic creation.

A voluptuous, spiced-floral fragrance. Jasmin Rouge is a bold and hedonistic blend of precious sambac jasmine sepals absolute with dusky clary sage and rich spices. It unveils a new facet of jasmine's erotic decadence.

A beautiful and elegant white floral musk. Jasmine Musk combines the intoxicating aroma of jasmine with ylang-ylang, vanilla, and soft musk. It's a sophisticated and sensual fragrance that is both clean and deeply alluring.

An electrifying and unconventional take on lavender. Lavender Extrême pushes the classic note to its limits, blending two types of French lavender with a zesty Italian lemon and a warm, tonka bean base. It's aromatic, fresh, and surprisingly gourmand.

A tribute to the city of London, this fragrance is a rich and spicy woody scent. It captures the city's unique blend of aristocratic elegance and urban edge with notes of spices, precious woods, and oud. It's a sophisticated and complex fragrance.

A luscious, tempting, and insatiable gourmand fragrance. Lost Cherry features a candy-like gleam of exotic black cherry and liqueur, touched with teasing almond. It's a full-bodied journey into the once-forbidden; a contrasting scent that reveals a tempting dichotomy of playful, candy-like gleam on the outside and luscious flesh on the inside.

A sparkling and effervescent citrus aromatic fragrance that captures the idyllic cliffside villas of the Amalfi Coast. Mandarino di Amalfi blends bright mandarin and lemon with fresh basil and a hint of night-blooming flowers and musk.

A unique and captivating floral aldehyde fragrance. Metallique shimmers with a metallic sheen of crisp aldehydes, enveloping a heart of white flowers like hawthorn and lily-of-the-valley, all resting on a soft, vanilla and sandalwood base.

A vibrant and sparkling citrus aromatic fragrance that captures the cool breezes, sparkling clear water, and lush foliage of the Italian Riviera. Neroli Portofino is a modern interpretation of a classic eau de cologne, blending crisp citrus oils with floral notes and an amber base.

A fresher, more sparkling expression of Neroli Portofino. Acqua is an irresistibly light and effervescent fragrance that captures the crystalline waters of the Mediterranean. It's a brighter, more casual take on the original, perfect for a sun-drenched day.

A bold and intensified version of Neroli Portofino. Forte deepens the citrus and floral heart with the addition of rich leather and a double concentration of the floral core, creating a more opulent and long-lasting experience of the Italian Riviera.

An oriental, sensual fragrance that captures the dual facets of the Tom Ford man; the refined, urbane sophisticate who the world gets to see and the intriguingly private, sensual man they don't. It's a powdery and spicy scent with a warm, resinous heart.

A dark and provocative chypre fragrance that reflects the light in the dark. Noir Anthracite is a powerful and spicy scent with a prominent Sichuan pepper note, blended with rich woods and a mineralic, almost industrial feel.

A dark, sensual, and rich chypre fragrance. Noir de Noir is a dramatic and opulent scent that blends dark rose and black truffle with vanilla, patchouli, and oud wood. It's a gothic, earthy, and intensely romantic perfume.

An amber-drenched, woody oriental fragrance with a tantalizing and delectable heart. Noir Extreme reveals a new dimension of the Noir man. It's a charismatic and sophisticated scent with a prominent kulfi dessert accord, blended with spices and warm woods.

An intensified and richer version of Noir Extreme. The Parfum concentration heightens the spicy and ambery facets, with an increased dose of cardamom and the addition of a sensual leather note, creating an even more decadent and luxurious experience.

An oriental floral fragrance that is both extravagant and sensual. Noir Pour Femme captures the fascinating paradox of the Tom Ford woman, blending dramatic florals with mysterious, gourmand notes of kulfi, vanilla, and amber.

A fragrance that merges floral leather and cool spices, evoking the vast, untethered spirit of the American West. Ombré Leather is a deeply textural scent that is both raw and refined, with a powerful black leather heart.

A radiant and sensual solar floral fragrance. Orchid Soleil captures the warmth of the sun on bare skin, blending spicy pink pepper and cypress with a creamy heart of tuberose and red lily, on a sweet vanilla and chestnut cream base.

A rich and noble fragrance that marries two of the most iconic ingredients in perfumery: oud and rose. Oud Fleur is a complex and opulent scent where the animalic oud is beautifully balanced by a symphony of roses and other precious woods.

A unique and dramatic fragrance that merges the richness of oud with the freshness of the ocean. Oud Minérale is an exhilarating scent that contrasts smoky oud with salty marine notes, pink pepper, and fir balsam, creating a scent of elemental power.

One of the most iconic scents in the Private Blend collection. Oud Wood is a masterful composition of exotic and precious woods. It uses rare oud wood, sandalwood, and vetiver, balanced with the warmth of tonka bean and amber, creating a smoky, refined, and sensual fragrance.

The definitive patchouli fragrance. Patchouli Absolu is a deep, modern, and hypnotic scent that explores every facet of the raw ingredient. It's a rich, earthy, and slightly smoky blend, enhanced with woods and leather for a luxurious finish.

A luscious and opulent fragrance that contrasts the succulence of Japanese plum with a rich blend of exotic Asian ingredients. Plum Japonais is a complex and sensual scent, blending sweet fruit with saffron, cinnamon, oud, and amber.
An untamed and decadent rose fragrance. Rose de Chine contrasts the rich, smoky aroma of Chinese peonies with the warmth of myrrh and labdanum, creating a provocative and untamed floral scent.
A new and daring interpretation of rose. Rose Exposed is a spicy and woody floral that combines the classic beauty of rose with the unexpected heat of pink pepper and a smoky, woody base.

A wild bouquet of beautiful and rare roses. Rose Prick is a sharp and pristine fragrance that blends three types of rose—May, Turkish, and Bulgarian—with the warmth of Sichuan pepper and turmeric, on a base of patchouli and tonka bean.

An oriental woody fragrance inspired by the mystery and luxury of the Middle East. Sahara Noir is a tribute to incense, blending the precious resin with notes of cypress, spices, and a rich, ambery base. It's a dry, smoky, and deeply spiritual scent.

A mesmerizing, spicy wood oriental. Santal Blush is a textured fusion of creamy sandalwood and exotic eastern spices, enhanced with intoxicating florals. It's a sensual, skin-like fragrance that is both glamorous and earthy.

An opulent and spicy floral oriental fragrance that evokes the glamour and intrigue of the historic Silk Road. Shanghai Lily is a rich blend of warm spices, exotic florals like lily and tuberose, and a deep, resinous base of incense and vanilla.

A bright, sun-drenched citrus floral fragrance. Sole di Positano captures the dream-like beauty of the Italian coast, blending a masterful mix of Italian bergamot, petitgrain, and lemon with a heart of shiso leaf, orange blossom, and jasmine.

An addictive solar floral amber and coco de mer-infused fragrance. Soleil Blanc is the epitome of a luxurious private island escape, blending spicy notes of cardamom and pink pepper with a decadent floral heart and a creamy base of amber and tonka bean.

A bright, crisp, and radiant floral musk that mimics the serene shimmer of sun on snow. Soleil Neige opens with bergamot and carrot seeds, leading to a floral heart and a warm, musky vanilla base. It's a scent of cool reflection and warm comfort.

A regal and rich fragrance that combines the iconic scents of oud and tobacco. Tobacco Oud is a powerful and smoky blend, featuring aromatic tobacco, precious oud, and warm spices, creating a scent of pure opulence.

An opulent, warm, and iconic fragrance. Tobacco Vanille is a modern take on an old-world gentleman's club, blending rich tobacco leaf and aromatic spices with a creamy, sweet base of tonka bean, vanilla, and cocoa. It's a luxurious and comforting scent.

A sensual and extravagant floral fragrance that captures the dual nature of the tuberose. Tubéreuse Nue unveils the flower's fresh petals at night and its intoxicatingly carnal aroma by day, blended with soft suede and a musky base.

A primal and sophisticated leather fragrance. Tuscan Leather captures the raw yet sensual scent of fine leather, enhanced with night-blooming jasmine and black suede. It's a modern classic that is both supple and powerful.

A force of nature in a fragrance. Vanille Fatale is a defiant and intoxicating scent that blends spicy saffron and coriander with the rich aroma of coffee absolute and a heart of narcissus and frangipani, all wrapped in a decadent vanilla and suede base.

An oriental floral that evolves the carnal grandeur and seductive power of the iconic Black Orchid into an uber-feminine fragrance. Velvet Orchid is a bold and glamorous scent, lavished with notes of cool citrus, dramatic petals, honey, and rum.

A brighter, more sparkling interpretation of Velvet Orchid. Lumière opens with a fresh burst of citrus and honey, maintaining the original's floral heart but with a lighter, more luminous touch. It's a radiant and sensual fragrance.

A fresh and elegant woody spicy fragrance that transports you to the sun-drenched citrus groves of southern Italy. Venetian Bergamot is a bright and sensual blend of bergamot, warm spices, and rich woods.

An unconventional and provocative green woody fragrance. Vert des Bois introduces a new expression of green, blending the aroma of budding poplar trees with anise, plum, and a warm, resinous base. It's an innovative and modern scent.

A modern and sophisticated take on bohemian chic. White Patchouli is a clean and elegant fragrance that blends the earthy depth of patchouli with sparkling bergamot and delicate white flowers, creating a surprisingly fresh and refined scent.

A charming and supple leather-musk fragrance. White Suede captures the primal essence of leather and suede, but gives it a beautiful new dimension with a blend of soft musk, velvety rose, and warm amber. It's an elegant and addictive scent.

A more intense and floral interpretation of the original Ombré Leather. The Parfum version amplifies the rich leather heart with unexpected notes of violet leaf and cedarwood, creating a distinctly powerful and seductive fragrance that is both raw and refined.

brandInfo.name: Tommy Hilfiger
brandInfo.description: Tommy Hilfiger is an American premium clothing brand. Its fragrance line is known for its fresh, clean, and often sporty scents that reflect a classic, all-American preppy style.

perfumes.description: The iconic and fresh floral fruity fragrance. Tommy Girl is a bright and energetic scent with notes of apple blossom, black currant, and a clean, citrusy opening.

brandInfo.name: Tosca
brandInfo.description: Tosca is a classic German fragrance brand, first launched in 1921. The scent is known for its timeless, elegant, and powdery floral aldehyde composition.

perfumes.description: A classic and timeless floral aldehyde fragrance. Tosca is a rich and elegant blend of florals, spices, and a warm, powdery base.

brandInfo.name: Tous
brandInfo.description: Tous is a Spanish jewelry, accessories and fashion firm. Its fragrance line is known for its playful, elegant, and often fresh and floral scents, with the teddy bear logo being a signature element.

perfumes.description: A gentle and comforting floral fragrance designed for babies and mothers. Baby Tous is a soft and clean scent with notes of citrus, florals, and a delicate, musky base.
A fresh and romantic floral fragrance. Rosa is a modern and elegant scent with a prominent rose accord, blended with violet and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Trussardi
brandInfo.description: Trussardi is an Italian luxury fashion house founded in 1911. Known for its leather goods, ready-to-wear, and accessories, Trussardi's fragrances are an extension of its sophisticated and elegant style, often inspired by the Italian lifestyle.

perfumes.description: A classic leather fragrance for men, Trussardi Uomo is a sophisticated blend of aromatic spices and rich woods. It evokes a sense of timeless elegance and refined masculinity, perfect for the modern gentleman.

perfumes.inspiredBy: Passeggiata in Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II
perfumes.description: A vibrant and artistic fragrance from the 'Le Vie di Milano' collection, celebrating the creative spirit of Milan. This scent is a sophisticated blend of floral and nutty notes, capturing the essence of a Milanese courtyard in bloom.
A fresh and modern fragrance for the man who forges his own path. A Way for Him is a dynamic and charismatic scent that blends citrus, woods, and a hint of the unexpected.

A fresher interpretation of the original Trussardi My Land, Blue Land is a crisp and invigorating fragrance that captures the essence of a cool, blue landscape. It's a scent for the man who is confident and free-spirited.
An elegant and sensual fragrance that captures the spirit of Italian elegance and craftsmanship. My Land is a modern classic, a scent that is both powerful and refined.
A fragrance that represents the modern Trussardi man, Riflesso is a scent of contrasts. It is both fresh and warm, aromatic and woody, a reflection of a man who is both traditional and contemporary.
A bold and passionate fragrance for the man who lives life to the fullest. Trussardi Uomo The Red is a spicy and woody scent that is both seductive and sophisticated.
A light and feminine fragrance that celebrates the beauty of the rose. Delicate Rose is a fresh and modern interpretation of a classic floral scent, perfect for the romantic and graceful woman.

A modern and sophisticated fragrance for women, Trussardi Donna is a tribute to the brand's iconic Donna fragrance. It is a radiant and sensual scent that combines fruity notes with a delicate floral heart and a warm, woody base.

A sophisticated and timeless fragrance that captures the essence of time. Essenza del Tempo is a complex and evolving scent that blends citrus, spices, and woods to create a truly unique olfactory experience.
A warm and inviting fragrance that feels like a second skin. Inside is a sensual and intimate scent that combines coffee and amber with a soft, floral heart.
A joyful and sparkling fragrance that captures the feeling of pure delight. Inside Delight is a fruity and floral scent with a touch of sweetness, perfect for the optimistic and playful woman.
A delicate and personal fragrance that is a tribute to femininity. My Name is a soft and powdery floral scent that is both elegant and intimate.
A fresh and feminine fragrance that is a celebration of a woman's unique charm. My Scent is a delicate and luminous floral bouquet that is both modern and timeless.
A soft and sensual fragrance that feels like a second skin. Skin is a delicate and intimate scent that is both comforting and alluring.

brandInfo.name: Ungaro
brandInfo.description: Emanuel Ungaro was a French fashion designer. His fragrance line is known for its bold, sensual, and glamorous scents, with the iconic Diva being a hallmark of 80s perfumery.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual amber spicy fragrance. Desnuda is an intimate and skin-like scent with notes of blood orange, cardamom, and a creamy vanilla and sandalwood base.
An iconic and opulent chypre floral fragrance. Diva is a rich and powerful scent with a prominent rose and honey accord, on a deep, mossy and animalic base.

brandInfo.name: Valentino
brandInfo.description: Valentino is an Italian luxury fashion house founded by Valentino Garavani. Known for its glamorous haute couture and signature 'Valentino Red', the brand's fragrance line, including the popular 'Born in Roma' and 'Voce Viva' collections, embodies modern romance, elegance, and a rebellious spirit.

perfumes.description: A sophisticated and elegant chypre floral fragrance. Donna is a modern classic that blends the freshness of bergamot with the beauty of iris and rose, on a smooth, leathery vanilla base.
A modern and edgy floriental fragrance. Donna Born in Roma is a bold and feminine scent that combines the sweetness of black currant with a trio of jasmine flowers and a warm, woody vanilla base.

A more intense and sensual version of Donna Born in Roma. The Intense version is a captivating amber floral that amplifies the vanilla and jasmine notes, creating a deeper and more addictive fragrance.
A modern and aromatic woody spicy fragrance. Uomo Born in Roma is a cool and edgy scent that combines mineral notes and salt with the freshness of violet leaf and a smoky, vetiver base.
An elegant and rebellious amber floral fragrance. Valentina is a beautiful and modern scent that combines the freshness of bergamot with the earthiness of truffle and a heart of white flowers.
A sophisticated and gourmand leather fragrance. Valentino Uomo is a modern classic that blends the freshness of bergamot with the richness of roasted coffee, chocolate, and a smooth, leathery base.

A limited edition collector's bottle of the original Valentino Uomo. This sophisticated and gourmand leather fragrance is a modern classic that blends roasted coffee, chocolate, and a smooth, leathery base.
A vibrant and playful floral fruity gourmand. Valentina Pink is a joyful and energetic scent with notes of strawberry, blackberry, and a heart of rose, on a sweet praline base.
A more intense and opulent version of Voce Viva. The Intensa version is a rich and captivating amber floral that amplifies the jasmine and vanilla notes, creating a deeper and more sensual fragrance.

brandInfo.name: Van Cleef & Arpels
brandInfo.description: Van Cleef & Arpels is a French luxury jewelry, watch, and perfume company. Its fragrance line, particularly the 'Collection Extraordinaire', is known for its high-quality, elegant, and artistic compositions that celebrate the beauty of nature's finest ingredients.

perfumes.description: A warm and addictive amber woody fragrance. Bois Doré is a smooth and creamy blend of tonka bean, vanilla, and precious woods, creating a sophisticated and comforting scent.
A classic and powerful aromatic fougère for men. Tsar is a rich and green scent with a complex blend of herbs, spices, and a deep, mossy and leathery base.
A fresh and delicate floral fruity fragrance. Feerie Spring Blossom is a bright and joyful scent with notes of cherry blossom, pink pepper, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Vera Wang
brandInfo.description: Vera Wang is an American fashion designer known for her wedding gowns. Her fragrance line is celebrated for its romantic, elegant, and feminine scents, with the iconic Princess being a popular choice for its playful and youthful charm.

perfumes.description: A playful and whimsical floral fruity gourmand. Princess is a sweet and enchanting scent with notes of water lily, apple, and a rich dark chocolate and vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Versace
brandInfo.description: Versace is an Italian luxury fashion company founded by Gianni Versace in 1978. The brand is known for its bold, glamorous, and often opulent designs, characterized by vibrant colors and daring cuts. Versace fragrances reflect this extravagant aesthetic, offering scents that are powerful, sensual, and often feature rich floral and oriental notes.

perfumes.description: A fresh and aromatic fougère for men, Blue Jeans is a classic and casual scent. It combines the freshness of citrus and basil with the warmth of sandalwood and a touch of vanilla.
A warm and aromatic fougère for men, Dreamer is a unique and captivating scent. It combines the freshness of lavender and sage with the warmth of tobacco and a touch of tonka bean.

A fresh and aquatic aromatic fougère for men, Dylan Blue is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of bergamot and grapefruit with the coolness of ambroxan and a touch of black pepper.
A fresh and aromatic fougère for men, Eros is a captivating and passionate scent. It combines the freshness of mint and green apple with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of cedarwood.
A vibrant and energetic citrus amber fragrance, Eros Energy is a modern and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of lemon and mandarin with the warmth of amber and a touch of mint.
A warm and spicy woody fragrance for men, Eros Flame is a captivating and passionate scent. It combines the freshness of lemon and mandarin with the warmth of vanilla and a touch of black pepper.
A classic and elegant leather chypre fragrance for men, L'Homme is a sophisticated and timeless scent. It combines the freshness of lemon and basil with the warmth of leather and a touch of oakmoss.
A fresh and aromatic fougère for men, Pour Homme is a classic and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of lemon and neroli with the warmth of cedarwood and a touch of tonka bean.
A fresh and spicy oriental woody fragrance for men, Versace Man is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of neroli and angelica with the warmth of saffron and a touch of tobacco.
A fresh and floral fruity fragrance, Bright Crystal is a luminous and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of yuzu and pomegranate with the beauty of peony and magnolia, on a soft, musky base.
A warm and spicy oriental floral fragrance, Crystal Noir is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of ginger and cardamom with the warmth of amber and a touch of gardenia.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance, Dylan Purple is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the sweetness of pear and freesia with the beauty of purple freesia and a soft, musky base.

A fresh and citrusy floral woody musk fragrance, Eros Pour Femme is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the freshness of Sicilian lemon and pomegranate with the beauty of jasmine and a warm, musky base.
A fresh and spicy floral fragrance, Gingembre Pétillant is a vibrant and uplifting scent. It combines the freshness of ginger with the beauty of white flowers and a touch of musk.
A sophisticated and elegant floral woody musk fragrance, Iris d'Elite is a captivating and luxurious scent. It combines the powdery sweetness of iris with the warmth of amber and a touch of musk.
A rich and opulent amber woody fragrance, Oriental Oud is a captivating and luxurious scent. It combines the exotic aroma of oud with the warmth of amber and a touch of rose.
A warm and woody spicy fragrance, Santal Boise is a captivating and sensual scent. It combines the richness of sandalwood with the warmth of saffron and a touch of cedarwood.
A fresh and floral woody musk fragrance, Vanitas is a luminous and elegant scent. It combines the freshness of lime and freesia with the beauty of tiare flower and a warm, woody base.
A vibrant and energetic floral fruity fragrance, Versus is a playful and youthful scent. It combines the freshness of kumquat and star apple with the beauty of stephanotis and a warm, musky base.

A luminous and sparkling floral fragrance, Yellow Diamond is a captivating and radiant scent. It combines the freshness of lemon and bergamot with the beauty of mimosa and freesia, on a warm, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Vertus
brandInfo.description: Vertus is a niche perfume house that creates bold, artistic, and high-quality fragrances. The brand is known for its powerful and long-lasting scents that often explore unique and provocative themes.

perfumes.description: An addictive and intoxicating fruity gourmand fragrance. Narcos'is is a powerful and unique blend of coffee, rhubarb, and mango, with a warm, ambery and woody base.

brandInfo.name: Victor & Rolf
brandInfo.description: Viktor & Rolf is a Dutch avant-garde luxury fashion house. The brand is known for its conceptual and theatrical designs. Their fragrance line is equally iconic, with explosive and opulent scents like the best-selling Flowerbomb and the spicy, masculine Spicebomb.

perfumes.description: A rich and complex amber woody fragrance, the discontinued Antidote is a magical potion of scents. It blends fresh mint and citrus with a warm, spicy heart and a deep, resinous and leathery base.
A delicious and addictive gourmand fragrance. Bonbon is a sweet and playful scent that wraps you in notes of caramel, supported by fruity mandarin and peach, and a warm, woody base.
An iconic and explosive floral fragrance. Flowerbomb is a lavish bouquet of flowers with a warm, gourmand twist. It blends notes of jasmine, rose, and orchid with a deep, patchouli and vanilla base.
A lighter and airier interpretation of Flowerbomb. Bloom is a fresh and joyful floral fragrance with a prominent 'liquid air' accord, blended with pomegranate and a heart of rose and jasmine.
A solar and exotic twist on Flowerbomb. Tiger Lily is a tropical and creamy fragrance that combines the sweetness of coconut milk with a heart of tiger lily and a juicy mango accord.
A spiritual and bewitching floral fragrance. Good Fortune is a modern and unique scent that blends the aromatic fennel and gentian flower with a heart of jasmine and a creamy vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Victoria'S Secret
brandInfo.description: Victoria's Secret is an American lingerie, clothing, and beauty retailer. Its fragrance line and body mists are famous for their playful, sexy, and often sweet and fruity scents, with Bombshell and the Fantasy collection being among its most popular.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual fragrance mist, Amber Romance is a comforting blend of rich amber and sweet crème anglaise. It's an inviting and classic scent from the brand's collection.
A glamorous and sparkling floral fruity fragrance. Angel Gold is a bright and confident scent with notes of bergamot, gardenia, and a soft, musky base.
A fresh and playful floral fragrance. Angels Only is a youthful and modern scent with notes of apple blossom, freesia, and a touch of violet.
A woody floral musk that adapts to your unique body chemistry. Bare is a soft and intimate scent with notes of Australian sandalwood, mandarin, and Egyptian violet.
A simple yet addictive gourmand fragrance mist. Bare Vanilla is a warm and cozy blend of whipped vanilla and soft, apple blossom.
A fresh and serene floral fragrance mist. Blissful Garden is a tranquil blend of tangerine, peony, and creamy woods, evoking a peaceful walk in a sunlit garden.

The iconic and best-selling fragrance from Victoria's Secret. Bombshell is a glamorous and confident floral fruity scent, with a signature blend of purple passionfruit, Shangri-La peony, and vanilla orchid.
A romantic and floral interpretation of the original Bombshell. Bombshell Forever is a bright and feminine scent with notes of boysenberry, lavender, and a unique pamplewood accord.
A festive and glamorous version of Bombshell. Bombshell Gold is a warm and luminous floral fragrance with notes of litchi, gilded peony, and a warm, sugary woods base.
A bright and sparkling limited edition of Bombshell. Pink Diamond is a vibrant floral fragrance with a prominent ylang-ylang note, refreshed by pink grapefruit.
A solar and tropical interpretation of Bombshell. Sundrenched evokes a beach sunset with notes of sunset coral peony, guava blossom, and warm sands.
A tropical and gourmand fragrance mist. Coconut Passion is a simple and beloved blend of creamy coconut and warm vanilla, evoking a tropical island getaway.
An energetic and flirty floral fragrance. Crush is a fresh and spicy scent with a prominent pink pepper note, blended with peony and Ashoka flower.
A bright and fruity floral fragrance. Dream Angels Glow is a luminous and feminine scent with notes of boysenberry, iris, and a warm, cashmere woods base.
A glamorous and vibrant floral fruity fragrance. Fabulous is a modern and sexy scent with notes of juicy currant, osmanthus, and pink freesia.
A seductive and exotic floral fruity fragrance. Forbidden is a tempting blend of exotic pear, jasmine, and a warm, amberwood base.
A romantic and sophisticated floral fragrance. Love Me is a beautiful blend of French narcissus, neroli, and a warm, sugary amber base.
An iconic and enchanting floral fruity fragrance mist. Love Spell is a vibrant and youthful blend of cherry blossom and fresh peach, creating a magical and irresistible aura.
A sensual and luxurious fragrance from the Parfums Intimes collection. Feathered Musk is a soft and intimate scent with notes of black cherry, musk, and a touch of leather.
A classic and flirty floral fruity fragrance mist. Pure Seduction is a juicy and irresistible blend of red plum and sweet freesia.
A decadent and gourmand fragrance. Rose Caramel is a rich and sweet blend of sugared rose, caramel, and a creamy vanilla base.
A seductive and gourmand floral fruity fragrance. Scandalous is a tempting blend of raspberry liqueur, black peony, and a sweet praline base.
A flirty and tempting floral fruity fragrance. This flanker to Noir Tease is a playful blend of pear, gardenia, and a creamy vanilla base.
A warm and gourmand floral fruity fragrance. Tease is a playful and flirty scent with notes of black vanilla, frozen pear, and blooming gardenia.
A light-as-air gourmand fragrance. Tease Crème Cloud is a dreamy and comforting blend of vanilla meringue, santal flower, and sheer amber.
A fresh and tropical gourmand fragrance. Tease Dreamer is an athletic and beachy scent with notes of bronzed coconut, ocean salt, and California sun.
A sweet and playful floral gourmand. Tease Sugar Fleur is a bright and candy-like scent with notes of fresh apple, jasmine buds, and a pop of pink caramel.
A soft and gourmand floral fragrance mist. Velvet Petals is a comforting and feminine blend of lush blooms and a sweet almond glaze.
A solar and warm interpretation of Velvet Petals. Sunkissed adds a radiant glow with notes of solar blooms and kiwi, creating a scent that feels like golden hour on the beach.
A tropical and floral fragrance that captures the heat of summer. Very Sexy Now is a lush blend of coconut, pink lotus, and warm sand.
A solar floral fragrance that evokes a day on a private beach. Very Sexy Now Beach is a warm blend of orange blossom, creamy coconut, and warm sand.
An exotic and tropical floral fragrance. Very Sexy Now Wild Palm is a lush blend of starfruit, monoi flowers, and white florals, inspired by a night in a palm-fringed oasis.
A lush and opulent white floral fragrance. Very Sexy Oasis is a heady blend of tuberose, camellia, and orange blossom, creating a scent that is both exotic and sophisticated.
A sensual and sophisticated floral fragrance. Very Sexy Touch is a warm and inviting blend of iris, apricot, and a rich amber base.
A warm and sweet gourmand fragrance mist. Warm Coconut Sugar is a comforting blend of coconut, vanilla, and brown sugar, creating a cozy and delicious scent.
A dark and edgy gourmand floral fragrance. Wicked is a sensual and mysterious blend of freesia, black sugar, and a warm Tahitian vanilla base.

brandInfo.name: Victoria's Secret
brandInfo.description: Victoria's Secret is an American lingerie, clothing, and beauty retailer. Its fragrance line and body mists are famous for their playful, sexy, and often sweet and fruity scents, with Bombshell and the Fantasy collection being among its most popular.

perfumes.description: A crisp and cool fragrance mist. Fresh Snowfall evokes the scent of a winter morning with notes of sugared peony and holly berries.
A classic and celebratory fragrance mist. Strawberries and Champagne is a sweet and bubbly blend of wild strawberries and sparkling champagne.
A soothing and creamy floral fragrance mist. Coconut Milk & Rose is a comforting blend of coconut milk and rose, creating a soft and relaxing scent.
A classic and simple amber vanilla fragrance mist. Vanilla Lace is a warm and comforting blend of vanilla and musk.

brandInfo.name: Vilhelm Parfumerie
brandInfo.description: Vilhelm Parfumerie is a niche fragrance brand founded by Jan Ahlgren. The scents are inspired by memories, travel, and classic glamour, creating modern and sophisticated fragrances with a narrative twist.

perfumes.description: A vibrant and juicy tropical fruity fragrance. Mango Skin is a realistic and delicious blend of ripe mango, blackberry, and a touch of vanilla.

brandInfo.name: Vivienne Westwood
brandInfo.description: Vivienne Westwood is a British fashion designer and activist who was largely responsible for bringing modern punk and new wave fashions into the mainstream. Her fragrances, like her fashion, are known for being bold, rebellious, and unconventional.

perfumes.description: An iconic and provocative chypre floral fragrance. Boudoir is a bold and sensual blend of florals, spices, and a warm, animalic and powdery base.

brandInfo.name: Widian
brandInfo.description: Widian (formerly AJ Arabia) is a luxury perfume house from Abu Dhabi. The brand creates fragrances that are a modern fusion of Arabian and Western perfumery, known for their opulent, high-quality, and sophisticated scents.

perfumes.description: A warm and sensual amber fragrance. Gold II Sahara is a rich and elegant blend of saffron, rose, and a deep, ambery and vanilla base.
A sophisticated and modern leather fragrance. London is a unique blend of oud, raspberry, and leather, creating a smoky, fruity, and elegant scent.

brandInfo.description: Xerjoff is an Italian luxury perfume house founded by Sergio Momo in Turin. The brand is renowned for its dedication to using the finest and rarest raw materials, combined with exquisite craftsmanship and artistic presentation. Xerjoff's fragrances span several collections, including 'Shooting Stars' and 'Casamorati', often celebrating Italy's rich history and culture while delivering complex and opulent olfactory experiences.
brandInfo.name: Xerjoff

perfumes.description: A rich and honeyed tobacco scent that celebrates the beauty of Sicily. Naxos balances fresh citrus notes with sweet tobacco and creamy tonka, creating an addictive and elegant gourmand experience.
A classic and spicy oriental fragrance that exudes vintage elegance. 1888 is a rich and complex blend of warm spices, florals, and a deep, woody base, reminiscent of a bygone era.
A fragrance that captures the feeling of luxury and freedom on a yacht in the Mediterranean. 40 Knots is a unique blend of salty sea air, warm sun rays, and deep, woody notes.
An elegant and sophisticated fruity chypre fragrance. Accento opens with a sparkling pineapple note that quickly blends with a powdery and floral heart on a warm, musky base.
A majestic and powerful fragrance that blends fruity lavender with precious woods and an exceptional oud. Alexandria II is the epitome of opulence and refinement.
A variation of the iconic Alexandria II, where the oud note is more prominent and smoky, adding a deeper, more mysterious dimension to the original composition.
A rich oriental fragrance that blends fruity top notes with a complex heart of rose and oud, resting on a warm, ambery base. A truly opulent and captivating scent.
A warm and resinous amber fragrance paired with precious woods. Amber Star is a deeply comforting and luxurious scent, perfect for those who love rich and enveloping aromas.
A tribute to the Apollo 11 moon landing, this is a clean, ethereal, and powdery floral musk. Apollonia evokes a sense of cosmic beauty with its delicate orris and white flowers.
A warm, spicy, and woody fragrance that creates a cozy and romantic aura. Bouquet Ideale is a beautiful blend of cashmere, vanilla, and spices.
A rich and aromatic fragrance that celebrates the world of fine cigars. Comandante is a complex blend of fruity, floral, and spicy notes with a prominent tobacco and leather base.
A beautifully balanced fruity and musky fragrance. Coro is elegant and uplifting, with a sophisticated blend of fruits, florals, and a soft, ambery musk base.
An adventurous and exotic fragrance inspired by the Amazon rainforest. Cruz del Sur I is a rich blend of rum, dried fruits, and leather with a deep animalic and woody base.
A soft, powdery, and ethereal fragrance that feels like a gentle caress. Dama Bianca is a delicate blend of white flowers, vanilla, and musk, creating a beautifully romantic and feminine aura.

An intensified and luxurious version of the collaboration with Tony Iommi. This parfum concentration adds a prominent leather note and enriches the spicy and gourmand facets for an even darker and more captivating experience.
A delightful and sweet gourmand fragrance inspired by the Amalfi coast. Dolce Amalfi is a playful blend of quince, apple, and spices with a warm, ambery base.
A bold and audacious fragrance capturing the essence of a gangster's world. Don is a powerful mix of gunpowder, whiskey, tobacco, and sugar for a truly unique and daring scent.
A new interpretation of Erba Pura presented in a stunning gold bottle. Erba Gold opens with a brighter citrus and ginger accord before revealing the signature fruity heart and ambery vanilla base.

A luscious and modern blend of Mediterranean citrus and sweet fruits, layered over a warm and sensual amber-oriental base. Erba Pura is an intoxicating and long-lasting fragrance that exudes joy and vitality.
A romantic and feminine fragrance that evokes the glamour of an 18th-century aristocratic ball. Gran Ballo is a sweet and intoxicating blend of honeysuckle, gardenia, and caramel.
An incredibly rich and decadent gourmand fragrance. Italica is a photorealistic scent of almond milk, toffee, and saffron, creating a warm, creamy, and utterly delicious experience.
A tribute to London's iconic department store, Harrods. JTC 400 is a sophisticated blend of honeyed tobacco, sweet orange blossom, and rich vanilla.
A bright and aromatic citrus fragrance with a rich, resinous undertone. Kobe is a complex and luxurious scent that blends neroli and petitgrain with exotic woods and oud.
A tribute to Moscow, this is a stunning fruity leather fragrance. La Capitale opens with strawberry and caramel before revealing a heart of leather and saffron on a rich amber and vanilla base.
A dark, herbal, and smoky woody fragrance. Laylati is a mysterious and captivating scent featuring a unique blend of green notes, cedar, patchouli, and a hint of sweet tobacco.
A tantalizing and gourmand fragrance that feels like a delicious dessert. Lira combines caramel, citrus, and vanilla with a hint of licorice and spice, creating a provocative and charming scent.
A classic Italian cologne style fragrance perfected. Mefisto is a bright, clean, and supremely elegant blend of citrus, lavender, and iris with a smooth woody base.
A poetic and intellectual fragrance that blends fruity and floral notes with a deep, resinous oud. More Than Words is a complex and artistic scent that tells a story on the skin.
A delicate and artistic fruity floral fragrance. Muse is a soft and sophisticated scent with notes of plum and white flowers resting on a clean, leathery base.
A vibrant and classic Italian citrus fragrance. Nio is a refreshing and sophisticated blend of neroli and bergamot with a green, spicy heart and a clean, woody base.
A grand and opulent floral woody fragrance. Opera is a dramatic and sophisticated blend of ylang-ylang, Turkish rose, and spices on a rich base of ambergris and vanilla.
A celebration of Italy, this is a vibrant and zesty citrus aromatic fragrance. Renaissance is a refreshing blast of mint and citrus with a soft, floral heart and a clean, musky base.
A rich and powerful fruity floral fragrance with an oriental twist. Soprano is a dramatic blend of lychee, freesia, and rose with a deep base of oud and leather.
A clean yet complex musk fragrance. Star Musk is a floral and spicy scent with a powerful, long-lasting musk and vanilla base that feels both sensual and sophisticated.
A warm and inviting spicy gourmand fragrance. Starlight is a comforting blend of cardamom and cinnamon with a smooth, balsamic, and ambery base.
A delectable and luxurious gourmand fragrance. Symphonium is a mouth-watering blend of Spanish chocolate and juicy orange with a rich vanilla and oud base.
A collaboration with the legendary guitarist, this is a dark, boozy, and spicy fragrance. It blends rum, passionfruit, and patchouli to create a rock 'n' roll scent with a gothic edge.
Created to celebrate the Nitto ATP Tennis Finals in Turin, this is an incredibly fresh and energetic green aromatic fragrance. A vibrant blast of mint, lemon, and basil.
A vibrant and aromatic fragrance that continues the celebration of the ATP Finals in Turin. It features a sophisticated blend of saffron, eucalyptus, and warm woods.
A sophisticated floral and powdery scent. Torino 23 is a tribute to classic elegance, featuring a prominent tuberose note blended with neroli, jasmine, and a soft, musky base.
A sophisticated and versatile fragrance that balances bright citrus with warm amber and coffee. Uden is a smooth, slightly sweet, and incredibly classy scent.
An intensified version of Uden, where the spicy and warm notes are amplified. Uden Overdose adds ginger and tobacco blossom for a more powerful and long-lasting experience.
A beautiful and bold rose fragrance with a smoky and spicy character. Wardasina, meaning 'little rose', is anything but small, featuring a powerful blend of saffron, rose, and tobacco.

brandInfo.description: Yankee Candle is an American manufacturer and retailer of scented candles, candleholders, accessories, and dinnerware. Their fragrance line, often in the form of home fragrance oils and sprays, aims to replicate their most popular candle scents, known for being evocative, comforting, and true-to-life.
brandInfo.name: Yankee Candles

perfumes.description: The scent of sun-dried cotton combined with green notes, white flowers, and a hint of lemon. Clean Cotton is a fresh and clean fragrance that evokes freshly laundered linens.
A delightful autumn scent that combines the aroma of brown sugar, cinnamon, and cloves with a touch of apple and cedarwood. Fall Festival evokes a cozy, festive atmosphere.
The authentic scent of an English garden full of fragrant roses. Fresh Cut Roses is a pure, photorealistic floral fragrance that is both timeless and romantic.
A heartwarming blend of cinnamon, baking spices, and a hint of freshly poured tea. Home Sweet Home is the quintessential cozy and welcoming fragrance.
A festive and fruity scent of pomegranate mixed with sweet apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. Pomegranate Cider is a perfect fragrance for autumn gatherings.
A sophisticated and soothing blend of florals and subtle fruits. Wedding Day is a romantic and elegant fragrance, perfect for celebrating special moments.

brandInfo.name: Yardley
brandInfo.description: Yardley London is a British personal care brand and one of the oldest in the world, established in 1770. The brand is famous for its classic, elegant, and affordable floral fragrances, particularly those centered around lavender and rose.

perfumes.description: A classic and timeless floral fragrance. English Rose is a fresh and delicate scent that captures the essence of a blooming English garden.
A fresh and delicate floral green fragrance. Lily of the Valley is a bright and classic scent that captures the dewy freshness of the flower.

brandInfo.name: Yas
brandInfo.description: Yas Perfumes is a luxury fragrance house from the UAE, known for its opulent and traditional Arabian scents, often featuring high-quality oud, amber, and musk.

perfumes.description: A sweet and fruity gourmand fragrance. Huboob is a delicious and playful blend of tropical fruits, vanilla, and a touch of oud.

brandInfo.name: Ysl
brandInfo.description: Yves Saint Laurent is a French luxury fashion house founded by Yves Saint Laurent and his partner, Pierre Bergé. The brand's fragrance line is legendary, with iconic and often revolutionary scents like Opium, Kouros, and Paris that have left an indelible mark on the history of perfumery.

perfumes.description: A playful and sparkling floral fruity fragrance. Baby Doll is a bright and youthful scent with notes of grapefruit, black currant, and a touch of rose.
A warm and sensual amber spicy fragrance. Babycat is a soft and leathery scent with a prominent vanilla and suede accord, blended with warm spices.
A warm and comforting amber woody fragrance. Caban is a cozy and elegant scent that blends pink pepper and tonka bean with a smooth sandalwood base.
A sophisticated and leathery amber fragrance. 6 Place Saint Sulpice is a warm and elegant scent with notes of leather, saffron, and a rich, woody base.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance. Lavallière is a bright and elegant scent that blends the sweetness of fig and black currant with a heart of rose.
A warm and sensual amber spicy fragrance. Body Kouros is a modern and unique scent that contrasts the coolness of eucalyptus with the warmth of incense and a sweet, benzoin base.
An iconic and powerful aromatic fougère. Kouros is a bold and animalic fragrance with a complex blend of aldehydes, spices, and a deep, leathery and mossy base.
A fresh and modern interpretation of Kouros. Kouros Silver is a vibrant and energetic aromatic fragrance with a prominent apple and sage accord.
A more intense and sensual version of L'Homme. The Intense version is a rich and captivating amber woody fragrance with a prominent suede and orange blossom accord.
A fresh and spicy interpretation of L'Homme. Libre is a vibrant and energetic woody spicy fragrance with a prominent violet leaf and basil accord.
A fresh and energetic interpretation of L'Homme. The Sport version is a vibrant and modern woody aromatic with a prominent aldehydes and verbena accord.

perfumes.inspiredBy: LA NUIT DE L'HOMME BLEU ELECTRIQUE
perfumes.description: A fresher and spicier take on the iconic La Nuit de l'Homme, with an electrifying dose of cardamom and ginger.
An iconic and seductive woody spicy fragrance. La Nuit de l'Homme is a dark and sensual blend of cardamom, lavender, and a warm, woody base.
A legendary and groundbreaking amber woody fragrance. M7 was one of the first mainstream designer scents to feature a prominent oud note, blending it with warm amber and fresh vetiver.
A modern and expressive aromatic floral fragrance. MYSLF is a clean and sensual scent that blends fresh bergamot with a radiant orange blossom heart and a warm, woody base.
An iconic and exotic amber spicy fragrance for men. Opium Pour Homme is a rich and sensual blend of black currant, star anise, and a warm, balsamic and vanilla base.
A classic and sophisticated aromatic fougère. Rive Gauche Pour Homme is the ultimate barbershop scent, with a fresh and spicy blend of star anise, lavender, and a deep, mossy patchouli base.
A sophisticated and elegant chypre fragrance. Tuxedo is a modern and unisex scent that blends the earthiness of patchouli with the warmth of ambergris and a touch of spice.
A modern and fresh aromatic fougère. Y Eau de Toilette is a crisp and clean scent that blends the freshness of apple and sage with a warm, ambery and woody base.
A more intense and sensual version of Y. Le Parfum is a deep and aromatic fougère with a prominent lavender and cedarwood accord, creating a bold and sophisticated scent.
A sweet and exotic amber floral fragrance. Atlas Garden is a delicious blend of dates and orange blossom, with a warm, tonka bean and ambroxan base.
A mysterious and sensual amber woody fragrance. Belle d'Opium is a modern and intoxicating blend of white flowers, incense, and a smoky, hookah accord.
An iconic and addictive amber vanilla fragrance. Black Opium is a modern gourmand that blends the adrenaline rush of black coffee with the sweetness of vanilla and a soft, white floral heart.
A more intense and radical version of Black Opium. The Extreme version amplifies the coffee and cacao notes, creating a darker, more powerful, and long-lasting gourmand experience.
A zesty and energetic twist on Black Opium. Illicit Green adds a juicy green mandarin and creamy fig accord to the signature coffee and vanilla base, creating a mocktail-inspired fragrance.
The most intense and sensual version of Black Opium. Le Parfum is a rich and powerful amber vanilla with a quartet of vanilla notes, creating an incredibly deep and long-lasting gourmand experience.
An electrifying and luminous interpretation of Black Opium. Nuit Blanche is a creamy and energetic scent that blends the signature coffee accord with rice and white musk.
A juicy and seductive twist on Black Opium. Over Red introduces a luscious cherry accord to the signature coffee and vanilla base, creating a sweet, fruity, and intoxicating fragrance.
An elegant and sophisticated floral fragrance. Capeline is a beautiful and powdery blend of lily and vanilla, creating a soft and feminine aura.
A glamorous and radiant amber floral fragrance. Cinema evokes the elegance of old Hollywood, with a sparkling blend of clementine, almond blossom, and a warm, ambery vanilla base.
A modern and vibrant floral woody musk. Elle is a bold and feminine scent with a prominent patchouli and pink pepper accord, blended with fresh florals.
A bold and modern amber fougère. Libre is a groundbreaking fragrance that contrasts the masculinity of lavender with the femininity of orange blossom, creating a unique and empowering scent.
A warm and spicy interpretation of Libre. This version adds a fiery ginger and saffron accord to the signature lavender and orange blossom blend, creating a more intense and captivating scent.
A more intense and sensual version of Libre. The Intense version amplifies the floral heart with orchid and adds a richer, creamier vanilla and tonka bean base.
A cool and metallic interpretation of Libre. L'Absolu Platine adds a fresh white lavender accord and aldehydes to the signature blend, creating a modern and intensely aromatic fragrance.
A warm and spicy interpretation of Libre. This version adds a fiery ginger and saffron accord to the signature lavender and orange blossom blend, creating a more intense and captivating scent.
A radiant and spicy floral fragrance. Magnificent Blossom is a beautiful blend of jasmine and orange blossom, with a touch of saffron and a woody base.
An opulent and luxurious amber woody fragrance. Magnificent Gold is a rich and sensual blend of vanilla, oud, and spices, creating a truly precious scent.
A bold and sensual amber floral fragrance. Manifesto is a modern and addictive blend of jasmine, green notes, and a creamy, woody vanilla base.
A more intense and opulent version of Manifesto. L'Elixir is a rich and captivating amber floral with a prominent vanilla and cashmeran accord.
A sparkling and romantic chypre fruity fragrance. Mon Paris is a modern love story in a bottle, with a dizzying blend of red berries, datura flower, and a deep, white musk and patchouli base.
An iconic and provocative amber spicy fragrance. Opium is a legendary and opulent blend of spices, resins, and florals, creating a dark, sensual, and unforgettable scent.
A classic and romantic floral fragrance. Paris is a beautiful and vibrant bouquet of roses and violets, creating a timeless and ultra-feminine scent.
A modern and sensual floral woody musk. Parisienne is a unique and edgy scent with a prominent vinyl accord, blended with cranberry, rose, and a soft, musky base.
An iconic and sophisticated floral aldehyde fragrance. Rive Gauche is a bold and assertive scent with a metallic, aldehydic opening, a rich floral heart, and a deep, mossy base.
An opulent and intoxicating amber floral fragrance. Supreme Bouquet is a rich and sensual blend of white flowers, particularly tuberose and ylang-ylang, with a fruity touch and a warm, ambery base.
A modern and edgy amber floral fragrance. Vinyle is a unique and sensual blend of myrrh, pink pepper, and a touch of vanilla, creating a warm and resinous scent.

A sparkling and joyful chypre fruity fragrance. Yvresse (formerly Champagne) is a vibrant and effervescent scent with a prominent peach and nectarine accord, blended with spices and a deep, mossy base.

brandInfo.name: Yves Rocher
brandInfo.description: Yves Rocher is a French skincare, cosmetics and perfume company, founded in 1959. The brand is known for its botanical-based products and its commitment to natural ingredients, offering a wide range of accessible and nature-inspired fragrances.

perfumes.description: A warm and radiant white floral fragrance. Plein Soleil is a rich and exotic blend of tuberose and ylang-ylang, with a creamy sandalwood and cardamom base.

brandInfo.description: Zadig & Voltaire is a French fashion brand founded in 1997. The brand's aesthetic is characterized by a rock-and-roll, bohemian-chic style. Their fragrance line, particularly the 'This Is Her!' and 'This Is Him!' collections, reflects this edgy yet effortless vibe, often featuring contrasting notes like creamy vanilla and smoky incense.
brandInfo.name: Zadig & Voltaire

perfumes.description: A playful and sweet amber vanilla fragrance. Girls Can Be Crazy is a fun and addictive blend of pear and cola with a creamy vanilla and sandalwood base.
An empowering and modern amber floral. Girls Can Do Anything is a sweet and unconventional fragrance that blends pear and orange blossom with a warm tonka bean and vanilla base.
A sensual and rebellious amber floral. Just Rock! for Her is a creamy and intoxicating blend of white florals, particularly tuberose and jasmine, with a warm, woody vanilla base.
A dark and mysterious amber woody fragrance. This is Him! is a cool and edgy blend of grapefruit, spicy black pepper, and a smoky heart of incense and vanilla.
The brand's signature feminine fragrance. This is Her! is a unique and addictive amber vanilla with a creamy, nutty heart of chestnut and whipped cream, balanced by soft florals and sandalwood.
An intense and vibrant amber woody fragrance. This is Really Him! is a modern and luminous scent that blends bright citrus with a warm, resinous amber and palo santo base.
A unisex fragrance designed to be shared. This is Us! is a soft and comforting amber vanilla with a clean, musky character and a smooth sandalwood base.

brandInfo.name: Zara
brandInfo.description: Zara is a Spanish apparel retailer. Its fragrance line is known for being trendy, affordable, and often created in collaboration with renowned perfumers, offering a wide range of scents that are frequently compared to popular designer fragrances.

perfumes.description: A playful and sweet floral fruity fragrance. Barbie is a bright and cheerful scent with notes of orange, neroli, and a powdery, vanilla base.
An elegant and powdery floral fragrance. Zara Woman is a sophisticated and clean scent with notes of peony, bergamot, and a soft, musky sandalwood base.

brandInfo.name: Zarkoperfume
brandInfo.description: Zarkoperfume is a Danish niche perfume house founded by Zarko Ahlmann Pavlov. The brand is known for its molecular fragrances that fuse classic French perfumery with Nordic molecular science, creating unique scents that interact with the wearer's skin.

perfumes.description: A unique and sparkling floral fruity gourmand. Pink Molecule 090.09 is a fresh and sweet scent with notes of champagne, apricot, and a creamy, woody base.
A clean and comforting floral woody musk. The Muse is a soft and powdery scent that evokes the feeling of fresh laundry, with a prominent white musk and cotton flower accord.
A fresh and fruity floral fragrance. The Youth is a bright and energetic scent with notes of peach, pear, and a soft, musky base.

brandInfo.name: Zielinski & Rozen
brandInfo.description: Zielinski & Rozen is an artisanal perfume house from Tel Aviv. The brand is known for its handcrafted, dynamic, and multi-layered fragrances, with each bottle being individually signed by the perfumer.

perfumes.description: A rich and deep amber vanilla fragrance. Vanilla Blend is a warm and sophisticated scent that is more than just sweet, offering a complex and multi-faceted take on vanilla.
